Not to mention his engorged organ that seemed to be effected the most. At about 16in long and 3in wide with tennis balls for balls, it seemed that it had a life of its own.

Ken was speechless…

Wess “It seems to work very well on you. Previous test subjects had half the growth that you had. It might be because of your size. The bigger you are. The bigger you grow I guess.”

Ken looked at his body in amazement. “Tell me!!!! What’s your secret. How does it work? How can it be possible! I just got years of progress in minutes or less!”

Wess “Should I tell you? I think I might if you promise me one thing.”

Ken looked at Wess greedily. “Anything! I’ll do anything!”

Wess “I want you to do a little spying on Ben Tennyson.”

Ken felt a rage rush up, but he suppressed it somehow. “Why do you need me to do that? Is the punk that special?”

Wess “He has something that a person wants. That person hired me to get it. Now I’m hiring you. Will you accept?”

Ken smile evilly. “As long as I get that secret. I’m in.”

Wess smile “Very good. The secret is…” Wess walked toward the ray gun and opened a small compartment to reveal a small green pearl sized orb. It gave off a small glow as though someone just shoved energy into it. “…this little pearl.”

Ken looked at Wess like he was crazy. How can something like that make his growth possible. “You’re kidding right?”

Wess “No I’m not. This little orb here can convert regular energy into something that strengthens any living organism. It also grows what ever holds it. Though its strange. I was told that these orbs are selective to one owner at a time, but once you shove a chunk of energy into them, they couldn’t care less. Anyway… as long as you have this on hand, you’ll grow. However, not as fast as this time. I just fired a few trillion kilojoules of energy into the orb and fired it at you. That’s a lot of energy.”

Ken looked at the orb with desire and imagined how soon he’d be able to bring Ben down. He reached out to grab it, but Wess pulled it back. Ken glared at Wess angrily and was about to attack.

Wess “Stop. don’t forget out deal.”

Ken smile at that “Don’t worry. I’ll see of he was what you want. I might even help you get it depending on my mood.”

Wess “Very good. Here you go.” Wess hands over the pearl. “I’m expecting another one to come in soon. If you want, you can have it. That is… if you get me what I want.”

Ken looked at Wess with a crazed look “Oh… you’ll get it alright.”

Ken leaves after that with the pear held tightly in his newly strengthened grasp.

What happens now?
14112221111211121112111221211.title: Looks for a faster way to get stronger.

choices: Sees Ben and decides to do a face off.
141122211112111211121112212112.content:
The next day at school, Ken walked around showing off his new growth. He didn’t care if people said it was impossible, he’d just say that he’d had a growth spurt similar to Ben, but several times faster.

As the day went on, Ben passes Ken several time, and he had a strange sense that he was being watched. Also, he could feel the orb in his necklace pulse stronger every time Seth passed him. (Ben had stopped feeling the presence of other pearls ever since he absorbed the green star). Also, every time Ken passes him, he felt that Ken was different.

As Ken traveled the hall, he made sure to keep an eye on Ben when ever he saw him. However, it was weird. Every time he passed Ben, he’d have this sudden intense tingle, but that vanished as soon as Ben walked away. Be lunch time, his new cloths felt tight, so he went to investigate. Ken went to the bathroom and looked in the mirror. What he saw amazed him. He had checked that morning, and saw that he’d grown a tiny bit, but now there was a significant growth showing. “What can it be the Ben has.”

When the day ended, Ken went to the gym and did his usual work out routine. He was more than happy to find that his old weight settings were practically weightless. He felt a tiny pressure, but that was it. He had to light several hundred pound weights to get a partial work out. “This is amazing.” Ken took out the pearl and kissed it for all its worth. After that he went outside to see…

What does he see and do?
141122211112111211121112212112.title: Spies on Ben.

choices: Seals away the pearl before Ken can get it again.
Knocks Ken out and gets the plumbers to make everyone forget what happened.
1411222111121112111211122121121.content:
The first thing Ken saw was Ben and his friend Amy talking. They had become friends about a month ago, and they learnt that they had a lot in common. Amy was a bookish girl, but she wasn’t afraid to get her hands dirty. She new how to laugh and talk and have fun, but she was totally dependable and an overall great person to know and be with.

Last year, Ben was bullied and pushed around. He had always been the smallest of the stalk. Short and not to strong, but he was always defiant and pranking people. This put him at the bottom easily. People made fun of him and didn’t include him, but one girl was never cruel. That girl was Amy. She talked to Ben once in a while, and Ben was grateful for that, so he never pranked her. Ever since the 5th grade, Ben had a bit of a crush on Amy. Anyhow… back to reality.

Ken walked up to Ben “Hey… like the new me? I’m bigger and better than ever. There’s no way you can take me down this time.”

Ben frowned and said with an annoyed tone “Look. I don’t care if your better or stonger, so why should you!”

Ken “Because being lower means you have to look up at someone. I hate it even more because I’m taller than you, but I still have to look up to see you. I was the top dog at my old school. I’m just second best here.”

Ben “What’s wrong with that?”

Ken “Everything. Know one remembers second. Its always the top they know of. Second is just the lacky.”

Ben sighed “What ever. I’m done dealing with you.” Ben stood up and got ready to leave. He helped Amy with her things.

Ken roared angrily “You done when I say so. Now sit down. We’re arm wrestling again, and this time, you have no hope of beating me.”

Ben sighed and sat down. He asked Amy to step to the sides because this might get a little ugly. Ben and Ken sat down on either sides of the table and grasped each others hand. By now a group of kids had gathered. The all heard Ken’s rant.

When they both sat down, Ben saw his necklace glow green for a sec, and then he saw a similar green from Ken’s pocket. “It’s a pearl” Ben thought.

Ben “Ok. Seth, I’ll do this on one condition. If I win, I can take one thing from you. If you win, you can have something from me.”

Ken thought about it for a sec, and agreed because of his overconfidence.

The same kid from before began to countdown and referee. “3...2...1... Wrestle!”

Ben did the same thing as before, and sat there holding Ken’s arm with ease. Ken on the other hand was totally dismayed to find that Ben’s arm hadn’t moved an inch. “How?!? I’m twice your size! How can you keep up?”

Ben “Because I’m stronger than you. Its that simple.” At this, Ben slammed Ken’s huge arm down threw the table and onto the ground.”

Ken groaned clutching his arm. All his anger that he though had gone away with his growth had risen back up back up with greater force then ever before. As though reacting to Ken’s emotion and Ben’s orb, the pearl in Ken’s pocket glowed brighter than ever. Before Ken knew what was happening, he began to grow at a colossal rate. He felt pain everywhere as though he had done a marathon over and over again. His eyes were closed tight from the pain.

All Ben knew was that Ken was growing even bigger than he was before and it was slowing down. He got taller and stronger, and just kept on growing. His shirt ripped off soon to reveal a tank where his torso used to be, and his giant legs were soon revealed. When he pants had ripped off, the pearl had fallen out under Ken, so he was still lying on it as he grew. The agony he suffered was to much, so he all he did was sit there on top of the pearl. By now all the kids had run screaming from the growing Ken.

Ken soon passes 6ft then 7 ft and 8ft, and just kept going. When he got to 30ft tall, he had rolled on his side smashing threw half the school’s playing field, and off the pearl. As soon he was off of it, his growth stopped and so did the pain.

The surprise of Ken growing kept Ben from moving to do anything, so Ben just stood there, but when the pearl revealed itself, Ben ran and grabbed it, and put it in his pocket.

When his growth stopped, Ken’s eyes opened and looked around. Everything looked different. Everything was smaller, or he was BIGGER! Ken looked down and saw two meaty pecs blocking his view. “No way!” Ken started to bounce his pecs up and down and enjoyed his new growths.

Down below, Ben’s face had turned red because Ken’s underwear had ripped up along with the rest of his growth, and a 10ft long anaconda was swinging in the air with bean bag balls. However, that didn’t stop Ben from taking this chance to do something.

What does he do?
1411222111121112111211122121121.title: Sees Ben and decides to do a face off.

choices: Ken was shrinking. With out the pearl, he loses his size, or did he?
14112221111211121112111221211211.content:
While Ken was absorbed in his growth, Ben took the chance to hide the pearl so that Ken couldn’t get it again. Ben opened his compass and was about to put it in, but the pearl started to float up and get sucked into the pearl by itself. Ben took out his orb, and saw that it had a small pearl in the middle (from before), but now, it had a single glowing dot orbiting it. Ben put the orb back into the locket and turned his attention to Ken.

By now, Ken had remembered what was happening, and he turned his attention Ben as well. Then a thought hit him. The pearl… where is it! Ken bent down looking all over the ground, but I seems impossible. The pearl was just to small for his huge eyes to locate. Then another though entered his mind. Ben… he might already have it.

Ken “Give it to me.”

Ben “You mean the pearl? No…”

Ken knew that Ben had it from that, so he tried to grab Ben, but Ben just avoided him.

After a while, Ben noticed something was off.

What was it?
14112221111211121112111221211211.title: Seals away the pearl before Ken can get it again.

choices: Ben got some help from gramps to get things cleaned up.
Ben starts to get ideas and advice.
141122211112111211121112212112111.content:
As Ken tried frantically to catch Ben, things started to change. Ben noticed that his head didn’t have to look up so high to see Ken’s face anymore. After a few minutes, Ken had shrunk down to an average size. Even the muscle he had before the orb was gone. He was ‘average’ sized now.

Ben stopped running around now and waited for Ken to realize what happened.

Ken “What’s going on! What happened to my muscles! I just got them!” Ken fell to the ground crying all over his naked self. Ben looked down at Ken, but felt a little pity. Ben ran home and got some cloths for Ken to put on. That would take a normal person about 10min, but it looked like Ben hadn’t even left. He’s that fast. It appears as though he just materialized the cloths out of nowhere.

Ben “Put these on. Make yourself look decent.”

Ken was still moaning over his loss. (I just realized that a lot of kids are jealous of each other and want to out do the other. It makes sense right?) Somehow, in has loss, Ken was still able to think. He had given up right there and then. He couldn’t stop Ben. He simply put on Ben’s cloths and walked away defeated. He started walking towards the gym to start all over again. Ben just watch sadly as Ken walked away.

When Ken was gone, Ben decided to help Ken out a bit, but first he had to fix the field. Ben ran and fixed anything that could be fixed, and put the dirt back in their proper place. After that, he walked towards to the gym to look for Ken.

Ken was sitting at a bench press lifting weights. He hadn’t even looked at the weight setting. Just lifting what ever he thought he could. If he had looked, he would have seen that he was lifting several hundred pounds with ease.

Ben “Ken. That’s kind of amazing what you’re doing there.”

Ken looked up slowly “What?”

Ben “You’re lifting about 600 lbs there.”

Ken turn his head to the weight and was surprise to see it was true. “What’s going on?” He said quietly.

Ben “I think I know. Lets go check out a scale to make sure.”

Ben led Ken to the nurse’s office to use the electronic scale. Be told Ken to step on it. For some reason, the school had an industrial scale used for weighing objects in the thousands of pounds. When Ken stepped on, the numbers began to rise. It stopped at about 30tons. “I thought so… Your previous size has been compressed into this frame. I think that there is one more thing you can do.”

Ken looked at the scale amazed and wanted to hear more from Ben “What?”

Ben “Lets go back to the gym. There’s more room there.”

They both went back to the gym and Ben said “Imagine yourself bigger. I want to see what happens.”

Ken did just that. He imagined himself bigger than Ben. About 300 lbs of muscle and about 7 ft tall. As soon as he thought that, he began to grow bigger. Ben’s ‘normal’ cloths were tearing at this new size. “Wow…” Then Ken started to get an evil smile.

Ben had looked away while he was think about how to tell this to his Grampa, but while his guard was down, Ken had taken the chance to grow to his biggest size (which was the thirty ft tall behemoth), and attacked Ben. He threw Ben at the wall with such force that that half of the room caved in on itself. At this, Ken quickly ran out and went looking for someone that could stop Ben. Ken looked around, and saw Amy on the field looking for Ben. He ran out and grabbed Amy before she could run away.

Ben had been stunned by Ken’s attack. Ben was hit on the temple, so it had knocked him out. When Ben came to (about 2 min after because he recovers quickly), he followed Ken’s destruction.

Ken was in the middle of the field with a wide grin and something in his hands.

Amy “Ben! Help me!”

Ben turned his attention to Ken’s hand and was angered that he had involved innocent people. Especially the girl the Ben like!

Ben “Put her down. This has nothing to do with her.”

Ken “So? I don’t really care. I think I have the upper hand now. You wouldn’t want to hear this would you?” Ken gave Amy a slight squeeze, and Amy screamed and passed out. “Woops. A little to tight I guess.”

Ben had enough “This is you last warning. Put her down or else.”

Ken “Or else wh-” Ken didn’t get to finish because Ben gave into his rage. In a fraction of a second, Ben had given Ken a few hundred punches. All with enough force to kill a hundred men each, but at Ken’s size, they were only enough to give him a lot of bad bruises and to knock him out. Ken had let go of Amy.

As she fell, she was aware that she was falling. Then it stopped suddenly. Ben had ran up to her and caught her. Amy fell into Ben’s arm. You’d expect it to hurt because of his hard muscles, but it didn’t. Ben soften her fall and carried her. To Amy, the world was a small bubble that contained only Ben and Amy right there and then. She felt safe. She felt the warmth in his body calming her, and the strong steady beat of Ben’s powerful heart. Before, They were just friends, but she didn’t know anymore. She didn’t get to think much more because as Ben carried her, she drifted into blissful sleep.

Ben vaguely remembered where Amy lived, so he carried her slowly home. Savoring the moment. When he got to her house, he knocked on the door and waited for one of Amy’s parents to open the door. A lady wearing an apron came to the door, and was shocked to see Amy passed out in the arms of Ben.

Ben “Excuse me. Are you Amy’s mom?”

The lady “What did you do to my baby? What’s wrong with her. Give her to me!” Amy’s mom grabbed her from Ben violently in panic. “I’m sorry, but I don’t know you. I thank you for bringing her home. I want to trust you, but I can’t”

Ben nodded in agreement “I know. I understand. Anyway, some kid pulled a prank and put knockout gas in her locker. She was out cold when she opened her locker. I was in the hall when it happened, and took her to the nurse. The nurse said she’d be fine, but should go home. I just carries her.”

Amy’s mom smiled, but she still hesitated to do more.

Ben “Anyway. I have to go back home. I have a few things to get for my mom.” Ben turned and left and Amy’s mom just stared. Soon after, Amy’s dad had joined Amy’s mom and was shocked. He carries Amy up to her room, and let her rest.

The next morning, Amy woke up to find her mom on her bed, and her dad laying in a chair next to her bed.

Amy “Mom… dad… why are you here?”

This woke up her parents and they were so happy to see their daughter was ok. They asked her what happened with the knockout gas, and the large young man that carries her home. When they described Ben, her faced turned a little red, and she hoped they didn’t notice.

Amy “Umm… yah. I vaguely remember Ben, you remember him, carrying me to the nurse. I don’t remember much after that.”

Mom “Wait. That was Ben? Wow. He grew a lot over the summer. Quite the gentleman.”

Dad “Well. I think I’d like to meet him.”

Amy’s face turned red as she thought of how she felt when Ben had carried her home. “Yah… I think we all like him.” She muttered.

Mom “What was that honey? I didn’t hear you.”

Amy “No. Nothing. I think I should get to school. My friends are going to worry.”

Dad “Actually, the school is close down for repairs. It seems like that knock out gas had done damage to a gas line that caused part of the school to explode. Luckily, no one was hurt.”

Amy was shocked “So no school? Can I at least go outside?”

Both her parents seemed nervous about doing that, but they reluctantly said yes.

What happens now?
141122211112111211121112212112111.title: Ken was shrinking. With out the pearl, he loses...

1411222111121112111211122121121111.content:
Back at Ben’s place, Ben had just called Gramps to get the Plumbers to make a cover story for what happened at school. After he hung up, he jumped onto bed and tried to sort his thoughts.

Ben thought “What happened back there. I carried her home. That was it.” However, Ben couldn’t get a grasp over what he was feeling. When he carried her, he wanted to do everything he could to keep her safe. He looked at the calm face and the steadiness of her breathing. He wanted to never ever wanted to hear that scream again. The one that came out when Ken squeezed her half to death. After laying for a while, Ben fell asleep.

The next morning, Ben had woken up and was still thinking about what he felt. When his dad came in to tell him that school was canceled till further notice, Ben asked something. “Hey dad. Can I ask a question.”

Dad “Sure sport. What’s on your mind.”

Ben “Well. I don’t know how to say it.”

Dad closed the door and locked it “What? I’m listening.”

Ben “Well there’s a girl, and I don’t know what happened.”

Dad gave a small chuckle as though he just learnt a cute little secret. “Ok. I think I know what going on, but just keep talking.”

Ben told a small lie about how Amy was about to get hit by a car, and he get her out of it. He said she fainted, and he carried her home, and how he felt. How his emotions were all missed up. Anger towards the car (Ken), and a sense of protecting. About hot he cared about only one thing.”

Dad “Ok. I think its time we had a talk…”

One talk later.

Ben looked at his dad with a new view of the world.

Dad “Ok sport. I’m going to be late for work now. Take care while I’m gone. Oh and you can have this.” His dad slipped him a twenty. “Maybe take you lady friend for a movie?”

Ben “Dad!” Ben’s face turned red.

Dad “Just saying. Mom’s on a business trip to Hawaii, and I’m not home.”

Ben “DAD!”

Dad “Ok... Ok… I’ll stop. The money’s on the table.”

When Ben heard his dad leave the house and the car backing out, Ben stood up and put the twenty in his pocket. “What movie is good.”

*Hours later*

Amy had been walking around and somehow wandered into the local park. Ben had done the same as well. As they were walking, they were lost in thought, and without looking, they walked right into each other.

Ben and Amy “Oh! Sorry. Didn’t see you. I was j-”

Ben and Amy again “Oh. Hi. Sorry. I didn’t-” Both their faces turned red as they accidentally talked in unison.

Amy “Hey… thanks for carrying me home. Sorry for what my mom did.”

Ben said quickly “No! It was alright. I wouldn’t have given you to her if she didn’t care so much.” then Ben thought what he said over and said “Well I mean that I would have given you to her but I wouldn’t trust her. No wait! I mean-”

Amy started giggle and then that turned into a laugh. Thus turning Ben’s already red face into something redder “Its ok. I know what you mean.”

Ben slowly asked “Well… if your free… umm… do you want to see… that’s if you don’t mind… to umm… go..”

Amy smile “What! Just say it!”

Ben cleared his throat and said quietly and very quickly “Will you go on a a get to know me date at a movie or some thing?”

Amy “Nah… I’m busy.”

Ben made the “O” shape with his mouth, and he started to feel uncomfortable, but then Amy said “Well… I guess I could make an exception since you asked so nicely. But it have to be back by 9, and it better be a good move.”

This surprised Ben even more “Umm…” and made with scrunched up kind of face afterwards.

Amy suddenly started to laugh, and then grabbed Ben’s arm and pulled him I the direction of the movie theater. Ben slowly caught on to what she said and started to laugh to! While they were running, Ben had started to carry Amy, and then he bolted to the movies.

Then Amy decided that a movie was to quiet for a Get to Know You Date, so she suggested a smoothy. To help start with a ‘smooth’ clean slate.

It was the best day of Ben’s life.

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111.title: Ben got some help from gramps to get things cle...

choices: Skip to summer, with a new adventure.
14112221111211121112111221211211111.content:
Ben and Amy have dated to about a month or two and are still going strong. After their fifth date, Ben had called in a favor with Gramps.

Gramps “I was wondering when you’d call. Its good to hear from you.”

Ben “Hi gramps. Sorry. I’ve been a little preoccupied.”

Gramps chuckled on the other end of the line “With you lady friend I bet. So what do you need?”

Ben’s face was red from the comment “Well… yes… Do you have anything like my necklace? I want to get Amy a gift.”

Gramps “Hmm… That’s a tough one. I think I have a solution of you can stop by. I’m near Mt. Rushmore right now. Just making sure everything is where its supposed to be.”

Ben “I’ll be there in a sec.” Ben hung up the phone and ran to Gramps.

Gramps was outside the door still on the phone “Ben? Hello? Are you still on the phone?”

Ben “Hey gramps.”

Gramps “Ahh good. Your still on the phone.”

Ben “No gramps. I’m right here.”

Gramps turned and was surprised to see Ben. “Oh. Hey. Yah. My solution was that we could try to make copy from nothing. Thought it takes tremendous energy to do it though. We’ll need Gwen and Seth’s help to get you linked up to the machine to run it.”

(Lets just say that they managed to make a copy of Ben‘s locket, but not the necklace because if he took off the necklace, everyone on the planet would be killed by his galaxy sized gravitational pull)

Ben “Thanks guys. I appreciate the help.”

Gwen “Well sure! I’d help sooner, but I had to get over the fact that my you were in an actual relationship.”

Ben “Its not that unbelievable!” Ben said whining a bit.

Seth “Anyway… Your strong mana field made it possible to synthesize the gravitum. Though it seems to have different properties from regular gravitum. Well, actually, it has the same properties, plus more. It seems to repel harm, or things that want to induce harm. Even poisonous gases are being filtered from the air. If I look further, I think that it keeps you from drowning, and other stuff as well. Its like a bubble of defense. I believe your will to protect carried over to the gravitum and made it something new. Anyway, it can still reduce weight and store a near unlimited amount of objects.”

Ben looked at the clump of gravitum or what ever it was, and wondered what shape to give it. He didn’t have enough of it to make a necklace whole necklace. Maybe a small locket like his, or a bracelet.

Ben “Gwen… your girl right?”

Gwen looked up surprised “What’s that suppose to mean?”

Ben “I mean, you know what girls like right?”

Gwen “Well duh… I have palate.”

Ben “Does that mean you can help me out?”

Gwen “Only if you say please”

Ben “Will you please help me out?”

Gwen “Sure! Anything for a love bird.”

Ben groaned “Not you too!”

Everyone laughed at Ben’s suffering, but not in the evil way. Just the playful kind of way.

Gwen “What does she like?”

Ben “Well… she to take care or animals. She said that’s why she helped me last year because I was wild and unpredictable. Which now that I think about it was kind of true. Anyhow… she helped a couple of doves the other day, and they sang her a song in thanks.”

Gwen “Well then. Why not a couple of doves?”

Ben “Ok then. Lets make it a dove.”

Gramps took the small clump of gravitum but stopped when he remembered something. “I forgot that we need a type of crystal inside to act as a stabilizer. The crystalline structure helps create order when space is being bent to hold and object. It needs to be about the same density of the gravitum in order to prevent the gravitum from ejecting it.”

Seth “Well… this isn’t good. When the gravitum formed, it copied Ben’s density. Its even getting denser as we speak.”

Gwen “So we can just make a mineral that gets as dense as Ben.”

Seth “Good point. I suggest that we use a pure carbon mineral like diamond. Due to its strong crystal structure, it can maintain order very easily.”

*Moments later*

They now have a diamond crystal the size of a pea, but it was the densest mineral in the universe. Though, because of that, it has a gravitational pull that was almost equal to Ben. To prevent it from killing them, the gravitum encased itself around the diamond.

Ben “That was pretty cool. The gravitum jumped onto the diamond the moment it formed.”

Seth “Most likely because we could die if it hadn’t. The gravitational pull would make us all get sucked into it.”

Ben just had a thought “I just remembered something about black holes. Since I’m so dense, why am I not making a whole in the universe.”

Seth “Because of the gravitum. For every force, there is a counter force. If you want to go forward, you have to push something back. If normal atoms pull on other atoms, gravitum pushes. These two forces are countering each other at this very moment.”

Ben “That’s pretty cool.”

Gwen “Yah, but not we have to do something with the clump of gravitum. It took the shape of a pearl when it surrounded the diamond. Now we have to change it up a bit.”

Ben “Oh right! Can you hand it over.” Seth hands the orb over to Ben, and Ben takes it. Ben looked at the orb for a little bit, and then he started to mold it with his bare hands. When he was done, he had made two doves flying with each other, but he also revealed the diamond. He had taken the diamond out for a bit and chipped it and shaped it into a small heart that he inserted into the dove’s chest. Ben spent hours shaping and angling the strange metal until all his hard work paid off. “I think its finished.” The little doves was about an inch in diameter, and you could see every detail that you’d expect to see, plus more. They seemed alive.

Gwen stared at the doves as they took the shape had wanted it, and had been amazed at how easy he molded it, and even more surprised by how careful Ben was to put in even the most minuscule details. Even Gwen was jealous of Amy right now, but not the bad kind. “Its beautiful. I didn’t know you were that artistic.”

Ben “I’m not. The idea just came to me. It felt like the clump of gravitum wanted to look like this.”

Gwen “Well what ever it was, Amy’s still a lucky girl.”

Ben’s face turned a shade of pink as he thought about it. “I think I should get ready for our date. it’s the end of the school year, and I want to prepare it ahead of time.

What happens now?
14112221111211121112111221211211111.title: Fastforward a month or two

choices: Lets give Seth a real body.
We've forgetten about Ken haven't we?
141122211112111211121112212112111111.content:
Ben had spent the last few days before summer started making a chain to put the doves on. His dad came to check in on him every now and then and left quietly as he saw his son entirely focused on his project.

On the last day of school, Ben asked Amy if she wanted to go camping the whole summer like he had.

Amy “Sure, but I need permission from my parents first. Lets go ask.”

Ben smile and picked Amy up and ran to her house.

Amy’s mom and dad were outside put things in the garden, and cleaning the place up.

Amy’s mom and dad “Hey Amy. Nice to see you Ben. What brings you here?”

Ben “I wanted to know if it was ok with you if I took your daughter on a camping trip this summer. Like the whole entire summer. She seems to like animals and nature. So what’s better than the outdoors. Don’t worry. We’ll have my grandpa be the adult. He’s can handle any form of camping.”

Amy’ mom and dad looked at each other for a moment, and smiled. They kind of like Ben. Like another person in the family. Ben would occasionally come over and have dinner, and they always had a blast. “Sure. Amy is this ok with you?”

Amy “Of course! I want to see the wild for a while.”

Dad “Ok then. Lets start packing. Summer starts tomorrow.”

*The next day*

Ben, Amy, Gwen, Seth, and Gramps are making their way into the forest for their little excursion. Amy’s face never left the window.

Ben was outside running lightly beside the Rustbucket. He waved to Amy from outside, and she waved back. When they stopped, Ben was digging his heels into the ground because he just remembered that he was supposed to give the necklace to her the day before, but he forgot in his excitement that her parents said yes.

When Amy got out the Rustbucket, her face was full of joy from the fact that she was with nature, but she turned her attention to Ben when she say him waving her over.

Ben looked nervously at Amy “Uhh. I forgot to give you something yesterday that I wanted to give, so I’m going to give it now. Is that ok?”

Amy “Depends on what you want to give” Amy said smiling mischievously

Ben reached into his pocket and pulled out the necklace. The chain was made of billions of micro diamond links that he chained together painstakingly. He had heard Gramps say that this makes the chain exceptionally strong. At the bottom was a small keepsake.

Amy gasped when she saw what Ben took out. She somehow knew that Ben hadn’t bought it. It was to detailed to be made be normal. “Its beautiful. How did you get it?”

Ben “Well… I made it with some help from Gramps, Gwen and Seth.”

Amy “I love it!”

Ben “Then here. Let me put it on.”

Gwen was on the side looking at Ben as he put the necklace on Amy, and Gwen felt a little jealous. She turned to Seth, and saw that Seth was looking at her. Seth had said a long time ago that his emotions were connected to hers. If she wanted something, he wanted it to. Gwen wanted a boyfriend.

Ben had put the necklace around Amy’s neck, and she was surprised to find that it was warm. Probably from being in Ben’s pocket. When the metal hit her skin, we felt the air around her stir and become more calm. She took a deep breath, and it felt like Ben was in the air, and everything around her. When she touched the doves, she felt a heart beat as strong as Ben’s. The steady beat made her feel safe. Everything felt safe.

Amy started to drift into a day dream, and slowly fell asleep. Luckily Ben was there to catch her. “Dang. I didn’t even get to tell her what it does.”

Amy woke up suddenly re-energized “Wow! What just happened. I put it on, and it felt like someone put giant warm blanket over me.”

Ben “Umm… I need to tell you what the necklace does. Actually, I think I need to start off clean. You’ve been polite, and haven’t asked me how I got so strong. I should tell you how.” Ben looked up at Gramps for reassurance.

Gramps saw Ben look up, so he nodded.

*One flash back later*

Amy “That makes more sense. So you have a green orb that’s growing and condensing your muscle. And its in that compass of yours. And that you got that necklace from a Plumber. Who are people that keep order in the universe. And that compass counters your intense gravitational pull that can now grab anything with in a 10 light year radius. Also, you synthesized the materials that give your necklace the ability to hold objects. But usually, it holds only one thing at a time, but for some reason, mine can hold a near infinite amount. Also, mine has the ability to guard against any form of harm, and helps prevent an unnatural form of death.”

Ben “Yes. I think that’s it.”

Amy “So how strong are you?”

Ben thought about it “I don’t know. I’ve never faced a challenge that I couldn’t muscle out of.”

Amy “I see. Now how about those other green pearls? Are you going to try to seek them out?”

Ben shook his head “Not really. I’m probably the strongest living thing in the universe, so I don’t see the need to do it. Though I’ve had this bad feeling that someone has more than just one pearl. I wonder what happens if you have a couple hundred, or thousands, or a planet sized horde of them. That could be bad.”

Seth decided to chime in “Yes. That would be. That person would have the equivalent power of your orb. Just not as compressed.”

Ben “Luckily, aliens in the universe guard the ones they have with everything they’ve got.

Gramps “Well its night time. That flashback took most of the day, and its almost time for bed. I think its safe to say that we’d better get some sleep.”

Ben was about to complain, but he saw Amy yawn, and decided that he had more stamina than most. He helped Amy up and walked her into bed.

Gwen on the other hand gave Seth a look and they thought of a solution to their predicament.

What happens now?
141122211112111211121112212112111111.title: Skip to summer, with a new adventure.

choices: We still have'nt taken notice of Seth. What happened to him?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111.content:
Gwen “Seth. Is it possible for you to have a real body?”

Seth looked at Gwen as though he were not surprised “Yes its possible, but it comes at a tremendous cost.”

Gwen “What kind of cost?”

Seth “You have to give up your magic.”

Gwen looked at Seth like he was crazy “Is that the only way?”

Seth “That’s the only on that I know about. I don’t think its worth the risk. If you had given up your mana, maybe, just maybe, you’d still be able to tap into Ben’s but it’ll never be the same.”

Gwen thought about it. “Maybe in a few years. I’m not ready to give up my mana yet. It’s still to fun.”

Seth looked at Gwen agreeing with her decision “Yah…”

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111.title: Lets give Seth a real body.

choices: Lets do a recap on our characters.
14112221111211121112111221211211111111.content:
*Laboratory of Dr. Wess*

Ken “Oww… My head kills”

Wess “Ahh! You’re awake now. You’ve been out for quite some time.”

Ken looked around and saw that he was back in the lab. “What happen?”

Wess “You were defeated by Ben Tennyson, and have been out for about 3 months now. Summer already started.”

Ken “What! Summer started already?”

Wess “Don’t worry. An organization told everyone a convincing lie. IT won’t be your fault unless someone has good evidence.”

Ken sighed “Why… how did I get here?”

Wess “I brought you back. I also gave you a little present. I think you might like it.”

Ken raised an eyebrow “What kind of present?”

Wess “Look what you’re laying on?”

Ken looked down and saw that he was resting on a pile of green pearls. His started to lose himself in desire and greed. Unknown to him, the pants he had on started to form a tent from his preteen hormones rushing out from his organ, and filling it with blood.

Wess “They’re all yours. I did some tests, and the more pearls you have together, the greater the effect. The growing ability is exponentially greater. Also, you’ve been resting on that pile for the past three months. Think you’re capable of posing a threat to Ben’s strength. Though, he’ll still beat you if he still has his special item.”

Ken “Hold on. What is this thing you want anyway?”

Wess looked at Ken intently “Well. it’s the mother of all pearls. The largest one, and it has a near infinite power compared to these little pearls. I’ll even let you have it after I perform one test.”

Ken smile “No what doctor? I like you… Where’s the like rat now anyway?”

Wess “He’s on a little camping trip with his girl near Mt. Rushmore. I believe you know how to bring him to this place now?”

Ken smile, and then vanished as he ran as fast as he could to where Ben was.

What happens now?

141122211112111211121112212112111111112.content:
BEN TENNYSON
Age: 11. Almost 12
Hieght: 5ft 6in
Weight: 190lbs
Description: Ben is by far one of the most overdeveloped kids of his age. Especially in the muscle category. He could pass for a 15 year old kid who was extremely athletic, and could be lifting serious weight. His pecs pushed 1.5in off his body, and his abs were nicely defined. His muscles were cut and tone everywhere. His biceps were large and round, but not so huge that it was abnormal. Same with his legs.
He has brown has, green eyes, with a nice light summer tan.

KEN TEN
Age: 12
Height: Minimum of 5ft 7in. May increase depending on what size he takes.
Weight: Minimum of 195lbs. May increase depending on what size he takes.
Description: Ken is similar to Ben in all categories above, but he prefers to take on larger, and more abnormal sizes. He has dirty blonde hair, with hazel eyes, and is rather pale from his 3 month stay indoors.

SETH
Age: Unknown
Height: 5ft 6in
Weight: None. Just an illusion
Description: Seth has that Hawaiian looks with a nice even summer tan. He has a strong and tone looking body as if from years of surfing and various sports.
Seth is also known as VERITAS, the book of truth, and his body came from Gwen’s imagination.

GWEN
Age: 11. Almost 12
Height: 5ft 1in
Weight: 102lbs

141122211112111211121112212112111111112.title: Lets do a recap on our characters.

choices: Ben finds himself at a lab.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben had dug two holes in the ground and filled then in with water. Gramps used Plumber technology to turn it into a hot tub. Amy and Gwen had changed into their swimwear, and Ben was in his swim trunks. Then they went into their designated gender pools.

Ben go into his little tub and the water immediately tried to sink his high density body, but Ben used his powerful legs to keep himself a float. Amy and Gwen were in the other tub relaxing and putting cucumbers on their eyes. Ben decided to relax as well. He could feel several knots in his muscle loosed, and he slowly fell asleep. So did everyone else. Gramps was on a folding chair napping with a copy of the Galaxy Times on his face. Seth also went to sleep, but only because he was forced to sleep when Gwen slept.

A mile away, Ken saw a strange cloud of steam rise out of the forest. Ken went to check it out, and was glad to see that it was Ben and his gang. Plus they were all asleep! Ken quickly ran up and tried to grab Amy, but he felt like he slammed into a wall. Amy was about 5 ft away, but he could even reach her.

Ken muttered “What’s going on?” Ken was wondering why he couldn’t get near Amy. Any angle, it seemed like their was a wall. Ken then tried another approach. He walked away, and started to dig a tunnel until he got under Gwen and Amy’s pool. Then he dug up until he felt the wall from before, and pushed up.

On the surface, Amy started to rise up from the water and float in the air. This was what Ken had hoped. He pushed her up and out into the air and then he followed. Ken slowly made a game of toss and catch with Amy. Ken slow picked up the speed until he go to the laboratory of Dr. Wess.

*Back at the pools*

Gwen felt a chill pass over her as the water from the pool escaped through the hole Ken had made in the ground. When she woke up she saw that she was laying in a giant hole that was ‘supposed’ to be filled with water.

Gwen “What happened to the water!” She yelled.

This woke everyone up.

Ben “Huh? I was having a nice dream. What happened?”

Gramps looked at Gwen pool and saw that the water had gone through a hole in the ground. “It seems like someone dug from below. Though, this is only a minor problem. The big one is what happened to Amy?”

Ben heard Amy’s name, and that there was a problem. This got his full attention and he was out of his pool in an instant. “I heard Amy. What happened? Is it bad? Is she hurt?”

Gramps “I don’t know about hurt or anything. I know that she isn’t here anymore though.”

Ben “Where’d she go? We have to find her.”

Gwen looked at Ben as he franticly talked to himself and anyone who would listen. “How are we going to find her?”

Then there was a flash of green from Ben’s compass, and the arrow inside started to spin in on direction.

Ben looked at the compass, and realized it was showing him the way to Amy. “Sorry guys. Be right back.”

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Where'd Amy go?

choices: Ken has a change of heart.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Gramps “Ben wait don’t go yet!”

It was to late though, Ben had already started to run. He vanished from sight and reappeared in front of an industrial building. Ben broke through the fencing and ignored the security and traps. He simply smashed threw the floor and the ground strait to Dr. Wess’s lab.

The lab was cleared out except for a few large machines that connected to an even larger machine.

Amy “Ben! Get out. It’s a trap!”

Ben turned around and saw that Amy was inside a red bubble. Ben ran towards it and broke the bubble. It let go of Amy, but it soon encases Ben.

Amy “Why didn’t you run! I would have been fine!”

Ben “What’s going on!”

Wess “Ah… so this is the Ben Tennyson that my employer has been seeking.”

Ben “What do you want.”

Wess “No ‘I’. He, my employer, wants your growtium orb.”

Ken suddenly turned up from behind a machine “Wait. If he gets it. Then I don’t. What’s going on?”

Wess “Right… sorry. But you’ve been removed from this contract.” Wess hit a button and another red bubble encases Ken.

Ken “You tricked me!”

Wess “Not really. I simply had a pre-existing deal that force me to use you. I did what I needed to. Now that I think a bout it, I guess I did trick you. Oh well.” Wess said in an undermining tone.

Ben just stared.

Wess “Now just to have the extra precautions. Vilgax… master, can you please keep hold of this girl just because I don’t want to get over confident.”

Ben’s eyes snapped open. “Vilgax! You made a deal with Vilgax! He’s nothing but a low lying, dirty little, space urchin that wants to rule the universe.”

Wess sighed “That’s what he said you’d say. No… he’s a benevolent alien that seeks to create peace. Not everyone can be trusted to do the right thing. I believe Vilgax can. don’t think to badly of me. I’m just doing what I think is right.”

All of a sudden, a red beam appeared from the ceiling and landed on Amy. It slow dragged her off the ground and up into a ship flying over head.

Amy “Ben! Ben! Help!” She said while trying to break loose.

Ben “Amy!!!!!!” screamed as he pounded against his prison made of light.

Wess “I would stop hitting that wall now. It is capable of recovering instantly from any form or damage. You can only hit it in one or two locations at one time. That’s not enough to break it.”

Ben leaned against is orb shaped prison. Almost hopeless until Wess said that he had only hit it in one or two places at once. Ben thought “Maybe… just maybe.”

Wess “Now about that orb. I believe that if you want that girl of yours to live, you’d best give me that orb.” Then he saw Ben doing something. “Wait. What are you doing? No!”

Ben had lifted his necklace off his neck and this released a deadly gravitational pull that attacked all the angles of the sphere. Ben started to float toward the middle of his prison as his gravitational pull tried to made the prison collapse in on itself.

*Crackle. Snap. Zap.*

The orb had begun to fail. It couldn’t recover fast enough. As cracks formed, they had healed a bit, but another had already formed. To the side, the machine sustaining the orb had started to short circuit. It flashed random colors. Then BOOM! Then Ben’s red prison fell.

Wess had already retreated to the side, and Ken was still in his orb. When the prison fell, Ben quickly put his necklace back on to prevent him from destroying anything else.

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Ben finds himself at a lab.

1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben was about to leave, but he heard Ken say something. Ben turned and gave Ken a glare.

Ken looked at Ben with defiance, but ended up doing something unexpected. “I’m sorry. I was confused and power hungry. I shouldn’t have done that to you or Amy.”

Ben looked at Ken disbelieving his ears. Was he lying? “Prove it.”

Ken sighed “There’s a pile of pearls over to the side of the lab. That old man said I could have it if I got you.”

Ben raised an eyebrow as if to challenge him. Ben walked over to the spot Ken said, and lifted up a cloth. The was a metal container filled with hundreds of green pearls. Ben looked at in surprise at the horde. No one has this many can they?

As if on impulse, Ben raised his compass and opened it up. As soon as he did, the pearls in the container started to float up and enter the compass. Ben’s muscles pulsed every time a pearl entered the orb. Like someone stuffed an air compressor into his body, and pumped him up. Ben felt his muscle grow and condense even fast than ever before. “Oh my god…”

Ken was on the side watching as the orbs entered that compass. As they entered, he could feel the power that Ben had. He finally realized that he never had a chance in the first place. “Ben… maybe second place isn’t so bad, but I’ll never know unless I get out of here. Can you give me a second chance?”

Ben looked at Ken thoughtfully. Ben though ‘Well… he did show me this horde of pearls.” … “This is the last time though.”

Ken was silent but grateful “Um… can you help me get out of here?”

Ben walked over and gave the red prison one powerful punch shattering it. This was even a surprise to Ben.

Ken “Wow!”

Ben nodded in agreement, but then he remembered that Amy was taken hostage.

Ken saw Ben’s expression “We better hurry. Who knows what this Vilgax guy will do.”

Ben “Lets hurry. We’ll get a plan on the way. Can you keep up with me?”

Ken “Depends. Can you go around the world in less than second.”

Ben “Faster.”

Ken “Try to keep it at a second. That’s my limit.”

Ben “Fine…”

With that, Ben used his compass to find Amy, and they came up with a plan in that fraction of a second.

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Ken has a change of heart.

choices: With pure force of coarse. This is Ben we're talking about.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben’s plan involved a stop at Gramp’s place.

Gramps was in the Rustbucket getting ready for Ben to return with Amy, or return for advice. He heard a loud rush of wind hit the trailer.

Ben “Gramps. I need some help. Quick!”

Gramps “Ok. Ok. Do you have a plan?”

Ben “Yah, but I need some stuff first.”

At this moment, Gwen come rushing in after she was blow back from a strong wind. “What was that! Oh. Of course its Ben. Why’s Seth outside?”

Ben “I gave him a second chance.”

Gwen looked at Ben and than at Ken. “Are you sure?”

Ben “This is a trial period.”

Gwen “Fine. Did you get Amy?”

Ben “No we’re discussing that.”

Gramps “No what did you need?”

Ben “Can we make some gravitum real quick, and a stabilizing diamond. Though, use Ken’s energy to make it this time.”

Gramps “We can, but should we?”

Ben “I think so because when I look at Ken, I can tell that the ground beneath him is having a hard time holding him up.”

Seth spoke up from behind Gwen “I believe that’s a good idea. If Ben made it again, who knows what properties it will have. Ken will be more adapted for him. Plus, I can see that his mana field is rather large. Most likely due to him being exposed to the pearls for a long period of time.”

Ben and everyone went outside and they told Ken what was going to happen.

Ken “Wait what? Gravitum? It does what?”

Ben “No time. Just trust us like I’ve trusted you.”

Ken sighed “Fine.”

*Moments later*

Ken “That felt kind of weird. I feel kind of tired now. What did that do?”

Seth “The process takes energy to convert the nuclei of atoms into something else. Gravitum costs a rather large amount of energy. Don’t worry. You’ll recover.”

Ben “Ok Ken. This think right here” Ben gestured toward the clump of gravitum with a diamond in it. “Can hold anything! And only you can open it. This is crucial to the plan. No everyone listen up…”

*Under Vilgax’s Ship*

Ben was on Earth looking up at the ship that held his girl friend. Then he jumped and smashed through the hull of she ship. Alarms started to flare. When the smoke cleared, Ben started to run around the ship at a speed close to the speed of light. He found the command center quickly. In it was an alien with tentacles covering its mouth wearing the Vilgax family crest.

Vilgax “Hello. I’ve been expecting you. Your mate is in the chair over there.” He said pointing to the side “But don’t try to get her. She’s surround with explosives. Oh! And that’s trinket that she has on won’t work. The killing force of the bombs are far to great and far to close for those barriers to deflect.”

Amy “Ben! Get away. don’t deal with this monster! He’s going to take over the universe. He want’s your orb.”

Ben “I know, but I can’t let you pay the price.” Ben turned his attention back to Vilgax “Let her go. This is just between you and me.”

Vilgax “I know… the girl can go once I get what I want. She’s just here to make sure you stay. I’m not so unreasonable am I?”

Ben glared at Vilgax “You know I can finish this before you even blink.”

Vilgax “That would be true if I didn’t have my family’s planet sized horde of growth crystals. We’ve been collecting them for years. Destroying who ever own one and gathering them. Every last one of them. I’m up to par with your orb. It just comes down to wit and cunning. That is if you want to see her live…”

Ben looked at Amy “I’m sorry. I can’t lose you.”

Amy “Ben! NO!”

Ben turned to Vilgax and took off his compass. Then he did the unexpected. “Ken!. Now” Ben yelled as he chucked the compass at Amy.

In that faction of a second, Ken opened the locket from the inside and jumped out. Also, when he got out, he got Amy off the chair, and finally tossed the chair into the compass. He didn’t have time to close the compass, so when the explosives went off, a flaming inferno rose out of the opening in the compass and melted a hole in the ship.

Vilgax was shocked for a second, but realized what just happened “You will pay for this Ben Tennyson!” Vilgax said. However, at the same time, his already bulk frame got even bulkier. The pearls that he owned started to make Vilgax grow even faster as though reacting to his anger. A fraction of a second later, Vilgax vanished from sight and attacked Ben.

Ben responded by dodging and trying to get a punch in every now and then. Ben had the advantage of a small more condensed frame. He was smaller, so he was more agile. Ben and Vilgax were in a horrid dance of battle. No one knew who would win. It was like a Dragonball Z fight where they would appear and disappear in different locations.

All the while, Ben was thinking. Where are the pearls? He has to have them close by so that can make him grow. Ben then thought “Maybe he has a gravitum locket like me!” That’s so vilgax doesn’t destroy the universe.” But where is it…
Ben looked all over Vilgax trying to find something that could be it. Then he saw it. It was the Vilgax family crest. It has the same astral grey that gravitum had. In a flurry of motions, Ben grabbed the crest off of Vilgax.

As soon as Ben did that, he noticed a significant drop in Vilgax’s strength with every passing second. Ben was out growing Vilgax in strength because Vilgax had stopped growing.

Vilgax realized this to and looked for the crest on his body, but didn’t see it. “Give it back to me. It belongs to my family.”

Ben said mockingly “Not any more. I believe its mine now.”

Vilgax, in one last attempt, threw himself at Ben, but Ben simply side stepped. When Vilgax was with in reach, he grabbed Vilgax by and arm and tossed him through the ceiling of the ship, and out into space. All he heard was “Curse you Ben Tennyson!”

After Vilgax was gone, Ben looked to the side and saw Ken standing next to Amy smiling grimly. “Is he really gone?”

Ben “For now. Though, I doubt he’ll be as trouble some next time.” then Ben looked at Amy “Are you ok? Did he do anything to you?”

Amy “I’m fine. He couldn’t even touch me because of your gift. Though, he did push me onto that chair.”

Ben “Right… we better get that fixed”

Ken “We should get out of here. We made three large holes in this ship while we were on it, and I don’t think that’s a good think. Especially if I can feel the ship tilting. Can we get off?”

Ben smile “Lets go…” And all three kids vanished from sight (If you were watching)

*Back at the Rustbucket*

Gramps “They should be back about now.”

As soon as Gramps said that, Ben, Amy, and Ken reappeared.

Ben “We’re back.”

Gramps sighed in relief “What took so long?”

Ben “Vilgax’s family had been hording every pearl created in the universe. It was about the size of a planet.”

Gwen was listening on and gasped “That’s huge! How did he hide that?”

Gramps “With a gravitum locket I assume?”

Ben “Yah.” Ben said as he took out the Vilgax family crest.

Gwen “Well… hurry up and put them in your orb before someone come and nabs it.”

Ben nodded and then took out his compass from his pocket (His actually compass. The one he threw was Ken‘s), and took the orb out.

Ken was on the side and he stared at the size and power the of the orb. No wonder Ben was so strong.

After Ben took out his orb, he tried to open the Vilgax family crest. “Why won’t it open!”

Gramps “Oh right! Only the owner can open it.”

Ben “Then how do we open it!”

How do they open it?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Ben is in Vilgax's ship.

choices: Wait! We forgot that pea sized orb and its abilities.
Nah... it got sucked in to. What was changed?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Seth chimed in some advice “You can try removing the crystal stabilizer. That would cause the inter dimensional powers of the gravitum to collapse and release the pearls.”

Ben looked at Seth as though he was the smartest thing in the universe. Which he was in some ways.

Ben then started the bend the crest with his hands until he came across a green crystal on the inside. “This must be the stabilizer. What kind of crystal is it?”

Seth “It appears to be something similar to growthium, but it’s a little different. It has a unique property. I believe that it stabilized the gravitum, but it also helped to amplify the effects of the growthium. That’s why Vilgax was able to keep up with you.”

Ben “I see. So what happens when I remove it from the gravitum?”

Seth “The pearls will start to shoot out of the gravitum through the largest opening. I suggest that everyone stands back about 50 ft, lest they want to get hit by high velocity objects. Ben you can stay because you are bonded to the orb.”

Everyone did as Seth said, and Ben stood up and removed the crystal that was the shape of the pearl and a size of a pea. As soon as he did, he felt the air vibrates as the green pearls began to shoot out of the crest and orbit around Ben. They kept coming and coming, and didn’t seem to stop. Slowly, the pearls started to get absorbed into the orb, but the speed picked up. After 5min, the pearls had stopped coming out of the crest, and were almost done falling into the orb. Along the way, Ben had felt sudden change.

No one had seen what happened because the whole area was blinded by green light. However, because Ben was connected to the orb, every time a pearl entered the orb, Ben felt intense pleasure. But since their were trillions, and more, Ben was drowning in euphoric pleasure. As soon as the first pearl entered the orb, Ben felt his pants tent up, and with each pearl, he felt it get harder and harder. At some point, Ben had instinctively started to jack off. He was almost in pain trying to relieve himself. Then it came. As though some one-dimensional gate had opened a door, and all the stuff locked away had rushed forward. Gallons upon gallons of cum shot out of his mighty shaft. His super dense balls were on overtime as they made millions of gallons of cum that was being released. The cum shot out so fast, it blasted straight out into the outer reaches of space. When the last trickles of pearls entered the orb, Ben had about emptied his reserves, and passed out.

*Moments later*

Ben “Ow… I just had the Best dream ever!” Ben looked around that he was in bed inside the Rustbucket. As he looked around, he saw his compass on a night stand, and the or next to it. Then Ben remembered what happened (sort of). He remembered the pearls entering the orb, and that he felt ‘good’, but passed out when the last pearl went into the orb. Ben turned his attention to the orb and saw that it was different.

Instead of just a solitary dot being orbited by one other dot, there were countless dots this time orbiting the center so fast, you could barely see it. The orb was now growing a bright green and it seem to thrum with energy. As Ben looked closer, the orb looked more like an enlarged atom trapped in clear shell.

What was changed?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: They remove the crystal stabalizer.

choices: The effects will where off over time. What's happening to everyone else?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben sat up and put the orb in the compass, and then back onto his necklace. Soon after, he walked outside to see everyone sitting around a campfire. IT was dark outside now. Ben had been asleep for a couple of hours.

Ben “Hey guys. What’s going on?”

Gramps looked up “We’ve just been studying that crystal inside of Vilgax’s crest. Its really odd. Its not growthium. That’s for sure. It seems to be a substance that reacts with the growthium crystal and make it more potent.”

Ben “What do you mean?” Ben started to walk closer, and he saw that it was between Gwen’s hands. It was surround by a purple light as Gwen tried to understand that crystal through mana.

On the opposite side was Ken who was looking at Gwen intently. But when Ben got close, Ken turned his attention to him.

Ken “Hey. How was your nap?”

Ben smiled secretly “It was good, so what else did we find on the little pearl there?”

Seth “We’re starting to get more info. Gwen is doing a fantastic job at analyzing the crystal and its properties. I only had a hunch earlier.” At about this time, Gwen had finished her spell.

Gwen “It seems that this pearl here is not growthium. It is capable of amplifying the effects of your orb, but also, if you get them to combine, it creates an area of growth. I can’t quite explain it. Anything with in a certain radius of you will develop stronger. Like… not grow specifically, but will help grow. Does that make sense?”

Ken was listening like his life depended on it. Even though he gave up on trying to beat Ben, he still wanted to get stronger.

Ben “Not really. I don’t make them grow, but I help them. Do you mean like a supplement?”

Gwen “Not really. More of…hmm… lets say Ken was working out at the gym. He gains 10lbs the first month, but with you near him, he’ll develop faster, and gain 30lbs lbs. That’s just and example. I don’t know how much faster that grow.”

Ben “Ok. I think I know what you mean. The only question is… should I?”

Ken was sitting down with his heart pounding. “Yes!” He blurted out. This startled everyone.

Ben looked at Ken with a slight glare. Ben trust Ken more since he helped rescue Amy, but not entirely.

Ken started explaining “Don’t get me wrong. I don’t think I’ll ever get to Ben’s level, so I’ll settle for second best. Though, I just realized I didn’t care about that either. I just want to get stronger in general.”

Everyone looked at Ken surprised at his explanation.

Amy was quiet the whole time, but decided to speak “Ben. I think you should put the pearl in your orb. It’s not like its going to hurt anyone, and anyway, who else can use it? I doubt there are many pearls left in space. It’d be more useful if you had it.”

Ben looked at Amy and smile. He couldn’t say no to her. Plus her logic was reasonable. “Fine. I’ll put it inside. Gwen… do you mind handing it over.” Ben held out a hand for Gwen to drop the crystal in. When Gwen handed it over, Ben took out his orb as well.

As soon as the orb got close to the pearl, it flared green. Ben could feel the growing powers of the orb increasing again. Ben felt a lot of pressure build in his body as his muscle grew and compressed. Kind of like inhaling to much air. As soon as they pearl and orb touched, the whole area was flooded in green light. Then slowly, it faded away.

When Ben’s eyes cleared, he saw that his orb was still glowing brighter than before. Also, he still felt that pressure from his increased growth. The pressure wasn’t going down. It actually seemed to speed up ever so slowly.

What does this mean?

1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben brushed the feeling away because it seemed only natural.

However, everyone else was feeling a little different.

Ken smiled as he felt more energized and felt ready to do anything.

Amy and Gwen had started to feel more awake as their fatigue faded away.

Even Gramps began to feel less aches from his old bones.

Ken “I feel awesome! Its like the greatest pump ever!” Ken said while doing pushes up and other various exercises.

Everyone looked at Ken and smile at his enthusiasm.

Amy “I don’t know about a pump, but I definitely feel less tired. I was about to fall asleep. I guess now anymore.”

Gwen nodded “Yah. Same here.”

Gramps “I could get used to this, though I don’t think I should. You’ll be gone after the summer, and you won’t be here with the orb.” Gramps said calmly as though to not show his disappointment.

Ben felt kind of awkward just standing there watching everyone act like they felt something. He didn’t feel anything new except that slight pressure. “I don’t really feel anything.”

Seth “Neither do I. I don’t have a real body.”

This caught Gwen’s attention, and she made a face as though she were thinking.

What goes on now?

Lets show Seth a few now concepts to being human.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Gwen “Do you want a body?”

Everyone looked at Gwen suddenly.

Ben “What’d you ask?”

Gwen “I’m asking Seth if he wants a body.”

Everyone looked at Seth now. He had his usual posture and everything, but even his face betrayed his surprise. “I don’t know. My emotions and feelings are connected to you, so I can’t say.”

Gwen looked at Seth and said sincerely “I honestly don’t mind. You’re missing out on a lot. And sure, magic has a lot of benefits. But knowing that you can have something with out much effort is kind of boring.”

Ben “Wait. Why do you sound like you’re about to lose you magic?”

Gwen turned to Ben “Because in order for Seth to get a real body, I’ll have to sever my ties with magic there by freeing Seth of his connection to me. Though, just before I lose my magic, I can perform one last spell.”

Everyone looked shocked, but they didn’t say anymore. This was up to Gwen and Seth.

Seth “I don’t know if I want a real body. To know that you can die, but living forever has been lonely. Waiting for you to get me was one of the harder things of existing forever.”

Gwen “Maybe being human will be more simple. It’s kind of fun being tied to the problems of reality. It keeps you busy and not as bored.”

Seth was quiet. “I think I’ll try taking on the life of mortal. It does sound more fun then living forever.”

Gwen smile “Ok. Lets get started. What do I do.”

Seth asked “Are you sure?”

Gwen frowned “I wouldn’t have asked if I wasn’t. I’ve put a lot of thought into this, and I’m ready. Everyone deserves a chance at enjoying life to the fullest. Living forever takes the fun out of living.”

Seth “Ok them. All you have to do is imagine the magic in your body leaving you, and as it leaves, you can transform it into one final spell. This ritual is called the ‘final breath’ because it will feel like you are exhaling your magical half. This will be you last breath of magic. And every time someone has performed this ritual, the spell has always been the truly spectacular and the most powerful magic that can be done.”

Gwen “Ok. So just imagine it leaving me, and do I need a spell?”

Seth “No. The ‘final breath’ takes the shape of your desires. Only if you are sure about this, only then will it work.”

Gwen “Ok.” Gwen sunk into deep thought. She was floating in her mind, and she thought of her magic. Suddenly, she saw this purple girl flying around threw the air of her mind. The moment Gwen saw her, she kner that this was the embodiment of her magic.

Gwen called out “Hello!”

The girl saw Gwen and flew over. When they were close enough together, Gwen grasped the girls hand, and then gave her a hug.

Gwen “Goodbye” then Gwen let go and waved goodbye.

The little girl looked up at Gwen and then flew away without a word.

Back outside Gwen body, Gwen had started to release a purple aura. It began to rush out displaying amazing power. As it shot into the sky, it began to disperse and take the form of millions of butterflies. They started to fly down ward toward Seth and circle around him. Faster and faster they spun into all you could see was a mass of purple light. It soon became the only color you could see. Then poof. It was gone. All that was left was a wisp of purple have that was gently blow away by the wind.

Gwen had opened her eyes and saw that Seth was on the ground, and looked like he was unconscious. Gwen ran over.

Gwen “Seth! Are you ok?” Gwen said when she arrived near him. She put a hand on his chest and was surprised to feel a heartbeat. “Seth! What up! It worked.”

Seth opened his eyes and gave a cough. A small wisp of purple escapes his mouth and faded away. “Did I just cough?”

Gwen started at Seth and then realized her hand was still on his athletically muscled chest. Gwen’s face turned red “Um. It worked…”

Seth stood and took of his shirt. The night air was cool, but was not freezing. It was the summer’s night chill. “Is this what cold feels like?” Gwen hadn’t heard that question. All she saw was Seth’s tones and muscle upper body. She had felt this feeling of longing before, but now it felt more intense. Gwen stood up and hugged Seth in warm embrace.

Seth started to cry “Is this warmth…?” he said quietly. Then he said in a smaller voice “so many wasted years.”

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Gwen makes a desicion.

1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Its been a few weeks into summer leaving us in early august.

During this time, The gang showed Seth some new feelings and showed him a bunch of other stuff.

Also during this time, the group had done some work on seeing the radius of how far Ben’s orb can help people grow. It appears that the distance is so large that it covers the whole earth, but they learnt that the orb only helps males grow bigger, and even then… its only the males that Ben knows and wants to help.

At the same time, Seth discovered emotions, especially one that drove him towards Gwen. After the first couple weeks, they were in a full blown relationship.

Another thing that happened was that Ken has been doing a lot of exercise. Like a lot. His minimum size was 5ft4in, and the build of a person who did track. Now, since he’s been influenced by the orb, his minimum size is 5ft6in and a swimmer’s build. It seems that by exercising, he increases his ‘base’ strength. Then when he grows to larger sizes, he’s exponentially stronger.

Even Seth’s new body was feeling the effects. His new body was feeling the effects of testosterone combined with the energy from the orb. With out even exercising, his body was growing. He went from surfer’s tone build to a more bulky swimmer’s build. All this did was drive Gwen even more crazy for Seth’s new hot bod. ()Though Gwen isn’t as focused on that. The body was a bonus, but when they got Seth enrolled in school, Gwen would have someone who was as smart as her to talk to.)

Ben was still the same, except he entered his ‘would be real’ growth spurt. Like the actual one his body would have received. This brought him to a nice 5ft 8in, and still growing. Ben was 12 about now, and he looked like a 16 year old junior body builder. His pecs pushed 2in off his body. His shoulders were round and strong. His biceps were bowling balls, and his 6 pack was nice cut, and tone. One more thing for Amy to like about Ben (though she likes him mostly for his personality)

Everything was peaceful. When word got out that any alien that wanted to do harm to earth vanished, the usual numbers had dropped down next to nothing.

Will this continue?

1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
As the days turned into weeks, thing started to feel to peaceful for Ben. There wasn’t the fun of adventure like last summer. He was starting to feel bored.

Ben stared at the night sky, and saw a shooting star “I wish something exciting would happen…”

Unknown to him, a it was a fragment of an asteroid was wizzing past earth. This asteroid wasn’t normal though. It was charged with mana that was similar to Gwen’s. When Ben made his wish, the asteroid exploded releasing the mana inside to make Ben’s wish.

Ben looked at the shooting star as it left its white streaks, but suddenly, the shooting star exploded into multiple fragments, and flew off in several directions.

What did the shooting star do to make thing more exciting?
