choices: Nothing. Ben just caught a space girl.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben “That was odd.”

Amy was inside, but heard what Ben said “What was odd?”

Ben “I saw a shooting star, but it kind of exploded.”

Amy “That’s kind of interesting. I wonder what happened?”

As she said that, Ben saw a small purple light fall from the sky towards them. “I think we‘ll find out soon.” Ben starts running to the light.

Inside the Rustbucket, Gwen was in deep sleep. When Ben made his wish, Gwen started to have a weird dream. She was in the middle of space, with nothing but stars, and the earth below her. Suddenly, an asteroid appeared and was rushing by earth when suddenly it exploded. It was odd. The asteroid was discharging purple energy. When it exploded, Gwen saw a little girl appear from the inside. She was unconscious. Slowly, she started to fall to earth, and was slowly speeding up.

Gwen looked shock, but still tried to save the girl “Wakeup! Do something. You’re falling.” Gwen managed to move close to the girl and fall with her. Slowly, Gwen grasped the girl and turned to look at her. What Gwen saw shocked her. This was the girl that Gwen said bye to when she gave up her magic. Before she could say more, they had hit the ground.

Gwen jolted up from her bed gasping.

Seth was nearby looking a little nervous “You ok Gwen?”

Gwen “I don’t know.”

Seth “What happened?”

Gwen “It was this strange dream. I saw the girl that I said bye to when I gave up my magic.”

Seth looked at Gwen quietly “Gwen… she is your magic. I didn’t think this would happen. Maybe its because… no it cant…”

Gwen “What? What can’t?”

Seth “When you your powers left you, it left as energy. Some of the energy was solidified into the body you gave me. However, I think that there was so much energy, that had nothing to do, so it went out into space. There, it solidified into another body. Which I think is the girl. You were dreaming of the materialization of her body.”

Gwen “What does this mean?”

Seth “Don’t get your hopes up, but it could mean that you can get your powers back.”

Gwen looked shocked. The past few weeks have been amazing. However, Gwen thought the world looked different. She couldn’t feel the mana in living things anymore. The world looked more bland. She tried to tap into Ben’s mana field, but couldn’t even sense it. “Is it really possible?”

Seth “Don’t get to hopeful. I said it might be possible.”

Gwen “I know… its just that the world seems to have lost some color since I gave up my magic. Don’t get me wrong. There past few weeks have been amazing, and still are.”

Seth put a finger on her mouth “I know…”

Gwen smile and gave Seth a hug.

Seth “We may want to go outside. That girl is about to crash near us.” Seth said this while slowly guiding Gwen outside.

(Also, Gramps isn’t here right now. He‘s on a Plumber assignment, and trust the Ben would handle things. Ken had also left the group and had gone home to clear thing up with his parents.)

Outside, the purple light was getting closer and closer.

Ben “Amy… can you step back. Things might get a little dangerous for you.”

Amy “I doubt that I’ll be in danger next to you, but ok. I’ll humor you.” Amy started to back up a bit.

Ben “Thanks.”

About now, the purple light was closing in. When it was close enough to tell where it’d land, Ben ran up and caught it.

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Something unknown is approaching the earth.

1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben as the girl fell into Ben’s arms, a strange purple energy entered Ben’s body. Though… Ben didn’t notice.

Ben landed to the ground with a light thud absorbing a lot of the impact to keep the girl safe. Ben was shocked.

Amy started running up to Ben “What is it?” Then Amy saw that Ben was holding a girl. “Oh my god. How’d you get that girl? Was it that light!”

Ben nodded “I don’t know how…”

Seth and Gwen heard the noise and started running.

Gwen “What happened! Ben is everything alright?”

Ben “I’m ok, but I just caught this girl.”

Gwen heard this and ran up to Ben “Its true!”

Ben “What’s true?”

Seth “That’s her magic. It took the form of that girl.”

Ben looked at the girl in his hands in surprise. He carefully gestured for Gwen to carry her, and Gwen did.

The girl looked to be a 6 year old with purple hair, and purple eyes. Her body was very lightly tanned, and she had no cloths on.

Amy “She looks cold. We should get something on her.”

Ben nodded and vanished, but reappeared instantly with a thick blanket. He handed it to Gwen and Gwen wrapped it around the girl.

Gwen “What happens when I get my magic back Seth?”

Seth’s face was kind of grim “The girl vanishes.”

Gwen was quiet “Then I don’t want it.”

Seth looked at Gwen curiously “Why?”

Gwen “Because it would mean that I would be taking away a life. A life that I gave up my magic to create. If I took back my magic, then my resolve to give you a body wasn’t as strong as I thought.”

Seth nodded and smiled happy to hear Gwen’s explanation.

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Ben is changed.

choices: Ben and Gwen start to glow and float.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Ben “Lets get her warm. I’ll make a fire”

Ben did that and set up a camp as well. Everyone gathered around the fire.

Gwen was holding the little girl and Seth was next to her keeping an eye on things. Ben was sitting on the other side of Gwen was Amy. She was stroking the little girl’s hair. Ben was next to her.

As the night continued, everyone started to fall asleep on the ground. The fire was slowly burning out, but everyone was still warm. It seems that Amy’s doves released a warming energy that heated the air around them.

The little girl was still sound asleep.

As Ben started to drift into a dream, he felt a strange tingle fall over his body. In his dream, he was in a blank world. There was nothing but a blanket of green on everything.

A voice from behind Ben “Excuse me sir. Where am I?”

Ben turned around quickly to see the little girl “Uhh.. Sorry. I didn’t here what you said. What was you question?”

The girl “Where am I? I miss the other place I was in.”

Ben thought about it, and it must have been with Gwen “I might know the place you want to go to, but I don’t know how to get there.”

The girl started looking down slightly disappointed. “Oh… is it ok if I follow you? It was kind of lonely here.” The girl looked up with large beady eyes.

Ben couldn’t say no “Sure, but just until we find this place you liked.”

The girl smile and jumped cheerfully. “Yay! So where should we go?”

Ben “Well. That’s what I’d like to know. There’s nowhere to go here.”

The girl “Why not make an exit? That’s what the other place could do.”

Ben “An exit?” As soon as Ben thought of it, a door appeared out of nowhere. “Wow!”

Girl “You did it.”

Ben was shocked, then he remembered to ask “What’s you name? Its strange just calling you by ‘you’”

Girl “No one gave me any. Though, my cousin’s name is Seth, and the place I used to live in was called Gwen. I never had a name.”

Ben was shocked to here this. Then he thought, maybe this door could go to Gwen. Ben willed the door to open into Gwen’s mind.

In Gwen’s head, she was dreaming of a time in the future when Seth and herself would be in school together. Doing a bunch of stuff together like an item. Then suddenly, she everything changed. The scenes in her mind morphed into the scene when she first saw the girl. Everything was purple. But this time, there was a door in front of her. Slowly, it opened, and green light flooded her mind.

Ben “It worked!”

Girl “You found it!”

Gwen was shocked “What’s going on!”

Ben “I don’t quite know, but this girl got into my dreams and wanted to come here. I somehow made a door to get here.”

Gwen was speechless. “Ben… do you know this place that we are in? This is where I said goodbye to my magic.”

The girl was happily flying around the landscape of Gwen’s mind. “Oh yah… you said bye, so I left. I missed this place though. Is it ok if I stay? It took forever to find.”

Gwen looked at the girl in shock. “Um… sure.”

The girl then smile and walked up to Gwen and gave her a hug. “Thanks Gwen.” Slowly, the girl began to glow purple and she started wiz away around the strange magical landscape. There was one final flash of purple and…

Ben and Gwen sat up at the same time.

Ben “Did that just happen?”

Gwen looked at Ben “I don’t know…”

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: Something strange happens to Ben.

choices: Something else about Ben was changed.
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.content:
Everyone woke up after Ben and Gwen started to chat about a strange dream. They were all curious, so Ben told his half of the story, and Gwen told her half.

But before they finished, Amy asked “Wait! Where’s that little girl?”

Gwen “The girl was the embodiment of my magic. Though, she had real feelings and thoughts. When I said goodbye, she left. Though, she didn’t really like leaving, so she came back.”

Seth sighed “I see.”

Gwen looked at Seth kind of guiltily.

Seth “You did good Gwen. She wouldn’t have been happy outside here in the real world. She thinks differently than we go. I think differently as well, but that’s because I’ve lived so long.”

Gwen smiled “Oh! Be quiet. You talk a lot sometimes, but thanks.” Gwen said playfully.

Ben “So do you have your magic now?”

The question made Gwen pause. She didn’t think about that. Slowly, Gwen thought about a fun spell she used to use on Ben.

As soon as she thought of the spell, Ben vanished. Then he reappeared.

Ben “That was not funny.”

Gwen started to burst out laughing.

Amy “What just happened?”

Ben “She just sent me to San Francisco… AGAIN!”

This sent Gwen into another laughing fit.

Ben couldn’t help but laugh. Gwen was contagious. As he laughed, he wondered how Gwen would react if she was sent to the Golden Gate Bridge by surprise.

There was a flash of green, and Gwen was gone.

*At the Golden Gate Bridge*

There was a flash of green, and Gwen appeared on the ground “What just happened?”

Gwen looked around and knew where she was. She quickly teleported back to the camp. “What happened? I didn’t do that.”

Everyone looked at each other strangely.

Amy “There was a green light and you were gone Gwen.”

Gwen “I know! I was at the Golden Gate Bridge.”

Seth “I think that It was Ben who did that.”

Everyone said “What!” In unison.

Seth “I think when Ben caught that girl, she sent some of herself into Ben giving him the ability to manipulate mana.”

Ben “So… I can use magic now?”

Seth “I think so.”

Ben thought of another spell that Gwen had done. He thought of a small ball of light appearing, over his head. Suddenly, raging inferno of blinding light appeared above his head. He quickly extinguished it with a thought. “Cool”

What happens now?
1411222111121112111211122121121111111121.title: The girl's gone! (or is she?)

choices: Only a little more muscled. Not to noticeable with cloths on.
Please read the above branch of choices, and then read this sequal.
14113.content:
Ben, Gramps and Gwen were in the world's largest medical mineral institution taking a tour.

Gramps “I want you all you stay close by. No funny business.” He gives a sharp look at Ben.

Ben smile innocently. Gwen was looking around, and admiring the building. The halls were full of display cases full of rare crystals and rocks that were being used for medical uses.

The tour guide “Thank you all for waiting. Now if you would follow me this way, we’ll get to see that world’s largest synthetically formed diamond. And its still growing bigger!” This got people’s attention, and they followed along.

Ben on the other hand had other things to do. He walked with the crowd, and slowly began to back up. When they were out of sight, he walked away into another hallway. He walked down and say behind one of the windows was a room filled with an endless array of technology. “I wonder what all those things do…” Ben continued walking until he found a door, and he slipped in. All of a sudden, he heard a door slam. Ben quickly hid behind something.

Voice “Doctor. This must be the greatest thing ever discovered. This mineral can solve the obesity problem. It will strengthen any human! Can you believe it! When the ray hit the crystal, and fired at beam at that mouse, it practically doubled in muscle mass.”

Another voice “Ok. I know its exciting, but remember that this must be confidential until we fully test it, and get it patented.”

Voice “Sorry doctor, but do you know what this means?”

The other voice “Yes. I do. All kids with growing disorders will be cured, and improved beyond our imaginations.”

Voice “Yes!”

Soon the voices faded away.

Ben “I wonder what this thing is?” Ben was slowly think of what it’d be like to be bigger and stronger. No one could boss him around. He could do stuff that he was to small and weak to do. “If only…” Then Ben got an idea. He looked around until he saw a security camera. He hid behind another machine, and turned to the Omnitrix. You could see the aliens change until you saw a blobby kind. “Alright… Upgrade…” Ben pressed down, an there was a flash of green. When it cleared, you saw a strange green blob. It moved, and jumped into the security camera.

As soon as he did that, security alarms flared. A speaker turned on “All personnel! There has been a security breech. I repeat a security breech. All tours are postponed till further notice. Make way to the field up front.

Gramps looked around for Gwen, and saw her standing near the front of the group, but where was Ben. Gramps waved for Gwen to come closer. “Have you seen Ben?”

Gwen “He’s gone isn’t he… idiot!”

Gramps sighed “Where could he have gone?”

Gwen was a bout to say she didn’t know, but a security camera caught her eye. Instead of the usual clear lens, there was a large green circle that was blinking. Gwen pointed to it “He’s there…”

Gramps turned and saw that camera.

Back with Ben, he was looking around, and he saw Gramps and Gwen stare at him. “Oh no. They saw me!” Ben quickly retreated from the camera and went around looking for this mineral they were talking about. Suddenly, he felt a sucking motion. All the energy inside the wires that he was in was being dragged to one location.

*Three floors down*

There were dozens of people in lab coats preparing for the next test of the newest mineral.

A woman stepped up to an old looking man “Doctor. All preparations have been completed. We are ready to proceed.”

Doctor “Alright then.” The doctor stepped up to a large machine in the center of the room. The machine was a laser kind of thing, but it had a clear container in the middle. A stream of energy was being passed through it. Inside was a green softball sized orb. The doctor walked up to a control panel near by and pressed a large red button. The laser started to charge up and drag a huge amount of energy. In front of the laser was a young kid. Average in every way. He signed up for this because he wanted to be bigger. As the tension built…

Ben was being forcefully sucked threw the wires. He couldn’t fight it. The current was to strong. It twisted and turned, and doubled back several time. Then suddenly it slowed down. Ben looked forward, and saw that he was heading toward an opening. He was shot out and he saw a giant green orb in front of him. The current he was riding sent him orbiting the orb, and POW! He slammed into it, and got sucked in.

*Outside the ray gun*

Beep Beep Beep.

Woman “Doctor. It seems that something has gone past security and obtained access to this room. The person could be manipulating the laser!”

Doctor looked slightly panicked “Shut it down! Shut it all down!”

All of the scientist in the room went to a near by electrical panel and started to turn this off, but it was to late. The laser was already charges up, so it fired!

The kid looked as the laser hit him for a brief second. The feeling was warm and tingle, but that was about it. Then it stopped. The laser started to recede back into the machine, and it no longer fired at the boy.

The beam from the laser moved back until it was back in the orb. Then suddenly, it fired out a bright Green light, but it didn’t continue to the boy. It stopped short and began to bugle out at the end as though it was being trapped in a bubble. The laser kept on firing until it ran out of power. Slowly, the ball of green light ‘popped’, and out came a green alien.

Ben looked around and was confused. What happened? I just slammed into a green orb, and now I’m in a room surrounded by scientist. Wait! They can see me. Ben started running towards an exit. The scientists in his way ran scream at the unusual green monster made its way to them. Then the worst happened. There was a green flash, and Upgrade turned back into Ben. The flash blinded everyone for a moment giving Ben enough time to get away.

The kid sitting in the test area was looking over his body, and smile slightly. He was the average skinny kid before, but now he was more on the heavy side. That brief contact with the laser had made him really athletic. The kid was about 10 yo, and his muscles were big, but not to huge that it looked weird on his body. The kid stared as the green thing ran away, but blinked when it changed into a boy. That boy looks familiar… The kid couldn’t remember at the moment.

The scientist was still in panic over what happened. Only one person was quiet, and it was the doctor. The doctor stood in front of the machine, and he was looking at the clear container. There used to be a green orb in it, but not any more.

Back with Ben, he had ran up several flights of stairs. In his panic, he didn’t see that he was different.

What size was he?
14113.title: Lets start with a different event.

choices: When Ben grows, he feels something odd. What is it?
141131.content:
Ben ran up the stairs and when he got to ground level, he opened the door, and ran out.

Thump! He ran right into an old man wearing a Hawaiian shirt.

Previously: Gwen and Gramps had gone to the security room and they saw a huge commotion going on at lower levels. Gramps and Gwen had looked at each other and nodded.

Gwen “We better get down there. Who knows what that idiot is capable of!”

Gramps “Gwen. Be nice, I know Ben’s a little careless, but he’s a good kid.”

Gwen “What ever… we better stop him.”

They had ran to the nearest stair case and were about to open the door, until it burst forward. Gramps was surprised to the brown haired nephew of his fly threw the air into him. Gramps caught Ben but had to take a few steps back. Gramps didn’t remember Ben being this heavy before. Not much heavier, but still heavier.

Ben got his face out of Gramp’s gut. “Oh. Hey guys. We have to get out.”

Gwen “What did you do.”

Ben had already started jogging to the exit. “Talk later. Run now!”

Down the stairwell, there were a bunch of panicked voices rushing up the stairs. Gwen and Gramps joined Ben as they made their way to the exit. They left the building, and got into the Rustbucket, and drove away. After an hour of driving, they pulled over to the side the road.

Gramps “Ben… you have some explaining.”

Ben looked at Gramps defiantly “It wasn’t my fault. The dang thing sucked me in.”

Gramps raised an eyebrow “Sucked you in? Just start from the moment you left us. It’ll make more sense that way.”

Ben “Ok… So I left the group.”

Gwen “We know that. Duh!”

Ben gave Gwen a glare “Well… I left the group and looked around. Then I heard these scientist talking about a mineral that can make people bigger and stronger. Stuff like that. I wanted to have a look at it, so I turned into Upgrade and went around looking by using the security cameras. Then suddenly, I felt all the energy inside the wires suck me in on directions. The took me to this orb, and slammed me into it. After that, I don’t really know. However, I do know that I was surrounded by people, and had to get out before the watch timed out, but it did when I was so close to getting out. Anyway, I don’t think anyone saw me. I think the green flash blinded them for a few seconds.”

Gwen was waiting for Gramps to say something.

Gramps “You shouldn’t have done that. These labs are expensive. Luckily, it doesn’t sound like you broke anything. Anyway, you are still getting a punishment. It doesn’t seem like you intended to do harm, but you should stop meddling. No going outside the Rustbucket for a week.”

Ben was shocked by how short the punishment was. His parents would have grounded him for a month if he did something like this. However, Ben made a sad face just to satisfy Gramps. Then he started to mumble about how its not fair…

Gramps “Ok. Stop whining. Now tell me about this orb. I’m curious.”

Ben starts to talk about the orb and what it looked like. Gwen on the other hand had stopped listening when Ben had received his punishment. She turned on her laptop and was looking up the latest news. On the front page of a newspaper website was the name of the place they were just at. “Latest mineral discovery had gone missing. Unknown alien is blamed for theft.”

Gwen “Guys. Take a look. It seems like Ben’s famous.”

Ben and Gramps walked over and read the article.

Ben “I didn’t take it. I swear! Even search me.”

Gramps “No… I don’t think you took it purposely. Though its odd that it disappears then you came out. Something must have happened along the way.”

Ben “Well, all I know is everything I told…” Ben stopped talking as he felt something happening.

What was going on with Ben?
141131.title: Only a little more muscled. Not to noticeable w...

choices: While they wait, Ben grows again.
1411312.content:
Ben stood where he was quietly. He felt a warm sensation spread across his body. It felt like there was some time of energy coursing threw his veins that originated at his balls. Slowly, Ben began to grow. His muscles stretched, ripped and repaired them selves. His bones grew longer making him taller. Though, the whole time, Ben simply felt a warm tingle, though it was more intense in his balls.

Gwen “Ben… what just happened. You grew!”

As the feeling faded away, Ben looked down at his body and say that he was bigger. Not much, but the growth was definitely there. His shirt felt more snug. He looked at his arm and saw small bumps of muscle that weren’t there before. Ben picked up his shirt and saw small dimples where his abs would be. Even his chest pushed out half an inch. Underneath the fabrics of his pants, he could feel that his leg muscle were larger to. “Wow…” Ben just admired his growth. He flexed and arm and felt the bicep that formed. It was small, but hard as well.

Gramps “Ben… I think you have the orb.”

Ben snapped back into focus “I told you. I didn’t take it.”

Gramps “I know… you think you didn’t take it, but while you were growing, I saw a green glow behind your zipper. I think the orb is in your middle region. Technically, its your groin. I cold get into more depth, but I’ll have to look more closely.”

Ben “What ever. I’m good. I don’t mind. I kind of like the growth.”

Gramps “Well… I can’t do anything about it unless I know more about what’s going on. I’ll have to get more specialized help. I think I know who to call.”

Gwen “so what do we do if we find out what happened?”

Gramps “I don’t know…” As he talked, he took out his plumber badge and called to people. They agreed to come because they were curious as to what happened to.

What happens now?
1411312.title: He just simply grows.

14113121.content:
Gramps had told the two plumbers where they were. The two plumbers agreed to meet there. Now all the Tennyson’s had to do was wait.

Gramps “Ok. They’re coming. They’ll be hear in about 12hours. They are both on different continents right now.”

Ben groaned “That’s to long of a wait!”

Gwen “Stop whine. At least you got something out of this event. Everyone in school was getting taller than you. That’s why that Nick kid picked on you.”

Ben stuck out his tongue “He was bigger than everyone since first grade. Everyone else is about his size now. He just grew early. He can’t pick on anyone now. I heard that he’s an ‘average’ sized 11 year old now.”

Gwen “Well… anyway. You should just be quiet. You grew to a normal height, though your muscles had more development. You look kind of athletic now.”

Ben “I’ve always been athletic… just not coordinated or strong or big.”

Gwen “Well at least your humble about it.”

Ben “Yah. Well. I don’t need to be humble for long. If this keeps up, I’ll be bigger than everyone soon.” As soon as he said that, he felt the warm tingle again, and he smiled. He slowly grew again, but it lasted longer. As it happened, the tingle in his balls felt even more intense than before, but he ignored it. When it stopped, Ben was 5ft 5in tall, and had a light swimmer’s build. His pecs pushed an inch and a half off his body. His 6pack was defined and hard as a rock. His biceps were softballs. Even his penis had caught on a little with the growth, and was 8in long, and his balls were golf balls. It looked like he was a well balanced athlete who could do almost any sport. He could pass for a 15 year old. Though, he still had the face of a 10 year old. “Awesome! It happened again!”

Gramps and Gwen looked at Ben worried that something bad was going to happen to Ben.

Gramps “I hope they hurry up. We don’t know if this will have negative effects.”

Gwen “Well… I’m just worried that his muscles are going to feed his ego and make him even dumber than he already is. One small dweeb was bad, but a bulky one is even worse.”


Ben smile snidely “I don’t care about your insults. Nothing’s going to ruin my mood.” As he was talking, he felt the tingle for a brief second, and he hag grown a little more. “Actually, I think my mood might even get better.” he said as he flexed his newly enlarge bicep.

As they waited, Gwen started to read her spell book, and Gramps had gone to his Plumber’s guide to the universe. He wanted to find out more on Ben’s issue. Ben on the other hand didn’t think it was an issue at all. It was more of a gift.

For Ben, the time spent waiting was a period of understanding his new body. He started to do exercises and lift things he could never do before. Though, he did get tired sometimes because everyone had a limit. Ben did about 300 pushups before he got tired. When he did get tired though, he felt the warm tingle and grew again. Then he would start doing another set of push ups, but even more!

After 11hrs had past, Ben had grown significantly. He could pass for a high school senior that was into pro bodybuilding. He was 6ft 9in tall. His pecs pushed out 6in off his body. His 8pack abs were cut so deeply that you could stick your whole index finger in before you hit the end. His biceps were 8in in diameter, which is really big! His legs had grown so big that that were rubbing against each other. Even his calves looked over stuffed. During his growing, he had already lost his cloths. The 10yo sized clothing could never hope to cover the godly muscles of Ben Tennyson. The only thin that survived was his underwear, but even that was about to fail. If it were to hang freely, it would be 18in long with coconut balls. Though, Ben didn’t think much of it at his age. He’s only TEN! He just thought it made going to the bathroom easier.

Gwen “I’ve had enough! Stop moving around and put some cloths on!” Gwen’s face was red because she had been looking at Ben naked for the past 7hrs.

Ben smile “What? You don’t like all this muscle? Besides. I don’t have anything that fits. I doubt I could fit in gramp’s stuff either.”

Gramps over heard this “What are you trying to say?” He said sarcastically. “And I do have thing that will fit you!” he stated. “I should probably give it to you now because our guests will be here soon.”

Ben raised an eye brow unwilling to believe that anything could cover his gargantuan muscle. Earlier, he like the fill of his cloths tightening around his muscle, and the feeling they gave when they tore off his body “Really? You have something?” Even though Ben did like feeling the cloths gave off when they ripped, he was starting to feel self conscious of the fact that he was almost naked. “Umm.. You don’t happen to have under wear do you?”

Gramps laughed “Yah. I do, tough you aren’t getting my underwear. I’m giving you Plumber brand clothing.”

Ben “Wait! You mean those grey space suits you wear? Those are so boring. Don’t you have anything like what I usually wear? You know… a the T-shirt and cargo pants that I usually wear?”

Gramps laughed at Ben’s whining over style “Don’t worry. These aren’t space suits. When plumbers are forced to go to other planets that don’t have the same conditions on earth, we wear special clothing that mimics the feeling of earth. Though we will still need to have an oxygen tank or something. The clothing just keeps us from being crushed by gravity, and maintains the proper body pressure. It is also near indestructible. The material is super stretchy, heat resistant, and can’t be torn. Trust me. We tried to set it on fire. We put it on the surface of a star, and it still came out perfectly normal. We were able to stretch it to the size of a mountain before we lost the man power to stretch it even further. Then we tried to cut it, but we couldn’t. not even with lasers. These types of cloths are given to the higher ranks of plumbers once they have earned the clothing. But I think you should have it. You’ll need it more than me.” As gramps talked, he pressed a button on the wall and a set of cloths came sliding on a tray out of the wall. The clothing was gray and looked totally not extraordinary.

Gramps “They look bland, but put them on anyway. You’ll be in for a surprise.”

Ben walked over shaking the Rustbucket with his heavy foot falls. Ben took the clothing and put them on. They were actually to large for Ben. They hung to loose. Then suddenly, they started to shrink and wrap around Ben’s body perfectly. They hugged his every muscle on his body showing off their size and power. Then something else happened. They started to change colors and pocket began to form. After a few moment, Ben was wearing a larger version of what he usually wore. “These are so cool! Thanks Gramps.”

Gramps “Yah. Yah. I don’t need to get you a birthday present now.”

Ben’s face froze “Seriously?”

Gramps broke into a smile “Ok. That was funny. I think about it.”

Ben “Ok good. Think long and good. Or until you think you want to get me something else.”

Gwen saw something outside walk toward the door. “Hey guys. I think someone’s here.”

There was a knock.

Who was it?
14113121.title: While they wait, Ben grows again.

choices: The green orb is being ejected.
The green orb appears in Ben's ball sack.
141131211.content:
*Its about 9 in the morning now*

Feminine voice “Hey Max. Let us in. It me Melly, and Renold is here too.”

Gramps walking to the door and lets the two people in. A lady who looked to be inher twenties came in. Following her was an older man, in his 50’s. The old man was wearing a lab coat, and had a toothy smile when he saw Gramps.

Gramps “Melly! As beautiful as ever! And Renold! How are the rocks down below the earth?”

Renold “Good. Very good. We found an interesting crystalline life form down there. It’s very interesting. You should come back and visit every now and then.”

Gramps “I might take you up on that offer some other time, but we have a prupose for gathering.”

Melly “Yes… you said that this Ben kid was have and issue?”

Gramps “Yes. He’s right here.” Gramps gestured to Ben and then Gwen “Melly and Renald. These are my grandkids, Ben and Gwen.”

Melly’s mouth was wide open when she saw Ben. “He’s huge. How old is he?”

Gramps “I told you when I called that he had a growing issue.”

Melly “I thought it was a regular teenage crisis when the kid thought he was to short or something. But this is totally different. Wait, Did you say ten?”

Gramps nodded “Yah. Ten”

While Melly was talking to Gramps, Ben felt a kind of strange. Due to the effects of the orb on his body, Ben had progressed further into puberty, thus causing his hormones to be highly explosive at time. He felt his penis fill with blood, and his face turn red. 14113121111111111.content:
Gwen “Hey guys… we still have two day. What are we going to do?” Then a thought came to her “Why do they need you over at the Green Star?”

Gramps “Because I have a lot of connections with powerful alien species either threw old mission or legal contracts. They want me to call in a bunch of favors.”

Ben “Can’t you do that from here?”

Gramps “No. I don’t have the equipment to call in all my favors.”

Ben “Well… what are we going to do. We know Gwen is strong enough to do the spell. Should we just go?”

Gwen was about to say go, but she realized that they’d be entering a war between two large alien armies. “Maybe tomorrow guys. I think we should do something together first.”

Gramps knew what Gwen was doing and agreed. This would be an event to get them to know each other again. Especially Ben since he seemed to be changing the most.

Ben was kind of confused about the idea, but went a long.

Gramps “What do you guys wanna do?”

Ben had an idea “How about pasta! That first day of summer we had summer and it was awesome. I still don’t know what you put into it to make it taste so good.”

Gramps looked at Ben and she smile. She said “That good. Lets do it.”

Gramps “If you help make it, I’ll tell you what I put inside.”

Ben was all for that.

*several hours of chopping, cooking, and stirring*

Gramps “Ok. we’re done.”

Ben “Wait! I didn’t see you add anything to the sauce.”

Gramps “The secret wasn’t a physical ingredient. It was time.”

Ben looked at Gramps disbelieving. He though it was some super rare alien herb so something.

Gwen laughed at Ben’s face “It makes sense”

Gramps “Lets dig in.” Gramps set out 3 plates of pasta. There was a loud roar that appeared in the room. Gwen and Gramps ducked down because they thought hey were being attacked. When they looked up, they saw that Ben’s face was red.

Ben “Um… that was my stomach.”

Gwen stared at Ben. It wasn’t possible for a stomach to growl that loud. But its Ben! Then Gwen burst out laughing. Gramps joined her soon. Even Ben smiled a little.

Gramps took one of the plates and pushed the pasta on it into another larger plate. It was about 3 time the size of the old one. Then Gramps dumped the rest of the pasta onto it. Then he set the plate onto the table for Ben to eat.

Ben’s mouth was salivating the whole time.

Gramps “Dig in.”

Ben grabbed two forks and began to chow down like he used to do. His mouth was covered in sauce. Gwen on the other hand was using a pair of chopsticks and was eating her pasta while staring at how Ben could eat so fast and not throw-up.

Ben saw Gwen staring at him, but he didn’t care. Then he noticed her using chop sticks and wanted to try. Grabbed a pair from the side.

Gramps raised an eyebrow wondering what Ben was doing.

Ben tried copying Gwen, but couldn’t. He got frustrated “How do you do it?” He said to Gwen.

Gwen “Because I practiced. Just keep trying. You’re getting there.” Though she was being amused by Ben’s sad attempts.

After about 10minuted of failing, Ben get frustrated again and accidentally snapped his chopsticks in half with his hand. This caught Ben’s attention. He had lost control to easily. He put them down and picked up another pair, but instead of using them the traditional way, he just stabled the pasta until he collected a few noodles. Then he munch them all down. Ben smiled happily.

Gwen had stared at Ben as he was doing that. “That’s not how you use them!”

Ben “Doesn’t matter. It got the noodles into my mouth, so I’m good.”

Gwen face palmed and looked at Ben. “What ever. If you’re doing it that way, just use the forks again.”

Gramps was sitting and eating quietly listening to the two kids talked. They’re arguing again. Maybe I should stop them. He didn’t because he saw the slight smile the Ben and Gwen gave each other. Because arguing was fun!

After a moment, they finished their pasta, and Ben was surprised that he finished his plate. He thought he’d never feel full.

Gwen “Hey dweeb. Wash your face. There’s sauce everywhere.”

Ben did that face when he was saying “What do you mean?”

Ben looked in the mirror hanging over the sink and saw that his face was spotted with sauce. Ben took a finger and smeered some sauce on it. “Want some?” he said while pointing it to Gwen.

Gwen recoiled “Ugh! You’re so gross.” then slowly, Ben’s snicker turned into a laugh. Gramps joined and then Gwen joined.

No one wanted to say this one phrase because that means they’d have to acknowledge that things were different. They didn’t want to say “Like old times.”

What happens now?
14113121111111111.title: They have another two days. What do they do?

choices: Ben heads out as an alien.
141131211111111111.content:
They’ve had their fun, so they get ready to leave. Ben brings nothing but the necklace and the cloths he’s wearing.

Gwen brought he spell book and bracelet.

Gramps had a book full of contacts.

Gramps “Are we ready to get going? The Green Star supernova’s in 36hrs.”

They all nodded, so they grabbed hands.

Gwen “Gramps, so how do I do the spell? Shouldn’t I practice once?”

Gramps “No need. All you have to do is imagine the place you want to go to. Luckily you don’t have to. I have a picture of the Green Star.” Gramps gave Gwen a picture, and she memorized it.

Gwen “Ok. Lets go.” They hold hands again, and vanished from the earth in a flash of purple lights.

Far away, there was a similar flash of purple, and three humans appeared in mid space. They were in the atmosphere of the Green Star.

Gwen “Gramps! We’re in space with out space suits. Why aren’t we dead!”

Gramps “Because the atmosphere of the Green Star is 1 light year in radius, and is composed of 90% oxygen. And 10 % of other harmless gases.”

Ben was silent. He felt the tingle from the orb again, but this time, it was a thousand times more intense. The feeling was almost numbing. Though he could feel his body’s density sky rocket. He must be millions of lbs now if not billions. “Guys. I’m growing even faster that before.”

Gramps “Probably because the orb is reacting to the energy released by the Green Star. It should weaken I think. Maybe when you become dense enough, the feeling will fade because the growth will become relatively minimal compared to your density at that time.”

Ben thought about it, and could slowly feel the tingle fade slowly away. “I think you’re right. The feelings going away.”

Gwen “Ok then. What are we going to do? We’re in the middle of space with no was of getting to this person that called you.”

Gramps “Actually, he should almost be here. The Plumber badges has a tracking systems that let the other know where we are at anytime.”

As Gramps was saying that, the sound of a roaring engine appeared. They looked in that general direction and saw a spaceship getting closer.

Ben “How do we know that isn’t a bad guy?”

Gramps “Look at the insignia on the side.”

Ben looked and saw the logo of the omnitrix. “Oh…”

When the ship got close enough, it releases a tractor beam pulling everyone in.

A little alien with a large head and large eyes said “Welcome back. Its nice of you to join us.”

Gramps “Azmuth. Nice to see you. What’s the situation?”

Ben and Gwen had already encountered Azmuth, and were surprised to see that he was leading the defense to keep the universe in order.

Azmuth “Not so good. The enemy army out numbers us 100 to one. We’ll need you to star calling some favors with some aliens that can help. We’ll need as much of it as we can get. The enemy has already declared war and will attack in 10 hrs. We’ll need you to go make the transmissions now.” Azmuth pointed to a large machine.

Gramps “I can’t punch these all in on time.”

Azmuth chuckled “No need. Just let the machine scan the pages. It’ll take an hour to process, but after that, it’ll be sending messages faster than the speed of light.”

*Breaking the fourth wall*

Gwen “Impossible! That goes against Einstein.”

Azmuth “This is an interactive story on Writing.com Gwen. Anything is possible.

Gwen “You broke the Fourth Wall! What’s the writer going to say?”

Writer “What ever. I’m letting the story write itself for a while.” the voice resonated around the universe of this interactive.

Azmuth “See… he doesn’t mind.”

Gwen groans “What ever”

*Repairing Fourth Wall*

Gramps “Thanks. Do I just set it on the machine?”

Azmuth “Yah. It’ll do the rest.”

Gramps did just that, and the machine turned on and began scanning.

Azmuth “No that that’s done, we can talk about the omnitrix. Ben… I’d like you to give it to me.”

Ben was shocked “What do you mean? Why can’t I use it?”

Azmuth “Because… When you transmute into another alien, the alien gets enhanced strength using the original host’s strength as a base.”

Ben “Huh?”

Gwen explained “I think he mean that if a child used it and turned into diamond head, he’d be stronger, but if a pro wrestler used it and turned into diamond head, the new diamond head would be even stronger because it’s base is a pro wrestler and not a child. Am right?”

Azmuth “Correct. Now hand it over.”

Ben “But what if I were stronger than all the other aliens you wanted to give it to.”

Azmuth sighed “”Ben. Be real. A human child can’t match an alien that was born into a planet that requires it to use strength for everything. I’ve met aliens that could lift mountains. I’m sorry Ben, but you’re to weak.”

Ben chuckled. He took out the green orb from his pendant.

Azmuth gasped “That is what I think it is? Is it?”

Ben “It’s the universe’s largest growthium crystal.”

Azmuth commanded several aliens to lock the doors and stop anyone from entering. “How! Wait. Tell me later. This changes every thing. How long have you been holding it?”

Ben “About 5 days.”

Azmuth frowned “That isn’t good enough. Your body appears stronger than most humans your age, but that still isn’t strong enough.”

Ben “Because its all condensed. I think I’m a few billions lbs of condensed muscle, bone, and other stuff.”

Azmuth gasped. He realized that that was enough muscle to match a small mountain. Then he saw the Gravitum necklace “Ah… That’s why the ship hasn’t imploded. You’er wearing a Gravitum neckalce.”

Ben “So what happens now? Can I hold onto it?”

Azmuth sighed “I was going to ask my second inn command to take it, but I guess you’ll make more use of it.”

Gwen “Ok… so that’s solved. How are the enemies going to collect the energy of the Green Star?”

Azmuth “With a giant battery. It can store enough energy to light the universe for days. They’re going to use it to store the energy released when the Star implodes. Then after that, they’ll collect the materials that that star will have created in its last moment of life.”

Ben “What does this mean for the rest of the universe?”

Azmuth “Depending on who’s controlling the army, they could take over the whole universe.”

Gwen “Then how do we stop it?”

Azmuth “We’ll need Ben to make a bee line to the machine that they’re going to use to trap the energy. If we can destroy that, then the star will release its energy into the universe and then we’ll need Ben to rush in and collect what ever it made during the supernova.”

Gwen “So a lot is depending on Ben…”

Gramps “Then why did you need me to call in my favors?”

Azmuth “Their army is huge. We’ll need to get them disperse in order for Ben to get to the machine in the center of their army.”

Ben “But how can they contain a super nova?”

Azmuth the same way your pendant can store anything.”

Gramps gasped “You don’t mean.”

Azmuth “Yes. They obtained large amount of Gravitum ore and have started to loop it around the green star. They are almost completely done making the circle.”

What will happen now?
141131211111111111.title: They go to the Green Star.

choices: It was a decoy. They have millions of the machines.
The Green Star supernova's ahead of schedule.
1411312111111111111.content:
Azmuth “Ben. We’ll need to you rest up. You’ll have about 24hrs to do what you’ll need. During that time, I’ll send out forces out to disperse the army. You’ll have to be quick on getting to the machine as fast as possible.”

Ben “Ok.”

Azmuth dismissed everyone. He sent them to their on rooms for them to wait to be called on. Ben went to his room, but then got bored, so he decided to roam the halls.

As he was walking he met hundreds of alien Plumbers and a couple dozen human Plumbers. They all wondered why there was a kid on board. A few aliens saw the Omnitrix and glared at him. How can a human dare wield the greatest instrument in the universe! Word got out about a human boy wielding the Omntrix. Eventually, word got to Azmuth’s second in command. His name is hard to pronounce, so we’ll call him Gerf.

Gerf was sitting in his office waiting for Azmuth to come and give him the Omnitrix. He’s worked hard, and was under the impression that Azmuth thought he should get it as well. When he heard a human boy had it he almost went mad. “What! Show me this thing that wields the Omnitrix.”

The servant guided Gerf to Ben.

Gerf “You! Why do you have the Omnitrix. Give it to me. Azmuth is planning on giving it to me.”

Ben “Was was, but not anymore.”

Gerf laughed “Are you trying to say he gave it to you?”

Ben “Yup. So why don’t you go do something else. I’m busy.”

Gerf’s anger rose up again “You can’t dismiss me. I dismiss you!”

Ben “Ok. If you say so.” Ben turned to leave because Gerf said ‘I dismiss you!’.

Gerf stomped a heavy foot on the floor “Don’t mess with me human. I’ve had years of experience in this field you call sarcasm. I’ve hated every moment. Continue, and I will remove the Omnitrix by force.”

Ben smile “Go ahead and try.”

Gerf was confused. Usually, his size, power, and aura of command made his enemies cower in fear. What is wrong with this human. Is he stupid or something! (Gwen would be laughing right now) “I have warned you human.” Gerf charged at Ben and tried to grab the Omnitrix.

However, with his super fast reflexes (that he got from his dense muscle), he side stepped Gerf and punch him in the gut. Ben started to walk away while Gerf was still standing.

Gerf’s body was in turmoil. How can a human be so strong. How does he move so fast. Why can’t I move. Then he fell into unconsciousness.

All the aliens had gathered to watch Gerf teach the human a lesson. He should not wield the Omnitrix so lightly. When Gerf lost, they were all lost for word. Some aliens wouldn’t accept his loss, and thought it was a trick and threw them selves at Ben. Ben silences them with a quick punch.

After all that, Ben wanted some peace, so he went back to his room and looked out the window. He say the Green Star and how it shown with lively green. He could feel his density spike again and slowly fade away.

Ben stared out the window until he heard over a speaker “Prepare for battle! The enemy is quickly approaching.”

With that, the ship came alive. Aliens from every corner of the universe got ready for battle. After a few minutes, ships were already deploying. Even Gramps’ contacts had arrived, and were still coming. The armies from both sides seemed equal in numbers now.

You could hear the battle cries as aliens jumped out of their shuttle and blasted forward using rocket boots and stuff of the like. Ben turned away. It was to bloody for him.

There was a knock at his door. Ben “Come in!”

He saw Gwen and Gramps come in.

Gramps “Nervous?”

Ben “A smidge. I didn’t think was as bad as people said, but I was wrong.” Ben’s face was grim.

Gwen “Smile a little. There’s been a change in strategy.”

Ben “What?”

Then another voice chimed in from outside the door.

Azmuth “Yes. Indeed. You’ll head straight towards the machine with out even having to fight. We’ll need you to go in as the alien you call ‘Ghost Freak.’”

Ben began to chuckle. “He. Its so simple it funny.”

Azmuth “Yes… it seems that way. Well. Hop to it. Every second the enemy fights us is another thousand lives. They’ll start to think we’re tricking them.”

Ben took out the watch turned into Ghost Freak. Something was off. Ben thought. Where’s the ship. Where is everyone? Ben looked around with his one eye and then say that his body was so huge that he enveloped the ship and a huge area around it. “Wow! I’m huge!”

Inside the ship, Azmuth was awestruck. He knew Ben was highly condensed, and that he’ll expand once he turned into Ghost Freak, but this was beyond what he had thought.

Gwen “Where did he go?”

Gramps “I’d like to know that as well.”

Azmuth “His compressed body decompressed once he turned into Ghost Freak. His body is covering the whole ship right now.”

Outside, Ben began to more toward the other army. When he got to it, he covered the army and sent a chill through their bodies. They all froze and couldn’t move. Ben knocked every alien he passed through unconscious. When he go to the center, he saw a huge machine. Ben got to work on ripping it apart. He squeezed his whole body inside, and then expanded making it explode. The aliens near the machine freaked out and were shocked by what happened. Ben took this moment to get away.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111.title: Ben heads out as an alien.

choices: He asks for an item or service.
14113121111111111112.content:
Ben had escaped the army and began working his way back to the ship when his watch timed out. “Dang it! So close.” Ben yelled.

Then he heard a rumble. He looked down and saw the Green star morphing and convulsing on itself. It was getting ready to super nova. Then Ben remembered the Gravitum ring around the Green Star! Ben looked down and saw a thin line across the surface that must have been the Gravitum.

Then if that was bad, something worse happened. Ben heard a roaring of millions of engines. Ben looked around and saw millions of machine fly past him and attach them selves to the ring.

Ben was to far away to make it in time. Then when he looked closer, he saw a glow surrounding the star. It was force field! Everything was getting worse and worse, then a thought struck Ben. Ben began to take of his necklace. Once it was off his neck, it appeared as though he vanished.

His tremendous weight and gravity pulled him toward the Green Star at a speed near the speed of light. BAM! He slammed into the force field. This stopped Ben in his tracks. Then slowly, the force field began to sag around Ben. POP! It vanished and Ben began his descent toward the star.

In the moment Ben was stopped by the field, The Green Star imploded. Then it released a wave of energy that seemed to be stopped by something. The ring of Gravitum seemed to be doing its job.

As Ben fell, he felt the orb in his necklace vibrate in anticipation. It sent a tingle threw Ben’s body. The star was quickly approaching. It seemed like a solid wall, Ben simple fell through it and into a sea of green light and energy. The orb in Ben’s pendent went out and flashed green. All the energy from the star began to get sucked into the orb.

At the same time, Ben felt his penis grow hard, and a unknown level of pleasure passed through his body. Pulled his pants down and began to jack off in the middle of a supernova. Lost in euphoric pleasure, Ben failed to notice that the energy around his was slowly fading away. As the minutes ticked by, the pressure in his hyper condensed balls grow to much for him. He exploded with cum. Millions of kiloliters of cum blasted out of his hose of a penis. At the same time, the orb flashed green once more and all the cum Ben had released was sucked into the orb. This caused it to bond with Ben even further!

Slowly, Ben calmed down and realized that his pants were down, so he pulled it up. Then off in the distance, he notice a tiny green crystal. It was shaped like a thin four pointed star, and it drifted towards the orb and entered it. Ben felt his body burn as the intense tingling feeling rushed through him. He wanted to scream, but couldn’t. The pain was that strong. Like before, the tingle began to fade away until it was a barely noticeable. Ben realized the he was curled into a ball, and had been crying. He wiped his eyes and looked for his orb.

It was right in front of him, but it looked different. It was clear like before, but it had a tine 4pointed star in the middle, and surrounding it was were lines of green energy. The lines moved in a slow un ordered path that was ever changing. Ben stared at it mesmerized by how the lines moved and how the crystal thrummed with power. Ben held it in his and was surprised to see that it had a heart beat. For some reason, Ben could tell it was copying his heart beat. Ben put it back into his pendant where it would be safe. And then put his necklace back on.

There was a roar from behind him. Ben turned around and was surprised to see the enemy army was surrounding in a giant sphere. Ben looked at its size and saw that there were aliens farther than he could see. The aliens surrounded Ben making a prison out of their own bodies that was about 500 miles thick. Ben sighed… this is going to take a while. Suddenly, there was a flash of purple and a pair of arms grabbed his neck. Ben would have already thrown the arms off, but he knew who they belonged to. Then there was another flash of purple and Ben disappeared from the prison for aliens.

Back at the ship, there was a flash of purple light and to kids appeared in the room.

Ben “Thanks Gwen. I thought I’d be there for months.”

Gwen “No problem. I wanted to hurry and get home.”

Gramps was sitting in a chair reading a magazine. “Welcome back Ben. We thought you had disappeared, but when the aliens formed a ball, we knew you were in there somewhere.”

The doors to that room opened, and Azmuth entered.

Azmuth “What on earth happened out there!”

Ben “Well… I stopped the machine at the center of the army, but it was only one of a few million of machines. The others had arrived once the star started to act all funny. I couldn’t get there on time if I just floated toward then, so I took of my necklace and gravity pulled me in. It was kind of weird. First I broke through a force field, and then I get submerges in the star. After that, the orb began to suck in the energy from the exploding star. When it was done with that, there was a crystal left behind. It was a 4 pointed star, and it merged with the orb. Its in the center of it right now.” Ben took out his orb and saw that it was glowing by itself and had no need to a light source. Ben could feel his density increasing rapidly, but her didn’t feel the pain from before.

Everyone looked at the orb and saw that it was different. They saw the lines of energy and the star at the center.

Azmuth “This is totally unheard of. But I’ll accept it for now. Ben Tennyson, the universe is in your debt.” (I‘m sorry! I know its cheesy!)

Ben didn’t know what to say “umm… your welcome?”

Azmuth “Is there anything we can get you?”

Ben “Yah…

What is it?
14113121111111111112.title: The Green Star supernova's ahead of schedule.

choices: Lets skip to the first day of school.
141131211111111111121.content:
Ben “Yah… can you get the Omnitrix off my wrist.”

Everyone was speechless.

Azmuth was the only one who could talk “Why is that?”

Ben “There’s to much power for me to handle. When I used the Omnitrix, I saw how strong and powerful I really was. I knocked out the enemy army just by drifting over them. I don’t know what would happen if I wanted to do real harm. I’m not think about hurting things, but I fear what will happen if I do.”

Azmuth nodded approving his reasoning “Ok. I will grant your request. However, since it is so trivial, I will grant you one more request.”

Ben thought about it for a moment “Can you give me something that will help me control my strength. I fear that I might hurt someone by accident.”

Azmuth nodded again and agreed that that was a good request “Very well. We will produce a seal for your strength. Is there something you keep on you at all time?”

Ben nodded and showed him the pendant on his necklace. “Yah. I have the pendant with me at all time. I sometimes remove it, but keep it in my pocket or my hands.”

Azmuth nodded. “Perfect. Can I see it?” Ben hands it over to Azmuth. Azmuth looked at the 2 in diamter circle. “Yes… Gravitum. A strange element if I must say. Gwen can you come over?”

Gwen looked surprised “Me?”

Azmuth “Yes. We need to you use magic to link Ben’s strength to this medallion.”

Gwen “Ok. How do I do that?”

Azmuth “Ben’s going to hold the medallion and imagine its abilities. Then you will use your magic to infuse his will with the medallion. Just imagine a ghost of Ben flowing into the Medallion. The magic will do the rest.”

Azmuth handed the medallion to Ben, and Ben imagined it doing what he wanted it to do. He wanted to hold back his strength so he was as strong as he looked. Though it only worked when it was connected to the necklace. When he took it off, the seal on his body is removed, but it would go back on when he attached it to the necklace again.

While Ben was think, Gwen imagined the ghost of Ben’s will flowing into the medallion. There was a green glow around Ben that started to flow into the medallion. The medallion gave a green flash, and the spell was done.

Azmuth “Ok. The spell is done. You can relax now.”

To Ben, when the spell finished, his limbs felt heavier, and the air felt thicker. “Wow… my arm feels heavier.”

Azmuth “That means its working.”

Ben walked over to a chair and picked it up. Ben felt the weight of the chair now. Unlike before, he hadn’t felt a thing. He began to feel the fatigue from hold the chair for a while, so he set it down. Ben felt a sudden long for the strength he had, but knew that this was for the best “Ok. Yah… it worked.” There was some satisfaction in his voice though.

The doors opened, and a messenger came in “Azmuth. The enemy army has located our position and is in a frenzy over their fail attempt. We will soon be overwhelmed.”

Azmuth nodded and waved him away. “Ben… it appears that I will need you to remove the seal and use the Omnitrix just this once more. We have to stop this before anymore people get hurt”

Ben nodded and removed the medallion. As soon as he did, he felt the world seem small and weak. Ben remembered the feel of power, and was scared of it. He knew that he’d return the seal back to the necklace once he finished. He wasn’t a person that like the power. After removing the seal, he turned into Ghost Freak and put the enemies to sleep. While they were asleep, he erased their memory of what had come to pass.

Ben returned to the ship and turned back into Ben. He put the medallion with the Omnitrix logo back on to the necklace. “Can you remove the Omnitrix now?”

Azmuth “Yes. Seeing you take down the arm had made me see why you wanted to rid yourself of the temptation. I believe that you are wiser than you look.”

Gwen snorted and then covered her face “Ben? Wise? HA!” And she continued laughing.

Ben couldn’t help but smile. “No… not wise. Just scared of what could happen.”

Azmuth “Call it what you want. Now… I believe that this satisfies your 2 request.”

Ben nodded “So can we go home now? Its been a long day and a half.”

Azmuth “Just one question. Will you help serve the Plumbers when you are called upon?”

Ben thought about it “Yes and no. I’ll help on impossible things, but I can’t help all the time. Or else the plumbers will get lazy. They have to prove to me that they have run out of resources. I’ll feel guilty if the Plumbers fail to protect the universe because they have a quick and easy solution.”

Azmuth agree with Ben’s reasoning “Very well. You may go home and rest. We’ll take care of the rest.”

With this, Ben, Gramps and Gwen vanished in a flash of purple light.

What happens now?
141131211111111111121.title: He wants something unexpected.

choices: Nick wants to show him whos in charge. How?
1411312111111111111211.content:
The rest of the summer was uneventful. Ever since that Green Star event, nothing seemed exciting. Ben spent his time having fun like before. He got used to the slowness of his body, and then thing returned to normal. Gwen was still practicing spells. And Gramps was… he was just being Gramps. Everything was peaceful.

As the rest of summer timed down, there was little to no alien appearances. No evil plots. Nothing! When the occasional alien arrived, Gwen would teleport it to the other end of the universe. Ben had removed his medallion once near the beginning because he was still training his resolve, and had thrown the alien back into space. That was it though.

When summer was over and Ben had gone home. His parents were shocked to see their son a half a foot taller and a lot more muscled. Ben just said that he had a major growth spurt, and at the same time, he had been lifting some of Gramp’s old weights. They accepted it because their son was a preteen, and thing were changing. Plus he had been a away for the whole summer. Their biggest surprise were his manners! He even asked to be excused from the table to go to bed early.

Ben just said “I kind of got a little to strong over the summer. I hurt someone by accident, so I kind of learnt how to control my self in order to prevent that. I couldn’t let my anger spike any more so I was forced to mellow out.”

His parents were lost for words, but went a long with it because they approved of his reasoning.

Now, it’s the first day of sixth grade (everyone had turned 11 by now. Including Ben). Ben walked to school that day and got inside early. He had found his new homeroom and sat down in a corner. All he had to do now was wait. As the bell rang for homeroom, students began to funnel into the room and get into their seats. The students rearranged the desks so they form their own little groups.

Nick, the bully from previous years, entered last. Everyone exclaimed when he entered the room. He had grown significantly. Near the end of last year, his growth had slowed down, so people began to catch up to his height and size. Now however, it seemed he had hit another growth spurt. He was 5ft4in, and had a strong bulky build (well as bulky as an eleven year old can get). He was proud of his body though he had to cheat in order to get it, but after that, he worked hard to maintain it. With hard work, he got to a decent size. His pecs pushed half an inch off his body, and you could make out decent sized muscle. He even had a six pack! Nick wasn’t average anymore, so he was ready to exert dominance over his peers once again!

He strolled in trying to show off his good features. His jet black hair, dark brown eyes, summer tan, trade mark smile. He didn’t have these last year, but ever since the experiment that summer, he was looking even better! The girls in the class felt a minor attraction to Nick and his improved body. All of these thing, he thought, would help him control his peers. He smile at the thought.

When he took his seat, their homeroom teacher, Ms. Tse, came out and called for attendance.

Tse “Amy!” A girl said present. “Nick!” Nick stood up and flashed a smile at all the girls and sat down. Tse continued through the names until she got to the last one. “Ben Tennyson.” Tse sighed waiting for some noisy, brown haired kid to storm into the room. Actually, everyone expected that. Nick was sitting in his chair waiting for a chance to make fun of Ben. Some said something from the back of the room.

Ben “Here.”

Everyone looked back surprised. Tse was surprised “Ben… is that you? You grew so much!” She was moaning inside. A bigger Ben means bigger problems.

Nick was outraged. Who ever this kid was, it wasn’t that shrimp Ben. “Impossible! Ben was a shrimp last year. How can it be possible.”

Ben sighed and looked at Nick “I won’t tell you. May be if you asked nicely…”

Nick glared at Ben in anger. No one makes him do anything. No one has ever talked to him like that but his mom.

A girl to the side stood up and walked to Ben. It was Amy. She poked Ben’s chest to make sure it was real, and recoiled when she felt the hard muscle beneath.

Amy said nicely “Can you tell me? I’m kind of curious.”

Ben smiled. Amy was one of the few people who was nice to him last year. He would tell her anything. “For you, I can tell. I had started lift my Grandpa’s old college weight over the summer, but that can’t make some grow that fast. However, it was funny. I had a growth spurt at the same time I started to lift, so the two coupled together made me grow significantly.”

Amy made the ‘o’ shape with her mouth and sat at a desk next to him and they chatted about their summer and what happened. Everyone was back in their own little groups gossiping about how Ben had changed. Nick on the other hand found that he had a new rival. It was going to be harder to maintain his alpha male status with Ben around. He’ll have to show that he can beat Ben.

So what happens now?
1411312111111111111211.title: Lets skip to the first day of school.

choices: Confronts Ben, and demands he give the green orb.
Tries to steal it from Ben, but where is it?
14113121111111111112112.content:
The first class that everyone had was Gym and the first day was always a fitness test. Nick thought that this would be a great chance to show off his strength, and push Ben out of the picture.

The test checks for speed, flexibility, and strength.

Speed: Run a mile as fast as you can.

Nick was at a disadvantage in this category. He had trained his body mostly for strength. He couldn’t do endurance exercises like running, but he could still beat a bunch of people with a bit of effort.

Ben was at an advantage. All the hiking over the summer had helped Ben develop leg strength and endurance.

The Gym teacher was Mr. Ted. He had everyone line up in 5 different lines and had the front five race each other. Ben and Nick were in the front.

Ted “Ok. Ready. Run!”

With that, Nick bolted forward trying to get as much of a lead as possible. By the time he got to half a mile, he was dying. His body couldn’t handle the constant motion. Weights were do ten then rest. Do ten then rest. This was continuous.

Ben on the other hand had experience. He took a quick, but steady pace that he could maintain. Due to his larger size, he could be faster than most. Ben passed Nick sometime during the mile run and finished first. He felt slightly fatigued, but recovered quickly thanks to the stamina he built over the summer. Nick came third because some track kid had caught up and passed him.

Nick didn’t count this as a victory for Ben. Running didn’t count Nick reasoned. He was rally waiting to the strength portion of the exam. He was confident that he could out muscle anyone.

Flexibility: How far past your toes you could reach, bend back, etc.

Ben and Nick lost this to Amy who could bend so far back, she could take her glasses off with her feet!

Ben “Wow Amy. That’s incredible. How can you do that?”

Amy smile from the compliment “Thanks Ben. You did pretty good on the run too! For me, I excel in flexibly. I have a lot of double joints, and I take aerobics, gymnastics, and yoga. They all help improve flexibility and keep me in shape.”

Ben said seriously “Maybe I should give that a shot. I heard yoga helps loosen stiff muscles. I could use that a bit right now.” Ben said as he stretched his arms, and back, etc.

Nick wasn’t listening. We was getting impatient for the next exam to start.

Strength: As many push-up, pull-up, and sit-up that you possibly can. Then lift as much weight as you can for 10 reps.

Ted told everyone to grab a mat and a partner.

Ben paired up with Amy, and Nick didn’t get a partner. No one wanted him, so the coached ended up being his partner.

Ted “Ok. As many push ups as possible. Ready! GO!”

Everyone began to do push-ups. Most kids began to die at 5. Some made it to 11. Ben and Nick however got to 20 then 30. By forty, Ben and Nick were starting to feel the strain on their bodies. Ben has been working out a lot over the summer as well in order to understand his body. He also learnt that he could always push his body a little harder than the last time. And this was a time to work harder.

Nick’s face was drenched in his sweat as he tried to maintain a lead on Ben. When Ben got to forty, Nick did 41. As Ben continued, Nick began to panic. He wanted his previous place of power. Everyone feared him, and he like that, but if he lost to Ben now, his dominance would be shattered.

To his dismay, Ben continued. Inside Ben’s head, he saw Amy staring at him. Last year, Ben was relatively weak compared to everyone else, so they mocked him. Amy was nice, so he like her for that. Right now, he wanted to leave a good impression on Amy.

Nick wanted power (he‘s evil), and Ben wanted to impress a girl (less evil).

Ben made it to 50, and Nick was at 49. Inside Nick’s head, Nick was screaming at his muscles. What was all that training for if he couldn’t beat Ben! He bent his arms and got low to the ground, but he strained to push himself up. He made it half way up before his arms failed in.

Ted “Ok. Ben has 50 push up. Nick has 49 push-ups. Very good to the both of you. You should be proud.”

Ben said good job to Nick, but Nick just gave Ben a sneer and walked away.

Ted “Ok! Time for sit-ups”

Ben won at 125 situps, and Nick at 124.

Ted “Pull ups!”

Ben won at 25, and Nick at 24

Ted “Weight lifting time!”

Ben could lift 160lbs for ten reps. Seth was able to match his at 160 lbs for ten reps.

After the exam was done, Nick stormed into the boy’s locker room and took his shower and changed. while he was doing that, the boys and girls out in the gym were gossiping about Ben’s body. This made his face turn red as he blushed. A lot of the girls snickered at Ben’s discomfort, but when he saw Amy he smiled.

Inside the locker room, Nick was alone inside and he had started to punch the wall with had hand. How?!? How did he beat me in all of them! I can’t believe it! I even got an experiment done on me to make me stronger than everyone. Then he remembered something that happened during the experiment. The green and black blob monster had turned into a kid. It looked like Ben, but he was smaller back then. Maybe the effects of the ray were delayed for him, and cause his growth over a period of time! It doesn’t matter. Ben was effected by the ray like me! Then he took the orb too!

What happens now?
14113121111111111112112.title: Fitness test in Gym today!

choices: He looks for a quick way to grow.
He tries to become friends with Ben to get the orb.
141131211111111111121121.content:
Nick’s eyes opened in realization. Ben could have the orb! I want! Nick began searching to Ben’s backpack trying to see if he had it there. He had emptied out the backpack, but it was all textbooks, and other school supplies. Then he heard some noises.

Ted told everyone to hurry into the locker rooms to shower and change. He would give them a pass to next period if they were a little late. The boys and girls funneled into their respective locker rooms. As the first boys headed into the bathroom, Nick made a bolt out of the locker room.

Ben came in last because the coach held him back for a quick question. Why he did get in though, he say his school supplies scattered all over the floor. Ben sighed and began putting things away. Nothing was missing he thought. Probably just a prank. After everything was all squared away, Ben too his shower and changed. He was late so Ted gave him a pass.

Nick was already in his next class, and the teacher was talking, but he was to busy think about where Ben had hid the orb.

After school, Ben talked to Amy shortly. They had become close friend through out the day. They had all the same classes. When Ben said good bye to Amy, Seth went out of the building and followed Ben.

Nick “Hey Tennyson. How’d you really get so big?”

Ben raised and eyebrow and made a questioning face “What?”

Nick “Don’t play dumb. This summer at that medical mineral institute, you and that blob teamed up to steal the orb didn’t you.” he said smiling confidently.

Ben was shocked, but he learnt to hide his expressions. They sometime got him in trouble, so he worked on it a bit. He maintain his previous look and broke into a smile. “That’s funny Nick. Me and a blob! Good one.” Ben said letting out a laugh. So he was the kid that the ray fired at.

Nick had been confident Ben had the orb. Why is he laughing? I’m being totally serious. Nick walked up to Ben and tried to tower over Ben, but Ben was an inch or two taller than Nick, so Nick had to settle for looking straight in the eye. “This isn’t a joke. Tell me where it is, or else.”

Ben’s face got serious “Or else what? You going to give me a punch? Shove me in my locker? Give me a wedgie? I don’t think so. Maybe you think I’m still weak like before. That I’m helpless? Not any more. I’m done with you.”

Nick was outraged. No one talks to me like that! I’ve always been the strongest, and I still am. Who does he think he is! Nick walked up to Ben and gave him a hard punch to the gut. Then a just wave of pain rushed threw his fist and into his arm. What does he have under there! A metal board? (Even though Ben had limited his strength, his Boy was still has dense as before. Denser actually). Ben yelled in pain “What’s under there?!?!”

Ben smile “Nothing much. Just a 6 pack.” Ben lift his shirt up to prove it. Under his shirt was a set of nicely chiseled abs.

Nick “No abs are that hard!” he was panicking. I can’t stand losing. Not to Ben! The kid I humiliated last year. “You can’t fool me. I know you have that orb. That’s the only way you could get so strong!”

Ben sighed “So what are you going to do about it? Try to steal it from me? I’ll tell you something. I always have it on me. I never leave it anywhere else.”

Nick though about it… It wasn’t in his backpack. His pants don’t have any bulges. So it can’t be there. Did he eat it!?! De he put it un his body? This freak! “You put it in your body didn’t you! That’s the only way.”

Ben let out a short burst of air and chuckled “You would think so, but no. I’m not that crazy.”

Nick was losing his patience. He saw Ben’s medallion dangling out of his shirt. He always has that with him. It must be important. Nick planned on taking it and trading for the orb. Nick ran forward surprising Ben and grabbed the medallion and yanked it off.

Ben’s face turned blank. He felt his strength sky rocket. The world was small and weak in his eyes, but he didn’t want to hurt it. He wanted to protect it. Ben looked at Nick. “You don’t know what you just did to yourself.”

Nick smile “So this is important! Tell you what. Give me the orb, and I give you back you medallion. It seems important enough. Doesn’t it?” Nick looked at Ben confidently think that he won. Then Ben vanished. Where did he go. He was standing right there! Nick felt his hand become empty, and looked down. The medallion! Where did it go! Behind Nick, Ben was putting the medallion back into place.

Ben “You Don’t know what you just did…” Ben sighed sadly.

Nick turned around “What is this! Some trick? Nobody moves that fast!”

Ben “Your right. Nobody moves that fast, but this somebody does. Now get over yourself.”

Nick wouldn’t give up. He charged at Ben and punched his chest as hard as possible. There was a cracking sound as he broke a few fingers upon impact. He screamed and fell to the ground clutching his hand. Its not possible! He’s literally harder than stone! What is this!

Ben had a little pity. Ben knew that Nick was used to the feel of power, and was trying his best in a futile situation. Ben took out his phone and called Gramps.

Gramps “Max Tennyson. What’s the situation?”

Ben “Nick, last year’s school bully got hurt pretty badly. Can you come over and patch him up?”

Gramps sighed on the other line “It must be pretty important for you to call me.”

Ben “Yah, I also what some advice.”

Gramps “Now this is making more sense. I’ll be over in 10 minutes. Luckily I’m only a town away.”

Ten minutes later, and Gramps arrives in the Rustbucket. Ben Picks up Nick (who is knocked out), and carries him into the Rustbucket to get patched up.

Gramps “What’d he do?”

Ben “He took my medallion off, but I didn’t hurt him. He gave me the hardest punch he had, and hit my chest. He broke a few fingers though.”

Gramps nodded and took out a small ray gun and shot it at Nick’s broken hand. After a few moments, it began to patch itself up.

Ben “That’s new. When did you get that?”

Gramps smiled “It was a gift from Azmuth for helping back in you know when.”

Ben smiled “That was interesting.”

By now, Nick’s hand was all patched up and fully functional.

With this, Ben took Nick out of the Rustbucket and set him back outside on the ground. Ben said good bye to Gramps and started walking home.

An hour later, Nick was making his way home to. How did I lose. I gave him the mother of all punches. Its just not possible. Nick continued to himself how impossible it was that Ben wasn’t effected in the least by his punches. Nick concluded I need to get stronger.

What happens now?
141131211111111111121121.title: Confronts Ben, and demands he give the green orb.

choices: Waits a bit, and grows stronger.
1411312111111111111211211.content:
Nick got home and started looking for his miracle growth online on the internet. He searched for a product that could enhance strength instantly. He wanted to out shine Ben.

When he was about to give up looking online, there was an ad on the side of the monitor. “Looking for person to test miracle muscle grower. Past results show a 50% increase in muscle mass in just the first day.”

Nick got the address and got ready to leave. He went down stairs, but his parents were gone on a business trip. He was home alone… AGAIN!

As he made his way to the address, he noticed that the suburban setting changed to industrial. Everything was grey. He got to the right building and went in. He asked the lady at the counter about the testing on the growing product. The lady smile and pointed him down the hall. “You’ll see an elevator. Just press the bottom floor.”

Nick left without saying thank you. He got into the elevator and pressed down. He thought about the place as he went gown 15 floors. The place is all grey and white. There’s no color! The elevator made a thud when it hit the bottom floor. It opened to reveal a large cube shaped room. There were parts scattered everywhere. The room was barely lit and the only source of light came from behind a pile of disassembled parts. Nick walked around the piles to find an man in his 40’s. Not old but has years of experience. The man was working on a ray type machine.

Nick “Hello! I’m here for the testing on the growth thing.”

The man looked up, and saw Nick. “Hello there young man. How old are you? About 14 or 15?”

Nick smile “No… I’m 11.”

The man “God! You’re huge. About 5 inches above the average height I can see. Well my names Kelvin Ester Nelson, but most people just call me Ken. Its good to see the young people stay in shape. Though it sad really. Some kids want to, but can’t because of a growing disorder. I want to fix that.”

Nick chuckled “Just like those scientist over at the medical mineral place.”

Ken stopped smiling “Yah… I was one of them. The dang orb was stolen, and the doctor flipped out. Poor guy. Anyway, my new boss supplied me with another smaller one. Do you want to get started?”
