Nick heard this and time seemed to freeze. He has another orb? This could be my chance to catch up with Ben. Lets get on his good side. “Sure. Lets go. I’m dying to give it a shot.”

Ken remembered “Oh, and how’d you know about that institution?”

Nick “I was being tested on when that monster stole the orb.”

Ken sighed disappointed “Ok… lets get going.” He turned on the machine and told Nick to stand 10 feet in front of it. Then he fired. A beam of green light shot out and hit Nick.

Nick felt a slight tingle. The feeling was warm and soothing. Nick looked at his body and was excited to see that he was really growing. He felt his penis get hard from the feeling. Then energy stopped, and the feeling faded. “That’s it!?!”

Ken “Sorry buddy. I need to let the little fella recharge.”

Nick looked disappointed.

Ken smiled “Know what? I’m gonna let you borrow the pearl!”

Nick looked up surprised “Really? What’s the catch?”

Ken continued smile “Just bring it back in a couple of days. I need to fix this machine up a bit. Then you can come back for another test. While you’re holding the orb, it will grow you slowly, but not as fast as it just did. May be half to a quarter of the growth just now per day.

Nick shook with excitement “Thanks! I really appreciate it, and I’ll be back in a few days for sure!”

Ken smiled and said good bye. Nick thanks him again and left.

After Nick was gone, Ken turned to a monitor. “I did what you said boss. The boy has the orb.”

Static filled voice “Very good human. Keep this up and I’ll get you that new lab in no time at all.”

Ken “Thank you boss. I’m glad you gave me that chance to collaborate with you.” The transmission ended after that.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211.title: He looks for a quick way to grow stronger.

choices: Ben puts the pearl in his medallion.
14113121111111111112112111.content:
Over night, Nick had grown to 5ft 8in tall. His pecs pushed out 2and a half inches, his 6 pack was cut deeply into his body. His shoulders were large softballs. His biceps were a good 4 inches in diameter. His legs had grown so that they almost rubbed each other when he walked.

Nick got out of bed and felt the extra weight on his body and smile. ‘Today might be my day’ he thought. He did his usual morning routine, and went to school. He decided to wear a sleeveless T, and some cargo shorts to school. He wanted to show off his growth.

When he entered the build, he heard murmurs about how he seemed bigger, and he smile knowingly. The day continued on, and when Nick went to the bathroom, he could tell that he was just a smidge bigger than that morning. Slowly, his ego and confidence built up, and by lunch, he though he was ready to take Ben down.

Ben was outside sitting at a picnic bench enjoying his brown bag. Amy was sitting next to him and they were just talking and having a good time. Their relationship hasn’t moved. They were still just friends, and Ben was ok with that.

Nick walked out of the school and saw Ben sitting, so he walked up and said commandingly. “Ben! I challenge you to an arm wrestling match. Winner gets to take one thing from the other person.” Nick was confident he would win with his larger build. He was at least 30lbs heavier than Ben now, muscle wise. He still wanted the orb.

Ben sighed, and was about to say no, but he saw a flash from his medallion, and another green flash from Nick’s pocket. ‘He has an orb?’ Ben thought. “Fine… I accept.” He asked Amy to stand back a bit. Ben wanted to end this quickly.

Nick sat down across Ben and they got their arms into position. A crowd began to gather and they counted down for the two competitors. “GO!” Ben and Nick started to strain their arms trying to pin the other down.

They were dead locked for a good 5 minutes. But slowly, Nick began to get the upper hand. Ben hadn’t removed his medallion, so he was just average strength right now. As Nick started to get Ben down, Ben started to panic. Just at the last second, he thought of Amy and how she was watching him. This gave him a burst of strength, and his arm surged with one last burst of energy. He pinned Nick down.

Nick looked at his arm in shock. “How…”

Ben “Ok… A deals a deal. I get something from you that I want.”

Nick was silent and didn’t say anything. HOW! In his rage and confusion, he didn’t notice that a tingly feel was covering his body.

At this time, lunch was over, and kids began to make their way back to class. Ben was still standing over Nick waiting for the orb.

Ben was about to ask for the orb, when he noticed something happening to Nick. His cloths seemed tighter. Then he saw the glow from Nick’s pocket. Then Ben saw the glow from his medallion. It seemed the Nick’s orb was reacting to Nick’s anger, and was borrowing energy from Ben’s orb.

Nick clenched his fist and began to pound the picnic table. Bam! Bam! Crack! “Huh?” Nick looked down and saw that he punch a hole through the table. Wait! Are my arms bigger? Nick stood up and saw that he was growing again, but even faster.

Ben stood where he was watching as Nick grew to 6ft then 7ft, and it didn’t stop. You could hear bone cracking as the stretched and grew. His muscle were bulging out. At 10ft tall, his pecs pushed 1ft6in off his body. His 8 pack was so deep, you could fit your index finger between the gap. His shoulders were over inflated medicine balls. His biceps were 16 in in diameter. He grew to about 20ft tall. Ben only reached up to his knee. His muscle were huge and totally out of proportion from his body. They seemed over inflated and impossible to move, but Nick could somehow.

During his growth, his cloths had fallen off revealing 5ft of pure boyhood along with bean bag family jewels. Ben stay to see what was happening. He ran and grabbed Seth’s pants and pulled out the green pearl inside.

Nick was speechless. This like a dream come true. He towered over absolutely everything.

What does Ben do now?
14113121111111111112112111.title: Challenges Ben for dominance again.

choices: Nick, can also grow to his previous larger size. What does he do about that?
Nick apologizes to Ben hoping to get help.
141131211111111111121121111.content:
Ben took advantage of Nick’s shock to lock the pearl away. He turned around and quickly insert the pearl into his medallion. Unknown to him, once he did that, the pearl quickly fused with the orb, increasing it’s strength exponentially. After a moment, the merge was complete, and Ben began to feel a tingle. It was like the times his density increase dramatically, though this time, it was only minimal.

What happened next surprised Ben, and angered Nick even more.

Nick looked at the school trying to get a guess on his height when suddenly, he noticed the school getting taller. “What! No! I just got these muscles! I can’t shrink now! What happened?!?” He looked frantically at his body as it shrank. When he got to 10ft tall, he saw Ben. “You! You did this. What did you do!” In his rage, he ran at Ben to strangle him.

Ben saw this coming, and knew he couldn’t get away in time. So he removed the medallion from the necklace. To Ben, time seemed to slow down. His reflexes, strength and speed were so fast that everything seemed like it was moving through molasses.

Nick flew though the air as he tried to jump on Ben and slam him to the ground. His feet made contact. It was like running full speed, and trying to kick a wall. You heard a thump, and Nick fell to the ground clutching his foot. “It not fair! You already have an orb. Why can’t I have that pearl? Your so selfish.” Nick was crying like a child would cry if you took away his favorite toy, or long loved stuff animal.

Ben responded sadly “Because you want it for the wrong reasons.” Ben couldn’t help but feel pity for Nick. He was obsessed with power, and it drove him to the point of near madness. Ben slowly turned around, and went back into the school and went to class. Nick stayed out in the field naked and defeated.

When the final bell rang, Nick mustered the will to run to the boy’s locker room and retrieve his spare change of cloths. He put them on, and felt how baggy they were now. He felt his anger swell again, and he didn’t know what to do with it. He ran into the gym and started lifting what ever weights he could find.

A little while later, Ben came into the room looking for the Nick. He saw Nick over by the bench press lifting with out noticing how much he was lifting. It was about 300lbs, and he’d done about 100 reps.

Nick saw Ben come in and stopped what he was doing. “What do you want? You already took everything away from me. Why couldn’t you let me keep the pearl? You already have the giant orb. Why?!?” Nick’s voice was filled with longing, and anger.

Ben felt pity for Nick. He had set on completing an impossible goal, and failed. “Nick… did you see how much you were lifting?”

Nick was surprised by the random question, but answered. “I wasn’t looking. It must have been pretty light for this wimpy body to lift. No thanks to you!”

Ben “It was 300lbs”

Nick’s ears perked up “Huh?”

Ben “You were lifting 300 lbs. I don’t thing your muscle were lost, but more compressed. If you step on the scale over their, you’ll see what I mean.” Ben pointed to a scale in the corner.

Nick walked over to it hopefully. When he stepped on, the scale’s numbers kept spinning and spinning. It stopped at about 50000lbs. “Oh… my god.”

Ben “I thought so…

What happens now?
141131211111111111121121111.title: Ben puts the pearl in his medallion.

choices: Ben and Amy wake up with a new perspective on life.
Nick had gone back to Ken.
1411312111111111111211211111.content:
Ben closed his eyes as he thought of how to deal with Nick’s new body.

While Ben wasn’t looking, Nick was experimenting. Nick stood in front of the mirror and started flexing. He was disappointed that he lost all his muscle mass. As he examined his body, he imagined it being bigger. Then he felt a tingle pass over his body as he grew to a larger size. I am I growing? He started to imagine himself even bigger until his cloths got to tight. Then when that happened, he flexed as hard as he could to rip the cloths off his body. After that, he grew even more until his body wouldn’t allow it anymore. Which was at the 20ft tall behemoth from before.

And Ben had not noticed for some reason. Nick turned from the mirror to Ben and smiled evilly. He walked up to Ben, and gave him the hardest kick he could. Ben flew straight into a fall causing it to collapse. Nick took this chance to run and get someone.

*In an after school math club program*

Amy was sitting down with a group of 30 kids working on math problems. They had recently learnt about imaginary numbers and what not. Suddenly, the fire alarm went off. The door opened, and Nick came in wearing a football uniform.

Nick “Everyone! There’s a fire on the other end of the building.”

The teacher in the room got everyone in line to leave. Amy was the last in line. When everyone got out, Nick grabbed her arm and closed the door.

Amy “What are you doing!” She turned around and he faced slammed into Nick growing body. “Oh my god! You huge!”

Nick smiled and grabbed Amy when he got to his 20ft height, and smashed through the walls of the school.

Back in the gym, Ben was working his way out of the rubble that had fallen on him. It was difficult since his strength was being suppressed by the seal. When Ben got out of the rubble, he sighed. He planned on dealing with Nick and trying to teach him control over his emotions. Ben is the only one who can survive his assaults.

There was a high pitch scream. Ben turned in the direction, and began to run to it. When Ben got out, he saw Nick on the other end of the field. Ben ran up to him.

Ben “What on earth are you doing!”

Nick smiled “Nothing much. I just want to bargain.”

Ben sighed “I can’t ever give you the orb. I’m preventing people like you from getting it.”

Nick “Not even if its to save your friend, Amy?”

Ben froze “What did you say?”

Nick opened his giant palm to reveal a semi-conscious Amy. She could see, but couldn’t talk or anything.

Ben’s voice was call, but it seethed with anger “Let her go… she has nothing to do with this.”

Nick “You’re wrong. She’s friends with you, and that’s enough.”

Ben “Let her go, or you’ll regret it.”

Nick laughed “Did your skull crack from my strong kick? I’m not surprised if it drove you crazy.”

Ben was tired of Nick’s ranting. “I warned you.” Ben raised his hand to his medallion, and unhooked it. There was a small Click when the medallion came off. At the same time, Ben vanished.

Nick only saw Ben disappear before his vision blacked out. In that fraction of millisecond, Ben delivered one inhumanely strong punch to Nick’s stomach. The second after that, he had appeared in Nick’s hand and grabbed Amy from it.

Ben landed on the ground softly, un-flexing his powerful muscles so they could absorb the shock of the land for Amy.

To Amy, her body became light from the fall. When she landed, it felt like she fell onto a firm, but soft bed. She looked at Ben as he carried her somewhere. Her ears and body heard the strong beat of his heart. She felt the warmth from his body enter her giving her a feeling she never felt before. It was a longing, but also a memory. A memory of true safety. When you felt like nothing would hurt you. She felt safe. She looked at Ben and saw his from a new perspective.

She saw how he vanished, and the next thing she knew, she was falling in the arms of her hero. She saw the strength in Ben’s muscles, but she wasn’t scared. The emitted a strong feeling of defense, like they were a shield.

As Ben carries Amy, he felt a strong feeling of protecting. He wanted to keep Amy safe from everything that wanted to hurt her. He held her close to his body, and stood as strong as his body could look. His body had an aura of defensive hostility. Anyone who had any evil intentions would be dealt with swiftly.

Ben was carrying Amy home to let her rest. Along the walk, Amy had started to get could from the chilling air. It wasn’t summer anymore. As she began to fall asleep, she did something that surprised Ben. To warm herself, she started to curl up against Ben’s chest. She rubbed her face into his left pec to warm her nose, but she didn’t know she was doing it. She was asleep, and dreaming a sweet dream. Ben smiled and hugged her closer to his body.

When he got to where Amy lived, he knocked on the door. A short Asian lady came to answer the door. She saw Ben through a window and smiled. Ben occasionally came by for dinner and a homework session with Amy, and her mom was always ok with it. Her name was Zia Chen.

Zia opened the door smiling “Hello Ben. Amy isn’t home yet, but you…” Zia saw her daughter in Ben’s arm and froze. “Oh my god. What happened!” Ben brought Amy inside and set her on the couch in their living room.

Ben “She tried to stop a fight, but one of the kids got angry and choked Amy till she fainted. I got there right after that, and put an end to it. After that, I brought her back here.”

Zia had her hand over her mouth and was stroking the hair of her daughter.

Ben sighed “I’m sorry I didn’t get there sooner, but…”

Zia “Stop Ben. Its ok. At least you came… Thank you.”

Ben “I’ll leave. I’ll let you tell her dad. This seems like a family moment.” Ben started to make his way to the door.

Zia asked him to stay for a drink or something, but Ben could tell that she wanted to be alone with her daughter.

Ben “No really. I should go. My mom needs me to get something for her.”

Zia nodded and turned her attention back to her daughter.

Ben had left and gone home. Along the way, Ben remembered the medallion, and put it back on. He walked back to school to see how Nick was doing. When he got there, he saw that Nick was gone, but the ground was all torn up as though someone had been writhing in pain. Ben sighed, and went home. He’ll let the plumbers take care of this one.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111.title: Nick, can also grow to his previous larger size...

choices: Lets go see what Ben and Amy have been up to.
Nick thnks of a way to get Ben.
14113121111111111112112111112.content:
The world faded away as the pain enveloped his mind. Nick fell to the ground grasping his stomach as though someone threw a nuke at him. His anger boiled and consumed him. He grasped the ground beneath him and began to tear it up. He imagined Ben’s face on every blade of grass, and he was tearing them all out.

Ben had left a little while ago to go to Amy’s, and Nick had recovered enough to know that Ben would do something even worse if he didn’t leave. Nick fumbled down the street shaking the ground with every one of his mighty steps. Slowly, he made his way to Ken’s lab. As he neared it, he began to shrink down for some reason. Nick didn’t really care at the moment. He just wanted to get back at Ben, and he knew that the only way is through Ken.

Nick walked into the building naked and ignored the lady at the front desk. He made his way to the elevator and went down. When he got to the bottom floor, he stepped out.

Ken was working on something, and wasn’t looking at Nick. “I was wondering when you’d show up. Ben got the pearl?”

Nick was surprised, and only managed a grumble.

Ken “Don’t be like that. Just talk to me.”

Nick groaned “I hate him!”

Ken sighed “Well… maybe I can help. My boss has a special plan for Ben, but he’ll need your help.”

Nick stopped pitying himself and raised an eyebrow “Special plan? And he needs my help? Count me in!”

Ken smiled “That’s it. He told me to give you something if you accepted. He made a special delivery the other day. I installed it into my ray. Can you please go to the center of the circle on the ground?” Ken pointed to a spot 10ft away.

Nick smile and did as he said. When he got to the spot, he wondered where the ray was. He didn’t see it.

Ken presses a button, and a strange buzzing sound began to resonate from around the room. Suddenly, a flash of green light appeared at the top of the room, and a laser fired out and hit Nick.

Nick was attacked by billions of volts of energy. His body was being assaulted by micro knives. Nick bent over in pain as the energy from the beam coursed through his body. He fell to his knees and began to writhe on the floor. Then suddenly… it stopped. Nick was breathing heavily on the ground. When he opened his eyes, he was looking up, and saw a giant 10ft diameter sphere up attached to the ceiling. Inside were thousands of green pearls. “Oh… my… god…”

Ken smile knowing that Nick was fully ready to obey their commands. “Hey… you can have those if you bring Ben here.”

Nick recovered, and smiled. He could feel all the strength that was compressed into his preteen body. There is no way Ben can be as strong as me. The orb can probably grow him a little at a time like it did to me. He wasn’t zapped like I was. Nick quickly built up his confidence.

As his confidence began to rise, his body grew to match it. His slim average 11 yo body began to ripple. He grew taller and taller. His pecs seemed like someone was stuffing cold cuts into it, but forgot to stop. His abs started to multiply. First there were 2, then 4, then 6, then 8, but he somehow got to a deeply cut 10pack. He was reaching 35ft in height, his biceps were 3ft in diameter, his pecs pushed 5ft off his body. His shoulders and neck were so thick with muscle, there was no neck visible. His legs were like school buses.

All this growing roused Nick’s dormant preteen hormones sending him into a raging hard on. As if by natural instinct, Nick kneeled down and began to jack off on ground, and he was still growing! The feeling of his growing member in his hand gave him even more pleasure. They pressure in his balls built until it was almost to painful to say, then it happened.

Nick was laying faced up shooting his first load ever. His rob thrummed with heat and power as the hot seedy liquid rocketed out and hit the ball of pearls. For some reason, the cum was going up, but didn’t going down.

Ken was hiding behind a wall waiting for the boy’s episode to subside.

The eruption slowed down to a trickle, and then ended. Nick was panting unable to comprehend the feeling that thrummed every fiber of his body.

Then suddenly, he felt a tingle cross over his body. He felt as though he were growing again, but with out the pain. He looked at his body and saw that everything around his was getting smaller again. He looked up at the sphere of pearls, and saw it getting closer. They were all glowing and sending invisible energy into Nick’s body. They have become tied to his DNA. “Yes! Yes! MORE!” Nick encouraged the growth until his head began to press against the ceiling. As he continued to grow, he had to crouch and he eventually had to lay down. If he were standing up, he’d be near 250 ft tall. The room was around 100ft tall.

Nick began to feel more and more cramped in the ever shrinking room. It soon felt like he was being squished together against his will. The pain was almost unbearable. Slowly, Nick had enough of the pain and thought of shrinking down. Slowly, shrank down unwillingly. Nick got to a height of 6ft, and with muscles the size of a pro body builder in super steroids.

The room was demolished. The only thing left was the dome of orbs, and a few machined locked away in another room.

Nick saw Ken hiding behind a door that led to the other room, and then he saw the mess he made. He didn’t really care, but thought he should be polite since Ken got him all his new growth. “Sorry Ken. I got a little carried away.”

Ken smiled knowing that if everything went as planned, his new lab would be waiting for him. “Its ok. Now get to it! Ben isn’t coming here by himself.”

Nick nodded, and jumped as hard as he could. When he pushed off the ground, he left a crater that was 10 ft in diameter. Nick vanished from sight as he blasted threw the air, threw the ceiling, and several other floors, and finally ending up about 100ft in the air. Nick was beaming with joy at the sight of his new strength. They have literally brought him to new heights.

What happens now?
14113121111111111112112111112.title: Nick had gone back to Ken.

choices: Ben wants to get Amy something.
141131211111111111121121111121.content:
Amy was at home in bed. She just woke up from an amazing dream. She looked out the window, and everything seemed brighter and more colorful. She had a strange dream the Ben was saving her from various scenarios of life and death situations. She blushed from the thought. Amy looked down at the side of her bed and saw a bible, holy water, and prayer beads. Holding the prayer beads was her mom who was now slumped on the bed sleeping.

Amy “Mom? Are you ok?”

Zia bolted up looking at her daughter. She was speechless, but that didn’t stop her from hugging her daughter, and not wanting to let go. Amy let her mom hug her for a while.

Amy “Mom… you should let go. It’s kind of hard to breath.”

Zia panicked. She couldn’t have her daughter faint twice in a row. “Ben told me what happened. You are so brave to break up the fight.”

Amy was confused for a second and realized that no one knows what happened. They all evacuated to the front of the school. Nick and Ben were in the back. “I’m sorry… I didn’t think it would get so violent.”

Zia scolded “Well next time, let someone else handle it. I can’t handle another one of those events.”

Amy smiled “Really? It was so fun!”

Zia frowned “If you do that, I’ll kill you before they can.” Then Zia smiled… “Seriously though. Let someone like Ben do it. He’s more than qualified.”

Amy smile hearing a compliment about Ben. “Yah… I might do that next time.”

Zia “And about Ben. He seemed different when he came over yesterday. He was always kind of… fun and easy going, but yesterday, he seemed calm, but at the same time it seemed like a shell. Its like he was hiding a storm that was about to break loose.”

Amy wasn’t surprised “I guess so. He doesn’t like fighting. He’s kind of like a pacifist, though he will do anything to protect someone. He doesn’t like any physical fighting at all.”

Zia thought about it “I makes sense. If a giant muscle kid like him walks around with a temper, someone is bound to get hurt. I like that he’s composed, but easy going.”

Amy wanted to keep talking about Ben, but decided to stop. Suddenly the lights in her room began to flicker.

Zia swore “I guess we should get Ben over here to fix that.”

*Flash back*

Amy’s dad died a long time ago because of lung cancer. Things have never been the same. The house began to fall into shambles. There were leaks and broken furniture, and it looked pretty darn bad. Zia had kept the place tidy, but she doesn’t have the physical strength or money to get it all fixed or replaced. Amy wasn’t happy about all this, but knew her mom was doing everything she could.

Then on the second week of school, Ben had asked if he could come over to get help on homework, and Amy had agreed. She forget her home was in shambles. When they got to the house, Ben saw the house had its paint peeling off, and the lawn was dug up by passing dogs and surrounded by weeds. Amy saw Ben looking and felt ashamed.

Ben “I think this place could use a little help.”

Amy looked away.

Ben realized that this was a touchy spot for Amy, so he walked away. Amy stood in front of her disrepair home silent and ashamed for about an hour. Then there was a tap on her shoulder. She turned around and saw Ben carrying a couple buckets of paints, a belt full of tools, and a backpack filled with odd things.

Ben “I think I’ll help this place out a bit.” Before Amy could say ‘no’, but started walking towards the house and began scraping paint off the wall. Amy stared for a moment, and then smile. She walked up to Ben and asked for a scraper and began helping him out.

After a few hours, an old disrepair car came up the drive way, and Zia came out of it. The sun was still up because summer hadn’t totally abandoned them yet. Zia saw that Ben and Amy had scraped the paint off of one wall and were working on the next one already. Ben was doing the top half with the help of a ladder, and Amy was on the bottom half. Zia walked up and grabbed a scrapper she found next to Ben’s supplies and began scraping next to her daughter.

A couple of days later, Ben had plastered up cracks, and had painted it a nice creamy yellow. Those days had been the best for Amy and Zia. Everyday after school, Amy helped where she could, and Zia did the same after work. Once the walls were done, Ben had taken responsibly for resigning the room. He had learnt all these neat skills from his dad a few summers back. He mom was opposed to it, his dad insisted it was a very useful skill.

A week later, the roof is hole free and water resistant. The lawn was totally weeded, and flattened. Zia had even found extra money to by grass seeds to scatter for the following year. Ben had gotten his supplies from the plumbers. He called in a few favors, and Ben now had a small budget for materials that he needed.

Through out the next week, Ben, Amy, and Zia had torn down wall paper, and sanded the hardwood floor. Ben was surprised to find that the floor was 250 year old cherry wood. The floor had acquired a beautiful orange red color from its age.

As the month began to end, they had painted the walls and polished the floors. Ben was now currently working on the electrical plan with some help from his dad.

*Now*

Zia “I can’t believe what this place used to look like. I worked and cleaned, and cleaned some more, but no mater how clean it was, it still fell apart.”

Amy nodded. She wasn’t ashamed of her home any more. In fact, it was one of the best, if not the best home in the neighborhood. “We should thank him somehow. The place is really amazing now.” Amy looked at her room and saw the radiance and brightness of it all. It used to be all stained walls that were peeling, and floors that were degraded.

Zia nodded “You know what? I think we have some money left over in our budget for this month. Lets throw a party!”

Amy was surprised by her mom’s enthusiasm “Lets do it!”

Amy and Zia talked party plans while Ben was at home thinking.

At Ben place, Ben was laying in bed trying to organize his thoughts. He still didn’t know where those feelings came from. For the past few months, he’s been friends with Amy, but it was just friends. He helped fix the house because he knew it was something he could help with.

There was a knock at Ben’s door, and his dad, Matt came it.

Matt “Hey sport. Just saying hi before I go to work. Crazy stuff yesterday at school wasn’t there?”

Ben nodded “Yah… to bad I missed all of the cool stuff.”

Matt smiled, and began to turn to leave.

Ben “Dad…can we talk? Like just the two of us?”

Matt froze and came back in. He locked the door. “Sure. What’s up sport?”

Ben “Well… its about his girl who I…”

Matt nodded egging Ben on. He knew what this was about. Ben was a young preteen with crazed hormones. What do you expect.

Ben “Well… I kind of saved her, and I felt like… I can’t explain. I wanted to keep her safe.”

Matt nodded and finally said “I think its time to have a talk.”

*One talk later*

Ben’s eyes had opened into a new world unknown. “So the reason… Then its because…”

Matt just kept nodding as he let Ben answer his own questions. “Well. This girl seems nice. Tell Amy she’s very luck.”

Ben’s face turned red “What makes you think its Amy?” Ben said quickly.

Matt’s face broke into a smile, and he chuckled. “No reason. Just a hunch. Anyhow… there’s no school today because its under renovations. There’s a 20 on the table. Use it on what ever.” He gives Ben a wink and left.

Ben groaned.

What happens now?
141131211111111111121121111121.title: Lets go see what Ben and Amy have been up to.

choices: Something happens to Ben in space.
1411312111111111111211211111211.content:
Ben got out of bed and retrieved the 20 dollars on the table. His mom had gone away to Italy to see a friend’s wedding, and his dad had gone to work. Ben thought about what he’d do with the twenty. He’s to young to have a job though his body can handle it, so he had relatively no income. He occasionally got some money from his parents when they felt like sharing. This was one of those time.

Ben put the twenty in his pocket and was surprised to find that his plumber badge was in his pocket. Ben pulled it out and realized that he should get something special for Amy. Not from earth at least. Ben called Gramps.

Gramps “Max Tennyson. What’s the problem.”

Ben smiled “Hey gramps. Can I come over? I need to ask you for something.”

Gramps “Sure! Do you want me to pick you up?”

Ben “Nah. Just tell me where you are.”

Gramps “I’m kind of far away. I’m near Mt. Rushmore right now.”

Ben “That’s fine.” While talking, Ben had come to the conclusion that a gift for Amy was of utmost priority. He took of his medallion and ran to Mt. Rushmore. He ran around looking for the Rustbucket. He stopped when he found it. “Hey gramps. I’m here.”

Gramps opened the door and was shocked to find Ben standing outside reattaching the medallion. He frowned think that this must be important for Ben to need to take off his seal. “What’s wrong Ben?” Ironically, Gramps got another phone call at that moment. He picked it up and heard Ben’s dad talking about how Ben might stop by for a gift for his lady friend. Gramps smiled hearing this. It was kind of adorable. Young love…

Ben “Hey gramps. Who was that?”

Gramps “No one important. What did you need to come here for?” Though he secretly knew.

Ben had come up with a logical, and unrevealing story. “This kid Nick got an orb, but he grew only a little. Then when he met me he started to grow dramatically. Then he tried to get my orb, but I stopped him. I tried to befriend him, but he attacked again, but this time he involved this girl. I saved the girl, but I fear he will attack her again without me knowing. Can you give me something casual and easily over looked that can help me communicate with her.” Ben’s whole speech was said kind of robotically. There was no depth.

Gramps was expecting a more straight forward request, but this was a little more complicated. “Wait. He had an orb?”

Ben nodded “And he’s like 20ft tall, but he can shrink down to a minimum size, but grow up to a max of 20 ft.”

Gramps was slowly catching on. He was only wondering how the kid got the pearl. “Did you get it away from him?”

Ben “Yah. I got the orb away before it made him even more of a threat. I put it in the medallion, but when I did, the pearl got sucked into my orb, and I felt like was growing even faster.”

Gramps “I’m not surprised. Considering the green star event, I assume that you get even denser every time your orb absorbs something with energy similar to its own.”

Ben nodded in agreement “But this is besides the point. That girl is in danger because she is associated with me!”

Gramps sighed “Well… I do have a simple solution. We can give her a heart stone. It’s a rare mineral that grows only on Gravitron. As you’ve noticed by now, everything unusual and rare is found on gravitron, but that’s because everything on it contains gravitum.”

Ben was curious. “What’s heart stone?” He wanted to make his gift perfect.

Gramps “Well, they vary in color and are composed of 100% gravitum. When gravitum atoms are bonded to each other with no specific order, it creates the silver color that you now wear. However, when the gravitum atoms bond together in a specific crystalline structure, it results in the strongest material in the universe (It can cut anything and is near impossible to break) It has the same properties as regular gravitum, and a little more. The stone gives its wielder the ability to tap into ONE source of mana. Remember Ben, mana is the magical energy that every living things have. The stronger that living this is, the more mana it has. Except Gwen’s race. They have large mana’s for some unknown reason. Anyway, the stone connects to the mana of one thing that allows it.

The stone is also capable of connecting it’s wielder’s thoughts to the source of mana there by allowing the user to think their thoughts threw the heart stone. You basically share thoughts, though that’s only if you want to.”

Ben was amazed by what gravitum could do “Why is it called heart stone?”

Gramps “Because it emits an aura that is based on what the source of mana, and the wielder feel. It has ‘unstable’ properties that will change depending on how the souce and wielder feel.”

Ben “How rare is it? Do we have any?”

Gramps sighed “Well. There are only 300 known in existence, and most are on Anodyne. Sadly, I don’t have one.”

Ben’s face looked down in disappointment.

Gramps felt bad for giving Ben a little to much hope. “How bout we try to find one for ourselves?”

Ben looked up shocked. “What do you mean?”

Gramps smiled “I mean we go up to Gravitron and find one for ourselves. If we can’t find one, then we can try making one.”

Ben was totally psyched “Seriously? You‘d do that!”

Gramps “Well… you are probably giving it to someone special. I don’t think just any girl would associate with you. Well… except Gwen.”

Ben’s face was cherry red. “What makes you think she’s special?”

Gramps just laughed “No what, I’ll be nice and stop. Can you call Gwen and get her over here?”

Ben called Gwen, and asked her to come over. Before she replied, there was a flash of purple and Gwen appeared out of no where.

Gwen “Hey Ben. Its been a while. You should call a little more.”

Ben scratched the back of his neck. “Yah… umm. Sorry about that.”

Gwen smiled at the shy side of Ben. “Its been 3 months into the school year!”

Ben got defensive “I’ve been busy.”

Gwen “Yup! I heard Amy’s kind of cute.” Gwen said this with a little playfulness.

Ben’s face turned bright red again “Its not even official yet!”

Gwen “Well… I go to the same school. We’re just in different buildings. Its not hard to catch on.”

Ben threw his hands up “I give up! The world wins!”

Gwen laughed “Ok. So why’d you call me over?”

Ben didn’t want to say the reason because Gwen would start ranting again. “We’re going on a field trip to Gravitron.”

Gwen raised an eyebrow “Why are we going there?” Gwen looked at Gramps

Gramps “Lets just say we’re going treasure hunting. Do you want to come?”

Gwen knew she couldn’t get anymore out of them “Fine… show me the place.”

Gramps “Before we go, we’ll need to get in some space suites. There’s no oxygen on Gravitron. We’ll also need you to apply a spell to keep us from being repelled by the planet.” Gramps had gone into the Rustbucket and brought back three plumber badges. “Take there and press then against your chest. These suits can decompose down CO2 into carbon and O2 gas for you to breath. The carbon will be filtered into a container.” Gramps gives Ben and Gwen a suit.

Ben pressed the badge against his chest, and it exploded, and quickly covered him. Ben looked at the suit and saw that it was see through. He felt like everything was normal on the inside. He couldn’t tell the difference between the changes in the conditions.

Gramps “The suits should feel like nothing. They appear not to be there. You’ll know its on you be looking at the badge on your chest. There’s a red light that says on.”

Ben looked down and saw the badge. It had the red light. “I think we’re ready to go.”

Gwen “Ok. Give me a moment to get the spell ready.” Gwen began to mumble a series of short phrases, and then they disappeared in a flash of purple light.
1411312111111111111211211111211.title: Ben wants to get Amy something.

choices: One one them flashes out to him.
14113121111111111112112111112111.content:
Some where millions of light years away, on Gravitron, there was a flash of purple light. As the light was about to his the ground, it was repelled and shot out into space.

The gang looked around. Everything was silvery grey. The ground was rough, and the sky didn’t exist. It was just space.

Ben “This place is kind of dull… Its as empty as the moon!”

Gramps “Nothing lives here. Its just a massive star sized clump of gravitum.”

Gwen “So what’s this treasure hunting you were talking about?”

Ben “Gwen… do you remember Nick, the school bully?”

Gwen nodded

Ben “Well. He somehow got a pearl and grew massive. I stopped him before anyone was seriously hurt, but I feel like he’s targeting Amy. Gramps suggest that we get a Heart Stone from Gravitron. They have the ability to let me talk to her with me thoughts and vice versa.”

Gwen smiled. She like how Ben was going out of his way to protect his lady friend “So what’s the plan? How are we going to find it?”

Gramps “We need to did down. It forms under intense pressure. About 10^10000000000000000000000000000 metric tons of pressure, it but they are generally the size of a ping pong ball. They can change shape, color, texture, etc. based on what the wielder wants it to be, but it will always be a stone.”

Ben “Well lets start digging. Gramps, can I remove the medallion to make the dig faster?”

Gramps nodded, and Ben unhooked the medallion. Ben felt hi strength spike as the seal was removed. Ben looked at the ground and gave it on strong punch that would have shattered the planet is not for the planet’s odd properties. The ground beneath Ben however has been pulverized into a fine powder. Ben released another punch sending all the crushed gravitum out of the hole. Ben looked down and saw nothing but pitch blackness. “Everyone ok?”

Gwen and Gramps were getting back on their feet and recovering from the planetary quake.

Gwen “Warn us next time!”

Ben smiled playfully “Oops. Can we jump in the whole? Or me at least. I’ll be doing a few of those punches.”

Gramps nodded, and Ben jumped down the hole. He fell for a few hundred miles. No one has ever dug this far, so who knows what down here. By now, Ben’s gone past the 10^10000000000000000000000000000 metric tons of pressure, so the chances of finding a heart stone should increase, but Ben has seen nothing so far. Ben finally hit the bottom, and delivered a few strong punches, and fell some more. Finally, Ben saw something in the darkness the surrounded him. Ben has now reached the very center of the planet where the pressure is greatest. This results in a stronger and more structurally correct crystal.

Ben walked forward in the tunnel he made until he came upon something glowing. At the end, he came upon an open chamber, and inside were billions of pearl sized gems. Ben gasped at the amazing jewels and couldn’t decided which one to take.

What does he do?
14113121111111111112112111112111.title: They're are on Gravitron.

choices: Insert a special form of DNA.
Gwen's magic is needed to establish a connection.
141131211111111111121121111121111.content:
Ben looked around and realized that the chamber was lit up by the gems. Its was kind of a warm glow. Not a blinding light, but enough to read a book with the light. Ben walked around for a bit and looked for a stone that stood out to him. He gave up trying because they all seemed perfect!

Then he had an idea. Ben picked up two stones beneath his feet and squished them together, and compressed them into a stone that was the same size as before. Seeing that his works, Ben began to grab hand falls of pearls and compress them. Ben was slow at first, but he quickly picked up momentum. After a few minutes, every heart stone was compressed into a super dense stone. The stone was about a few trillion stones compressed together, and it has developed some new unknown properties, but what? We’ll find out eventually, but for now, Ben has to go back to the surface before Gwen or Gramps start to worry.

Ben lifted the heart stone up above his head to light his path. He saw that is was giving off a white glow. The stone itself was foggy looking, and the light it emitted gave off a warm energy. Ben walked forward being guided by the light of the stone. Eventually, his tunnel turned and became vertical. Ben looked up and saw that it was a straight shot up. Ben bent his legs and pushed off the ground lightly. Whoosh. Ben rushed out of the tunnel he made and shot out of the hole.

Gwen and Gramps were waiting up at the opening of the hole.

Gramps “I hope he’s ok. Its been a while.”

Gwen let out a quick ha “I’m sure he’s fine. His head is to dense to get hurt. I’m surprised he even found out that a girl like him. He’s usually ignorant of that stuff.”

Gramps “Yah… well, he’s different now. I can tell just from the way he looks at something.”

There was a white flash at the bottom of the long tunnel.

Gwen “I think that’s him. What was the white light? Isn’t the orb green?”

Gramps “It seems like he found a heart stone. They generally give off a light glow when they are smothered in darkness.”

They heard a strange echo coming out of the tunnel.

Gwen “Are you hearing what I’m hearing?”

Whoosh. Ben popped out of the hole and shot into space.

Gwen sighed… There was a flash of purple, and Ben disappeared and reappeared next to Gramps.

Ben “Oomph!” Ben landed face first. “Gwen! What was that for?”

Gwen smiled “Well next time you shouldn’t flew out of tunnels that fast. You almost took my head off!”

Gramps was listening and then he saw the stone in Ben’s hand. “You found one! I’m surprised. I thought we were going to have to attempt to make one.”

Ben looked at the stone in his hands. It was a perfect sphere, but it wasn’t glowing anymore. It looked like a regular pearl, but more clear. You could see through it, but it wasn’t clear. “Yah… I actually found a few trillion. I couldn’t decide which one to take, so I compressed them all into this one stone. Though, the stone is super dense, it isn’t any heavier.”

Gramps “Most likely because its made of 100% gravitum. I wonder what compressing it does to the stone. No one has been able to do that partly because the owners of the existing ones don’t want to give up their stone, and because it just isn’t possible. At lest until you did it. Now you say there were trillions? That’s a lot of stones. Do you have any idea how deep you were?”

Ben “I think I actually made it to the center of the planet. It was rather odd. I could tell because felt the pull of gravity as I fell, but when I got to the center, the world seemed to press down from all directions.”

As Ben and Gramps were talking, Gwen was looking at the stone. Gwen could sense mana since her blood line originates in Anodyne. When Gwen looked at the stone, she could feel that it had mana in it, or it was getting mana from somewhere. “Hey gramps. You said that the heart stone can make light in total darkness. Where does it get its energy?”

Gramps was surprised by the question “It absorbs excess mana in its surroundings. For it to have shined so brightly before, the surroundings must have been saturated in mana.”

Ben “So it doesn’t need permission to absorb mana?”

Gramps “No! It does need permission for the orb to take more mana that the excess. With out it, it will just absorb the mana that is lingering in the air and is not needed.”

Ben “Ok… I see.”

Gwen nodded. She thought for a moment, and looked at Ben. She tried to sense his mana, but she couldn’t detect it. Usually, when she looked at a living thing, she can see the foggy blue mana circling around their body like an aura, but Ben didn’t have one. Gwen thought of a reason. Since the mana of any living thing is dependant on two factors. One being their genetics, if they are an Anodite. And it depends on their strength. Ben’s strength was immense. “Ben… sorry for this, but I want to check something out.”

Ben was about to say what, but he vanished in a flash of purple light. Gwen looked up into space waiting for something. Then she saw it. A giant foggy blue cloud appeared up in the sky. Ben was several thousand light years away, so his mana must be so huge that it encompasses several hundred, and maybe thousands of galaxies. Gwen gasped at the size of it.

Gramps saw Gwen’s reaction “Gwen! What’s wrong?”

Gwen “Oh… my… god… Gramps, I know you can’t see it. Every living thing has mana, and I can see it generally. Usually, the mana of a living thing appears as a faint blue clouds around their body, but it was usually only a millimeter in thickness. Bodybuilders have slightly thicker mana. My people have large manas because its part of our genes. Ben however has a mana that is several thousand light years in diameter. The size of it is astronomical.”

Gramps was shocked by the news “Really? That’s… why didn’t you see it before?”

Gwen “Because I was in his mana cloud. It was so huge, I could never see its outline.”

Gramps sighed… who ever gets hold of that heart stone would be immensely powerful. Plus… who knows what the orb is capable of since it has become super condensed. “You should bring him back now. He’s probably doesn’t like that you sent him so far away with out asking.”

Gwen smile and flashed Ben back.

Ben was fuming “What on earth was that for!”

Gwen retorted “Well I said Sorry!”

Ben “You don’t just send people out to the far reaches of space!”

Gwen “Well I said sorry, and arguing won’t get us anywhere. I was just trying to see your mana cloud.”

Ben made the face he usually made when he doesn’t know where the conversation has gone “My what?”

Gwen “Your mana cloud. You mana circles around your body in a cloud, and I can see it on living things. Though yours was huge, so I had to sent you into space to see the outlines of it. I only did it because Gramps was talking about how the orb will feed of your mana and allow the owner to direct the mana.”

Ben was trying to absorb what he was hearing. “So… what happens when the orb connects to my mana?”

Gramps “It will begin to absorb mana until the thing connected to it is depleted of mana, or until the orb become saturated. It will only absorb the mana of the organism until it is worn out. The thing won’t die. Once the orb is completely saturated, it will begin to generate its own mana and become independent of its host.”

Ben “I see… so it will suck up my mana until its full… then when that’s done, it becomes a generator for mana. How much mana does it make?”

Gramps “Well… as the mana in the stone goes down from usage, it will begin to build up on its own again. Though the rate is very slow since the orbs get saturated very fast. That’s the basic gist.”

Ben “So how about this one? It’ll probably be able to taking a huge amount of mana right? Since it can do that, it will generate mana even faster right? Maybe even into infinite?”

Gramps sighed “I sincerely don’t know. Everything you do its new to the universe. I can’t tell you the answer truthfully.”

Ben “Ok then… How do I get it to connect to my mana?”

Gramps made a weird look on his face *cough cough* “You have to…”

What does he need to do?

Gramps “Well… you have to insert… umm… insert reproductive cells.”

Ben’s face turned red “You mean…”

Gramps nodded.

Gwen began to chant loudly took keep herself from hearing anymore. “LALALALALALALALALALALALALALALALALALALA!”

Ben “This isn’t a joke right?”

Gramps sighed “No…”

Ben sighed as well. “Gwen… can you do me a favor. Can you flash me over to the place the green star was before. I’m going to have to take off my space suit in the oxygen that had surrounded the green star.”

Gwen said ok and Ben disappeared.

Over at the green star, Ben was taking off the suit. He pressed the badge on his chest, and he felt the suit peel of his body and retract back into the badge.

Ben’s heard rumors of boys doing what he thought he had to do. Ben took his pants of in the middle of space and began to stroke his penis. Ben had never done this on purpose before, so the feeling was a shock. Ben’s penis was filled with and endless amount of compact nerves that were genetically altered by his orb to release one feeling. That feeling would only come when purposely activated. This was good because if Ben simply went to the bathrrom… well lets not talk about what would happen if he was sensitive then.

We’ll just say that he’s super, hyper sensitive. The moment Ben began to purposely stroke his member, it instantly went hard and pulsed with power. It throbbed with every one of his heat beat. A wave of pleasure burst forward from his one mighty organ. Ben lost all memory of what happened next. His senses were washed away in pleasure. He pumped faster and faster. The pressure in his hyper productive balls began to build up faster and faster. Soon it was at the breaking point, and his load surged past the gate. Like water behind a dam that had just collapsed, his young male juices surged out. Hundreds of thousands of gallons passed through his mighty shaft every second. The surge began to die down to a trickle, Ben was still stroking himself. The pressure built again and was relieved, and built and went dozens of more times. When Ben had finally stopped, it was because his body couldn’t keep up with his demand for more pleasure. Slowly, Ben regained consciousness and looked around. He was shocked to see that there was a giant hot white string that was trillions upon trillions of miles long. It was all tangled up.

Ben looked beneath him and found his pants. He put them on and took out the Heart Stone. He held it out until it touched the string. There was a high pitched slurping sound as the stone began to suck in the young boy’s juices. The white string quickly shrank down until it was gone. The stone was still a foggy white, but it was also changing. Ben looked closer and saw that some parts of the cloud grew denser and some spots thinned out. It seemed like there was a fluid beneath the surface. Ben put the stone away in his pocket. As he was putting it in his pocket, he saw that it was beginning to blow. The light was trying to escape the murky could. Its was like looking at the sun from under water. There were patches of light getting threw, but it faded away and appeared somewhere else.

Ben “What’s going on inside.”

Back on Gravitron, Gramps was sitting down and thinking.

Gwen was staring out into space and was watching a giant blue mana cloud. The past few moment, the ’maximum’ size of the mana cloud had grown dramatically (it grew once every time Ben had an orgasm), but now it was shrinking down, and fast.

Back with Ben, Ben was still staring at the orb. The brightness of the light increased dramatically. More light was getting past the cloud, and it was almost blinding. Suddenly, Ben felt fatigued. It felt like he had his strength sealed away. Then he felt like he had ran a marathon. The wave of exhaustion grew until Ben began to almost fall asleep. Suddenly it stopped.

The tiny pearl one inch diameter pearl in Ben’s hand flashed a strange light. The light traveled faster than the speed of light, and it filled every corner of the universe for a fraction of a second. Even person on earth thought a strange thing had happened to them. For a brief second, darkness was obliterated, and light dominated the universe. As fast as it happened, it had ended just the same.

Ben’s body ached from the pearl’s drain on his mana. Then Ben felt a shock from the medallion in his pocket. He felt energy surge through his body rejuvenating his aching and sore muscles.

Back with Gwen, she was shocked to see the cloud has vanished from space. Then for a brief second, she thought she had gone blind from light. Then even that disappeared. Gwen continued looking into space. Suddenly, she saw the blue cloud return. It started out small and grew out to its fullest size again. There was something odd. It seemed like there was more than one cloud. There was a second cloud inside the first cloud. It was smaller, but still huge.

Gwen “Gramps… I’m going to bring him back now. It seems like he’s done.”

Gramps nodded, and there was a flash of purple. Ben appeared in front of them holding a medallion in one hand and a gem in the other. (He had luckily remembered to put on the space suite before hand).

Ben was silent, but then he exploded “I’m not to sure what I had done, but it felt awesome (It seems like the pleasure gave him minor amnesia). Then what happened next was cool too.”

Gramps “Great! Tell me when we’re back on earth.” He looked at Gwen, and Gwen nodded. The was a flash, and they were back in the Rustbucket.

Gwen “I should start charging you guys for this. Teleporting is a major drain of mana.” Gwen was breathing hard from the exertions of performing to teleports in one day.

Gramps “Know what? Lets talk over some ice-cream. That’ll cheer you up.”

Gwen and sat down at the table. Gramps got the ice cream, and Ben got the bowls, scooped the ice cream and inserted the spoons. “Enjoy.”

Gramps “Now Ben… care to explain what happened. Minus a certain detail.” Gramps began to eat his ice cream.

Ben began retelling what happened. Though he paused for a moment as he remembered part of the strange pleasurable sensation.

Gramps “I see. So it seems that the stone has reach saturation the moment you connected yourself to it. The drain you felt was the gem sucking up your mana. It reached saturation the moment you began to feel tired. It also appears that the green orb helped you recover from the drain.”

Ben “Ok. So what does it do now?” Ben took the gem out and set it on the table. It looked like an exotic pearl. Lustrous and ethereal were the two words to describe it. It emitted a warm energy that seemed to have a personality. You felt safe when you felt the energy.

Gwen “It feels different, and looks different.”

Gramps agreed. “I wonder what it does?”

14113121111111111112112111112111111.content:
Ben “Well… we’ll find out eventually. I however need to make this look nice.”

Gwen saw the chance “For Amy of course…”

Ben smile and he blushed shyly. “Uh… yah.”

Gwen smile but left it at that. She decided to help out “If you want to make it look nice, then no one knows how to make nice jewelry like a girl who understands it.”

Ben raised an eyebrow “You’re going to help me?”

Gwen laughed “Of course! I like messing with you, but we’re always here for each other. Right?”

Ben smile “Yah.”

Gwen “Gramps. Do you have any rich metal that you don’t need?”

Gramps was surprised by the request. He went into his drawer and pulled out a jewelry box. “This belong to an old friend that wanted my to have it. I don’t use the stuff inside, and it seems like a waste if I don’t, so pick something you like.” Gramps opened the box to reveal intricate metal carvings encrusted in gems and other things.

Gwen’s eyes were mesmerized. She wasn’t usually interested in jewelry, but this stuff had character. They had a hint of old lifestyles and made with exceptional skill. Even better than skills that exist today. She took a silver chain necklace from the box and put it on. The silver was made of billions of tiny links. Who ever made it must have spent years making it. The chain has an almost fluid look and feel.

Gramps smiled “That looks nice on you. Why don’t you keep it?”

Gwen gasped “Really!” Gwen jumped and gave Gramps a hug. “Thank you!”

Gramps smiled seeing Gwen burst out like that for the first time. He patted her on the back “No problem.”

Ben was still looking in the box until he came a cross a clump of iridescent white metal. It wasn’t carved or shaped to make anything. Ben pulled it out.

Gramps was shocked to see Ben pull that it. “Its funny that you would pull out the most unique item in that box.”

Ben “What do you mean?”

Gramps “That is another form of Gravitum. An old friend of mine had found that on gravitron with the help of an Anodite. It’s the only sample of gravitum ever found that looked like that in its metal form. Its caused by the strange semi random bonds that the atoms have with each other. They make bonds and break bounds almost instantaneously with each other. This should make it hard to bend, but it does the opposite for some unknown reason. It is even harder than heart stone. However, we suspect that it has other unknown abilities. You can have it if you want. I can’t do much with it.”

Ben looked at the clumps of gravitum in his hands and around his neck. “Gramps… its amazing what gravitum can do. And thanks Gramps. I think that the metal will look perfect with the heart stone. Why hasn’t the metal been shaped or carved before?”

Gramps smiled “Because there was nothing that could shape it. It was to strong.”

Ben smiled. If it was that strong, it makes it even better for protecting the gem from harm. “Umm. Guys… I’m going outside to carve this under some light.” Ben looked at the clump of metal and observed it as he went outside. Ben noticed that as he turned it, he noticed that the angle the light bounced of the metal changed the depth of the whiteness of the metal.

Gramps and Gwen watched as Ben walked away to carve the metal. Gwen went back to looking through the jewelry box. Gramps was there to comment.

Ben was outside. He took the medallion off and began to mold the tennis ball sized clump of gravitum. He spun it and stretched it, flattened it, split it, and wove it. Ben was so entranced by his project that he didn’t see the that the sun was beginning to set. Though he was finished by now. Ben had stretched the metal into a spider web thin length of string. He had weaved it into a complex design that he had seen in the jewelry box. This created a necklace that caught the eye, and if you looked closer, it intrigued the eye. Then using the remaining piece of gravitum, Ben molded it around the gem. Luckily, the gem wasn’t scratched because it was so dense. This was one of its new properties. Ben added details and designs that were so in depth, it seemed real. Ben made tiny white leaves branching out from on point on the gem. When you looked at it, it seems that the leaves were alive, and they covered the gem as though it was guarding it. After that, Ben created a tiny hooking area that looked like a vines woven together.

Ben looked at his work one last time making sure it was perfect. Ben saw that the gem and the metal were both white, but there was a clear and distinct difference between where one ended, and the other started. Then the sun set, and Ben was bathed in darkness. Suddenly, the gem in Ben’s hand began to release a foggy light. It looked beautiful. Even more so now that the thing was covered in white gravitum. Ben slipped the metal string necklace through the hook of the pendant, and latched the chain together.

Ben walked back into the Rustbucket. Gwen was covered in jewelry, and looked ridiculous. Gramps was reading a magazine. Gwen was napping on a chair.

Ben laughed “Gwen… you look ridiculous with all that on. The necklace was perfect.”

Gwen woke up “Yah. I know. I just wanted bragging rights. To say that I was covered in jewelry seems a little to cocky, I don’t think I’ll tell anyone this happened. Anyway. What did you make?”

Ben pulled the necklace out from behind his back slowly. He was nervous that they were going to say its not good or something. When Gwen and Gramps saw it, they gasped.

Ben “What’s wrong? Is it not good enough. I’ll start over.”

Gwen and gramps screamed “No!”

Gwen “Its beautiful. I’ve never seen anything so detailed. It looks like the leaves are alive. How did you make that! I don’t think a master crafter could match that detail.”

Gramps “Ditto.”

Ben beamed “Really? You think so? I put a lot of work into this.”

Gwen “How did you get it to look like that?”

Ben “I kind of looked the leaves in the tree nearby and copied it down as close as possible.”

Gwen “She’s going to love this!”

Gramps looked at Ben. He was only 11 years old and he likes a girl this much to make something like that. He’s very serious about her. Gramps wanted to know if the girl was the same way. Though, he knew his place. Grandparents shouldn’t get involved with this kind of stuff.

Gwen “Amy’s a lucky girl.”

Ben’s faced turned red from the compliment. “Um.. Well… I should go… um… give this to her.” Ben had a plan to commence.

Gwen smiled “What are you waiting for! GO!”

Ben was shocked by her sudden loudness, but smiled. Ben vanished as he ran back home.

141131211111111111121121111121111111.content:
The next day, Amy and Zia had bought all the party supplies and sent out invites. Ben’s family was invited, and various kids from school were as well. Ben had planned to go out for dinner or something, but when he heard about the party, he was shocked.

In Amy’s backyard:

Kids were playing tag and other games. Ben was with other boys playing football and basket ball. The girls were talking about how awesome the house was and using the make up they brought with them. Amy however was just simply enjoying everyone else’s fun. Some of the girls had joined the boys in football and tag. Amy was friends with a lot of tomboys because they were more fun and interesting in her opinion.

Ben shouted to Amy “Hey Amy! Thanks for the party. Its awesome.”

Amy saw Ben walking towards her with a glass of water. He was sweating lightly from the game. Ben handed Amy the glass. “Hey. How was the game?”

Ben laughed “I don’t know what those girls do in their free time, but they beat us.”

Amy laughed “Seriously? And I thought men were the dominant sex.”

Ben smile “Well… I let them win!”

Amy laughed “Don’t hide your shame…”

Ben said sarcastically “Ok… Ok… you win. I give up!”

They laughed for a moment and then things became quiet. They just sat next to each other awkwardly. Ben’s heart began to race, and he started to sweat again. Ben’s hand somehow magically began to drift towards Amy’s hand, and hers did the same. Their hands were about to touch when…

Friend from class “Hey Ben! They’re creaming us again. We need your help!”

Ben snapped out of his trance and saw the girls beating the boys. Ben looked Back at Amy and smile awkwardly. “Um… talk to you in a moment. It looks like they need help.”

Amy sat there wondering what just happened. The felt all jittery on the inside.

As Ben walked away, Ben had a new hop in his step. He felt that jittery feeling too. He kind of like it, but couldn’t explain it.

After the game finished, Zia, Ben’s mom and dad, and a few other adults called the kids over for cake. They all dropped whatever they were doing and ran over to the table and sat down. Ben sat next to Amy. Quickly, before any chaos happens, the adults passed out the cakes. There were a lot of happy comments.

Then Zia stood up from the table. Everyone trained their eyes on her. “I’d like to make a toast to Ben. The house next to us used to be a disaster, but thanks to Ben, it is one of the best in the neighborhood. And without him, there would be no party right now. Cheers!” Zia raised her cup of soda, and so did everyone else. They all clapped for Ben causing his face to turn red.

A young 4 year old yelled out “Mommy! Why is Ben’s face is all red?”

Everyone paused, and started to laugh. Even Ben smiled a little. They were all laughing with him.

As the hours ticked by, the adults thought it was time to go. Ben asked to stay to a little while, and his parents said yes. The only people left at the home now was Amy, Ben, and Zia who was inside in bed. She was exhausted by today’s event.

Ben and Amy were out in the back yard on the swing set under the moon lit sky.

Ben “Umm… thanks for the party again.”

Amy smiled “Stop it! It was my mom‘s idea. She did most of the work. Thank her!”

Ben “Ok. I’ll stop complimenting you.”

Amy froze and made a look “huh?”

Ben burst our laughing “Gotcha! You should have seen your face.”

Amy gave Ben a hard look “Hm!” Then smiled.

Ben smiled to. “Umm… I wanted to give you something earlier. I didn’t have time to during the party.”

Amy raised an eyebrow again. “Aww… You didn’t have to get me anything.”

Ben “Well I wanted to, and you can’t stop me. So can you close your eyes. It’s suppose to be a surprise.”

Amy closed her eyes and felt something warm wrap around her neck. She felt Ben’s arm brush her neck and pull her hair back. Then she heard a very faint click.

Ben “Ok. Open them.”

Amy opened her eyes and saw Ben smiling hopefully. Then she looked down and saw what Ben gave her. “Oh my god…” Amy was speechless. “How… how… did you get the money to buy this!?”

Ben said shyly “Well… I didn’t buy it. I got the gem and metal and made it.”

Amy looked at the carvings and the detail inside of it. For some reason, she believed that Ben had made this.

Ben was watching her smiling at the fact that she liked it. Then she flung her self on Ben and latched her arm around his neck. “I love it. Thank you.”

Ben blushed and scratched his neck “It was nothing really.”

Amy looked at him seriously “I don’t like it when people do that.”

Ben was caught off guard “Do what?”

Amy “Say its no big deal when it is.”

Ben said seriously “Well fine then. I had to travel to somewhere far to get that, and it was not easy. You should have seen all the digging I went through to get it!” Then Ben smiled “But it was worth it I think.”

Amy blushed and brushed her hair back. Then she looked at the gem again “Ben… what is this made of. I’ve never seen anything like this before.”

Ben frowned now because now he had to explain that she was in danger and that‘s the reason he got it for her. “There’s been something I’ve been putting off. I thought it didn’t concern you that much until Nick attacked. I learnt that because you are with me, you are in danger by those who want to hurt me through you.”

Amy frowned “So… what does this have to do with the necklace?”

Ben “I’m getting to that, bit I have a question. How do you think I took Nick down?”

Amy thought about it “I don’t know the reason, but you’re stronger than you look.”

Ben “Yes… I am. It started last summer with this…”

Ben began to retell his story.

Amy listened politely until the end. “So the reason is because you found this green orb that made you a lot stronger.”

Ben “Yah…”

Amy “I don’t know why, but I believe you, and all that alien stuff.”

Ben wasn’t surprised. He knew she would believe him. “Want to see the orb?” Amy nodded, and Ben took out his Green Orb. The orb released a green glow as it came out of his medallion. “This is it.”

Amy looked at it intriguingly. She felt her fatigue fade away as she was bathed in its light. “I can feel why it made you so strong. I don’t feel tired anymore.” Amy looked at get the heart stone and compared it to Ben’s orb.

Her gem was 1in in diameter, and was a liquid like foggy.

Ben’s orb was a clear green with a now 6 pointed star. The pointed in angles 90 degreed from one another.

Amy “You said that this thing will let me manipulate mana to a point. What is mana? You also said we could talk with our thoughts.”

Ben thought to Amy “Yah. Its true. Can you hear me? This is my first time doing this.”

Amy gasped when she heard Ben’s voice in her head. She thought “It works!”

Ben smiled. He thought “Now, about the mana, mana is a type of energy that allows you to manipulate matter. The simplest spell that Gwen ever showed me was making a tiny ball of light appear in front of you. The orb is connected to my mana, but it doesn’t drain me anymore. I charged it up to the max with my large mana cloud. I told you that already. Then after that, it began to generate its own mana. Its independent of me now, but it is still linked to me because I connected a part of me to it.”

Amy “Ok… so just think of a ball of light?”

Ben “Yah. Make it appear in front of you. It will glow the same color as your mana field. The orb will convert its mana to match yours.”

Amy thought of a ball of light in front of her. Suddenly, she felt a tingle run through her body, and the necklace began to grow warm. The Heart Stone hummed faintly and developed a small inner glow. A ball blazing ball of light appeared in front of Amy. The strength of the light shocked her, but she maintained control and dimmed it down. She somehow managed to restrict the flow of mana, and the blazing white light became as large as a candle flame. “Wow…”

Ben was amazed “Ditto.” Then Ben remembered that the Heart Stone only lets it user use a specialized type of spell. Such as Healing spells, or materializing spells. Each one has a different ability. Amy’s might have more because it several ones compressed together. Though they will only reveal themselves when the need is great. Some of the weaker spells are a given. Anyone can do them. Such as make light and a few other minor things. Ben thought these thoughts to Amy.

Amy “I wonder what this Heart Stone specializes in? Maybe it can do a lot since there are so many crammed together, or maybe because they are crammed together, they can make one specific group of spells even stronger.”

Ben “Only time can tell. If the need I great, the Heart Stone will react to your emotion and give you a new spell. The ball of light is an ability that they all have. Heart Stone users don't need incantations or anything. The stone reacts to your heart and emotions. Then it provides a spell that will help out. That's why it is called a Heart Stone.”

Amy “Yah…”

So what happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111.content:
Ben and Amy sat next to each other for a while until Ben worried that Amy might get a little cold. Amy, however was fine since the Heart Stone was keeping her nice and warm. Ben didn’t care. He insisted that she goes inside. Amy obliged since Ben was so serious about it.

Ben went home after that and dreamed sweet dreams. Amy did the same.

The next morning. Amy woke up to a panicked thrum from the Heart Stone. As though it was warning her… telling her to keep her eyes open. Zia was at work right now, so Amy was at home alone. There was a ring at the door, and Amy went down to open it. The thrumming from the stone was getting faster. Amy started to worry. Got to the door and looked through the eye hole. On the other side, she saw some girl scouts, and she sighed. Amy opened the door and said hi. The girls were about 6 years old.

One girl “Hello! Do you want to help us raise money by buying cookies?”

The other girl “We have a lot of choices!”

Amy smile and said “I’ll get one raising oatmeal please. They’re my favorite!”

The first girl squealed “Me too!”

Amy smiled “Know what? Give me two please.” Amy handed them the money from her purse. “And now I open one and give you a cookie.” Amy opened the box and handed each girl a cookie.”

They smiled and took the cookie. For some odd reason, the girls were waiting for Amy to bite first.

Amy “Fine… I’ll eat mine first.”

The girls smiled and nodded. Amy took a bite, and the world went black.

Ben was still sleeping at this time. “He is a growing boy” quoted mom. Well… it was true in a sense. Ben’s artificial growth ended, but his normal growth hasn’t even started. When Ben slept, he was dreaming of Amy and how perfect she was…etc. Then the dream got dark and mysterious. Out in the distance Ben heard “Help me Ben! Help!” Out of no where, a giant muscle bound arm appeared out of the sky, and slammed a mighty fist down on Ben.

Ben jolted up from his bed. He felt that something was wrong with Amy. The link created by the heart stone told Ben that something was wrong. Ben sent a thought to Amy, but didn’t a response. Ben started to panic. He went downstairs, but his parents had gone off to work. His mom had started working at a financial firm downtown. They though Ben was mature enough to handle being home alone.

Ben ran to Amy’s home and saw the door open. Ben went inside and went up to Amy’s room. He knocked, but didn’t get a response. Ben opened the door, and aw the room empty. On Amy’s bed was a metal disk. Ben went up to it and pressed the button in the center.

There was a buzz, and a hologram appeared. It began to take the form of a human. As it became more defined, Ben realized it was Nick. The hologram repeated the same thing over and over again.

Nick “164 ASDF St.” Then in the back ground was Amy unconscious.

And it played over and over. That was until Ben crushed the disc with his hands.

Ben anger unlike ever before. No one messes with the people he cares about. Especially his ‘undeclared’ girlfriend. Ben removed his medallion and ran to the address. Ben’s body was composed, and he had a poker face. Everything about him looked fine except he was seething with anger. Ben blasted through the doors ripping them off their hinges. The desk clerk freaked out and hid under the desk. Ben walked up to her.

Ben “Where is he?”

The desk clerk pointed to an elevator. “B-b-b-b-bot-bot-bottom floor.”

Ben turned away, and instead of using the elevator, he punched the floor sending his straight down. Ben knew he had landed at the bottom floor when the ground remained more firm under him.

The room was all black except for a single light in the middle of the room. Under it was Amy. She was sitting in a chair gagged and unconscious. Ben began to walk up to Amy, but something caught his eye. Standing in the darkness was a boy Ben’s age, but more heavily muscled.

Ben glared at Nick. Ben somehow maintained enough self control over his body so he wouldn’t end Nick right there and them.

Nick “Ben… thanks for joining us. You came faster than anticipated.”

Ben “Us…?”

Ken stepped out “Yes… us… my employer has been extra keen on meeting you.”

Ben “Well. Tell him I’m just picking someone up. Nick, I’m giving you a chance to redeem yourself. Stop this before I lose myself.”

Nick “I wouldn’t worry about that do much. I’ve had an upgrade since the last time we met. I’m stronger and better than before. I doubt you can beat me now.” Nick’s logic is… my many pearls Vs. his one orb. Who’ll win? Nick of course… That’s what he thought.

Ben never stopped glaring at them. He turned at continued walking towards Amy. Suddenly Ben was trapped. A force field appeared around Ben trapping him in. Ben gave the prison a punch shattering that part of it, but it quickly regenerated. Ben punched it again and again, but it repaired itself to fast.

Ken “Please stop… you can’t get out of that prison. I made it myself.”

Nick smiled “Well Ben… who on top now?”

Ben continued pounding the prison.

Ken got a page from his boss “Nick, Can you dispose of the girl?”

Nick smile “Sure. Where do you want me to drop her off?”

Ken frowned “No… not drop off. I said dispose of her. Make her cease to exist.”

You have the Gym Court and the Gym Weights. The gym court is the regular flat floored open area used for basket ball or other gym exercises. The other section had weights and aerobics in it.
