It was the last day of school… Nick, Ben, and the 10 were hanging around with a bunch of other kid outside. The school had a traditional picnic event after school, so the gang went out into the fields and had lunch, etc. This wasn’t mandatory, but most people did it because it was a nice way to enjoy the start of summer. Amy was sitting on Ben’s lap, and they joked around. Everyone knew that “The couple” were starting to heat it up a bit. Though they just pretended not to see.

Out at the border of the area was Seth. He had learnt to deal with is strange mood swing when ever he saw Ben, but he still didn’t know why it happened. He left the picnic early, and went for a walk. Out no where, a black van parks in front of him, and lowers the window

A middle aged man appeared and said “Hey kid. Do you know where Ben Tennyson is?”

Seth felt his face grow hot from anger “What? Why do you need to meet him?”

Man “He did something to me that I can’t forgive. Its time he pays up… But what ever. Its none of your concern.”

Seth felt a connection to the man. They boy hated Ben, but why did he hate Ben. “Tell you what… I’ll tell you where Ben is if you can tell me why I hate Ben.”

Man smiled knowingly “Ok… Maybe I should show you instead.” The man had been looking for ways to get back at Ben when he recently stumbled his old benefactor. The benefactor gave his a disk to show to Seth. “But any way… before I do that, I’ll let you know my name is Ken. Now if you would look at this screen.” Ken took out a small screen and showed it to Seth.

On it was the room in which Ben had hid them all, and stripped Seth of his huge muscles. As Seth watched, his eyes said one thing, and his memories said another. When it got to the exact part where he lost his muscle, a door opened in his mind. Seth began to remember. He grabbed his head from the pain the mental recall was producing. “AH!”

Ken sat in his chair very professional like and waited to Seth to calm down.

Slowly, Seth got up and looked his body over. “I hate him even more than before…”

Ken “Ok… that good. Now direct that anger to someplace of use. I can help you. I have a little machine that will help you grow bigger. Even bigger than before.”

Seth felt his greed consume him, but he still had room for reasoning. “How do I know you’re not a fake?”

Ken smiled “How would a fake have this type of footage? How would I know to look for you? How would I know the source of Ben’s strength, for it was this source that grew you. If you want to know more… then you have to make a choice. Follow me to learn and grow, or stay behind in anger.”

Seth didn’t spend a moment on thinking. He jumped into the back seat of the dark van, and it drove off.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Fast forward a month or two.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben was resting under a tree with Amy resting on his arm. They were cloud watching.

Suddenly, Ben felt a strange warmth on his chest. Ben looked down and saw his medallion glowing. “That’s odd.”

Amy sat up “What wrong?” Then she saw the medallion “Ah… the orb? Do you know what’s going on?”

Ben shook his head “No… I think I should go check out what’s going on.”

Amy frowned, but nodded. “Be quick. Remember… you promised me a movie.”

Ben smiled. He had gotten his first pay check from his job with a moving company. He was being paid relatively high since he was fast, though he had to work under the table and receive only cash. He was to young to receive an actual check, or job. “Ok. I’ll remember. Besides… its odd. When I go in the orb, I’m in there for days, but when I come it its been like an hour or less. Anyway… I should get going” Ben tapped his medallion and he vanished in a flash of green light.

Inside, Ben looked around was amazed by the size of his universe. It had more stars and planets than the real universe. Ben looked around for a bit when suddenly, he saw strange lines of energy floating around this universe. He watched until he recognized them. They were similar to the orb, and the stars and planets were in the same place as the orb. It appears to be that the orb was in a copy of itself. Ben looked around for the orb until he saw it a few feet away. He went out and grabbed it.

Oddly, their was no liquid on the orb. “Why Isn’t there any of the liquid on it this time?”

Suddenly, as if to answer his question, the orb flashed once. Suddenly, a gushing sound appeared behind him. Ben turned around just in time to see that a galaxy sized river was headed right at him. What he though had been lines of energy floating in space was actually a river of the fluid. The orb made the fluid, but it didn’t appear on the orb. The very universe is saturated in energy. The only reason it doesn’t explode is because (1) It grows infinitely, and (2) the energy gets converted into a stream of fluid. The orb simply emit’s the energy now, and nothing more. The fluid passes through planets and stars quickly causing them to explode in a flurry of energy, crystal stars, and pearls. However, the planets and stars appear faster than they are destroyed.

Now, the wall of fluid had hit him with enough force to destroy a couple hundred galaxies. Ben was able to withstand it thanks to his strong body. Time seemed to freeze for Ben. He knew what would happen next. And it did. Like a splash of arctic water, Ben was instantly showered in pleasure. He felt his penis fill up with blood instantly, but now he was powerless to even take off his pants. He felt every fiber in his body thrum to the feeling of pleasure. All he could do was rub and stroke his penis through his super stretch pants.

Then he exploded. His pants instantly filled with enough cum to fill a galaxy in a second. You could here the seems of the strong material beginning to reach their limits. Then, to the pants relief (if they were alive), the cum shot up there by shooting his pants right off. Like a rocket powered by white hot cum, it shot at near light speed. Ben hadn’t even realized it was gone. He was gone and lost in pleasure. This fluid that was entering his body was billions of time more potent than before. It has been getting more and more potent with every passing moment ever since Ben last left. Which was a long time ago. Ben was simply laying in a universe of fluid while releasing his young hot seeds into the void of the green universe. All the while, billions of stars and planets formed in the fluid. They were instantly energized there by causing them to explode into crystal stays and pearls.

The crystal stars provide structure for the orb to allow it to handle all the energy while the pearls provided the energy. The cum that was absorbed allowed everything to connect together and work. It was the glue and bridge for the energy in the crystal. It also helped the orb develop new properties that help it handle all the energy and provide structural benefits.

For the next week or so, Ben let there in a chaotic solution of energy and cum. His penis was engorged more so than ever from the abuse it was being put through. It had grown another foot just to handle all the pressure. Then the rush of cum slowed down to a trickle. Ben’s engorged cock turned flaccid and was at its previous size. Ben was exhausted. That the was longest and hardest one yet, and he enjoyed every moment, and hated every moment. It felt amazing, but during that time, he had no control over his body. He could think clearly now, but how couldn’t act.

He was a prisoner of his own body. Be moved slowly, and he sped up a bit as he regained control over his body. Ben sighed “I don’t know how I felt about that.” Ben looked at the orb and saw it flash. Suddenly, they universes (that means multiple universes) of cum rushed at the orb stabilizing it for the rest of eternity. Ben had stabilized the orb pretty well the last time, but this time, a more permanent solution was made. Now the orb will act out less because of built up energy. When all the cum was gone, Ben looked at the orb and saw that it was slightly bigger than before. It had encased itself in several atom think shells that will help it produce and convert the energy into something useful. Ben tapped the orb, and felt the solidness of the shell. He knew that even he could not break the orb.

Ben left the orb there in space to do its business. Already, Ben saw streams forming in the universe, though they were less potent. They will in crease in potency over time. Ben looked for his pants and was surprised it was a couple light years away. He had the universe move the pants to him, and he put it on. They looked the same as before. They had shrunken down to their proper size.

Ben then turned to the exit. He tapped the tiny doorway, and he reappeared outside.

Amy “You back! That was quick. You’ve been gone for a few seconds.”

Ben “Really? I thought it was a few days… Then again, things move faster in that world.”

Amy smiled “So that movie?”

Ben smiled in return and they walked toward the movies.

Far away, a strange ship was approaching earth. Ben’s orb had not made those shells just to be able to handle energy, but to also handle more of the ‘original’ planet. Something is come closer.

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Seth was taken to a collapsed facility. “What is this place. It looks like it was hit by an asteroid.”

Ken frowned “Its all his fault.”

Seth knew who he was talking about. “What did he do?”

Ken sighed “Do you know a kid named Nick? He should go to your school.”

Seth “Yah. I know him. He was like Ben. Had insane strength, but I could tell he was infinitely weaker than Ben. Why is that?”

Ken “Lets get inside. It’s safer to talk there.”

Seth made a questioning face “What do you mean inside? Its all caved in.”

Ken smiled for the first time “Just that lab under the building. I came up the idea of having a lab near the lab. No one would think to look where I hid this one.” He walked over to a group of plain looking trees and he moved around a bush and waved for Seth to come over. Under the shrub was a well hidden hole. It was dark and cavernous. “After you.” Ken said.

Seth “Wait me? I don’t even know what’s down there!”

Ken smiled “Its my other lab. If no machines are need for an entrance, it makes it harder to find with technology.”

Seth smiled “Smart… But I’m not going in first.”

Ken sighed “Very well. I’ll go first.” He started to walk forward when suddenly he grabbed Seth and pushed him into the hole.

Seth screamed as he fell. Then his fall turned into a slide. He went looping and turning everywhere. He popped out with a slight thud on top of a memory foam bed. He turned and faced the exit. “Wait till I get my hands on you! If you were here …” And the rant continued. Then realization dawned on him. No one was coming down. “Dude! Where are you? When are you coming…” Seth couldn’t finish because he saw a screen on the side turn on, and another, and dozens more. Arrows began to appear and move in a certain direction. Seth followed them until they stopped.

Unknown to him, he had just stepped on top of a giant X mark. One screen turned from an arrow into a face. Ken was on it.

Ken “Sorry for the wait, but I had to hook my computer up to the lab.”

Seth was fuming “I don’t care! Why on earth did you have to push me down?”

Ken “Cause you wanted to grow right?”

Seth nodded “Yah, so that doesn’t justify anything.”

Ken “Well be prepared. In 10 - 9 - 8 …”

Seth “Wait what are you counting for?” He was silent. He heard a humming, and a green light appeared in 6 direction. In the front, back, left, right, above and below him. “Wait stop! What are you…”

Ken “2 - 1... Fire.”

Seth saw his life flash before him. Everything moved so slow he thought. His brain was running even faster than before. All he could do was watch the green beam head straight towards him. All he thought was “I’m going to die now. Why now?”

But the void never came. Instead, his eyes opened instantly from the energy surging through his body. He felt his muscle rip, and heal, and stretch repeatedly, He heard his bones crack and heal, and lengthen. His body was developing at hyper speed. The feeling started out pleasant, but as the energy continues to burn through all his cells, he began to feel pain. He couldn’t even scream! He just sat there and grew, and grew, and grew. He felt at one point that the walls began to close in on him. He was quickly filling up the small space that was left for him. The pain began to increase when suddenly it was reduced. He was shrinking down, but he still felt himself growing. For the hours, he had endured, but he eventually passed out. Who knows how long he’s been there.

When Seth came to, he was in his room. It was morning and the second week of summer “Was that all a dream?” Seth looked around and went about doing his usual morning routine. He saw a not on the fridge “Sorry Seth. We’re out of town on a business conference. Food money is on the table. See you on Monday. Love mom and dad.” Seth read the note and smiled. He had the house to himself for the weekend. He went back to his room to let the video game binge begin. When he came in, he saw an envelope that he had missed earlier. It was for him, but no return address. He opened it “Hello Seth. Its was not a dream. I can prove it. First off, you’ll need to play the CD enclosed. Sincerely Ken” Seth looked in the envelope and found a CD. He put it in computer and ran the short film.

A picture of an arm growing hugely muscle appeared. That was the logo. Then that vanished. Seth watched and saw a long presentation of Growthium and all of its abilities. He learnt that it came in the form of a pearl and stuff. Then he discovered that Ben had the largest one. It was his source of strength and power. Seth smiled because he now had a goal.

To bad for him, he doesn’t know about all the difficulties in acquiring it.

After the presentation on Growthium, a film on how Seth’s body began. It showed that he had grown far to big during the process yesterday. His body would have been reduced to pulp if it had not started to compress itself. So this leads to the knowledge that his body is really dense, but he can control his size with practice. Then it said that if he was not compressed, he would be equal to a few Earths. In order to prevent his strong gravitational pull from killing him, there is a gravitum particles injected into his blood stream. They are harmless, and they gave him the ability to store things by touching them.

After this, it told him to just simply practice growing. However, it warned him that he should not go over board. “We can not afford to have Ben discover that we have acquired more Growthium. Our supplier will not give me anymore. So try not to grow beyond a believable size when you are traveling.”

Seth nodded to no one in particular and went out into his back yard. He stripped down to the skin and then imagined himself bigger. He felt a warmth spread over his body. He felt his body stretch and grow and length. He went from 5ft 1in to 6ft the 7ft. His .5in pecs went to 4 then 8in off his body. His faint 6 pack grew more defined and multiplied. It turned into extremely deep 8pack. He was 3ft shoulder to shoulder. His biceps were watermelons. His thighs were so huge they spread the legs apart. His caves were live beach balls. Even his penis was engorged beyond normal proportions. A whopping 3ft long with over grown cantaloupes for balls. The boy had the body of the kind of pro body builders. He dwarfed any person he stood next to. Ken started to giggle, then laugh. It built into a roar of joy that echoed through the neighborhood. The laughter was a deep bass sound. It should the very earth. Seth started to move, but realized that so much bulk was put on a small frame that he could barely waddle let alone walk. He couldn’t even see the ground in front of him. There were to giant pecs blocking his view.

Seth though of growing taller until he was 9ft tall. At this height, he was still HUGE, but not he could actually walk. Or waddle/walk. Then he yelled to the world “Look out! Seth’s Back and bigger than ever!”

With that, he let out another round of laughter.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets see how Seth is.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ken was in his lab. He had left the address in the envelope. There was a knock, and Seth stepped in.

Seth was smiling “What’s the plan?”

Ben was in his basement lifting weights. He didn’t stay in shape by just working out at school (at least not his minimum). While Nick wanted to lift light weights for a lot of reps to grow ‘big’, Ben worked on really heavy weights for fewer reps to be smaller, but several times stronger. He however, also did yoga and endurance training there for, he can lift heavy weights for a relatively large number of times. Though he chooses not to. He likes to be strong with out all the bulky muscle in the way. Anyway, he was lifting a lot. After working out, he took his shower off all his sweat. He had ran his usual 10miles with his hour of yoga. He even started to do hand stands and practiced walking around like that. He wanted to try running with a hand stand in order to train his arms for endurance.

After the shower, he walked over to Amy’s house to fix the electrical problem they seem to be having. While he was walking, he heard a voice in his head “Help!” And then he began to feel a little uneasy. He felt his stomach turn a little. He knew something was wrong with Amy, and he bolted for her house.

When he got there, he saw a stream of smoke leading away from the house. Someone had taken her. Ben ran though the front door (like through it. It was not even open) and went to Amy’s room. He saw a note. He groaned when he ready it. “Not this again!” Ben looked up and saw the hole in the ceiling. He jumped out the window and began to bolt for the facility.

He saw the collapsed building and wondered why he was back here. Then he heard Amy’s voice in his head.

Amy “Ben! Ken has me again. I don’t know where I am. I think I’m underground though. Another person is working for Ken now. He is even stronger than Nick is I think.”

Ben “Ok… its going to be alright. I’ll be there soon.”

Amy “Please be careful. They have this thing… I don’t know what it is. Some kind of gun.”

Ben “It doesn’t matter what it is. I’ll stop it before it gets you.”

Amy “Its not for me. Its for you. I overheard Ken talking about it. Another person with this really deep voice was asking questions.”

Ben “I see. I’ll there soon.” Ben looked around trying to find out where Amy was. As he walked, he sudden felt a pull downward. Be knew that she was right below him. Ben began to dig at the ground. The dirt flew into the atmosphere incinerating itself as it shot up. Ben got to the bottom in an instant. When there was no more soil or bed rock, he had fallen a couple hundred feet to the floor. It seems like he has fallen into an old cave.

Amy “Ben! Look out! Behind you.”

Ben turned around, but not fast enough. A red beam shot at him locking him in place. He couldn’t move at all, but he could talk. “Why can’t I move!”

There was a chuckle in the gloom of the poorly lit cave. “Hello Ben. So nice to see you.”

Ben snapped his head to the right and saw Ken. Ken looked the same as before, but now he had developed a crazed smile. It was full of greed and hate.

Ben “What do you want?”

Ken chuckled “You know very well what I want. Your growth orb. I do believe it has changed since last time. It produced a liquid a little while ago right? Yes… of coarse it did. My benefactor gave me that piece of information from his own studies. Yes… yes! I’ll be with him soon. Studying along with his greatness. With access to all the materials I need. Oh yes…” Ken sounded like deranged maniac.

Ben getting frustrated with Ken, and tried to move and get Amy out.

Ken started to chuckle again “Can’t move? Well I can help shed some light on that. The red energy enveloping you is blocking and redirecting the signals your brain sends to your muscles. Thus making it impossible for you to move. Hah! Once again, my genius will prevail.”

Ben frowned and struggled even harder. “At least let Amy out. She has nothing to do with this.”

Ken “Yes she does. It’s the only way to keep you under control. I’m taking no chance.”

Suddenly, Ben heard in his head “Help!” Ben turned to face Amy again and saw that a large man in a ski mask was covering her mouth to keep her from talking.”

The man “Hello Ben. Its nice to big isn’t it?”

Ben “Do I know you?”

The man “Ben… that hurts. Don’t you remember? It was you who took away all my muscles.”

Ben thought about it for a moment, and realized “Seth…” Ben’s tone was filled with acid.

The man laughed and pulled off his ski mask “That’s right and don’t forget it!”

Ben “But why? How do you remember”

Seth “You have Ken to thank for that.”

Ben’s was silent for a moment. Then his voice croaked as he swallowed his pride to ask “Can you let her go.” Then he thought to Amy “I’m sorry. I couldn’t protect you.”

Amy yelled in his head “That wrong! The only reason that Seth is restraining he is because that red beam couldn’t even touch me. I can even tell that If He tried to hurt me that the heart stone would protect me. I can just feel it.”

Ben sighed in relief.

Seth frowned “What was that? You girl is in danger. don’t you feel worried?”

Ben laughed causing Seth and Ken to feel nervous. “You will never hurt her no matter how hard you try because I will always be there to guard her.”

Seth frowned and lifted his arm to strike Amy in defiance against Ben. As soon as his hand went above his head, a white bolt of energy was emitted from the heart stone that attacked Seth. Seth flew 30 ft before he landed with a crash. Then a moment later, another bolt shot at Ben causing the red energy around him to disperse.

Ken’s face was of shock and turmoil “NO! I was so close. Wait. Its not to late.” Ken rushed for a red button next to him and pressed it. “Master! Get the girl! I have failed, but you may still succeed!”

Ben looked at Ken in shock and then back at Amy. There was a loud hum and then a white beam broke through the ceiling and surrounded Amy. She was being sucked up by the tractor beam.

Amy “Ben! Look out!”

Ben turned and looked behind himself. A giant fist was swung at him causing him to fly into a red net of energy. The moment he touched it, he was immobilized. “AH!!!! Let me go!”

Seth limped over into Ben’s field of vision. His whole body was covered in soot from burnt patches of clothing. Also, his cloths were ripped in several place. He had grown in order to punch Ben in spite. “Say good bye to Amy…”

Ben felt his anger rise. He let out a yell as he struggled against his bonds, but it didn’t work. The signals weren’t getting to his limbs. He saw Amy slowly disappear through the hole. “Amy! I’ll come get you!”

Seth “I doubt you be going anywhere.”

Ken was in a corner rocking back and forth giggling. The shock of Ben breaking loose ad drove him mad.

Ben glared at Ken defiantly. He inhaled and let out a yell as he stroke to break free of his bonds. He saw sparks shoot along the red web of energy as they redirected his electrical signals. Seeing this, Ben worked even harder. The sparks grew in numbers until a never ending stream of energy was flowing out of Ben, and still Ben continued. Ben was nearing his limits. Any normal prison would have no hold against him, but this was unique. He had to send so much energy through it that it would cause the web to lose stability and dissipate. Similar to what the heart stone did. Though it is tougher for Ben since he has to over load the whole web, and not just one single point like the lightning bolt. Ben was about to give in. his weariness was taking over.

Seth staring at Ben as he tried to break loose. He was shocked. How can his brain send so many signals that it causes the whole web to jolt like that? Even I couldn’t do that. He can’t be stronger than me. I have to be more dense than him.

Ben felt his vision grow darker and the static on the web began to go down. Ben was about to give up when suddenly he saw a picture of Amy in front of his eyes. This gave his a single burst of energy out of desperation. He gave this one all he had, and overloaded the web. There was the sound of humming birds when the web overloaded. When it exploded, you heard small pop sound followed by a lot of crackling.

Ben fell to the ground with a thud panting. He felt a shock from his medallion and he felt reenergized. He got up and looked around. Ben looked up and saw that the lighting in the room was brighter. It seems that the energy the Ben redirected was used to power the web itself and the other machines in the room.

Seth yelled “How!” then he ran to swing at Ben.

Ben looked at Seth “I don’t have time. Go away or you’ll get hurt.”

Seth laughed while still running “Me.. Get hurt? I’m size of 3 earths compressed together. You can’t beat me.” Then he got close to Ben and landed a punch.

Ben felt the impact, but no pain. All he heard was a loud crunch. “I’m going now.”

Seth was on the ground clutching his hand. It was bleeding. He’d broken several fingers. “How!” He yelled, but his voice fell on no one’s ears. Ben had already gone.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ken and Seth develop a plan.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben jumped up the hole made by the tractor beam and shot up into the sky. He saw a large spaceship moving away. Ben saw it and started to run towards it. When he was under it, he jumped and broke through its hull. He searched every nook and cranny until he found the command center.

Inside, he saw an enemy he though had gone to the Null Void.

Vilgax “Hello Ben… Its nice to see you.”

Ben “Vilgax…”

Vilgax “Well… I see your manners haven’t changed. Anyhow, I had a guest, and I’m treating her with the utmost care.” Vilgax points toward the side of the room.

Amy was sitting in a chair inside of a red bubble.

Amy thought “Ben! Be careful. The bubble is a bomb. If I sit up, it explodes. If you touch it, it explodes.”

Ben glared at Vilgax “Let her go.”

Vilgax “Why would I do that?”

Ben “I’m warning you.”

Vilgax let out a strange alien chuckle “I don’t think you will. For you see… I have 99.99% of the original green planet on my side, and I’ve been devoting every ounce of spare energy my generators produce and sending it though these precious pearls. I believe that I am a fair match against your muscles.”

Ben’s heart skipped a beat. He felt the orb react to the information, but it couldn’t sense the pearls. They must be hidden by some type of material.

Vilgax chuckled. “Don’t try… I sealed the Growthium crystals away. They are still increasing my strength as we speak.”

Ben “Where did you get them?”

Vilgax laughed “My family always had them. I inherited them the moment I got out of the Null Void.”

Ben thought for a moment. SO it has to be in something that relates to his family. What can it be. It also has to be made of Gravitum to keep him from causing hard to anything he touches. Ben looked and stopped when his eyes saw a silver crest with Vilgax’s races’ face on it. That’s it!

Vilgax “As you know Ben… I’m reasonable. Lets say… you give me the orb, and this all gets left behind. If you don’t, then I hope you have fun seeing your mate dissolve in 999 molar hydrochloric acid.”

Ben gasped “That doesn’t even exist!”

Vilgax chuckled “IT goes if you mix in a little bit of Gravitum. Yes… Gravitum… such an amazing metal.”

Ben thought to Amy “Go inside your heart stone!”

Vilgax continues to rant.

Ben “I can not give it to you.”

Vilgax sighed “Very well. Good luck finding a new mate.” Vilgax snapped his fingers/tentacles, and the bubble popped. Then he started to chuckle.

Ben’s voice was quiet “You’ll pay for that…”

Vilgax had expect what happened next. Ben charged at Vilgax at near speed of light, and Vilgax reacted just as fast. Ben punched and Vilgax blocked. They went back and worth at this. It kind of looked like a DBZ fight. However, Ben had the advantage of size. Hiw was just as strong, but less bulky. Ben was more agile, and quick on his feet. Eventually, Ben found an opening and struck, and then again and again.

Ben “Is that ll you’ve got? You and your planet of pearls.”

Vilgax let out an enraged yell “Do not toy with me boy. I’m a force to be feared.”

Ben “Right… sure you are.”

Vilgax roared and sped up his attacks. In his anger, Ben had slipped though his guard and plucked the crest off his chest.

Ben “Ok.. This is getting boring. Lets finish this.”

Vilgax let out a breath of air. He got ina position that said ‘Yes.”

Ben hid the crest in his pocket and got ready to charge Vilgax. Then they ran. It looked like they vanished and reappeared on the opposite side.

Ben clutched his stomach. There was a bruise that began t form there. Ben went to his knees and let out a cough.

Vilgax chuckled “I told you… I’m a force not to be reck…” Vilgax didn’t get to finish because he fell down from the sudden burst of pain.

Ben started to chuckle and walked over to where the bubble was. He looked for the heart stone and picked it up. It looked totally fine and unscathed. Ben felt the acid on it tingle his skin, but not go through it. “I better neutralize this…”

Ben ran off the ship and went home. He opened his fridge and took out the baking soda, and dropped the necklace in it. There was a lot of bubbling and hissing. Then it stopped. Benn took the necklace out and rinsed off the baking soda.

Ben thought “Amy. You can come out now.”

Amy thought “Really? I think you should come in. This place is awesome.

Ben smiled “Ok them… I’m going in.”

Ben tapped the heart stone, and it sucked him in with a beam of white light.

When his eyes cleared, he saw a white universe with countless white stars. IT was almost blinding to watch.

Amy “Hey Ben! This place… I’ve never been inside. I totally forgot you could store things.”

Ben chuckled “No everything Is going inside?”

Amy smiled “Maybe…”

Ben “Well… I think we should get out. Time moves differently in this universe then in ours.”

Amy “Really? Oh! Like how you were in yours to a week but it had only been a few seconds.”

Ben “Exactly.” Then Ben waved we toward the floating pearl. “Ladies first.”

Amy smile “Why thank you kind sir.” Amy tapped the pearl and was sucked out. Then Ben followed.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ben runs up to the ship.

Ben and Amy pop out of the only white heart stone in the universe.

Amy “I really love that place. Though its kind of lonely.”

Ben “I know what you mean. My universe is a little more hostile. Every single spot is saturated with energy. I think I’m the only person that can handle that atmosphere. OR maybe you since you have the heart stone protecting you.”

Amy smiled “Maybe I should visit it some day.”

What did he see?

It had to grow and lengthen itself inn order to not get torn apart. Now at 3 ft long and 6in in diameter, it was a water pipe of a penis. His balls had grown to medicine balls in order to keep up with demand.

The orb had like two sections now. The inner section was the same as the original, then the outer section had relatively larger dots orbiting the core like they were guarding its precious cargo. Everyone looked Ben over and saw what Gwen said was true.

Gramps nodded “Well… I don’t think I takes that much away from you, and plus! You get healthier every time you go in, so it could potentially lengthen your life time moer than it reduces it.”

They thought about it.

Amy said hopefully and looked at Ben “Maybe only when you need to? Not to often ok?”

Ben smiled “Sure. I could do that.”

Gwen smiled a little then decided to joke a bit “Ben needs a hair cut.”

Ben freezes. “Oh no” he mutter so only he can hear.

Amy smiled and whispers to Gwen “What style?”

Ben started to creep towards the door to run. To bad he already put his medallion back on. Gwen had encased Ben in purple energy to keep him from moving. When he wasn’t sealed, he could get away, but now he was useless.

Amy and Gwen walked up to him with a comb, brush and scissors.
