His 6pack abs were large and deeply cut. Deep enough that you could put most of your index finger in it. His thighs were massive. They brushed against each other as he walked down the halls. Not to mention that fact that when he walks, the bulge in his groin bounces. It contained an 8in python that was 2in thick. It carried with it a pair of tennis balls.
Picture: http://grandwallpapers.net/photo/obnajen...
Imagine that, but 3 times buffer!

Seth is now
Age: 14 years old
Height: 5ft 10in
Weight: 235lbs
Description: Seth had been working hard to beat Nick in their muscle growth contest. They had until graduation senior year. Ever since 2 summers ago, he’s been working non stop, so he matched Nick proportionally in size. Being a couple inches short packs more muscle in a smaller frame thereby making him look bigger than he is. His pecs puched 4in off his body. His biceps were 7in diameter, his abs were as good as Nick’s, his thighs also rubbed against each other as he walked. His bulge was composed of a 7in anaconda, 2in diameter, with tennis balls for balls.
http://instinctmagazine.com/images/stori...
But 2x larger

They were the big 3 with their 10 followers.

The 10
Age: 14 years old
Height: 5ft 8in
Weight: 225 lbs
Description: These kids were highly motivated body builders. They have been working out together since the summer prior to the 6th grade. They stove to grow as strong as Nick in muscle, and a few hoped to match Ben in height. They all knew that no one can match his speed. He was like lightning. Their pecs pushed 3in of their body, their abs looked like freshly baked cupcakes. Their shoulders were like bowling balls. Their biceps were 6in in diameters, and their thighs brushed against each other slightly. Their build varied very little since they all had the exact same routine. Their pride was 7in long, 2in diameter, and their balls were tennis balls.

Today was freshmen orientation, so only freshmen were in the school. Everyone was given thirty minutes to wander and then come back for lunch. Apparently, they school is hoping for a few million dollars to get renovated. They were embarrassed that their elementary/middle school was nicer than their high school. Ben would need to fix that, but he can’t. His strength is still sealed away.

Ben walked down the hall looking down slightly to see everyone. They were all shocked to see that they had to tilt their head slightly to look at Ben’s face. Amy wasn’t as surprised since she had see Ben occasionally during the summer. Ben saw Amy and waved.

Amy waved back to her ‘friend’. Apparently, both of them decided to become friends just for high school, and may until after college. They need to work hard and get an education.

Nick had gotten a girlfriend over the summer. She was fairly nice, but it was clear that she was moving on. Nick was still stuck in the past however. He got a job and sent flowers, chocolates, and other things. He even sent her a dumbbell for their week-a-versary. Slowly, it came to dawn on him that things wouldn’t get started again, so he stopped. He went to the gym everyday afterwards and pumped iron until he couldn’t anymore. Lets see where this leads him.

Seth had decided that he wasn’t going to go through what Nick is going through, he is going to abstain permanently… at least until he changes his mind.

Gwen had decided against going to a fancy high school and decided to go to this high school because it had more ‘character. She could be with her friends, go to their school library (the largest school library in the world!), and participate in a whole series of events. Not to mention the school has hired a new set of faculty members. The teachers all had the title ‘Dr.’ which is suppose to make them experts in their fields. Most were in their 40’s, so they had been working in their field for quite a while.

The Ben walked in the front making small greeting to people he knew. Seth was trying to cheer Nick up, and Amy and Gwen were just talking about their plans during and after high school.

One of the new teachers, an astronomer and an alien enthusiast saw Ben walking down the hall. He saw the necklace Ben was wearing and saw its strange quality. “That’s strange. No rock on earth has that type of quality.” This is Dr. Comet. (Funny right? Well, that‘s just my opinion.) He thought about that chain and medallion for a little while when the bell had rung. That means that students would be filing in to their home rooms. They would follow their schedules, and go to their proper class to be told what they needed. At the end of the day, they would all go to an assembly to be told their expectations.

Funny that all 5 kids had the same homeroom with Dr. Comet.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets get to High School. Its the year of change!

choices: Dr. Comet is more than he appears.
Dr. Comet isn't just a normal human.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben sat up front with Nick and Seth to his left, and Gwen and Amy to his right. Everyone else was just gossiping randomly. Most were surprised at Ben’s amazing growth spurt, but they left it at that.

Dr. Comet felt it was time to introduce himself “Hello homeroom. Seeing that this is both of our first days, I find it necessary to start off with introductions. My name is Dr. Comet, and I’ll be teaching astronomy at this school. Maybe some of you will have me as your teacher, and I look forward to it. My hobbies include alien sci-fi movies, looking at the stars, and listening to music.” Then he pointed to Nick. “Your turn. Large young man in the front.

Nick realized it was his turn “Hello. I’m Nick. My hobbies are weightlifting, cardio, and I hope to start football this year. “

Dr. Comet “Very good. Now you point to someone.”

Nick turned and pointed at Seth

Seth “My name is Seth. I also do Weightlifting, and cardio, and I want to start football. I believe that hard work can get you anywhere.”

Everyone looked at Seth. Nick muttered “Showoff.”

Seth smiled and them pointed at Amy.

Amy “I want to join gymnastics, and start a yoga club. My hobbies as yoga, volunteering at the YMCA, and reading mystery books. Big fan of Sherlock Holms. I want to major in biology, and continue to work in a lab to study stem cells and muscle tissue.” then she pointed to Gwen.

Gwen smiled “Like Amy, I love Holms, and yoga, but I also like karate and track. I want to major in neuroscience and anatomy. I want to study brain and all it little quirks.” Then she pointed to Ben.

Ben “My name is Ben. I want to try out for football. I weight lift, do yoga, cardio, run, and other thing. A total fitness geek.” Ben smiled and then continued “MY other hobbies include anything hands on, so I know how to make a house and a car, and other things. I even craft among other things. I love sci-fi movies, I want to be an astronomer as an occupation. So maybe I might see you, Dr. Comet, later on today.”

Dr. Comet nodded and let Ben point to someone else. Everyone got to say their hobbies and goals, etc.

After that, everyone went to their ‘required’ classes. The school was doing something new. Homerooms would be one group that would have all the same courses except for electives. So all the kids from this morning found themselves in the same Geometry H. class, English 9 H. class, US History H. class, Biology H. class, and Gym class. They had one extra class of their choice. Ben chose astronomy, Gwen chose to do a schools to career with Dr. G. Matter, another neuroscience fanatic, Amy chose to do anatomy, Seth picked an extra gym period to go to the gym, and so did Nick.

Any how, every went to gym. They all got a uniform to wear. A pair of shorts and a T-shirt, though they were not required to wear those specifically.

Nick and Seth had specifically brought a change of cloths since they were going to lift weights after school, but now was as good as ever. Ben and may students did the same.

Today was a fitness test.

Their was an optional weight lifting section if you were interested.

The teacher Mr. Tuff (Get it? Tough --- Tuff?) “Ok. We are doing a mandatory fitness test today. Everyone go change and be out in 5.” Everyone went and changed.

Ben stepped out with his usual fitness attire along with Nick and Seth. Their sleeveless shirts showed off their hugely muscled arms and hugged their chest nicely. The clothing they chose showed off their muscles well, but Ben was a little more modest. Unlike out 2 muscle heads. Ben still had a sleeveless shirt and shorts, but they were a little looser on him than the other two.

Mr. Tuff “Ok. We are doing the optional weightlifting first. Who wants to participate?” All the boys raised their hands. They have been lifting since the 6th grade when their school had its sudden renovation. They were all more built than kids from other schools. Because of it, they all had relatively nice bodies that you couldn’t complain about.

Mr. Tuff brought the kids to a set of 3 bench presses. Ben, Nick, and Seth stepped up. Ben was in the middle. “Ok. Lets begin. How much weight do you want?”

They all said “400lbs.”

Mr. Tuff had already been shocked by the fact that these boys were extremely huge, but they even lifted outrageously. Any they were only freshmen! What will they look like as senior!

Ben had been building for body for endurance, strength, and flexibility. So this means ha can lift heavy weights for many reps. Its amazing he kept such a tight built.

Seth had been lifting lightly for a lot of reps. This results in a large build, but isn’t as strong.

Nick tried to cope Ben in strength, but he also wanted size, so he ended up having to lift slightly lighter, for few reps than either, but still very heavy.

So all three laid down and got ready to see who was strongest. Based on looks, it seems like Nick will win, but on muscular structure, it looks like Ben will win. Seth will probably lose.

They began nice and strong. They Seth started to slow down since he wasn;t used to the heavy weights. He got to the 6th lift before his muscles couldn’t take it anymore. He sat up slightly satisfied that he got that far. Nick and Ben were still neck in neck at 10 lifts… then 15.… At 17, Nick began to shake harder than he had before. He managed an 18. Ben got to 18 then did 19 with some difficulty. Not as much as Nick. Then nick got ready for the 19 and some how managed. Ben did 20, and Nick simply stopped because he was done. Ben stopped as well, and shook hands with Nick.

Nick smiled competitively “Next time…”

Ben “Next time.”

Mr. Tuff was awestruck at the immense power these two boys had. He decided to let everyone do what they wanted to do. “Ok class. Change of plans. Go do your usual workout routine. The test will be tomorrow. You three. Come with me.” He pointed to Nick, Seth, and Ben.

Mr. Tuff brought them to his office. “I have some advice for you three. Join the football team. I think you guys have a clear chance of making it.”

Nick, Seth, and Ben “That was out intention. We planned on doing it this year.”

Mr. Tuff nodded and dismissed the boys. When they were go, he did jump of joy. They football team has been getting worse and worse each year until recently, they lost 9 out of 10 games.

The gang took it easy and did a few cardio exercise, but nothing else.

After that, they took a shower and they went to their electives.

Ben walked back into his homeroom “Hello Dr. Comet.”

Dr. Comet “Hey Ben. Good to see you. Have a seat. Everyone should be coming shortly.” After a few minutes of trying to find their way through the halls, 29 more kids had filed in.

Dr. Comet “Hello class. I am Dr. Comet. I’d like to take a moment to ask you why you are interested in the heavens.”

The class to turns sharing. Ben’s turn came “My family has had a long history of looking at the stars and they got me interested. Besides. If I’m going in to space, I should understand it.”

Dr. Comet smiled. He had been designating teacher’s pet in each class, but so far Ben was at the top. Besides, he was still interested in that medallion. “Ben. I’m just curious. Don’t hold it to me, but where did you happen to find that stone around your neck. I’ve never seen anything like it.”

Ben’s tone a little more serious “If you want to know… I might tell you after school.”

Everyone grew quiet. Ben had never use any tone besides his usual cheery one.

Then Ben laughed “Gotcha! I’ve been waiting to use that tone. The stone’s been in my family for a long time. Supposedly, it came crashing down from the heavens, and my family has cherished it ever since.”

Dr. Comet was silent. He has more to tell. I’m sure of it. “That’s really interesting. Maybe you can tell me more, but not now. I have a whole agenda to get through before the bell rings.”

Afterwards, he went through a list of percentages, and stories about how people thought the stars had come about and the origins of the universe. He was practically in love with the universe. Which was totally fine in Ben’s eyes. He respected people who devoted to their interests.

What should happen now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets just get through orientation.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
After school, Ben went back to Mr. Comet because he was told to.

Ben walked into the room “Hello? Mr. Comet? You wanted to see me?”

There was a crashing sound in the back of the room in the closet. Ben ran in to see Mr. Comet buries unto maps, charts, and other space related material.

Mr. Comet “Little help.”

Ben began to dig Mr. Comet out of his mountain of stuff. Then suddenly, Mr. Comet’s arm rushed out and made a grab for Ben’s medallion. Ben was yanked forward, and he was shocked. Ben pulled back and Mr. Comet got yanked out of his pile.

Ben “What was that for?!?!” He was slightly pissed, but more confused.

Mr. Comet smiled innocently “Sorry. It was getting hard to breath. I needed to get out.”

Ben sighed “Sorry if I sounded rude, but this has been in my family for a long time. I’d get killed it I lost or broke it.”

Mr. Comet looked a little sadden “Sorry. I didn’t mean to.”

Ben smiled “Its ok. This is very durable. I put it through a lot worse. You kind of surprised me. That’s all.”

Mr. Comet jumped suddenly. “Hey Ben. Can you step outside my room for a moment?” Mr. Comet seemed slightly anxious and a little nervous.

Ben nodded “Ok. Should I just come back tomorrow? I have to be somewhere.”

Mr. Comet nodded “Yes. That would be good. See yah then.”

Ben left Mr. Comet’s room.

Mr. Comet reaches into his pocket and pulls out a disc. It had a screen like a TV. It sizzled and vibrated. Then the shadow of an image began to appear.

A voice “You have made contact.”

Mr. Comet nodded “I believe so. Though, the medallion will be an obstacle. I tried using the spell you taught me to pry it out, but it proved to be more resilient.”

Voice “I had anticipated as much. Study him for now. Then we’ll proceed from there.”

Mr. Comet “Understood.”

Ben had felt a stab of foreign energy when Mr. Comet had reached out and yanked himself out. Ben was sure that something has been attempted, but he liked Mr. Comet. So he gave him the benefit of the doubt.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Dr. Comet is more than he appears.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The next day.

The intercom “Today’s announcements. Boy’s football tryouts are after school 3:30. If you can’t be on time, then be early. Girls track will begin shortly after wards. Something new to this school is a yoga club. Led by Amy. Trust me… she can bend like its nobody’s business. Come and see for yourself.” The rest droned on and on.

First block today were their electives, so Ben went to Mr. Comet.

Mr. Comet says to the class “Congratulations! You have all survived the first day of school. Lets get started right away. Turn to page one of your text book and look at the picture to the right. Tell me what you see.”

Everyone gave meaningful observations about starts and empty space. Ben took a different approach.

Ben “I see chaos held together by chaos.”

Mr. Comet raised an eyebrow. That’s new… “Care to explain?”

Ben “Well… the universe is always getting more chaotic. That’s just how it is, but gravity pulls all that chaos into clumps thereby organizing it. Its kind of like clumping chaos into groups of chaos. The when there is so much chaos in one spot, you can get a star or a black hole! Both of which are chaotic at a microscopic and macroscopic level.”

Mr. Comet smiled. Though, inside he was feeling slightly hurt because he’s going to have to do something he would rather now. “Know what? I like that. A mass of swirling chaos. I’ll think about that.” He pauses “Turn to page 2 and begin reading.”

That’s what the class did for the rest of the period.

At the end of the day: Ben, Nick, and Seth went to the boy’s locker room and waited for the coaches to come out and tell them what to do.

While waiting, they were spotted. A group of young adults saw The 3. “Hey… are those seniors? I never saw them before.” These kids were 18yo seniors. They were for the most part 6ft 5in and heavily built. Almost as big and Nick, but not quite. Nick was short, so it made him look bigger. Kind of like Seth as well. Ben on the other hand looked well balanced. A jack of all trades, or in this case, a jack of all sports. Tall, lean, and muscular.

One of the seniors “You three! What year are you guys?”

Ben turned and face them “Freshmen. You guys are seniors?”

The seniors were shocked. These freshmen were giants! “No way! You guys are to huge to be freshmen!”

Nick laughed “We get that a lot. We’ll make it quick. You can believe us or not. Its up to you.”

The seniors were still shocked. Then the biggest (the alpha male) felt as though his authority might me over turned if he didn’t show these newbies who’s the boss. His name is Ralph.

Ralph “Ok. I’m captain letting you three know. We follow my rules. Understood?” As though to make his point clear, he puffed out his chest and tried to stare down at the three. He was 6ft 5.5in, so he some could looked down of Seth and Nick, but Ben was a different story.

Ben frowned. He new that Ralph was creating authority through intimidation, but that wouldn’t work on Ben. If he wants respect, he’ll have to earn it. However, Ben would play along for now. “Sure. It was kind of expected since you have more experience. Also… can you get your face out of my face. I kind of have a feeling that you’re trying to intimidate me. Not working just to let you know. Show me through your actions.”
Ralph was confused. This freshmen had some nerve! He gave Ben a glare, and brushed off Ben’s ‘lecture’. Ralph had been using intimidation for years, and it has never failed him. He gave Ben a glare. Ralph made a silent vow to get Ben off the team, and if not that, then have he become a bench warmer or water boy.

Ben had a feeling that Ralph was the reason the team lost so much. He was a horrible captain!

At this time, the coach came out.

Mr. Tuff and Mr. Buff were the coaches, and they were both on the strong and heavy side.

Tuff whispered to Buff a few words and phrases. Buff looked over the Ben, Nick, and Seth and was shocked as he heard Tuff’s words. He whispered “Seriously? They’re freshmen? 400lbs? 20reps? God!”

Buff smiled. This could be our turn around. Everything we’ve been looking for! “Ok. We’re starting off with agility exercises. You know.. The tires and what now. Did everyone put on a uniform?”

There was a few mutters “Yes. We have…”

Buff “Ok. Out into the field. Sprint there!”

Everyone began to run as fast as they could out into the fields. Ralph somewhere in the middle, so he pushed and shoved his way to the front. When he got there, he sprinted even faster. He planned on being the first in the field.

Ben had other ideas. Ralph should be more humble, so Ben would help with that.

Ralph was feeling the pump of his heart as he ran and enjoyed being the top dog. Suddenly, he heard a thudding of feet right next to him. He looked to his right and saw that newby running right next to him like it was no big deal. Ralph picked up the speed in an attempt to breeze past Ben, but Ben had anticipated that. Ben picked up the speed and went even faster. Soon he was whizzing past Ralph. By the time Ralph had gotten onto the field, his face was red from exertion. He’d never ran like that before. He’d always been able to take it relatively easy. Ben on the other hand was already stretching and looked totally fine. As though that wasn’t to hard of a run.

Buff look from far off and had seen his top dog racing the new kid. He turned to Tuff “Did you see that! That kid has speed.”

Tuff nodded “Told you. He could be the next quarterback. I don’t know how Ralph would feel about that though. He’s… well… you know.”

Buff “He’s used to be good in sportsmanship. Maybe this will be a good wake up call.”

Tuff “Yah…” That he pointed out “We should get down that. The other boys are almost there.”

They get in a gold cart and drive down to the field.

Buff “Everyone! Make two lined. Ben and Ralph in the front!”

Ben and Ralph stood in front of the tires and waiting for the call to be told to go. Ralph had caught his breath and was sneering at Ben. He was hating Ben more and more.

Buff “GO!”

Ben and Ralph stuck their feet in the first tire. Then the next… etc. They were an even match at first. Ben had to go a little slow that usual, but he quickly understood the footwork and went faster. He started to gain a lead ahead of Ralph. Ralph saw this and began to speed up. Then suddenly, he tripped since he wasn’t used to this new speed.

By the time he got up, Ben was already done. He grumbled and finished his course.

Buff was astonished again! “Tuff. It wasn’t just me who saw that right?”

Tuff shook his head “No… he’s amazing. I tell you! He’ll bring us to nationals.”

Buff got the other players to do their course. He had gotten a bit of interest in Nick and Seth, but he was focused on Ben and Ralph.

Buff “Next is agility. How fast can you move around something? Ralph! You’re up first.”

Ralph smiled inwardly. This was his forte. He waited for the go, and went. He dodged around the cones in record time, and waited in the other side. He looked at Ben smirking. As though he were saying: “Beat that!”

Ben looked at Ralph with a monotone expression.

Buff “Ben. you’re up.” Buff watched Ben attentively. He was thinking “Surprise me…”

Ben got up and began to dodge around the cones beyond record time. He tall, but balanced body was easy to maneuver. Plus the fact that Ben has been training his body to the point that he understood it to near perfection. He new just how to move it so it was would always be balanced and fast.

When he got to the other side, Ralph was dumbstruck. How????

Buff was of similar reaction, but it was more joyful, and not angered like Ralph. Buff got the others to finish. “Next is throwing! Each of you will throw this as far as possible, and we will also be testing for catching performance.”

Buff handed Ben a football and had prepared himself for something.

Ben took the ball and threw it. It whizzed though the air. As soon as the ball left his hands, Ben ran as hard as he could and he some how maintained a speed faster that the ball he through. Then he caught it! And at the border of the field to boot!

Buff and Tuff was awestruck. Tuff had expected his to throw it far. Not far and also catching it! Buff was of same opinion. Buff got everyone else to go. When Ralph went up, he through as hard has he could and attempted to go and catch it, but missed by mere inches.

Buff was getting anxious “Finally, tackling! Push the other as far back as possible. Ralph and Ben. You’re up first.”

Ralph and Ben were of relatively the same height, but differing sizes. Ralph was more like Nick. Really big and bulky, so that was one of his advantages. He had to exploit it. I fell sorry for him.

They ran at each other as fast as they could. Then they collided.

There was a loud and defined cracking sound upon impact.

Ralph blacked out.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Observation

choices: Everything blacks out. Where'd they go?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ralph woke up to see himself in a white room. He looked to his right and saw a view of a city.

A voice “Oh goody. You’re up.”

Ralph was a little groggy, so he thought he was dreaming “Who are you?…?”

Voice “That doesn’t matter yet. Lets just call me your fairy god father.”

Ralph “Huh???” Ralph tried looking around for the source of the voice, but everything started to get blurry. The last thing he heard was: nighty night… sleep tight.

Back at school, its been about a week since Ralph had gone unconscious from ramming into Ben.

After Ben the incident, Ben was really sorry. He had forget how dense he was. He got picked Ralph up and ran him to the nearest hospital. By the time he got there, the ambulance was just leaving. They saw Ben with Ralph and rush him into the ER.

Now, at school, everyone was talking about Ben and how good he was tryouts. However, there was always that shroud of doubt about whether he had intentionally hurt Ralph.

Some kid yelled to Ben “Why did you do it?”

Ben “What do you mean.”

Kid “Were you mad at him? Gave him a punch no one could see? I doubt a big kid like him could have been hurt by you. Since you are smaller.”

Ben sighed “I wasn’t mad. It just happened that way. You know as well as I do that I don’t resort to something as low as hurting someone else with anger.”

Kid seemed slightly chastised, but he still had a lingering doubt.

Amy walked up to Ben “Its alright. It’ll blow over.”

Suddenly, the front doors opened and a kid walked down the hall.

Ben “Ralph. You back. How’re your ribs?”

Ralph smiled cockily “Very good actually. Good as new. No thanks to you.”

Ben scratched the back of his head “Yah… sorry about that. I guess I should have distributed the force of the impact a little more.”

Ralph laughed “You know what? Its ok. I’m in a good mood.”

Ben was a little surprised “That’s good to hear. You got better pretty quickly. It usually takes people a month or two.”

Ralph smiled “Its in the family. We just heal quickly.”

Ben smiled a sincere smile and raised his arm to shake hands. “We’re cool right?”

Ralph smiled an inner smiled. He snapped his fingers and there was a black spark. “We’re cool.” He went to shake Ben’s hand.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: A week later.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Amy saw the spark “Ben! No!” She started to run towards them. Time seemed to slow down.

Ben heard this and turned toward Amy and hesitated.

Ralph glared at Amy and made a grab at Ben’s hand. Suddenly, his hand was enveloped in white light.

Amy was shaking from fear and shock at what she just did. It seemed like impulse to her. She had only one goal and it was to keep Ben safe, but she couldn’t get there in time. So her mana did it for her. “Ben. Get away!”

Ralph was furious at Amy. He resisted the mana as best he could. The voice had given him this power for one purpose, and he intended to use it.

-flash back-

In his dream while at the hospital.

Ralph was standing in a dark landscape surrounded by darkness. It was lit by darkness and only darkness. “Where am I”

The voice “Welcome. This is our home and your world. Please sit down.”

Ralph was very confused, and tried to make sense of things “Sit? Where?”

Voice “Anywhere. You can just make a chair if you want to. Think about it.”

Ralph was getting more confused, but he could feel his temper rising “Are you messing with me? I can’t make a frigin chair appear out of no where.” As he spoke, he felt the darkness in the air compress into a form. Then a chair appeared. “What just happened!”

Voice “We told you. This is your world. We have been waiting for you for a long time.”

Ralph “What are you talking about?”

Voice “This is one of the last sanctuaries the ‘green’ has not yet touched. We fear that it will be consumed some day.”

Ralph “So? What does this have to do with me?”

Voice “Its your home as well! Your soul has been here since its creation. You vanished a millennia ago and we have waited for your return. We had lost hope for a few years when he felt the “green” on the boundaries of our world. If this world if gone, then all is lost for us.”

Ralph “What do you mean us?”

The voice suddenly changed. It became louder and it seemed like there were more of them.

Voices “Us…”

Ralph panicked slightly “Where! I can’t see you!”

Suddenly, all the shadows in the world appeared to peal off the walls of the universe and its objects. The shadows came together to form various humanoid shapes. “Us…”

Ralph looked at them. They went as far as the eye couldn’t see. They embodied emptiness and lack of light. They were a void. However, Ralph felt a connection to them. As though they were a long lost friend.

The shadows “Please… help us, and we will help you…” Their voices were as hollow as before, they seemed more pleading.

Ralph froze where he stood, and for some unknown reason he said “Ok… I will help you.”

There was a silent wind that rushed over the world. It charged at Ralph and entered his body.

Ralph felt like every molecule in his body was being charge with energy. Enough to extinguish the sun and more. Then it stopped.

The voices “That is out power… you it and save us…….” The sound echoed in the back of his mind and then he had woken up.

-end of flashback-

Ralph wouldn’t lose. He had the power to destroy. It undo the making of things. He can do this. He focus his power on the white light attempting to end its existence.

Amy felt a sudden drain on his mana. The heartstone around her neck began to glow brighter and brighter. “Ben get away! He has some magic too!”

Ben heard this and regained his composure from the shock, and started to back away.

Suddenly, the light on Ralph’s hand went from white to black. The heartstone around Amy’s neck stopped glowing and became a dull stone. Ben felt his strength being sapped as the heartstone tried to recover.

Ralph turned his attention to Amy “You! How did you do that!” Ralph’s face twisted in fury. His hated being humiliated. And he hated everything in general. His family, friends, and even people he didn’t know. Animals… plants… rocks… everything is inferior to him and no one defies him.

Ralph made his way to Amy, and Amy froze. He hearthstone was cold to on he neck. She looked at Ben and saw that he was on the ground nearly unconscious. The stone had drained to much of his energy to sustain the spell.

Amy “What did you do… with your hand? What‘s on it?”

Ralph stopped and smiled. He raised his hand and looked at it “Nothing… absolutely nothing.” He laughed as though he made the funniest joke in the world.

Amy felt the air grow colder as that evil darkness on Ralph’s hand sucked up the warmth from the air.

Ben looked at Ralph in total fear. He saw Amy shuddering from the cold and suddenly, Ben’s anger flared. He was out of energy… and he knew it, but nothing could stop him from doing everything he could to save Amy.

Amy lay where she was shuddering from the strange presence. Then suddenly, everything seemed warmer and more comforting. He looked at her heart stone, and saw a tiny glow at the center. She looked at Ben and saw his eyes filled with fear and hate, but most of all was a piercing will to protect. She saw Ben mouthing the words… “Run! Run… please…” then his eyes started to get all teary as he cried.

Ralph smiled “I think I’ll get rid of you. I don’t like people who oppose me. No… now at all. Since this place is mine now…” He began to reach for Amy when he saw her mouthing strange words. “Wait… what are you doing? Stop it.”

Amy was frantic. She was doing something she didn’t want to do. The hearthstone was making her mouth words she didn’t want to say. It was not listening to her, but instead, it was listening to Ben’s will. Ben want it to protect Amy it all cost, and that’s what it was doing. It was forcing Amy to teleport away… to some place.

Amy looked at Ben longingly and she began to cry. Ben and Amy were connecting through their eyes and their minds. Ben mouthed “Be safe… don’t come back.”

Amy looked at him “Stop it… please. Let me stay…” then there was a bright light and she vanished.

Ralph covered his eyes from the light. When they cleared, she was gone. He let out a yell of fury.

The last thing Ben saw was the light and he knew Amy was some place safe. At least for now. Then he went unconscious.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Someone intercepts the shake.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Then suddenly, there were yells of fear. Everyone in the school had frozen in place out of fear of the evil presence. When the white light passed over them, they were cured of the feeling. At least temporarily. They ran away from the source as fast as they could.

Well… except Nick and Seth. They had just arrived to see a knocked out Ben and Ralph with a hand covered in a dark aura. Then there was a purple light and Gwen appeared.

Ralph turned his attention to them. He was still fuming from the escape of his first target. Then he saw Nick, Seth, and Gwen. He smiled… They will have to do. He began walking towards them, but before he could even get close, he saw Gwen chanting words similar to what Amy said. “No! Stop talking. You’re not going anywhere.” Ralph began to charge at the three. Nick and Seth saw that and made a run for it. They had a feeling that they should not be touched by the black light. Nick grabbed Gwen and ran away. Seth dashed around Ralph to get Ben, but stopped. He couldn’t get around Ralph. He was just to fast.

Gwen had stopped chanting when she saw Seth running for Ben. She began to chant faster. She planned on teleporting everyone out, but in her haste, she forgot Ben.

There was a flash of purple and they were gone.

Someplace near by, Mr. comet was laughing. He pulled out the screen. “Master… your underlings have seduced the ‘Voyde’ to join us (Voyde Rhythms with Void). You plan worked perfectly. Ben is unconscious. Should we proceed to make contact?”

The shadowy figure in the screen chuckled a hollow chuckle. “Patience. We will wait a little longer. We must test the resilience of out latest ‘Voyde’. Keep an eye on him.”

Comet “Yes Master. I shall.”

Shadow “Make contact as soon as the best opportunity reveals itself. I’ll let you be the judge of that.”

Comet “Yes master.” With that, the screen went black.”

Back with Ralph and Ben.

Ralph had started ripping the school apart by punching it and tearing at it in his anger. The dark glow on his hand began to work its way around his body until everything he touched began to dissolve into nothingness. After a moment, he calmed down and the glow faded away. He turned to look at Ben and he walked up close. “Funny… you’re the unconscious one now…” He tried to call up his power again, but it didn’t come. Then suddenly, a wave of exhaustion washed over him. And he fell asleep.

Ralph got up with a jolt. His whole body sore as though he had done every known exercise known to man. Even the muscles in his eye lids were sore. He tired sitting up. A hand pushed him down. He snapped his eyes open in anger. Who dares to touch him.

A human voice said “Take it easy. you’re recovering from the effects of your power.”

Ralph was astonished. “What do you know about my powers?”

Voice “More than you think. Any how. I’m Mr. Comet, the astronomy teacher hear at this school. Though, I think its on lockdown till further notice.”

Ralph was getting more confused “Ok… Mr. Comet. Care to elaborate on my powers?”

Comet “Well… they can destroy things basically, but you already knew that. You want to know something new. Am I right?”

Ralph “Well dah…”

Comet laughed a little “Watch your tongue. There are forces in act that could kill something as insolent as a little misconduct.”

Ralph scoffed “Nothing is stronger that me. I look down on everything, and everything must look up to me.”

Comet sighed “That’s not true at all. Ben is stronger that you… the only reason he was defeated yesterday was because his true strength is sealed. He presence could eradicate you power in an instant.”

Ralph was to proud to accept that “I doubt it. He’s just a normal kid.”

Comet sighed “Really? Do you remember getting knocked out be Ben when you two collided? That was just a fraction of his strength. His body is beyond infinitely dense. And his strength is ever growing. The only reason the universe isn’t consumed by his strength is because he has chosen to suppress his strength. That necklace around his neck is made of Gravitum, a strange metal that has limitless possibilities.”

Ralph couldn’t believe the things he was hearing. “Then I’ll get rid of him now while I still can.”

Comet sighed again and shook his head “I doubt you could. You power was able to bring Ben’s energy to a low level because he was using it to defend Amy. Then even that was gone. That was his ‘active energy’. the energy he can use for what ever purpose. Though, he has little control over it, so he used that girl’s hearthstone to send her somewhere safe. His dormant energy is still on his and waiting to be used. That energy could eradicate your power. I doubt it will let you kill him.”

Ralph “Than what do I do? And where is he?”

Comet chuckled “He’s sealed away somewhere. I don’t think he’ll go anywhere for a while. That’s the only thing we can do.”

Ralph was wallowing in his anger. How can it be that he’s stronger than me? I tore this school apart just by touching it. Suddenly, his hand developed a dark shadow, and the ground below It began to dissolve.

Comet watched it “Be careful. You don’t want your power to consume you.”

Ralph “What do you mean?” the aura around his hand vanished.

Comet “You are not trained enough to use your power like you had earlier. Luckily I had a few spells that kept it at bay or else you’d be dead. When you have to proper training, you can use it to an unlimited extent.”

Ralph smiled “What training? And when do I start?”

Comet smiled “Now…”

What happens next?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets follow Ben.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben was in the back of his mind. He was running as fast as his limbs could carry him. He was running from the darkness that was slowly consuming his mind. Everywhere, lights were being extinguished. He ran until he got to the back of his mind where he saw the door to his universe. It was glowing a bright green the covered a decent area of his mind. As he stepped up to hit, he felt the darkness fade away. He raised an arm to open the door. When he tried to turn the knob, it wouldn’t turn. “Why won’t you open?”

Ben hadn’t entered his world in a long time, so he had never noticed that the medallion had changed once again. He couldn’t even get in if he tried.

Then something caught his eye. He looked to the side and saw the shadows coming. Suddenly they stopped. It seemed like they had hit a wall. The light from the door was repelling the shadows.

Ben huddle closer to the door in order to get away from the shadows. He Hasn’t felt afraid like this in a long while.

Then a crack began to from in the shield of light. It slow grew along with Ben’s fears.

Back with Amy:

Amy had teleported out away from there and appeared somewhere in the future. She popped up next to Gwen in a flash of white light.

Gwen “Oh god! You’re ok.” Then she saw Amy‘s face. “You’re not ok…”

Amy fell to her knees crying. Even though Ben and Amy had agreed to be friend for now, these were the tears of a lost love.

Nick felt a heavy weight on his chest when he saw someone crying. It was even heavier since he know this person. “Amy. Ben’s a tough guy. He can take care of himself. Trust me.” Nick said it with more confidence that he had for himself.

Seth “Seriously. I think he’s getting away right now. He won’t lose so easily.”

Amy paused and then cried some more.

Nick “What’s wrong now?”

Amy said quietly “His strength is still sealed, and he can’t even get the dang medallion off!” he voice was full of anger and resentment towards Ralph, but it had a back drop of fear and hopelessness.

Gwen coughed to get her attention “Who are you?”

Amy “Huh?”

Gwen “I said who are you? Describe yourself.”

Amy stopped crying as she though. She was kind of confused. “I’m a 14 year old girl who has most likely lost one of the most important people in her life. I am a scared and fearful little girl who can’t even help get that person back. I’m a nobody.”

Then suddenly, Gwen stomped he foot down “Lies! You are a strong 14 yo girl who stands for what she thinks is right and won’t back down. She loves life and wants to protect it. She never gives up, but she can be dissuaded like she is right now. Hopelessness is and illusion to her and she must brush it aside. Now tell me. Who are you?”

Amy paused as Gwen’s words sunk in. “I am Amy. I am a person who loves Ben and a person who will get him back. I am a person who also thanks Gwen for getting her off her feet.” Amy smiled as she stood up. “Thank you.”

Gwen did a thing with her eyes. “It was nothing… You’re just easy to manipulate. Anyone who is connect to Ben is easy to manipulate.”

Amy lashed out “What’s does that make you?”

Gwen smiled “A regular person. I’m and exception to the rule.”

Amy laughed a hopeful laugh. It was full of confidence and joy at the prospect of saving Ben. The sound filled Seth and Nick with joy, and it gave Gwen a bit of satisfaction. Then she got serious “Lets make a plan.”

Back with Ralph.

Ralph let out a yell of pain. Comet was chanting a series of words that were meant to heal and repair. Ralph had just lost control of his powers again and it had backfired on him. There was a hole in his gut right now that was slowly getting smaller.

Comet “Done. Good as new.”

Ralph was panting from exhaustion. His body had calmed down, and the pain slowly subsided. He had just tried to direct his powers as certain things like he was shooting a gun. However, it didn’t quite work. Comet said it was possible, but it takes practice.

Ralph decided to take a break and learn a little more about himself “What am I?”

Comet smiled “You are the last ‘Voyde” That lives. You’re race has slow vanished upon the creation of the universe.”

Ralph “What do you mean?”

Comet “Before the creation of the universe, there was nothing. Its not like the nothingness of space. The ‘emptiness’ in space is ‘something’. I talking about true nothingness. Something indescribable. In this nothing, there was one being. One day, this one thing separates into countless beings. These this were made of the ‘nothingness’. They are called the ‘Voyde’. At the same time, the universe was created. The voyde were scattered all throughout it. Ever since, your numbers have dwindled to one. That is you. The shadows of the place you went to were the spirits of the voyde.”

Ralph was dumbstruck, but this didn’t stop him from being surprised: “Seriously? That’s frigin awesome!”

Comet smiled “Yes… it is awesome.”

Ralph then got curious “Who are you?”

Comet froze “I am nobody. Just an dispensable human life.”

Ralph froze “Then how do you know so much?”

Comet smiled “You will learn the answer to that later on.”

Ralph sighed “You know what? I really hate it when adults keep things from me. I’ll make you an exception. At least for now.”

Comet laughed “That’s good to know.”

Ralph “Ok. Think I’m good to go. Lets try that gun exercise again.”

They get up and Ralph managed to dissolve a chair from far away.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets check on Ben.

choices: The gang arrives ready to fight.
Ralph somehow gets into Ben's mind.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Its been a month in Ben’s mind and in the real world.

The shield of light had shattered 5 times. Each time, another shield formed, but it was smaller. Each time, the shadowy darkness got closer.

Outside, Ralph had finished his ‘training’.

Ralph turned and faced the school. He held out his hand and imagined it dissolving upon itself. Suddenly, the school groaned as it collapsed and melted into nothing.

Ralph smiled. The action had not tired him at all.

Comet “Good job! You did better than the last Voyde that I trained.”

Ralph smiled in self pride “Thanks. I fell like I could take on the world.”

Comet smiled, but then his face grew serious “I warn you. I understand your confidence, but do no approach Ben. I know that you know where he is, and that you have tried to contact him. Trust me. The seal I put on him will not be broken. Not even by you.”

Ralph frowned “Is that a challenge?” He raised his hand and it glowed a black aura.”

Comet frowned “No. Also, it isn’t powered by me, but by a greater force. It has the same power as you, and even more.”

Ralph frowned now “Why is it that everyone is stronger than me? Ben’s stronger, and this thing you’re talking about is stronger. How can I get stronger then both of them?”

Comet sighed “I don’t know the answer to that.”

Then an idea crossed Ralph’s mind “You’re just stopping me. I bet you’re just keeping me from my true strength. I bet I could beat Ben right here and now.” He raised his glowing hand for emphasis.

Comet paused for a moment. He pulled out the screen “Master. The boy is resilient. Should we let him?”

A voice said “He is no used to us if this continues. He is of no use right now as well. Let him dispose of himself if he wishes.”

Comet sighed “Yes master. I really thought he would be the one to turn the universe back on its self. To return you to your former glory.”

The voice “I’ve lived a long life. Eternal actually. I have reconciled myself to my limits. I will endure if I must.”

Comet “Very well master. I will let the boy go.” with that, the transmission ended.

Comet “Your making your own grave. Have fun.” With that, Comet left Ralph alone.

Ralph smiled to himself. Free at last from the nagging old man. Ralph snapped his finger, and a dark hole appeared. He walked through into his universe.

He proceeded toward the center of the dark world. There, Ben was floating in a dark sphere made from the ghosts of deceased “Voydes”. They were attacking his mind with their dark powers.

Ralph smiled “Enough! Let him go.” He waited for something to happen, but nothing did. “Let him go or else…” Ralph snapped his fingers and a hazy ball of black energy appeared. Still… nothing happened. Ralph had a enough. He through the ball at the prison, and the ball vanished. As though it had no effect. “Huh?”

Ralph tried a few more, but nothing happened. “Why Won’t you break!” Then he proceeded to though dozens of giant balls of emptiness at the prison. Ralph stopped once he became to tired to continue. He floated in space and tried to think of a way to get the prison to open.

Back outside, the gang had been preparing for that month, a plan to get Ben out. It was relatively simple. They had to find him first, and then simply transport him here. If that didn’t work, they would try something else.

Gwen “Ok… lets try to find him. We can use a spell to do that.” Gwen began to chant a series of strange words. Slowly, a ball appeared in mid air. It showed Ben , but that was it. Everything around him was black. Total darkness..”

Amy “Why is everything dark? Is he ok?” Amy walked up to the ball and tried to touch Ben, but her hand just passed through the image. “I’ll get you soon. Just wait.”

Nick “Can we get to where he is?”

Gwen “I think so. We should be able to. We just need to be sure we can get him out. Getting in and getting out are two different things. One might be easier than the other.”

Nick “Ok… we’ll get in where?”

Gwen sighed “I don’t know.”

Seth “Then what are we waiting for? I doubt we’ll learn anything new. Even gramps said he doesn’t know where Ben is. The plumber badge isn’t responding.”

Everyone looked at Amy since this affects her the most “Should we go?”

Amy looked down as she thought. “Yes… I don’t think we’ll gain any new insight, so we’ll just have to place our bets on this one attempt. Everything we’ve got.”

Gwen liked it when Amy was like this. Her confidence was contagious.

In the dark world, Ralph had just thought of a possible way of getting Ben free. If he couldn’t get Ben loose, then maybe Ben can…

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ralph comes up to Ben.

choices: Ben and the gang meet up.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Amy and Gwen began to chant as they tried to teleport to Ben. The gang vanished in a flash white and purple light.

They reappeared in the dark universe in a flash or purple and white light. Suddenly, the light that was made was destroyed.

Back outside, the gang suddenly reappeared outside. It felt like they had ran into a wall.

Nick “What just happened?” He was holding his head from the head ache he just got. Everyone else was doing the same more or less.

Amy “It felt like we had gotten somewhere, but got kicked out.”

Gwen “I don’t know, but it must have a lot of mana to stop to mana wielders.”

Seth “So how do we get in?”

Gwen sighed “The same way he got in. Which is through Ralph I think.”

Amy frowned. She had developed a hate towards Ralph. She generally forgave people like she had for Nick and Seth, but now it involved Ben and not her. She can never forgive that. “Lets go then! I want to give him a piece of my mind!”

Nick “I second that. There’s no point waiting.”

Gwen “Ok. Lets give that another show.” Gwen began to chant this time and they appeared school, or where their school was.

Seth “Where are we?”

Suddenly, the air grew a little colder.

Ralph chuckled “This was our high school.”

Amy and Gwen were horrified. Everything was gone. The fields, the school, the ‘life’ that the area had was gone. It was just the soil now.

Ralph “Looks better now. Its not as crumby now.”

Amy “Are you mad! There’s nothing now. The school had character. It was old, but it had creativity. Things have existed in those halls. Joys, tears, stupidity, and brilliant ideas. You eradicated it all!”

Ralph laughed “I know! And I enjoyed every moment. No one could stop me.”

Amy “Really! How about now?” The hearthstone flared a brilliant white light as it responded to her emotions. Without words, she let loose a new level of mana never before seen. It came forward like a tsunami. It surged forward as a force that was newly made.

Ralph saw it coming towards him. His will faltered a moment, but he focused on his power again. He would do everything to prove that he was above everything. Nothing could beat him. He held out his hands and focused all his power in them to contain the force of the mana.

The wall of mana froze in his hands. It was like Yin and Yang. The two sides collided and formed distinct sides. There was a silent battle of will going on. Amy was letting loose all her frustration and anger of the last month in this wave. It was meant to destroy Ralph. Ralph was sweating from the exertion. The force of her spell was different from last time. He felt his hands straining and the darkness around them began to fade.

Then suddenly, the white light dissipated. The hearthstone stopped glowing.

Amy understood why it stopped. She had calmed down now and her head cleared a little. She realized she had become obsessed with getting rid of Ralph. Then moments ago, then when she realized her reasons, she lost the will to sustain the spell. She let is go and vanish. She felt guilty for her motives.

Ralph sagged a little as the spell vanished, but then he began to laugh. “See? Nothing can stop me. Not even Ben. I’ll deal with him shortly, but I have to get rid of you guys first. I think that will get him to fight.”

Amy was on her knees crying because she felt like she had turned into a monster.

Gwen had seen the destructive force behind Amy’s spell and was afraid of its force.

Nick and Seth watched the spell dissipate and were glad it was gone. Their bodies were shaking from fear of the intensity of the anger that the spell released.

Nick, Seth, and Gwen saw Amy on the ground crying and ran up to her.

Gwen “It’s ok. No one was hurt. You’re ok.” She said reassuringly to Amy.

Amy cried “But I almost killed someone! All because I hated him. Is that going to happen every time?”

Nick frowned “No. Pull yourself together. I’m just happy you remembered yourself. I thought we lost you. That you had been consumed by your hate.”

Seth just nodded in agreement. They said everything he wanted to say.

Then suddenly laughter filled the air.

Ralph “That’s funny. You… kill me…? That’s a good one. I’ll treat you guys.. I’ll make it quick.”

Inside Ben’s head, he was watching the whole thing through the hearthstone.

Ben was crying and screaming at Amy “Get away! Are you nuts.” But deep inside, he was glad that she was trying to save him from the darkness. But when he heard, “I’ll make it quick.”, he knew that Ralph wasn’t kidding. Ben felt his fear turning into rage. No one threatened his friends and got away with it. Especially if its toward Amy.

The darkness was a foot away from Ben, and the shield was about to crack. Ben had had enough of this fear. He stood up and got ready to attack it. Suddenly, as though responding to his sudden need to protect and fight, a key appeared. Ben had a feeling as to its purpose. He grabbed the key and stuffed it into the keyhole of the door. He turned the key and heard a loud shattering sound. The darkness had broken through. It surged forward a few inches until a new force stopped it. It was even greater than before. The darkness was repelled and shot out of Ben’s mind as brilliant green light flooded Ben’s mind.

Outside:

Ralph “… I’ll make it quick.” Then suddenly, Ralph felt a pang of pain. Something had gone wrong in his universe. He opened a portal to see it flooded with green light. “No!”

Then suddenly, Ralph stepped back as he got punched be an arm. Ben stepped out of the portal. “No one threatens my friends and gets away with it.”

Ralph laughed and wipe off a little blood on his cheek. “It worked. Now I can kill you. That prison was the only thing stopping me.”

Ben glared at Ralph “How are you going to do that?”

Ralph “Easy… you can’t even stop me because your power is sealed.”

Ben smirked “Really now?” Ben lifted his hand to his medallion and yanked. There was a clicking sound like when you force two magnets apart.

If you were looking at Ben, you would see that the air around Ben vibrate from the unsealing of his strength. Ben took a step, and the air moved with him.

Ralph took a step back as he caught Ben’s glare. It was like someone drove a sword through him. Then he regained his composure “Ha… is that all?”

Then as Ben’s strength began to peak, he developed a green glow around his body. It was the power of the orb and creation. He felt like the world had become nothing, but the orb told him that even the smallest thing have a life, and that it should be helped. That is the power of creation. Death is part of unmaking, and that wasn’t the orb’s job.

Ralph saw the glow and grew a little more fearful, but he let his cockiness take over again. He got into a running stance and a darkness enveloped is body.

Ben copied Ralph’s stance and got ready to run. Then they ran and tackled each other.

The aura around Ralph dissipated as Ben’s power overwhelmed it. Then following it was the sound of ribs cracking.

Ralph passed out.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: The gang arrives ready to fight.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ralph slowly woke up. He was in a white room. He looked around and saw a view of the city. Then he heard a voice.

Voice “Oh. You’re up. How are you feeling?”

Ralph made a grab for the source and he caught a t-shirt. He looked up to see Ben. “Oh… Its you.”

Ben scratched the back of his head. “Sorry about practice. I didn’t mean to crack your ribs.”

Ralph was getting confused “Huh?” Then he remembered the first time he came here. “Oh… its ok…” He was still confused and trying to get a hold of reality.

Ben “That’s good to hear because I thought you’d hate me.”

Ralph let out a pained chuckle. “Funny thing. I had a dream that I was trying to kill you.”

Ben laughed, and smiled “You did? That’s hilarious. You wouldn’t do that would you?”

Ralph paused “I wasn’t a dream was it…?”

Ben paused this time and left the room. He came back in a moment later and…

What did he say?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ralph wakes up.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben sighed “Yes… but know one else remembers. Its just you and me. I even got Amy to forget what happened along with everything else. It took a little time to get the memory eraser to work.”

Ralph paused “Why…”

Ben “Huh?”

Ralph “Why are you doing this?”

Ben “Everyone deserves a second chance.”

Ralph “But I tried to kill you and your friends!”

Ben smiled “That isn’t the first time something like that happened.”

Ralph “Huh?”

Ben “You know Nick and Seth right? They threatened Amy’s life, but she forgave them, and so did I. When you blacked out, I asked her ‘Do you forgive him?’ And she said “No… but I’ll give his a chance to earn it.”

Ralph was silent.

Ben felt that Ralph needed some time to think, so he made his way to the door.

Ralph said just before the door was closed “Thanks you…”

Ben smiled as the closed the door off.

The next day on the news, the anchorman said “Scientists have dictated that a series of strange solar flares have caused wide spread amnesia. A few things that were forgotten are that an earth quake had hit Bellwood and that only the high school had collapsed. Its had an old structural design that made it easy to collapse. Construction is said to begin shortly.” After that, the news just droned on.

Ben smiled “The plumbers are really good at their job.”

Through out the day, trucks upon trucks of supplies had come in. By the end of the day, there were enough supplies to build a couple sky scrapers.

Later that night, the supplies vanished.

The next day, a new structure stood where the old one was. It was a giant pentagon shape dome. With a smaller pentagon in the center. Surrounding the building were floating pentagonal platforms that orbited the school in a petal like formation. The school had the latest human technology, and a few very well hidden alien technology, and a few minute traces of gravitum. The school was surrounded by a large grass field, and paved with sleek solar panels protected by a stronger type of glass. The school’s exterior was made of solar panels as well along with the floating panels. If you looked closely, you could see even smaller panels orbiting the larger panels. The structure was similar to that of the middle school.

Ben walked up to the school and smiled contently.

The same day, a series of officials went and checked out the building for safety reasons. They muttered happily “It happened again!”

The next day, there was an announcement that told everyone to come to school.

There were groans since none of them remembered their time out of school, but that turned into excitement as they saw their new school. “It happened again!!!!!”

Every able teen body ran into the high school and explored like they had years ago with the elementary/middle school. Teachers who got their first were amazed and made a charge for the higher floors where their were more windows. All the rooms were made pretty much the same, but some had more access to the sun than others.

Ben heard a voice behind him.

Amy “It was you again! It looks beautiful.”

Ben “I don’t know what you’re talking about. This is new to me too.”

Amy groaned “Not that again. Fine… be that way.”

Ben smiled and they walked into school like it was the first day all over again.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: It happened.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ralph had gotten out of the hospital that morning and was psyched to see the new school. Its not half bad now he thought. He joined everyone else in their exploration of the school. Suddenly the they heard the announcements. “All sports will meet after school for practice as usual. That is all. Oh! And if you get lost, maps were are found posted all through out the school by our generous benefactor. Have a nice day.”

When the last bell rang, no one left. They all decided to stay and explored. Some left and came back with sleeping bags.

The football field was on of the floating platforms. All you had to do to go up was step into the platform’s shadow. If it felt that you wanted to go up, it would pull you up. If not, the shadow would pass right over you. Any how, everyone decided to go up to floating platform. Even those afraid of heights went up out of curiosity.

Mr. Tuff and Mr. Buff were already waiting in the middle of the field for their player to arrive.

Mr. Tuff “Change into your uniforms. Locker rooms are to the side of the field. Pick a uniform. One size fits all.”

All the players charge for a uniform and ran to the locker rooms to change.

When they got back out, they were wearing the best padding material in the universe. It would even protect you from a hit from Ben in his sealed state.

Mr. Buff “Ok. The positions are…” He lists a series of positions. “Quarterback is Ben Tennyson.” There was cheers from the bystanders.

Ralph stepped out of line and faced Ben. Everyone was silent.

Ralph smiled and raised his arm to shake hands “Good job. You deserve it.” Everyone was speechless as they waited for Ben. Ben smiled and they shook hands. They crowd sheered. The cocky Ralph they new had turned into a more humble person.

Out to the side the whole time was Mr. Comet.

Comet “Mr. Steen... Everything has gone as planned. Your son has made a dramatice change in character for the batter.”

The shadow on the screen cleared and turned into the shape of a man that had a few traits similar to Ralph. “Thank you. I appreciate the help.”

Comet smiled “No problem. What else is the first and last Voyde suppose to do? Things get boring, so this was a nice challenge. I was difficult making your son believe he had my powers, but I did it.”

Steen smiled “Thanks again. I should get…” In the back ground was a lady’s voice yelling “Honey! Dinner’s almost ready. Do you know where Ralph is?”

Comet smiled “You should tell her no students are ready to leave the school yet. I’ll get an automated phone call started.”

Steen “Thanks again. Have a nice day. Oh! And keep an eye on my son please. I don’t want him in any trouble. If he is, give me a call. Now… can you get rid of the disc. I don’t want it leading back to me.”

Comet smiled and snapped his fingers. The disc vanished. "Have a nice life little brother. I'll keep an eye on your son."

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Freshmen year was relatively stable for the rest of the school year. Nothing to new happened besides the fact that there was a new school.

That summer, Ben had gotten a relatively small growth spurt, but it was by no means small. He gain a big 3 in bringing him to a towering 6ft 9in tall. Impressive right?

Nick’s bone’s have slowed down on their growth, so he gained a generous 1in.

Seth had hit a major growth spurt bringing him eye level with Nick. Nick was kind of peeved about that, but he didn’t say anything.

The school as a whole was really fit. One of the healthiest in the country. This being because of the awesome gym the had gotten last year. Latest exercising equipment, etc.

Mr. Comet had stayed with the school without incident. He and Ralph had a little chat, and Ralph came out missing something from his mind.

When the year started back up, everyone was shocked by voices that got deeper, people who got taller, and other masculine things. With the women, they got their assets and other feminine things.

Ben had discovered during the summer that when he looked a Amy in a certain way, his 13in python with twitch a bit, but that was only if he was in the ‘mind set’. He would always mutter “We’re just friends… We’re just friends. I can wait…” He was practicing serious abstinence.

Nick had found another girlfriend over the summer, but she to moved on, so now he was going through his second heartbreak. That is until Gwen had enough of it.

On the first day of school, Seth was sitting by a fountain at the school moping and wallowing in depression. Gwen walked up to him.

Gwen “Nick! Get up. It’s a new year. Pull yourself together.”

Nick just mumbled something inaudible.

Gwen had had enough. She was tired of seeing her friends moping. Its been about 2 weeks. Gwen got closer and yanked his ear till he stood up and yelled at her.

Nick “What’s wrong with you!!!!”

Gwen retorted “Nothing. What’s wrong with you!”

Nick frowned “Everything! I lost my girl. Twice!” He held out two fingers for emphasis.

Gwen “So? What are you going to do about it?”

Nick paused and then smirked. He realized he kind of like Gwen. Most girls loved his muscle, but feared them as well. Gwen, however, was immune. “You know what I;m going to do?”

Gwen yelled “What!”

Nick “I’m going to ask you to come to the movies with me tonight.”

Gwen paused “Huh?” She wasn’t anticipating that.

Nick smiled and said really slowly “Will… you… come… to… the… movies… with… me…”

Gwen did her thinking face “Well… I don’t know. I have book club and then there’s karate class. I think I could squeeze you in at 7 next week.”

It was Nick’s turn to be surprised.

Gwen smiled “Then again… I could move the book club meeting to tomorrow. That should free me up at 7-ish.”

Nick smiled “7 o clock. Pick you up?”

Gwen smiled “I pick the movie though…”

Nick frowned “No chick flicks ok?”

Gwen “Sure… never been a big fan of those.”

With that, they walk into the school.

Its been a month, and they are still going strong.

Its near the end of October, and teachers are making the quarterly exams.

The gang: Ben, Amy, Nick, Gwen, Seth, and Ralph

They meet up at Gwen’s place to study for their exams.

Ben groaned “Curse Mr. Comet and his tad pole galaxy obsession!”

Amy smile “Well at least your teacher is enthusiastic about his subject. Mine’s like a fish out of water. Dead and monotone.”

Gwen “You and me both.”

Seth “Well… Nick, Ralph and I are doing awesome weight room. Solids A’s, and our quarterly is to lift as much as we dare lift. I’m cool with that.”

Ben laughed “I bet I could be all of you.”

Ralph “Are you kidding me? Did you get so tall you hit your head on the ceiling? I think you lost a few dozen IQ points.”

Ben smiled “You’re all just jealous of my height.”

Nick laughed “I know I am, but what are you going to do? Shoot my with calcium shots? I’ll die before getting as tall as you.”

Ben “Well. Being tall is a prop, but….”

Amy “Ben! Study! List the 30 largest galaxies in the universe!”

Ben frown and scrunched his forehead as he thought. “My universe or this universe?”

Amy laughed “This one. Now stop joking! This is serious. You’re doing good in all your classes, but you keep getting distracted.”

Gwen had gotten used to the consistent yelling and laughing. He mind blocked it out when she studied.

Nick saw Gwen and snuck up behind her. He quickly covered her eyes.

Gwen smiled “What’s the question?”

Nick “What are the major parts of the brain?”

Gwen and Nick have been playing this game for the past month. They have to sneak up on one another and cover the other’s eyes. They can’t let go until the other answers a question. They pretty much new everything about the other’s subject because they had done it so many times.

Gwen made a list of important things.

Nick smiled “Ok. You got them.” Nick uncovered her eyes.

Gwen “Thanks for helping me study.”

Nick “Ha! Its because I’m the only one who can. We spend so much time quizzing each other, I bet I could even Ace your test.”

Gwen “I could probably learn your subject if it wasn’t weight lifting. You had me quizzing you on all the muscle and how to train them! I could get a job as a weight trainer now!”

Nick and Gwen entertained each other for a while.

Seth and Ralph was happy for their friends, but slightly appalled by the idea of having to give up so much freedom. The reward can’t be that great. Can it?

Ben and Amy were declared friends, but they act like super close BFF’s. It was like they were in a relationship. Minus the kissing and mushy stuff. They shared everything though. Thoughts, ideas, and troubles.
This is going to be a quick year. Hopefully…

What happens from here?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets fastforward to next year.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
At the start of the year, Ben had decided to stop playing football (to the coaches dismay), and join crew.

What is crew you ask? It is a sport that involves boats that you row using oars. And they are not called “Canoes!” Just call them Boats.

The Coach’s name is Ms. Buoy. Though everyone calls her Trace since her first name was Tracey. She taught aquatic sciences. Anything about a water based life form of environment was her specialty.

Trace was surprised to see Ben, the school’s reigning sports champ, come in her room after school.

Trace smiled politely “Hello Ben. What brings you to the Room of Agua?”

Ben smiled. He heard a lot about this teacher. She was as friendly as can be, but she coached like the devil. “It’s a new year, so I thought I’d give another sport a shot. If you don’t mind having me on the crew team.”

Trace’s heart skipped a beat. Ben was like a cheat code if you put him in the right position. If he could learn to row properly, he could be the best rower in the state. Even the captain wouldn’t mind so much if Ben brought the team to the Head of the Charles Regatta. “Sure. We’re a little lacking on rowers, so we can take all the people we get.”

Ben “So do I meet you guys on the water platform?”

Each of the floating platforms were designed for different categories. There were the water sports like pool and crew, then track because of all the events, field sports like football and soccer, court sports like basket ball or tennis, and one for miscellaneous things like catch, or 3 legged races. Basically, the last one was for sports that weren’t as competitive nation wide.

Trace “Yah. Practice is at 3:00. Don’t be late.”

Ben “I won’t.”

After school, the whole crew team (about 14 people) were surprised when they saw Ben walking towards them. The water plat form had a series of pools, and its own river. The river was just a long loop that circled around the platform. The water even flowed for some unknown reason. It moved in a clockwise direction at a speed that can be controlled by a dial in the coaches office.

The captain, Zeke, was just as surprised as anyone. Zeke was 6ft 5in, with a strong but tight build. His muscles were built for endurance and power because that’s what is needed for crew. Height helps a little. Especially when trying to grab boats from higher racks.

Trace “Your here on time! Another minute, and you would have been sent home.”

Ben “Sorry about that. I took a little longer than I hoped the get Buff and Tuff off my tail. They really didn’t want to let me go. I don’t know why they are complaining. They have 2 of the largest kids on the state, and one of the best assistant coaches. Seth and Nick could probably take anyone down, and Ralph had graduated, but decided to stay to help the team out.”

Trace “Well. I think they were built for that sport. That’s just my opinion. However! That’s not about crew! Everyone go change quickly. Ben… grab a uniform on the way in.” She told him where to find a set of spandex shorts his size, and a T-shirt.

When he got in the locker room, he saw the boy 9 boys of the team changing quickly into their uniforms.

Zeke had the most balance and athletic appearance in the room (besides Ben).

Zeke smiled cheerfully at Ben “What brings you to the crew team?”

Ben “I just wanted to try something new.”

Zeke “That’s good to hear. We can get as many people as possible. You can see that right?”

Ben “Yah… I can see that alright.”

Zeke “Well. Its good that you joined. If you’re good enough, you might make the Charles. That is… if we get a slot. We barely managed to get in last year. Since some of our players don’t know how to put 110% in their rowing. Well see you by the river.” He patted Ben on the back and made his way out of the locker room.

The other boys were relatively average. 5ft 7in to 5ft 10in in height, and similar builds. It was apparent that their only physical activity was crew. They didn’t even visit the weight room. Ben thought about helping the team out a bit. Their muscles were apparent, but nowhere near Zeke’s build. It was clear he was a devoted rower, and did everything he could to get where he was today.

The boys quickly finished changing and filed out. Ben did the same as soon as he finished.

Up top, Ben saw the boys running laps and warming up. Ben had long ago discovered that he didn’t need to stretch or warm up. His body was changed so that it was always ready for peak performance. That doesn’t mean he won’t get tired. He can, but slower since he was built for power and endurance.

Trace “Ben. Zeke is going to show you how to row. There are certain forms you have to follow. Follow Zeke and he’ll show you.”

Ben walked up to Zeke and saw his standing next to an machine he never saw before.

Zeke “This thing is a rowing machine, or what we call an Erge. It helps train your body and simulates rowing.”

Ben “Ok… so what do I do?”

Zeke told Ben to sit on the seat and push or the foot stretcher. The he showed Ben the various positions. The catch, pushing off, the lean back, finish, punch out, lean forward, slide, and repeat.

Ben muttered the steps and did it a few time till he got a the hang of it. He took it nice and slow as he memorized the forms.

Zeke “There we go. You’re a natural. Now add some power.”

Ben pushed off the stretcher. There was the sound of a chain snapping and Ben flying back a couple yards. He landed with a thud.

Zeke’s mouth hung open “To much power there. Lets get you on a boat. Try not to break an oar. They’re very expensive.” Zeke lead the way to a boat with a slightly happier hop to his step.

Ben was just curious as to how good or bad he’d be at this sport. When he got to the other rowers, they eyed him curiously. Who was he taking the place of? Since this was an 8 boat (made of 8 rowers, and a 1 coxswain). Someone would have to opt out of rowing today in order to let Ben row.

Trace came over “Mark. You’re off the hook today. You can go home if you want.”

Mark was a relatively average kid except for his brains and extreme devotion to crew. “Why me! can’t you take Kent out?”

Trace sighed and thought about it “I want him to try your seat for today. Just to see where he fits in. don’t take it personally. I want him as 7th seat today so he can follow along more easily.”

Mark protested a little more, but stopped when Trace threatened to kick him off the team. He left muttering silent curses at Ben.

Ben watched Mark leave and felt a little sorry.

Trace “Oars across! One foot down. And down! Count up from bow when ready!”

They went through various drills to see Ben’s strengths and weaknesses. It appeared that his only weakness is using to much strength. He nearly snapped the oar 3 times. He was currently on starboard side, to the boat would turn to port when ever he pushed off the foot stretcher.

Trace “Ben! Power down! You’ll tip the boat!”

It was to late though, Ben had already executed the stroke, and the boat tipped to one side and flipped.

Everyone started to freely float as they tried to organize themselves.

Trace sighed. Ben might be more trouble than they hoped for. “Ok… lets get the boat back to the dock.”

Everyone glared at Ben at first, but they al started laughing as they went back. They started to splash each other, etc. Tracy was on her motor boat watching them mess around. She just smiled and let them have their fun as long as they made progress towards to dock.

When the get there, they get the boat out, etc.

Zeke got on land and lets out a sigh of satisfaction “Haven’t had that much fun in a while.”

Everyone soon joined him and they lay around in a circle looking up at the sky. Watching the clouds pass by as the sun went down.

Tracy “So… I need comments on how practice went today. And some feed back on Ben.”

They all agreed that this was a fun start to the season, and that Ben would make a nice contribution to the team.

Off to the side watching with jealousy was Mark. “Why couldn’t I be the one to flip the boat.” He continued to mutter and think unhappy thoughts.

What happens now?
