1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The next day after school, everyone met up again for practice.

Tracy “Alright. Yesterday was a little hectic. Lets try not to flip a boat today.” She gives a look at Ben.

Ben smiled and so did everyone else. Someone even let out a snort and got everyone laughing. All except Mark.

Tracey “Ok. Everyone in go warm up! We’re doing ab workout today. Then you’re in for a surprise.”

Some people groaned. They didn’t like Tracey’s surprises, but they went a long with it. Ben took it relatively easy on the warm-up since he was always ready for any physical activity. When everyone was all stretched out, Tracey had them get in position.

30 minutes later.

Everyone looked like they had taken a shower. They were soaked in sweat and laying on the ground exhausted. Even Ben was having a hard time pulling himself together.

Tracey had a monotone expression “Ok. Take a 5 minute break. Stretch it out. Be back before then.”

Some kids picked themselves off the floor and started walking off the tension in their body. Ben got up and did a quick walk/stretch, and then came back.

Zeke did something similar, but he took a little longer to recover, but not to much.

Mark came back last, and just on time too!

Tracey smiled “Who’s ready for their surprise!” She did it with a straightforward, but happy tone. All the kids groaned except Ben. He didn’t know what to expect, but he knew it had to be bad. “5K!” (short for urging 5000 meters on a rowing machine, aka. an erg.)

Ben tried to be optimistic “It can’t be that bad right?”

Zeke laughed “The 5K is relatively standard. Its how to finish it that matters. The harder you row, the faster you finish. It usually takes 20 minutes if you row at a perfect 2 min per 500m split. My fastest time was 18minutes on the erg. The others have a range of 21-23 minutes. The lowest is 25 min.”

Ben “I see…”

Tracey clapped her hands for their attention “Ok. Everyone on an erg!”

Everyone got on an erg and strapped their feet in. They set the machine for 5000 meters.

Tracey “Begin!”

There were the sounds of whirling fans as the rowers pulled on the handle and chain.

Every 500m, Tracey called out a power 10 (ten strokes of power). Some kids let out yells and grunts. Some counted out loud as they did their power 10.

Zeke and Ben were started at a crazy 1min 45sec slip and maintained it for the first 2500m. Then after that, they slowly died down to a 1min 50sec split. The last 500m went by quickly. They rowed as hard as possible and got the split down to a 1min 30sec. They finished at 17min 35sec.

Tracey was screaming at them at the end to row harder. When they were done, she smiled “Go get a drink of water. Then she said to Zeke. You work better with competition.” She gave then a pat on the head and walked to scream at the other rowers.

Zeke did a light chuckle, but stopped. He was sore from the exertion. “Good job… for a newbie.” He smiled.

Ben let out a short laugh “Good one.” He felt the soreness in his muscles “Is it always this strenuous?”

Zeke laughed “It is now… I kind of like having you as a rival. Keeps me on my toes.”

Ben laughed “You better keep an eye open then. Stroke seat is going to be mine soon”

Zeke sighed “Its not out about the seat you have, but which one you can work best in. I don’t mind letting you have it if you are better at fulfilling the roll. But for… its mine.” there was a hint of a sarcastic challenge as he finished talking.

Ben smiled “Your on.” They shake hands and start walking around encouraging the other rowers.

In the end, the last person is Mark.

Zeke “Mark! Give your all! This is the last 500m. Everything you’ve got!!!!” Everyone else was yelling and cheering.

Mark smiled inwardly. He like the attention. He was usually a side thought. His only qualm is that he is the last to finish. Why did he have to be so weak? Then he saw Ben and got jealous. Ben was a star at the school. Everyone knew him. Mark glowered inside. He wished he were Ben and that he had the athletic body. He worked hard. As hard as he could, but his body wouldn’t grow to meet the size and strength requirements.

Ben saw Mark slowing down as though he were distracted “Mark! You got this. Don’t slow down.” Then everyone started to chant power 10... Power 10! This got Mark back in reality and he realized that he was still rowing. He finished at 24minutes. 1min faster than last time, but not enough for him.

Mark finished and walked away from the group. They said good job and other encouraging phrases. The words bounced off of Mark’s eardrums though.

Mark: as senior that is expected to be valedictorian. He had a 5.0 GPA and as already receiving requests from various AV league schools. He is rather cocky and looks down on people because he is smarter than all of them. He is president of the chess club and math league. He his brain was off the charts, but his physique couldn’t be any lower. That’s the thing that peeves. He opt out of gym by doing crew. He knew he wouldn’t do so well in gym. 80% at best. Besides, he really like crew because it was a perfect stress reliever. Though, it seems that its starting to give him some stress as well. He was jealous of everyone. He realized that he had to be the weakest on the team, and the only reason that he even got to row was because they didn’t have enough players. Now that Ben was here, he was basically off the team!

Mark walked. The group was talking about how awesome Ben and Zeke had been. They had to get a slot in the Charles this year. Mark had spent many practices looking at Zeke’s physique while want to copy it. Everything from shoulder to toe. Now, he was looking at Ben. Ben was a little bulkier than Zeke, but not to much. Mark wanted it. That body…

Ben saw Mark looking and smiled. He waved for him to come over and join the group.

Mark turned away and began to walk to go home.

Ben was a little confused. Was Mark ok?

What happens now?

Mark headed home and thought he would do some research on Ben. Apparently, he was average until 6th grade. At which he got a super huge growth spurt that made him relatively jacked. After that, no one had come close to his size until Nick came along. Then after that, Seth and the 10 followed. However, no one has beaten him in height. He was to tall to be beaten.

Then Mark looked into Ben’s family. No one had anything close to Ben’s height or size. Some of Ben’s ancestors were big, but mostly from farming, and they had light builds. Nothing huge like Ben.

Mark “I wonder what happened.” Mark felt that something was off. It seems a bit strange to him that Ben was the only on to ever get that big.

Mark then went though his complete set of the human genome that was on his super computer. He had made all of these machines himself from older parts and some newer one as well. He got the complete genome from a friend who worked at a private company that works on translating the genome. The had recently finished with a lot of yells of success.

Mark though of a plan to see how Ben’s body really worked. He would do it by looking at the very blueprints to his body. His DNA.

That was relatively easy to acquire. He simply stopped by Ben’s place after school and told Ben’s parents that he was collecting old unneeded clothing. Lucky for him, Ben’s parents had already made a box of Ben’s old clothing. Ever since his growth spurt, nothing seemed to pit for long. For some reason, Ben was obsessed with one set of shorts and a T-shirt that Gramps had given him.

Any how, Mark got Ben’s DNA off of his cloths. Then later the next day, when Ben had finished his lunch, he through away his trash, etc. Mark rushed over and found Ben’s milk carton. There was Ben’s saliva on it.

After that, Mark went home and got his computer to analyze sets of DNA starting from when he was youngest up to now. Now he had to wait.

The next morning, his computer was done analyzing all the sets of DNA. And it revealed something intriguing. Ben’s DNA was the same up until the sixth grade. After that, it changed. He was originally supposed to be a short, but relatively easily muscled kid, but then that changed. His DNA made it so that he could grow to really tall heights and he can recover from fatigue easily. Which was why it was easy for Ben to strengthen his muscles.

Mark was curious “What exactly happened to Ben in the summer just before 6th grade?”

Mark was ready to find out, but before that, he decided he wanted to synthesize the some of the proteins that the changed DNA produced. His rich friends from the company gave him a mini bio chamber. It inserted specific DNA into bacteria. And the bacteria make the protein you want. You just had to feed then occasionally.

Mark inserted the DNA inside and squirted a solution that was high in nutrient in to the bio chamber. It would take a while for the bacteria to make a sizable amount of the proteins that stimulates Ben’s growth. A few days at least.

Mark waited…

A week of suffering through crew and school finally came to the day he wanted. He began putting the chamber through a filter to collect the proteins he wanted. He was shaking with anticipation. After a moment, a glowing green pill popped out. If this did what he hoped it did, then he wouldn’t have to worry about size ever again.

He popped the pill into his mouth with a small gulp of water.

What happens?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Mark ran to the mirror and admired his body. He wanted it to be bigger and more perfect than anyone else. He was already nearing Ben’s size. This gave him a lot of satisfaction. However, there was still a problem. How was he going to explain his sudden growth?

With this, Mark went back to pacing.

Finally, he stopped and went to the place where all answers are found. “The Internet”

He went online while brainstorming possible ideas that could explain his growth. Maybe say he got an inflatable muscle suite that got stuck, and he couldn’t take it off. He put that idea aside because people would eventually find out it wasn’t a suit. After another hour, the internet gave him a miracle.

To the side in and advertising window, an image of a book with a strange title on it: “Rewritten… Its your story.” Then below was a series of comments stating the satisfaction it gave to various users. It was free and it didn’t even require that you give any personal information. Mark concluded that it wouldn’t hurt to try.

Mark clicked on the Ad and another text box appeared. “Your copy will arrive in 3...2...1...” When the countdown finished, his doorbell rang.

Mark raised an eyebrow in amazement: “That was fast.” Mark went to the door and opened it. Outside was a box with his name on it. There wasn’t a return address. Mark brought it inside and opened it up. He went through a mountain of packing peanuts. Then he pulled out an old looking leather bound book.

Mark opened it and was amazed by what he saw. From the first page to the book mark in the middle, was his entire life written down. Mark turned around and looked out the window. Either this thing was magic, or someone has been stalking him his whole life. And the only two people who have down that were his parents.

Mark was a man of science, so magic was impossible, but this book said otherwise. He went to the bookmark and saw something amazing. Words were slowly appearing.

The words “And Mark opened me up for the first time ever and read what’s happening to him. He can’t believe…” Mark slammed the book shut. “No way…” He put the book down and dumped everything out of the box. A smaller booklet fell out. They were the instructions on how to use the book.

Apparently, all you had to do was erase the part of your history you want to change and write over it. If everything goes wrong, all you had to do to fix it was burn the book and everything you changed would be reverted to what it was before.

Mark wanted to say impossible, but it never hurt to try, so he did. He wanted to start small. He thought about what he wanted to change. Then he remembered the week he spent worrying about all the pimples he was getting. He turned to that page and erased the pimple part and wrote down that he always had flawless skin. The book glowed a little.

Suddenly, a couple new memories appeared in his mind showing that he always had perfect skin. He still remembered having all the pimples, but the old memory felt like it was fake. Mark looked in the mirror and saw that the zit on his forehead had vanished. Mark started to shake with excitement.

Mark opened up the book and started reading from the very beginning. As he read, he rewrote parts he didn’t like. With ever passing moment, he began to feel the changes in his history. Surrounding him were dozens of sports and academic trophies. His genetics were made so that he had grown to his current size. As he read further in, he saw that many parts had changed of their own accord. Since changes done further back affected things that were later on. Quickly, Mark became the man he wanted to be and more!

He made it so that he could grow every day, and no one would think the wiser. As he sat, he felt the effect of his latest change. There was a stretching sound as he gained another 10lbs in growth. Mark simply smiled and fell asleep hugging the book.

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
All weekend, Mark had been messing with his history. Trying to make it perfect.

At the same time, Amy and Gwen felt a disturbance in the mana of the universe. Mana, once it settles, follows a pattern. If you disrupt the pattern, you cause a kind ripple effect. It changes the pattern of other things as well. Mana users like Gwen and Amy have a permanently stable mana pattern which helps them manipulate mana. However, it makes them susceptible to being able to see changes.

Each time Mark erased and rewrote his history, Gwen and Amy felt a shiver up their spine and turned to look in Mark’s direction.

Back at Amy’s place, Ben and Amy were studying for a test that they would have in history. They were on the civil war’s unit.

Ben was about to ask Amy a question when he saw he shiver slightly. The room was relatively warm, so it couldn’t be the temperature that made her shiver. Was she sick? “Amy? Are you ok?”

Amy stopped shivering as the new reality set in. She looked at Ben “I’m ok, but I felt like something just happened. Something that… I don’t know how to explain.”

Ben looked at Amy slightly worried.

Amy frowned “We should get Gwen. I think she’ll know more on what’s going on.”

Ben nodded and called Gwen on his plumber badge.

Gwen pickup “Amy felt it too?”

Ben “Well… she felt something.”

Gwen nodded “I’ll right over.”

There was a flash of purple and Gwen appeared.

Gwen “I was wonder if I was hallucinating. However, I feel that the mana around earth is fluctuating. It’s not stable like before.”

Ben “Everything feels the same to me.”

Amy “Ben… I think it has to do mana, so Gwen and I both use it, so we can feel it better than you can. I wonder what’s going on.”

Ben “Ok… I understand. Though, I don’t think we should get to worked up about it. It might just be sun spots of something.”

At that moment, Amy and Gwen felt a shiver run up their spines again, and they both said “No. Its important.”

Ben looked at Amy with a worried expression. He hoped that his necklace wasn’t going to get her hurt. Because if it did, then it was his fault. “So, what are we going to do? We don’t even know what’s causing all of this.”

Gwen “Not yet at least.” Gwen faced towards Mark’s direction. “We should go that way. That’s where the epicenter of all this is.”

Ben nodded and so did Amy. They began walking towards the disturbance. They stop if front of a giant marble mansion.

Amy “Oh My God! This wasn’t here before.”

Ben looked at Amy curiously “What do you mean? This is Mark’s place. His family is rich beyond belief.”

Gwen looked at Ben and then at the mansion. Something was definitely off. “Ben. Are you ok? Look at the houses.” Gwen pointed to all the average looking houses, and then at the mansion. It was so miss placed. “Do you think this was here the whole time?”

Ben frowned “Are you two ok? Mark’s family has been funding the town for years. Why do you guys sound like he has just appeared? I thought you two were better than this.” However, as Ben spoke, he felt as though he was lying. However, he was telling the truth… he thought.

Amy looked at Gwen with a worried expression.

Suddenly, a few kid from school were passing by. Their eyes passed over the mansion like it was nothing new.

Amy “I think something if affecting all their memories. This stuff was never here before.”

Gwen thought for a moment “I’m thinking that we can tell that things have changed because we are more resilient to magical changes. Everyone else is more vulnerable. Maybe if we get Ben into his orb, his mind will clear up a bit. The effects of mana can’t breach his world.”

Amy “Ok.: Amy turned to Ben. “Ben… we need to get into your medallion. Its very important.”

Ben sighed impatiently. He was getting tired of feeling crazy, but then again. Amy and Gwen have always been logical. They don’t play around unless its serious. “Fine, but if this is a joke…” He didn’t need to say more. They knew that if they were joking, then they would lose his trust.

Ben tapped his medallion and all three appeared inside.

As soon as Ben entered his reality, he felt as though someone had pulled back a veil. The truth revealed itself. “What just happened?”

Amy yelled in joy “Your ok!”

Gwen smiled “So we know it has something to do with mana. I wonder what made all those changes.”

Ben frowned “When I was out there. I felt as though that’s the way things had always been. I remember Mark as a really athletic and smart senior. He had a couple hundred awards and stuff, but now. I remember him as a super smart kid, but he wasn’t as strong. I think he rewrote history. Well… at least his history. I don’t remember anyone else changing. Unless it was involved with his history, it stayed the same.”

Gwen “So he changed his past. I wonder how.”

Amy “It has to be mana. I just know it. Maybe we can revert things back to the way things were. If mana made the problem, then mana can fix it.”

Gwen “Yah, but we need to know how to counter it. And to do that, we need to know what the purpose of the spell was. Then we can develop an appropriate counter spell.”

Ben “Why can’t you two just guess and check?”

Gwen “Because it can have undesirable effects.”

Amy “Its safer to find out the purpose and then create a specific spell specifically counter that on spell.”

Ben nodded in understanding. “So we just need to get in and interrogate who ever was doing all this?”

Gwen “Sort of. We don’t know if he’s good or evil. I’m just going to say greedy because it appears that this person chose only to improve his own life and no one else’s.”

Ben “The person we are talking about is Mark. Right?”

Amy “I looks that way.”

Ben “Ok then. Lets just knock on his door and see how things go.”

Amy “Yah, but will you remember what just happened when we get back into our universe?”

Ben sighed “Only one way to find out.” The three went out the exit and into reality.

Does he remember?

They all appeared in a flash of green.

Amy looked at Ben slightly anxious. “Ben… do you still remember?”

Amy “Do you remember which was real?”

Ben smiled “Yah… the weak, but smart one was the original.”

Any and Gwen sighed in relief.

Gwen “Ok. We’ll have to pretend that his spell worked when we confront him. Maybe we can find out why everything is changed once we get inside.”

Ben, Amy and Gwen made their way up to the mansion on the hill. They walked along a gold paved walkway. When they got to the front door, an imposing polished oak door guarded the front entrance. Ben stepped forward and knock three times. They waited.

Then the door opened to reveal an 8ft tall behemoth. The person’s biceps were like watermelons. Their pecs were like beach balls. Their 8 pack, which showed through their rather tight shirt, was deep enough to put half your hand in. Their thighs were massive tree trunks. Not to mention the bulbous sack where their groin was. It had to contain a 20in monster with melon balls… at least!

Mark “Hey Ben. What’s up? Hey! You brought Amy and Gwen.”

Ben smiled “Yah. I thought I’d show them your house since I’d been in it a few time. I kept telling them how awesome it was, so they got a little jealous. You don’t mind if I take them in for a look see? Right?”

Mark smiled pleasantly “Go ahead. I just got a chocolate pool. There are some crackers next to it and some strawberries. Feel free to dip them into the pool. I have to go attend to something. Being a senior isn’t all fun and games.” With that, he turned and left. You could hear him cursing homework for all its worth.

Ben smiled and then turned to Amy and Gwen. “That was easy…”

Amy laughed “I think you two had gotten to know each other pretty when in this reality. you’re both addicted fitness.”

Ben scoffed “I’m addicted to fitness! Mark’s addicted to size. There is a difference.”

Gwen walked between Amy and Ben, and then passed them. “If you two are done. We have to look for something.”

Ben and Amy scratched the back of their head and let out a cough. “Right… sorry.”

Gwen smiled inwardly. She thought to herself “Those two are perfect for each other.”

Amy “Where should we start?”

Ben smiled “I say we visit the chocolate pool. I want some strawberries. Who knows? We might even find something there.”

Gwen let out sigh of resignation. Ben… “Ok. it’s a start. Can you show us?”

Ben let the group through a few corridors until they came upon chocolate heaven.

Amy “Oh… My… GOD!” There were fountains of chocolate the bled into a pool of chocolate. There was also a waterfall and small river of it.

Ben “Lets take a break. I want to try some of this.” Ben went over to a strawberry bush and plucked a plump strawberry. He dipped it into the pool and ate it. “Wow! That’s sweet.” Ben had another and another. He would have had more, Amy and Gwen were giving him a look. “Ok… back to searching.”

They walked around the hallways again and looked through various rooms. They were about to give up for the day when suddenly, Amy and Gwen felt shiver run up their spine.

Ben saw that and braced himself for a memory wipe, but it never came. Ben still remembered Mark a weak brainiac.

Gwen and Amy still felt a trace of mana that the spell just made. The ran down various halls until they came to a dead end. Ben had followed right behind them.

They were standing in front of a fireplace surrounded by a shelves of books and a few well disguised electronic devices.

Gwen “Its behind something…”

They all looked around trying to see what could be the source. Suddenly, the fire place sputtered and Mark stepped out of it.

All three stared as Mark dusted himself off. He got a little soot on himself, but other than that he was clean. He looked a little different. He was even taller than before. 9ft tall with even more abnormally large muscle.

Mark saw them after a moment “Oh… how long were you there?”

Ben “Long enough o see you step out of a fireplace. What was that about?”

Mark smiled and whispered “Its my little hideout. Don’t tell my parent, or they’ll take that away from me. Now lets get out of here. I have to get the house cleaned up before my parents come home.”

Amy “Won’t that take a while? It’s a large house.”

Mark laughed “I meant clean my room. While I’m doing that. I’d prefer to have my house empty.” He gave Ben a look hoping that he’d get the two girls out.

Ben nodded “Ok Amy… Gwen. I think we should leave our host alone. He’s obviously very busy.” He gave Mark one last look.

Mark mouthed thanks “So I’ll let you walk yourselves out. Ben, you know the way right?”

Ben “Yah. Have fun cleaning your room. See you at practice tomorrow. I heard it’s a 10k. So get some sleep.”

Mark groaned “She’s going to make me row at a 1min15sec split the whole time!”

Ben laughed “That’s what you get for being a giant.”

Mark sighed “Well. What ever. Peace.” With that, he turned to leave.

Ben, Amy, and Gwen started to walk out when Gwen whispered to Ben. “Unseal yourself and get the book in his back pocket. I’ll explain later.”

When they were at the entrance, there was a clicking sound as Ben removed the medallion. Then it looked like he simply reattached it. In his back pocket, covered by his shirt, was a leather bound book.

What happens now?

Ben was looking through is history book as he review the individual battles in the civil war. As he studied, he saw the Book of Memoria float by his head. Ben looked at it for a little while and then wonder what it would say about him. He reached out and grabbed it.

When he opened it, it showed to him everything about him! As he read, he found out that his DNA had changed when he first met the orb. It made it so that he could grow really tall and recover from fatigue more easily than others. However, his muscles were average. It was all his hard work that made them as large as they were. Ben was kind of glad that it was mostly his own doing that made him fit, and not the orb.

As he got to the end, he thought it wouldn’t hurt to change himself so that he knew all the answers to his upcoming history test. He took out a pencil and wrote in the next line that Ben knew all of US History. The book glowed, and Ben felt his head fill with knowledge. He smiled and closed his history book. He didn’t need that anymore.

Then for some reason, he though of Mark and kids that were like him. Those people had a hard time training and building their muscles. Ben thought that maybe if he was able to find the most effective way of getting anyone the body they want. However, that person would have to work for it. Ben contemplated it and decided that this would be the fairest way to help people while not directly giving it to them at the same time. Ben wrote in the next line that he could somehow tell people the best way to train their body to get their desired results. Suddenly, Ben felt a window open in the back of his mind. It was like a 6th sense. He could tell people what they had to do just by looking at them.

With that, he closed the book and let it drift away. He hoped that Amy and Gwen couldn’t feel the changes inside their universe. Now, he could help a few people before the solar eclipse. When that happens, he’d forget most of US History and lose the ability to help people get the results that they want.

Ben drifted in his universe for a while just thinking and relaxing. He doesn’t got here often, but when he does, he takes his time.

Off in the distance, Ben junior was still firing unprecedented amounts of cum. His cock had shrunken down to a large 30in long. (well… compared to what it was, 30in is small). The orb was still absorbing the cum, and the universe was still growing. The very space was still saturated in energy. Everything was at peace.

Its as though once Ben’s hormones had started to settle down, so did the universe. Ben looked around and fell asleep. When he woke up, he looked around once more, and nothing changed. He collected his pencils and book, and then he left.

There was a flash of white and green light as Ben and Amy appeared. Gwen was still standing in the same place.

Gwen “How was studying?”

Amy smiled “I think I have it down. It took me a few days, but I got it.”

Ben smiled “That’s good. We can quiz each other now.”

With that, they quizzed each other. Gwen jumped in every now and then. Ben got most of the answers right, but he got a few wrong on purpose so that nothing felt suspicious.

What happens now?

When Mark got home, he got a blood sample and tested for any changes. He had done so that morning as well.

He checked out the result of the morning and found that his blood plasma had minute traces of a green compound. The compound got absorbed into his bones and muscle readily, so that’s why there was so little in his blood. Now ever, there was none in his blood. Its like the source had vanished, or got used up. Well that could be remedied. He just had to make another crystal.

Mark went and got his Bio-chamber and insert Ben’s DNA again. Now he just had to wait.

After school today, Ben walked Amy home and then he went back to his home. When he got there, he took out the crystal and looked at it. It had a fainter glow than a pearl, but it was a deeper green. Ben decided to call gramps about it. Ben gets Gramps on the Plumber badge.

Gramps “Max Tennyson. What can I do for you?”

Ben “Hey gramps. Its me, Ben.”

Gramps “Ben! You haven’t called in ages. I started to think you died before I did! You have to call more.”

Ben coughed “Sorry Gramps. I’ve been preoccupied. I have state exams to prepare for.”

Gramps “No excuses! All I need is 5minutes a week! Ok? Can you do that?”

Ben smiled “Sure gramps. I can do that.”

Gramps “Ok good. Now what did you call for?”

Ben raised the crystal up to the visual display on the badge “This.”

Gramps paused and thought “That’s isn’t what I think it is.”

Ben sighed “I don’t know. Its kind of like growthium.”

Gramps “Ok. I’ll be over in a few hours. I’m about a hundred miles away from you.”

Ben “Thanks gramps. See you soon. Also… you look paler. How much sun are you getting?”

Gramps sighed “We’ll talk more when I get to you.” Gramps hung-up after that.

Ben sighed and waited. After an hour or so, there was a honking sound. Ben looked out the window and he saw Gramps parked out front. Ben ran for it.

When he was inside, he saw something that surprised him. Gramps had gotten thinner and a little paler. He seemed like a shadow of what he was. Ben held back a gasp.

Gramps sighed “Now I don’t want any of that sappy emotional stuff. I’ve lived happily, and that’s that. Now show me the crystal.”

Ben stood still for a moment. Then he said in a croaked voice “Does Gwen know?”

Gramps sighed “No.”

Ben “When will she?”

Gramps “Just after I finish dealing with your issue.”

Ben “When would you have told me?”

Gramps “Tonight. Your dad called me over for dinner. We would have told you then.”

Ben “Ok…” Ben reached into his pocket and pulled out the crystal. “This is what I called you for. If its what I think it is, then you can keep it. Maybe it can help you a little. Not much, but enough so that you can live easily the rest of the way.”

Gramps smiled at Ben. At least he wasn’t crying. Gramps was beyond proud at how Ben was able to control himself. Well… at least in his presence. Ben probably doesn’t want gramps feeling sad before the moment. “I don’t want to prolong the inevitable. Lets make the most of what’s left. Ok? I don’t want any special treatment.”

Ben was silent “Ok.” Then Ben’s tone returned to normal. “Gramps… I wanted to know if you could help me find out what this crystal is. It’s kind of like growthium, but Amy said it had a bit of me tied to it. I can manipulate it to an extent, but nothing to drastic.”

Gramps took the crystal from Ben’s hands and set it under a microscope. “It is made of growthium. That’s a fact, but the atomic structure is different. It takes the form of a double helix. Kind of like DNA. Actually! It is like DNA. Your DNA I bet. What ever made this must have had access to your DNA and I don’t know how they got the growthium to make this. Maybe they stole the muscle mass from something. I don’t know. Maybe they stole the growthium from bacteria. Since bacteria can simply grow back, it wouldn’t be to hard to take mass from bacteria and make growthium from that I guess. Someone is manufacturing growthium using your DNA as a basis/platform to do it.”

Ben thought for a moment. “Mark…”

Gramps “Mark?”

Ben “Mark. It was in his body. I got the crystal to eject itself out of his body.”

Gramps “Any idea on how he‘s getting your DNA?”

Ben “Its not to hard. I can think of a bunch of way he can.”

Gramps “Well… you’ll have to stop him somehow. I don’t feel comfortable knowing that these crystals can be produced.”

Ben “Ok. I understand.” Then Ben remembered “You should come in for dinner. Dad was expecting you, right?”

Gramps smiled “Oh right! Lets get to it!” Ben walked out of the Rustbucket and held the door open for Gramps. Ben was heartbroken to see Gramps struggling down the stairs to get out. Gramps tripped on the last step, and Ben quickly caught him.

Gramps “Thanks.” Ben set Gramps up and waited for him to regain his balance.

Ben smiled a sad smile “We should get inside.”

Things went normally for the rest of the day, but everything was filled with sadness.

How can one adolescent teen be strong enough for you to grow this large! Mark listened to his muscles.

Mark raised a foot and stomped down on Ben. The ground beneath the now 150ft giant shook. Windows shattered. Pavement split. Old wooden houses collapsed. Mark felt the power in his limbs and continued stomping on Ben. He let out a roar of laughter. “No one can look down upon my now! This is what you get Ben. Who’s number one?”

Then to Mark’s surprise, he felt his foot being lift against his will. Mark applied some force, but it was to no avail. Suddenly, his entire leg was thrusted forward revealing Ben unharmed. “I am.”

Mark gasped “How! The book… it makes me grow stronger than anyone I’m fighting!”

Ben “What is your opponent never stops getting stronger? What if he’s strong enough to eradicate a universe? You’ll have to out grow untold numbers of universe before you can beat me. And you’re not the first to try. They all lost. What makes you different?”

Mark was screaming in his mind. Impossible! How can… “Ha! You almost got me there. You used the book didn’t you? That’s the only way!”

Ben sighed “Ok… Now tell me. What happens when you burn the book?”

Mark stated “It erases everything that was changed. So?”

Ben “Use your brain! I thought you were smart.”

Mark retorted “I am! That’s the undeniable truth.”

Ben “Then explain to me why I can be so strong after we burned the book at school? You’ve held onto the book ever since it rematerialized. So when could I have had the time to write into it?” Ben had to yell now since Mark was nearing the 500ft mark.

Mark paused as his brain tried to process what he just heard. He was in denial “No… it can’t happen. You had to have… How did you get so strong?!?!”

Ben “That’s not important. What is important is that you give me the book so that we can sort through the mess you’ve just created!”

Mark held onto the book. Surprisingly, it had grown with him. “No! Its mine.” He hugged it close to his chest.

Ben groaned “Fine. We’ll do this the hard way.”

Mark looked at Ben closely to see what he might do. Then he vanished from sight! “Where’d you do?”

Ben tapped Mark’s giant thumb “Where are you looking?”

Mark had enough time to look down to see that Ben had already slipped the book out of his hands and jumped down.

As Ben fell, the book shrank down to a size that matched Ben. Before Mark could do anymore damage, Ben whipped out and eraser and erased the newest things Marks wrote.

Mark saw what Ben did “NO!” then there was an orange flash.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets change over to Mark's point of view.

choices: Lets see how Mark has changed.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Mark was in bed again screaming at Ben because he had just lost all his muscles at school, etc. He was angry… parents locked him up… still cursing…

Ben was with Gwen and Amy discussing what should be done with the book.

Ben “I don’t feel bad about taking the book from him.”

Amy sighed “I don’t either, but I wish we could do something for him. He isn’t terribly bad. He was just ‘tempted’ with power.”

Gwen though for a moment “Maybe we could fix him up a bit. Don’t tell him though. We’ll need to know the changes that occur.”

Ben was curious “So you’re ok with me using the book to help him grow a bit?”

Gwen pointed out her index finger “Just once. This once. Amy, are you ok with this?”

Amy “Yah, but won’t we burn it eventually? Mark would lose everything he gained.”

Gwen smiled “The book has a permanent function, but don’t tell anyone. The function is permanent once the book is burnt, but that’s under an eclipse. I read that if you write in gold, the book will make it more permanent than in pen or pencil. However, it can still be over written if you change it before the book is burnt.”

Ben has dumbstruck “So we can make it so he doesn’t shrink back? That makes life so much easier. But how do we write in gold?”

Gwen frowned “That’s the tricky part. I don’t know how.”

Amy “Can we just use mana or something?”

Gwen “I though about that, but when I tried to actually cast a spell on the book, the book kind of swallowed the spell. It feels like it has a defense against mana.”

Ben “How about I try going into my world and convert the energy in space into gold. I can make it appear on the pages.”

Gwen thought about it “That could work. Then we can just keep the book in your world and burn it at another time.”

Amy “But Won’t we have to take the book out of his universe to burn it? And then the gold will just turn back into energy?”

Ben “I didn’t think of that.”

Gwen “I think it would be possible to burn it in Ben’s world. As long as the medallion itself is located in the darkest part of the eclipse.”

Ben “Ok then. We can give that a shot when the time comes. Now we deal with Mark. Lets get into my universe!” Ben was about to tap his pendant, but stopped. “Umm guys. I need to tell you something.”

Amy and Gwen got their serious faces on.

Amy “What wrong?”

Ben “My universe used to have a perfect balance, but I think I disrupted it for the worse. You know how the orb is like a paradox copy of my universe, right?” Gwen and Amy nodded since they heard it once before. “Well… the two crystals I got from Mark messed up the cycle. It made the orb more capable of absorbing more, so it ended up absorbing Ben Jr.” There was a faint gasp from Amy. “Don’t worry. He’s perfectly fine. He’s just in the orb instead now. Though, the liquid energy in my universe is entering the orb to feed Ben Jr.’s never ending episode… And since the orb is a paradox copy of the universe, anything entering the orb also enters the universe. Do you see where I’m heading?”

Gwen nodded with some understanding “So basically, you have an exponentially growing supply of liquid energy? The more that enter the orb, the more that appears in your universe. And I assume that the orb is also still releasing energy?”

Ben nodded.

Gwen “So then you also have that energy being converted into a liquid as well.”

Ben nodded “So I don’t know if the pressure will build again or anything.”

Amy “I wouldn’t worry to much. I remember you saying that the medallion is absorbing some of that energy in order to strengthen itself. So I don’t think that the energy will escape. I just think that the pressure inside will build unless we do something about the ever growing supply.”

Ben “That’s the conclusion I came to, but then I won’t ever be able to go back in with out being stuck there forever doing you know what!”

Amy looked down worried. She’d seen how long it took Ben to get out last time years ago. Who knows how potent the energy has gotten, and how much volume of it remains? Then she had a thought. “Use the book!” She stood up in her excitement.

Ben and Gwen looked at Amy as though she were a saint.

Ben jumped and hugged Amy for all she’s worth. “Did I ever tell you that you’re a genius?”

Amy smiled “Only as much as you called me cute and adorable.”

Ben “Well I’ll say it again! You’re a genius.”

Gwen looked at the two ‘friends’ and smiled “He’s right. I hadn’t thought of that. Lets give it a shot. We should write it in pencil first and then make it gold inside Ben’s universe.”

Ben opened up the book and turned to a blank page. “What should I right? The liquid gets compressed into a confined space? Or…?”

Gwen “That sounds good. That’ll help keep it all in an area that won’t be in the way.”

Amy “Maybe write it so the medallion can reinforce itself more. I don’t want there to be a single chance for the liquid to burst out.”

Gwen looked at Amy and then at Ben “Yah, its better to be safe than sorry.”

Ben thought about what to write “So I guess I could write that the liquid energy appears but then is immediately absorbed by the orb. And that it materializes around the orb forming a super thins shell? That way, the orb can still absorb the liquid and the pressure problem is resolves. Then I could make it so that more than enough energy is absorbed by the medallion so that it is always more than strong enough to hold the liquid inside should things get out of hand.”

Gwen and Amy were satisfied with that and nodded in agreement.

Ben proceeded to write down his length command. The book glowed orange slightly and then Ben’s orb glowed green in response.

Suddenly, Ben felt his heart skip a beat. The amount of liquid being formed is increasing astronomically, and it getting sucked in faster and faster than ever. In the back of his mind, he could partially feel Ben Jr. orgasming in a level of pleasure that seemed almost to painful to bare. It was inconceivable. Ben looked down at the medallion and saw it beginning to glow brighter and brighter! The light peaked and them vanished.

Ben, Amy, and Gwen had stare at it in astonishment. They had expected something to explode or at least a dramatic flair. Fortunately, the medallion simple got brighter and then died down.

Ben looked at his medallion and saw that it had shrunken down to the size of a large marble. Maybe an inch in radius. At the center, there was a faint glow that Ben assumed was the orb. Around it was the rest of the universe with its random shapes and stars.

Ben “Wow… we should go in and check it out.”

Amy and Gwen nodded, but they were wary. Amy got her hearthstone ready just incase. She would suck all three of them in to her universe if the need arise.

Ben tapped his smaller medallion and they all vanished in a flash of green.

Inside His universe, everything was normal. Except for the vacancy of liquid energy. There was usually a couple dozen streams of it nearby rushing about, but now there were none.

Ben looked around and was surprised that nothing to bad had happened. He looked around until he came to the very center of his universe. There it was. His orb in all its green glory. You could see it pulsing with ever growing power. Like a heart beat…

Ben could tell that there was a thin film of liquid on the orb. He could feel the density and power in it. Other than that, everything looked fine.

Gwen “We should write all this in gold now.”

Hearing that reminded Ben of the reason they were here in the first place. “So how should we change Mark?”

Amy scrunched her face as she thought “He wants to be stronger right? Why not make it a little easier for him to grow? We know he works hard for it, but his body isn’t adapted for that kind of growing.”

Ben looked at Gwen to see if she agreed, and she nodded.

Ben “Ok then. Umm also, do we mind making forget about the crystals and my DNA? I don’t want to have to put up with those anymore.” The all agreed to that, so Ben engraved it in gold. Mark can now grow a little easier. They even gave him a height boost so that things won’t get to suspicious. They gave him the growth spurt when he was a freshmen, so things would follow some type of order. Then after he started crew, he would gain a decent amount of muscle. Maybe a little more than decent. Though not as big as Zeke. Zeke was the captain, and he works by far the hardest.

Gwen “Ok. That’s done. Lets get out of here.”

There was a flash and they appeared back in the usual universe.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Everything returns to normal.

choices: We find out the 4th rower! Poor him...
Zeke does everything he can to get everyone stronger. A little to much...
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben went to the next day of school hopeful that Mark had changed.

As Mark went down the hall Ben saw that he had bulked up considerably. He was not 6ft4in with a decent amount of muscle on him. He was just under Zeke’s size. His pecs were pushing off 2in and his well chiseled 6 pack abs were shown slightly beneath his shirt. He had developed a set of broad shoulders and a strong looking back. You could see all the tiny muscles that were there. His legs were rock hard, and strong looking, though thin enough that they didn’t get in the way of each other. His body was more towards spring crew. Short races that require speed and a whole lot of power. However, since he was one of the better players, he did fall crew as well.

Mark passed Ben “Hey Ben! You’re going to love practice. We’re doing 5000m races a couple of times.”

Ben made mental notes on how Mark had changed. He was friendlier now, and less self centered. He didn’t call himself Mr. Superior anymore. Maybe he didn’t have a need to. He had all he wanted. Brains and a decent body.

Ben groaned “We’re going to feel that tomorrow.”

Mark let out a humored laugh “If you say you’re going to feel it, then the rest of us are going to feel it even worse! You recover the fastest, so we’ll be feeling it for a while.”

Ben smirked “Just do some yoga or something. Stretch your muscles and get the lactic acid out of your system. Trust me, it pays off in the long run.”

Mark rolled his eyes “But no one on the crew team is as flexible as you! Well… maybe those 3 girls on the gymnastics team, but other than them, we’re all practically iron nails. It hurts for us to be flexible.”

Ben patted Mark on the back as he was about to leave “Just practice. It takes time. I got to go. Homeroom starts in a couple minutes.”

Mark waved bye as he left “See ya at practice. don’t forget to hydrate.”

Ben “Thanks!” And then he ran for homeroom.

Later at practice, the team was gravely disappointed. One of their rowers was moving that day and had to leave the team. However, that frees up a seat for another row which would be Mark, but in this reality, he wasn’t the one picked off. Any how, there was a perfect number of rowers and the correct number of seats. The boat was faster today than ever before. At least for Ben.

Mark could row at a 1:45 split for about a 1000 meters, but after that, he slows down a bit. He continues as a 1:55 for the last 4000.

Ben had improved quite a bit, so he can manage 1:40 for 2000 meters, and then drops off the a 1:50 for the last 3000m

Zeke was working hard to keep up with his two competitors. He managed to go at a 1:40 for 1500m, and then drop to a 1:50 for the last 3500m.

These statistics come off of the ergs when they were measuring their strengths.

Trace decided that Mark, Ben and Zeke would be 3 of the 4 people in a 4 boat. The coxswain being the 5th person. She still needed one more person to be in the head of the Charles boat. Maybe she’d make it a competition. Who ever rowed the hardest got the last seat. She’d have to sleep on the idea.

After everyone got out of the boat and put it away, Trace made announced that they have a 4 boat in the Charles this fall season. Everyone was excited about that.

Zeke was extra excited. They did poorly last year mainly because the other rowers were relatively weak and they didn’t know how to give their all. This year would be different.

After practice, Zeke called Mark and Ben into a small group.

Zeke “Ok you 2. I already know that we are on the four boat. I’m not being cocky. Trace already told me. Anyway, the reason I got us here is so that we can start training together. I want us to get strong and faster. You understand? After practice starting tomorrow, we’ll go to the weight room and start working out overtime. I want to leave a good mark in my senior year. I know you two can help. What do you say?”

Mark and Ben were all for it. Especially Mark. He was always ready to work out since school and learning came so easy to him. He had a lot of free time since he could just glimpse at a page and read it in a moment. He had a perfect photographic memory.

Ben was ready to do just that. He worked out after school anyway, so this fit his schedule just fine.

Zeke “Now I just need to know who the last person is. Once I know, I can start getting him buffed up for the race. He’s going to need a lot of work. And I’ll be ready to give it to him.”

Ben smiled nervously. He’s never seen Zeke like this before. Zeke was always easy going, but hardworking. It seemed like he was totally obsessed with his race and winning. Ben hoped that Zeke would be able to remain the fun and admirable team captain that we was.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: The next day at school.

choices: Zeke feels that he has to make up for everyone else's weakness.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The next day at practice, Tracey had everyone row a 5k again. This was a race to see who would be on the Head of the Charles.

Mark: 18min 50sec

Ben: 17min 40sec

Zeke: 17min 50sec

Seeing these result made Zeke wonder. Last time, the winner finished at 16min. They had to beat that time. He would get there.

The 4th person was Jake who got 20min 50sec.

Zeke looked Jake over again. He had a slim build. Really compact muscles making him look skinny, but tough.

Zeke “Jake! Looks like you’re with us. Let me fill you in with our training regimen.”

Jake walked over “What regimen? I though we were doing this at practice.”

Zeke smiled “Trace gave me permission to do an extended practice. We’ll need it to win this year.”

Jake looked flabbergasted. He didn’t sign up for this. He just wanted a resume builder! This was totally outrageous. “No! I don’t have the spare time for an extended practice. I have to many classes. To much studying!” Jake was trying to make up as many excuses as possible. Though he was really just a lazy senior with more study classes than recommended. It was his last year and he already filled out most of his requirements.

Zeke scoffed “That’s not what I hear. You just sit in Tracey’s room all day playing games until you have her class. Nice try buddy, but you’re not off the hook.”

Jake continued to be resistant for a few more attempts, but Zeke gave him one cold look and Jake froze where he stood. He wasn’t going to get out of this alive if he kept this up. He just muttered and grumbled.

Zeke smiled seeing that he had won the argument. “Ok. So today, we’ll be heading to the weight room to work on our power. Legs today. Abs tomorrow. Chest the next day. Then Arms. Next week, we repeat the cycle. On Monday, we’ll talk about eating habits and diets. Any questions?”

Jake’s hand shot up “Are you nuts! Who do you think you are?”

Zeke looked at Jake and stated “I’m captain and what I say is law! This is not a democracy while I am here. If we win, then I’ll cut you some slack. Any other questions?”

There were none.

After practice, they went over the weight room, slightly weary, but still able. They did a bunch of squats with waits and leg presses. The whole shebang. When they were done, Zeke brought out a bunch of protein drinks.

Zeke “Drink up. You’ll need it.” He handed each person one.

Ben looked at the drinks distastefully. He preferred that his build be all natural, so he didn’t use any muscle growing products. “I’m good. I’ll have some steak tonight.” He pushed the drink away.

Zeke glared at Ben, but left it at that. He had ‘some’ respect for Ben’s choices since Ben had enough experience to know what he’s doing. He turned toward Jake and tossed him Ben’s bottle “Here. You’ll need it more then Ben.”

Jake caught it and started to drink. It was the worst thing he ever tasted, but Zeke was staring him down. He just pinched his nose and finished it. Once he’d finished, Zeke eased up a bit and dismissed them.

Oh! Mark drank his protein drink like it was a necessity. It appears that he’s used to those drinks.

This continued for the rest of the week. By then end, Jake was still not happy with the progress. He made them work hard and longer. Then when the day was done, he made them drink twice as much of the curse protein drink. Jake ended up with 4 and Mark had 2 and sometime 3. Ben remained at a constant 0.

One more week passed and they made serious gains. Everyone had buffed up a bit except Ben who some how maintained a tight build while getting stronger.

Mark brought his race time down to 18min.

Ben:17min

Zeke:17min 10sec

Jake : 19min

And Zeke was still not happy. He wanted an instantaneous growth in progress. This was to slow for him.

The following week, he drove them harder than ever. Even Ben left nearly ready to collapse. And again, they made serious gains.

Jake had never seriously worked out at the gym, so these new workouts were more strenuous than before which made him grow the most. In just 2 and a half weeks, he made a 20lbs gain. This is totally unprecedented! At least he gained something worth while from all his hardship.

There was only one month till the race, and Zeke wasn’t lightening up at all. He kept adding more and more in order to get then below 16min. You could practically call him an obsessed tyrant.

The following week, Zeke started to become desperate. While Ben, Mark and Jake weren’t looking, Zeke injected something into the protein drinks with a needle. He made Jake drink 5 bottle each day this week and Mark willingly drank 3 each day. Ben remained at 0 bottles.

This continued and by the end of the following week, there they were making even larger gains! Jake made a huge leap and put on 20lbs. Its totally un heard of. However, he started to have a lot of acne break outs and at home one day, he saw something frightening. His family jewels had shrunk a bit.

Mark was having similar symptoms and had begun to suspect the worst.

Now we are at the week before the race.

They worked out like usual, and Zeke handed out the drinks.

Jake looked at the drink “No.”

Zeke looked up shocked “What? Did you just say…”

Mark “He said no. And I’m saying no today as well. You put something in those. haven’t you?”

Ben’s eyes opened a bit more as he was listening. “Mark… Jake… why would you say that?”

Mark and Jake turned red a bit but they said their reason soon enough.

Ben looked at Zeke in shock “You didn’t…”

Zeke looked away “It was what we needed. Look at our progress! We’re so close too! Hey, I’ve been drinking it to and I’m fine. Look at us! I can finish in 16min 15 sec. Ben, you’re at 16min already. I don’t know how, but you’re just that good! Mark, you have one 20sec to go! And Jake look at how far you’ve come. 20min to 16min30sec! That’s an immense leap of growth!”

Jake “But how do could you! You know the effects of steroids right? Did you think about how we’d feel? Messing with our hormone level? Mine are barely large than raising light now!”

Zeke laughed “Ha! Mine are raisins. Do I care? Nope! As long as we win!”

Mark “You’re insane! All you care about is winning. Look at Ben. He’s at 16min and he didn’t drink a single one of your protein drinks!”

Zeke “Well he’s Ben. He has his own routine. Besides, I don’t think I could have forced him to do it anyway.” The he pointed to Mark “You on the other hand, I can make.”

Mark laughed “HA! Not this time. I quit. This isn’t worth it. Just you wait. Once Tracey hears about this, you won’t be rowing till you can afford your own boat.”

Zeke looked at Mark in anger. Then his expression calmed down. “You know what? You’re right. I was being crazy.”

Mark looked at Zeke suspiciously “Keep talking…”

Zeke slowly walked towards Mark “I shouldn’t have been giving you guys steroids. I was being stupid. Let me make it up to you. I promise I will, but can we get through the Charles?”

Mark felt that Zeke was being sincere enough. “Fine, but no more steroids. You’re going to give us the money to buy our own protein drinks. And recompense, I want you to get rid of all the steroid you bought. Then you’ll have to make it up to Jake some how.”

Zeke held out his hands in a reconciled gesture “Ok. I accept those terms. What do you want Jake?”

Jake looked at Zeke with half hate and half confusion. He hated Zeke for feeding him steroids and he was confused because he always thought of Zeke as a cool and collected guy. Not some winning obsessed teen.

Jake “I want you to… to…” He paused for a while “I’ll asked later.”

Zeke smiled “Ok then. Consider this an I.O.U.”

Ben just stood there with his mouth open in shock. He had never expected this from Zeke. He could never look at Zeke the same way again.

Zeke saw Ben’s expression and felt partially guilty “I’m not sorry for what I did, but I will recognize that it was a mistake. I thought I was doing what was best for the boat.”

Ben scoffed “You should have done it the natural way instead. It makes victory so much sweeter.”

Zeke sighed “I know. Can you ev…” He stopped the thought short “No. Don’t forgive me. Just help me get the Charles over and I’ll be grateful for that alone. That’s all I want. I can see why you’re the best athlete in the school.”

Ben sighed and submitted. “I’ll help, but we’ll being training my way after today. I have a few tricks up my sleeve. It’ll be more painful than before, but the results are all the same.

Zeke did a face palm “Why didn’t you tell me!”

Ben looked at Zeke “I did try. You never listened.”

They concluded practice and went home until tomorrow.

What happens next?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Zeke does everything he can to get everyone str...

choices: Lets see how they do in a week.
There were some unknown side effect of his overdose/binge.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The night, Zeke felt like he had failed the team. They’d lose now because he couldn’t get them to take the dang steroids. He looked at a box under his desk labels trash.

Zeke “Fine! If they won’t, then I will!” Zeke made his way toward the box and opened it up. “Here I go.” An hour later, the box is empty. (Oh dear. I thought he was smarter than this. How obsessed is he?)

The next day, Ben, Jake, and Mark waited for their captain like usual. Ben led them in their stretches as they waited.

Mark “I heard that Zeke wasn’t in school today. I hope he didn’t catch anything.”

Ben “Yah, but he gave me a call. He’d be here for practice.”

Jake “He’s taking a while.”

There was a loud bang as the gym door slammed open. Zeke came strolling in looking a little different. He looked more bloated like he was full of water. His mobility was shot, so he fumbled his way through the gym. When he was about to fall, Ben managed to catch him.

Ben “Zeke, what happened? You looked like you drank a tank of water and forgot to stop drinking!”

Zeke pushed Ben’s arms away. “I’m fine. I’m fine” His speech was partially slurred.

Mark and Jake glanced at each other nervously.

Zeke walked (sort of walked) to the bench press. He tried to lift the weight, but ended up lifting it, but then dropping it. He wasn’t in control of his body.

Ben looked at Zeke worried “Zeke. You should sit down. I’ll get the guys started on the work out. You take it easy. Go home or something.”

Zeke waved the advise off “No! I’m captain and I’ll… I’ll…” he didn’t finish his sentence. He fell to the floor and started too shake violently.

Jake “He’s having a seizure! Get 911!”

Mark ran for the nearest phone and dial 911. “Hello? We have an emergency. Our captain is having a seizure. Yes. The high school. We’re in the gym DO you want us to carry him up front? No… ok. We’ll wait. Should we do anything while you’re coming? Restrain him? Ok. Will do.” He turned to Ben and Jake “Hold him down. don’t let him hurt himself.”

Ben and Jake grabbed Zeke’s flailing limbs and held them down in place. Jake had a little trouble keeping his legs down. Ben was hold both arms down and was trying to keep Zeke’s torso from turning everywhere. He placed a wad of paper towels in Zeke’s mouth to keep him from biting his tongue off.

After a minute or two, the doors burst open and guys in uniform carried Zeke on a stretch out of the gym.

The men had a hard time carrying the giant muscle man, so they handed it to Ben and Jake. They rushed out at a fast, but stable speed.

Zeke woke up groggy and partly lost “Where am I?” He looked around and saw that he was in a hospital hooked up to an IV.

There was a knock at his door. “Come in!”

His mom and dad enter. His mom was crying and his dad was giving him a glare. Zeke turned away avoiding the eyes.

Mom “You were taking steroids!”

Dad “I though we raised to better than that.”

Zeke continued avoid their eyes. Especially his mom’s eyes. They were so sad and…

Mom “Where did we go wrong? What happened?”

Dad “It was those 3 boys wasn’t it? What’d they do? I can sue if you just tell me they did it.”

Zeke “No. It wasn’t them. I did it on my own. And mom. You guys did everything right. No one did anything wrong. I was going what was best for the team.”

Dad “So it was crew! Where’s the honor! If you…”

Zeke “Don’t bother telling me about honor and all that stuff. I already thought of it all. I made a huge mistake, and it almost killed me. Can we leave it at that?”

Mom turned to dad “Give him a moment. He’s a good boy. He just got a little lost.”

Dad sighed and nodded. He took his wife’s hand and they walked out. They gave Zeke one last look before closing the door. There were silent whispers on the other side.

An hour later, Ben, Jake, and Mark strolled in.

Jake “You doing ok? They got a gallon of that stuff out of you. You were officially dead for 16 seconds. How’s it feel to join the living?”

Zeke grunted in response.

Mark “Now don’t be like that. Jake was just trying to help.”

Zeke grunted anyway.

Ben was glaring down over Zeke’s shoulder. Zeke could feel it. The lost of respect and disappointment. He let them all down. “I’m sorry guys. I thought… I thought… I didn’t know what I was thinking. Maybe I felt like I had to make up for you guys not using them. I don’t know, but now I feel like a complete fool. Almost killing myself just because I was obsessed with winning. We you three this year. The biggest, strongest 4 boat we had ever! So I wanted to have the honor of bring this boat to first place. I wanted it to badly. I’m sorry. Especially for giving you guys that poison, and for pushing you guys so hard. I had the best interest in mind at the time, but now that I look back, I feel awful.”

Ben let out a short laugh “Ok. Good. I thought I’d have to tell you myself. It sounded so much better coming from your mouth and not mine. Anyway. They say you can get back out tomorrow. You’re relatively stable right now. You’ll be resting over night, and you will most likely go home tomorrow. The best part is that we can still race the Charles as long as we remain drug free for the next 2 weeks. The pushed the race forward because there’s a 90% change of lightning on the original date.”

Zeke scoffed “Ok. So we meet and practice tomorrow. Ben, can you show me these exercised you mentioned later on? I’m kind of curious. We’ll work hard, but I won’t drive you to death like before.”

Mark frowned “Dang. I felt like I really worked on those days.”

Zeke laughed “Ask Ben. He’ll be giving the workout. He probably knows more than me about it considering he reached the 16 min goal with out any help from you know what.”

Mark looked at Ben pleadingly.

Ben laughed “I’m making individual workouts because our bodies’ are different. I’ll make yours a little hard if you want.”

Mark punched the air in front of him to show his enthusiasm.

So it was settled, they’d get back to their schedule the next day.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The next day, Zeke hobbled slightly. His body was still a little weary from being pumped with water like a balloon.

Zeke “Hey guys. I thought of a problem yesterday. And its mostly my fault.”

Mark “What else did you do?”

Zeke “Its true we got stronger, but we also got a lot bigger and heavier. Our bodies have more mass and its broader, so it catches more wind. Ben’s build is more compact, so he may weigh as much as us, I don’t know, but he’s more aerodynamic. I’m just pointing it out since wind is a factor in whether you win a race or not.”

Jake shrugged it off “We’ll just have to row hard to make up the difference. No biggy.” He tried to make a point by flexing his now large biceps. He was a massive 200lbs of hard bulky muscle.

Ben “Well, its kind of to late to change that. We’ll have to get stronger now and not gain much more volume.” They left Ben alone for a moment as he though of a workout that would have remedy their problem. “Ok. I got it. We’ll be doing a lot of aerobic this week and strength building. Aerobics will help our stamina and I’ll think of a few ways to get stronger. This is going to hurt more than before. But the results are so much sweeter.”

3hrs later…

Mark was on the ground panting. He crawled to the water fountain and tried to drink from it, but he couldn’t get up. He felt the blood pound in his ears. His muscles were screaming at him. He was regretting the fact that he asked for a harder routine than the others.

Zeke was in a similar state, but mainly because he was already weary.

Jake was on the ground stretching. He lets out a yell as he got a cramp from stretching the wrong way.

Ben was in the best position. He was walking the work out off, but its odd because he had the hardest workout of them all. He was probably used to them after spending years training his body.

Zeke said in between breaths “I thought… Tracey’s… workout… were hard… Ben, you’re… insane!”

Ben smirked “Trust me. Tracey is much harder. You’re bodies are just more adapted to those than they are to my exercises. I’ve been doing them for years, so I can recover faster.”

Jake “Then doesn’t that give you less results?”

Ben “No. They help me get stronger while keeping my muscle from getting huge and in the way. Speed an power is all I want, and nothing extra. My routine can be manipulated to do that.”

Mark was still catching his breath “Is it always this strenuous?”

Ben smiled “At first, but your body gets used to it. Then you add more on top. I got a couple of my friends to help me make some smoothies. Their high in protein. They’ll help you recover for tomorrow.” He handed out some containers of a white blend. “Oh. If you’re allergic to anything tell me, so I can give you a different one. We have some with fruits and other with out them.”

Jake took the smoothy and sniffed it suspiciously. “You didn’t…”

Ben laughed “No. Its just a smoothy. Nothing foreign. Trust me.”

Jake trusted Ben enough, so he downed it in one sitting “That was pretty good. Nice use of pineapple.”

Ben “It was Amy’s idea.”

Zeke and Mark followed and complemented the drinks.

Zeke “Feeling better already.” The workout and then the smoothy helped Zeke’s body get out of sleep mode. It was practically as good as before he overdosed.

Ben watched them drink the smoothies and frowned inside. He didn’t lie to them, but he bent the truth a bit. Nothing was foreign, but the fruits were changed a little. He had Gwen make the fruits high in protein, etc. To help the team recover faster and get stronger as well. They were still fruits.

Ben drank some water to get the strawberry seeds out of his mouth. “Ok. Tomorrow them. Same time.”

That night, Zeke went home and ate dinner. The usual stuff. A little while after practice, he started to feel a little queasy again. He decided to sleep it off. As he slept, he didn’t notice that his raisin balls were growing to the size of tennis balls.

So, after he overdosed, the testosterone levels in his body were off the charts. A couple hundred times more than they should be. It should have killed him, and would have killed him too! If not for the speed at which he was rushed to the hospital. A minute later and he would be in a rectangular ditch.

His body, after the traumatic experience had decided to recognize that level of testosterone as its ‘homeostasis’, so it would try to get back to it. And what’s the only way it can? By making more testosterone. That’s why his balls grew abnormally huge.

The whole day, he felt sick because his body was trying to get to homeostasis. Basically, they were withdrawal symptoms.

What does this high level of testosterone do now?


CAUTION: DO NOT DO WHAT ZEKE DID! IT WILL MOST LIKEY LEAD TO YOUR DEATH. SO HEED THIS WARNING WELL.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Zeke woke up the next morning. He sat up and was surprised by the extra weight he felt on his torso. “Huh? What’s going on?”

Zeke thought that he was still a little tired from yesterday, so his limbs felt heavier. With that, he pushed the notion aside and went through his morning routine. When he went to take his shower though, he was shocked. He felt a giant mass where his groin was. He looked down and gasped. He already was well endowed, but he lost a significant amount when he started on the steroids. Now it was bigger than before. A giant 11in snake hung between his legs with a pair of tennis ball balls. Seeing this, he failed to notice the fact that he had gained like 10lbs of muscle.

On impulse, he started to stroke himself. The moment he touched it, he let out a moan. It was so sensitive. He stroked faster and faster until he was thoroughly lost in it. Suddenly he felt the pressure spike and he couldn’t hold it any longer. Hot white fluid shot into the air and some how landed only in the shower tub. He continued for another few minutes until he ran dry.

Slowly, he got off the ground and looked at the tub. It was filled till it rose a around 5in. That must be like 10 gallons!

Zeke was shocked “I did that… what! How?” Zeke was still totally confused about how this happened. Did it have to do with his binge? Or…? He ponder for a bit until he saw the time on a small clock. He rushed into the shower as soon as the tub drained out. He rushed through everything and then ran to school.

Wearing baggy cloths, no one noticed his muscle growth including him. As the day continued, he felt like his cloths were getting less baggy. It was like they were getting tighter, or he was getting bigger. But people can’t grow like that… can they? His bulging groin proved that things could grow that fast, but he couldn’t totally believe it.

Right before practice today, he ran to a scale in the gym. As he stepped in, he saw that he was 225lbs. 15lbs more than yesterday. “What’s going on?” Then the gym doors opened revealing Ben, Mark, and Jake.

Ben “Ok guys. Get stretched out. The usual.” Then he saw Zeke on the scale “Hey Zeke. Is everything alright? You seem a little shocked.”

Zeke looked at the Ben and then at the scale “Umm. Its nothing. I just wanted to see how heavy I was way. I need to get stronger to pull my weight in the boat. Literally.”

Ben “Don’t worry to much about it. That’s what we’ll be working on until the race.”

Zeke was a little distracted and gave a short reply “Kay.”

Practice went the same as yesterday except for Zeke. Mark was on the ground feeling the pain from the workout. Jake was stretching himself out. Zeke however, was doing better. He recovered a lot faster than yesterday.

Ben looked at Zeke slightly surprised “Wow. You got up pretty fast. Then again, we have similar builds. Maybe you were just tired yesterday.”

Zeke looked himself over “Yah. That’s the reason.” Though he knew it was because he had grown! Somehow… someway. It happened.

Ben saw Zeke looking himself over. Did he look bigger? “Hey Zeke. You’re not on it anymore right? Cause you look bigger. Yah… you are bigger. I can tell. You’re shirt is clinging to your body more. It was looser yesterday.”

Zeke grunted “No. I’m not on steroids anymore, but I think I am bigger. I don’t know how. I kind of woke up like this. Maybe it’s a side effect? Or maybe some excess testosterone in my system. I’m sure it’ll blow over tomorrow.”

Ben just nodded, but he still had a feeling it was more than that. Zeke seemed truthful enough, but he didn’t sound so confident about tomorrow. “Alright, but for now. Who wants a smoothy?”

This got the other two’s attention. Mark somehow got the strength to stand up and get a drink. He downed it in one go. So did everyone else. How good can the drink be?

The next day, Zeke got out of bed and felt even heavier than the day before. He looked in the mirror and saw that his sleeveless-T was hugging his chest. It was almost straining to cover his torso. Zeke did a flex and the shirt ripped apart. This surprised Zeke, but not as much as it gave him a silent satisfaction.

He dressed in his baggiest cloths which weren’t really baggy. They clung to his 6ft 6in tall body. With 5in pecs and rock hard washboard abs. His now bowling ball biceps and watermelon thighs were accented by the patterns on his cloths. “What’s going on?” He wanted to know just for the sake of knowing. He kind of didn’t want it to stop. If this kept up, then he’d get below 16min in no time.

During school, he avoided any excess attention, so there weren’t many questions. However, at practice, he knew that he would be questioned.

Mark walked in “Wow! When did you get so huge?” Mark was astonished when he saw a much larger Zeke.

Zeke was standing on the scale. He had made a 30lb gain making him a heavy 255 lbs of mountainous muscle. He bet he could finish a 5k in 15minutes if he put some effort into it. “Today. I don’t know how.” He knew there was no point in denying it. It would become common knowledge eventually.

Jake walked up to Zeke and poked his giant pecs to make sure they were real. He finger made contact with solid rock. “They’re real!”

Zeke laughed “You bet they are. You can’t do this with fake pectorals” He started to bounce his pecs.

Ben looked at Zeke nervously “You should go have the doctors check this out. Its not normal.” Ben was a little suspicious. He knew it wasn’t steroids. Those made growing faster, but not this fast. He thought it might be growthium, but he wasn’t positive. It seemed unlikely considering how Zeke’s been acting. Previous encounters show that people with growthium tend to keep their growth secret for a while and then go all out and attack Ben or his friend Amy. This was not the case.

Zeke “I know. I should, but the thing is… I don’t want it to stop. I love this feeling. Of getting stronger. I don’t want it to go away.” He started squeezing his bicep to test its hardness.

Ben wasn’t as shocked as he though he’d be. Zeke did go half insane over getting everyone strong enough for the race. “This isn’t about the race. Is it?”

Zeke smiled “Not entirely. It will help definitely, but I just like being strong. And I don’t care if you know and think its cheating. Its happening, so accept it.”

Ben sighed. So it wasn’t a relapse. Then it had to be something recent. The overdose maybe? “Zeke. If you don’t want to see a doctor, can you at least get your testosterone level checked? I think something has happened to your level of hormones. Its just a hunch.”

Zeke shrugged “Whatever. As long as I get to keep these babies.” He kissed his giant biceps.

Ben was worried. What was Zeke turning into? A totally self-absorbed jock! “How about we do that now. Can you bite your finger or something. I have a test tube from chem. You can put your blood sample in there, and I can get it looked at. I’ll tell you what it says.”

Zeke frowned. He didn’t want to come off as emo, but he did it anyway. It was for the sake of science, he reasoned. He bit his finger and a few drops of blood formed. Ben caught them in his test tube. Ben took out the first aid kit and put a sanitary band-aid over the wound.

Ben “K. I’ll tell you what’s up tomorrow. For now, lets get to work. Jake and Mark, do what you did yesterday. Once it starts getting easy, let me know, and I’ll get you on another regimen. Zeke… you’re with me. I think you can handle something new considering your bigger bulk.”

Zeke smiled cockily and flexed “A bit more than bigger.”

Ben scoffed “Lets get to it.”

After practice, Ben was walking the practice off. Zeke was on the ground soaked with sweat.

Ben “Maybe you weren’t as ready as I thought… Your muscles are built differently. I’ll have to make you a new regimen.”

Zeke said between breaths “No… I can… keep… up with… you…. Just… need… some… time…. Continue… tomorrow….”

Ben smiled “Sure. The workout may or may not get easier since you’ll keep growing. I don’t know how effective the work out will be.”

Zeke laughed then stopped when he was out of breath “I may not even need practice. Its more of a habit now.”

Ben scoffed “Sure, but it’s a good habit.” Ben looked to see how Jake and Mark were doing. They were recovering a bit faster than before. They’re getting used to the work out. Sooner than yesterday, they walked over to Ben and asked for their smoothy.

Ben handed them out and they finished them in one go.

Ben laughed “I might have to bring you guys a second serving tomorrow. I’ll ask Amy if she’s up to it.”

Mark “You go do that. These things are amazing.”

Ben “Ok then. Practice is done. Get some rest.”

Later, Ben went home and asked to borrow his mom’s microscope and a type of machine that measures testosterone levels. Surprisingly, she had both.

What did the results show?
