Ben put the blood sample into the machine and began the process of waiting for the machine to finish.

During that time, Ben went to the microscope and looked at the Zeke’s blood under a microscope. There were bits of silver crystal floating around in it.

Ben “What are those?” He asked his mom. She had a doctorate in biology and a long history with biological compounds.

Mom “Interesting. This isn’t your blood is it?”

Ben “No. it’s a friends. He wanted me to take a look at it.”

Mom “Well… I would take him to a hospital. Either he’s injecting drugs into his body, or there’s a high concentration of something in his body, and it is precipitating out of his plasma.”

Ben smiled “You said precipitate. Chem vocabulary for produces a solid.”

Mom smiled “Yes! Now we just need to know what that solid is. I would worry since it could clog his veins and arteries.”

Ben looked down as he thought. “I should give him a heads up asap, but he’ll want to know what it is first.”

As if on que, the machine dinged and a roll of paper spilled out displaying the results.

Mom looked it over and covered her mouth in shock “His testosterone level are off the chart! They’re hundreds of times the normal amount. He should be dead!”

Ben’s eyes opened in amazement. He said he was off of it.

Mom “Ben, is something else wrong?”

Ben looked at his mom “No. Everything’s good. I’ll have to talk later. I have a phone call to make.”

Mom “Oh. Ok. Dinner’s done in 30min. See you down.” Ben’s mom left hoping that nothing was wrong with Ben’s friend.

Ben smiled “Thanks Mom.” Ben turned back to his desk and looked at Zeke’s blood again. He sighed and picked up his plumber badge (which works for intergalactic calls, or simply earthly telephones).

The sound dial tones going off followed by a click.

Zeke “Hello?”

Ben “Hey Zeke. Its Ben.”

Zeke “Oh! Hey. What’s up? What’s my blood type?”

Ben “Its AB+ (the greediest of all blood types since the owner can take all types of blood), but more importantly, I found something in your blood.”

Zeke heard Ben’s grave tone “What?”

Ben “I was looking and I found crystals in your blood plasma. They turned out to be testosterone! The concentration is so high that they precipitated (solidified, or to make a solid) out of solution!”

Zeke was silent for a moment “What’s it mean?”

Ben sighed “It means that if those crystals get big enough, you blood vessels will get clotted up. I’m surprised it hasn’t already done so.”

Zeke, at home, was look in the mirror at his body in disbelief. He couldn’t believe that he got it from insane amount of testosterone. He looked at his arm and was shock by what he saw. One of the large veins on his arms was pumping insane amounts of blood through his arm. However, there were tiny white dots scattered along the stream of blood. “Ben… we need to hurry. Someth-”

On Ben’s end, he head the line disconnect. “Zeke? Zeke! Are you ok? Zeke!” Ben stared at the plumber badge in shock. As if reacting on impulse, he popped the marble like medallion off his chain.

--------------------------------

In Zeke’s room.

Zeke “Ben… we need to hurry. Someth-” Zeke fell to the ground as his blood pressure spike. The world went dark. But right before that, he window imploded as something jumped in.

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben charged and jumped through Zeke’s window. He was on the ground and his heart had stopped. “D***T.”
---------------
In Amy’s home.

Amy was sitting at her desk doing anatomy homework. Suddenly, she felt distress coming from the hearthstone. “Ben.” Reacting on impulse, Amy teleported to Ben.

She saw Ben kneeling over someone’s body.

Ben looked up and saw Amy. His panicked expression flooded with hope.

Amy “What’s wrong?”

Ben stepped up and Amy saw Zeke’s hulking body on the floor. She gasped “What happened!”

Ben frowned “No time. His heart has stopped and its being clogged by clumps of crystal.”

Amy’s face got serious as she tried to think of spell that could help. Suddenly it hit her. “Step back.” She commanded.

Ben stepped back and watched.

Amy snapped her fingers and Zeke was enveloped in white light.

Ben looked at the light hopefully.

Amy “Ok. I didn’t cure him, but that should keep him alive for now. I suspended time around him, and the spell should last a couple hours. We’ll need Gwen’s help from here.”

Ben let out a light sigh, but the tension was still there. “Ok. Lets get Gwen over.”

----------------
One moment later, there was a purple flash.

Gwen “What’s up?” Then she saw Zeke’s body suspend in a bubble separated from time. “How home you don’t ever call me to have a part or something? Its always in dire situations.”

Ben smiled “Dire situations are my parties!”

Gwen smirked at the reply. “You should change the theme later on. No one likes being stuck in the past.”

Ben made a thinking face “I’ll think about.”

Gwen smiled “Ok. Now why’s Zeke in a time pocket?”
At this time, there was a white flash as Amy returned to the room.

Ben “Your back. Did you search the file?”

Amy “Yah. I got the computer searching, but it might take a while. There's a lot of info to comb through.”

Ben “Ok. Lets hope that we get an answer.” Then he paused, “But more important Is that the news is good.”

Amy and Gwen nodded.

Gwen “So what’s the problem?”

Ben sighed and recounted everything that happed.

Amy “I didn’t know that the human body could do such a thing.”

Gwen frowned “Neither did I, but nothing is impossible.”

Amy “Yah, but it is very unlikely.”

Gwen sighed in agreement “Ok. Lets see what I can do.” Gwen paused as she thought of some spells that could help. “Lets see what else is wrong with him first.” Gwen cast a simply detection and reading spell to see what was going on with his body.

Currently, in his time suspended body, his testosterone level was about a thousand time over the average. There were several stops clotted or near clotting with the large amounts of crystalline testosterone.

Gwen “Ok… so there are various problems. One, I can’t make the crystals vanish lest you want Zeke to implode from the sudden drop in pressure. Two, I can’t rip it out of him or there would be micro punctures all over his body. Therefore, my only solution is to have his body slowly move the excessive crystals to a certain spot in his body for extraction. Though that will require that he be put back in current time. I have a spell that will help the process, but it will have to be fast or he may…” her lack of a description told them exactly what would happen.

Ben sighed “There’s no other way?” Gwen nodded. Ben looked down disappointedly “Ok… then there’s no choice. We can’t have him locked up in time forever.” Ben turned to Amy “Can you undo it?”

Amy nodded and wrapped herself on Ben’s arm for comfort. She snapped her fingers and the protective white glow on Zeke’s body faded.

Gwen started chanting a spell immediately. She quickly developed a hazy purple glow that spread over Zeke’s body as well. The she yelled “Amy! Use your mana to get his heart jump started. I get most of his blood vessels unclogged, but I can’t stop or they’ll reform.”

Amy nodded and channeled a steady flow of mana into Zeke’s chest cavity.

After a moment, Zeke coughed and began to breath.

Gwen sighed at that action, but she wasn’t done yet. She was getting his body to create another organ to store crystal testosterone and dispose of it when the crystal got too large.

After an hour or so, Gwen let out a sigh of relief and exhaustion. “Ok. Done. He should be good for now. I can’t seem to do anything to change his DNA so that it will stop mass producing HGH. However, I could get his body to make a pouch to deposit excess HGH.”

Ben “What happens when it gets to full?”

Gwen “Then two things could happen. It could either be expelled from the body, or I could use mana to compress it for the rest of his life. Or maybe it can expel the crystal, and I make it so that the excess HGH instantly warps into the crystal. That would make it easier to explain. Since we can hide the crystal. Though, if the level of testosterone level drops, i don;t know what else will happen to him. We can only wait and see.”

Ben nodded.

What do they do?

Ben and Amy had turned around during the ordeal, and Gwen didn’t even see what happened. He vision had been flooded in purple light.

Ben put a blanket over Zeke’s exposed organ and quickly got rid of the mess. Afterwards, he pulled the crystal from the wall. Its was a pale green ball or testosterone. Suddenly, it doubled in size. Ben dropped in it surprise.

Gwen “Oh… I forgot to make it compress itself. Woops. Amy, can you take care of that? I’m dry on mana.”

Amy “Sure. What’s the spell?”

Gwen “The orb is currently gained HGH from Zeke’s body. All you need to do is imagine it getting compressed into a certain size.”

Amy nodded and looked at the orb on the ground. A purple light began to envelope the now soccer ball sized sphere. There was a crunch sound as it compressed itself. “Done. That was easy.”

Ben reach down and picked up the orb. Suddenly, his medallion flash as if responding to the presence of another growing orb. “Ha! This thing is like a cousin to growthium. I can feel that it’s structure is very similar. However there are minute differences. One being that one of them needs no power source and the other one does.”

Gwen “Wait, so growthium is basically testosterone?”

Ben “Similar, but no. Growthium is made of one type of atom, however, the atoms arrange themselves a certain way. The structures are currently a copy of my DNA, but the protons and neutrons in the atom are arrange so that its similar to testosterone. So, the two compounds are like distant cousins.”

Amy “What would happen it we added a ton of energy? Would it act like growthium?”

Ben paused “I really don’t know.”

Suddenly, they heard a loud growl. Everyone turned to Zeke.

Zeke mumbled in his sleep “So… hungry…”

Ben shook his head and chuckled a little. “I think that all the testosterone that is made takes a lot of energy. We should fix that or he’ll be able to eat a restaurant out of business one day.”

Gwen nodded and made it so that his body used energy more wisely, and that when he ate food, every atom of the food would be turned into energy. That way, he won’t have to eat to much, and if he does, the excess turns in to testosterone. Which is sent into the crystal.

Ben “Ok then. I guess we’re good. When will he wake up?”

At that moment, Zeke’s eyes snapped open and he ran for the kitchen. Ben, Amy, and Gwen just stood in the room shocked.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Expel and compress.

choices: Lets go to Junior year and see what happens then.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
After that incident, Zeke was perfectly fine. He doesn’t remember a thing though. However, his balls are still producing like crazy. Actually, even more now because of the suddenly drop in his body, and also because Zeke eats like crazy.

-------------------

The next day, Zeke come to school like usual. His muscles were still the same size. He was bigger than Ben, but Ben weighed more since his work outs make his muscles really dense.

Zeke says to Ben, Mark and Jake “Who’s ready for practice today?”

Ben laughed “I hope the answer is yes because you’re all going to die if you aren’t.”

---------------------

At the end of practice…

Mark was half awake on the ground. Ben had made his workout harder at Mark’s request. “You’re… killing… me… slowly…”

Ben smiled “Its your own fault. You asked for it. Also, I told you guys to be ready.”

Next to Mark was Zeke and Jake. Jake was trying to sky some water but his hand shook so badly that he couldn’t. Zeke was taking a nap on a bench press.

Ben “Who wants smoothies?”

In a flash, all three teens were fully away and functional. They hands were held out in waiting. “Gimme.”

Ben gave each person two and they downed in a second.

This goes for another week or so, and guess what! With Ben’s help. They reached their goals.

-----------------

Its now that day of their race.

Zeke did all his captain duties (ie. Give a speech, etc).

Ben got the team to warm up correctly

Jake and Mark were being Jake and Mark. Not in that specific order.

Zeke “We have this in the bag. Now guys, I want you all to pull 200%. We race only once, so make it count. Got it? I know it’ll be competitive, so we’ll have to pull all the harder. Thanks to Ben, we made to out 16min mark. Now I want it to be 15min today. Now lets get on that boat.”

With that, they got on the water and rowed to the starting point.

2 min later, they were told to line up.

1 min later, they were told to row up to the starting line.

30 sec later, they started.

Their coxswain, Jenny, whom I forgot to mention was a friendly and down to earth kid, Everyone like her. However, the moment she got in the boat, if you didn’t row 200%, she’ll make you. She prepared a speech and everything.

7min later, they had passed a dozen boats and Jenny was still yelling at them to row harder. “COME ONE GUYS! IS THAT ALL YOU’VE GOT! I’VE SEEN MY GRANDMA ROW HARDER THAN YOU GUYS ARE! ARE YOU GOING TO ACCEPT THAT! NOW POER TEN IN TWO!”

6 min later, they passed the finish line and passed out. Trace pulled her motor boat up next to them and shook her head.

Jenny smiled “How’d we do?”

Trace frowned “You all had to break the record didn’t you? Now how are we supposed to get this boat of the water? They all passed out! Oh, by the way, good job. You finished in 13 minutes. I have it on camera and everything!”

Jenny smiled “Ok, so what now?”

Trace smiled “I have an idea. Can you get out of the boat? Here, hop on to my boat.” Jenny carefully go onto Tracey’s boat. “Now, Jenny, can you tip their boat over?”

Jenny looked at Trace in shock, but did it anyway.

SPLASH

A bunch of arms flailed in the water and grabbed onto the boat.

Zeke “What on earth just happened. Why do my arms hurt like h-” He stopped himself because he got a glare from Trace.

Ben looked around and saw other motor boats coming along to help out the tipped boat.

After a while, they got onto land and they lived happily ever after.

NOT!

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Disaster avoided, but what else is coming?

choices: Who remembers Ken? Lets see what going on in space.
Know what? Lets just go to senior year. The greatest year of all.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Junior year… the hardest year in high school…

Starting from when they won the race, to now, Ben had gone through another growth spurt. For some reason, it was more massive than before. Maybe it had to do with the orb, but whatever. He grew a huge 8in making him the tallest person in school if not the town. Along with that, his muscles grew larger to match his new height.

Ben - Junior
Age: About 17
Height: A towering 7ft 8in!
Weight: 300lbs
Description: Amy complains that her neck hurts to look up at him…
At school, he towers over everyone and he constantly has to look down in order to meet their eyes. The tallest kid, next to Ben, is Xen, but that’s beside the point.
Over the summer, despite Ben’s defiance, his body grew more muscle to match his height. He worried that they would grow to abnormal sizes and that would ruin all that he’s worked for. His biceps were pushing for 5in diameter and even more when he flexed. His pecs jutted out a good 3in making it only marginally hard for Ben to see his lower body. (He can still see it, but he has to try harder). When he looked past his large pecs, he sees an eight pack that fits perfectly into his taller torso. His thighs muscles up and increases his speed. They only, just barely touch, so they don’t implied his speed. Not to mention his bubble butt, etc. His pride, though he doesn’t think to much about it, could hang just about his knees. At a monstrous 15in long with softballs for balls, he could make enough cum to fill Amy and them some. That’s what he worries about…

Zeke graduated and moved onto a college somewhere in Europe. With a full scholarship to boot!

Mark, after winning the race, was hunted down by dozens of colleges offering him a full ride! His smarts and his muscle were a powerful asset to what ever school he chose to go to.

Jake, after his time in Ben’s boot camp learnt how to really commit to something. With his victory at the HOTC, he could go to any college with little resistance. He got some decent scholarship, but not a full ride. His grades weren’t all to amazing…

Seth - Junior
Age: About 17
Height: 6ft 6in
Weight: 270lbs
Description: With his natural growth coming to and end, and his hormones settling down, its amazing that he even grew 4in. With help from Ben, he managed to put on another 20lbs of muscle. However, its all in size. He was gigantic! 8in of pec just of his body like a protective shield. His biceps were earth shattering watermelons. When he walked he had to waddle just a tiny bit to move. Not to mention his schlong. 12in of baby Seth hung between his legs.

Nick - Junior
Age: 17
Height: 6ft 4in
Weight: 300
Description: What ever was left of his growing mostly went into his muscles. His height leveled out to its current 6ft4in, but muscles were able to gain 30lbs with Ben’s work out. He was peeved when he realized that he was shorter than Seth and even more so when he had to do a full tilt of his head to see Ben. However, he discovered that he beat Seth at least two things. One is strength. His muscles match Seth in size since he is shorter and has more muscle mass, however, its more dense, so he’s stronger. The other is, though he found out be accident, that his dick was bigger. (Lets just say it happened in Health class while they were learning about how the reproductive system worked). All in all, he was satisfied with life and with his 14in rod and softball balls.

Ralph: Still works as an assistant coach at his favorite high school

Amy grew quite a bit. It seems that handing around Ben more and more influenced her hormones. Her body molded itself into and hour glass kind of shape, but her breasts were huge. For some reason, they waited till the end of her puberty to expand. She has to get new bras soon since her latest pair were digging into her.
This caused quite a bit of panic of Ben when he found himself in less control of his own endowment when ever he look at Amy to long.
Amy had been unable to do gymnastics and other balance based activities until recently since her new growth threw her off balance.

Gwen was of similar change, however, not as much. She grew into EE’s and she developed some curves. However, it stopped there because her karate classes prevented her from going further. She put to much demand on her body for it to do anything else but stay tone and agile.
However! It seems like her Anodite growth spurt just kicked in. Her species, at this time, experience a massive explosion in mana, and their mana begins to strengthen in some areas of magic more than others. They cans still do all spells. Its just that some will be stronger than others.
Nick wasn’t as scared as Ben about the changes. He hinted that wanted to try doing ‘it’ if Gwen felt up to it. If not, then he’d wait.
Ben was of the same manner, but was afraid he might lose himself.

This is going to be an interesting year…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets go to Junior year and see what happens then.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben and Amy were sitting next to each other in AP Chem. Ben was towering over her by at least 2ft. When he looked down, he could see her massive cleavage which caused him his monster cock to fill with blood. Nick would feel that same way things at Ben’s height. Ben breath in and out until he calmed down.

Ben thought… I need to work on abstinence. I really need to work on it.

Amy looked at Ben and smiled. She knew how he was reacting to her body, and she knew he’d be fine. Its just some left over hormones from his growth spurt that was getting him all worked up.

Amy was looking at the board and saw a bunch of elements, etc. All the science made her remember another scientist she knew.

Amy: “Hey Ben. Do you remember Ken? I wonder how he’s doing.”

Ben was kind of glad for the distraction “I don’t know. We should call him after school. You know… to check up on him. I think he’ll be fine though.”

Amy smiled “I know. Maybe we should visit him.”

Ben “Know what? That’s a good idea.”

Suddenly, their teacher Ms. Que stated “Ben… did you know its hard not to notice a near 8ft tall kid trying to whisper to someone?”

Ben paused than shook his head “Sorry. won’t happen again.”

Ms. Que (First name is Molly. Get it? Molly Que… molecule?), nodded her head “I hope so Mr. Tennyson. We don’t want to see what will happen when report cards come out.”

Ben swallowed his fear and nodded vigorously. “I totally understand.”

Ms. Que smiled “Good.” She turned her attention to the class “Now, who know the periodic table?”

----------

Friday after school, Ben called the gang together to go visit Ken. Their parents said ok one way or another.

Ben “Ok. Then, its settled. We’re off to space… again!”

Seth “Actually, its my first time.”

Nick “Same here.”

Amy “Same…”

Ben “Oh… ok then. I guess we’ll need to get you some suites and what not.” he turns to Gwen “Gwen, Do you remember where Gramps put those see-through suites? Those were pretty nice.”

Gwen thought about it and then snapped her fingers. There was a purple flash and a 5 plumbler badge/suites appeared. “Here they are.”

Ben laughed “So, basically, you just put this over your chest and press the middle. Give it a shot.” A moment later, they were covered in invisible suites, etc.

Amy “Shouldn’t we call Ken first? To see if he’s free?”

Ben smiled “Lets surprise him.”

Amy scrunched her face “Should we get him a present? Just incase we come at a bad time?”

Gwen “Ben, she has point.”

Ben “What should we get?”

Nick “I say we let him perform an experiment on Ben. Maybe give a little of your muscle tissue just to see how dense you really are.”

Ben laughed “Funny, but no. That’s not happening. Someone already got a hold of my DNA and that went horribly.”

Seth “If anything, I think we should get him something made of growthium. That stuff can do anything.”

They agreed on it, so…

Ben “Off to Gravitron!”

In a flash of purple, they appear on the desolate planet of Gravitron.

Amy “Where are we?”

Ben “We’re on Gravitron. Its composed entirely of Gravitum and its about the size of a few hundred thousand suns. Though, it weighs almost nothing.

Amy “Seriously!?”

Ben “Yup.”

Gwen “So how much do we need? And what are we making?”

Ben “I say we make a laboratory dimension for him. You know… with test tubes, beakers, etc.”

Nick and Seth agreed. What ever time they spent with him was spent mostly talking about science.

Ben lets them talk about the design and stuff for the present “I got to go check something out. I want to see something.”

They all let him since he could take care of himself.

Ben ran around until he found the giant hole he had made to find the heat stones. He jumped down and fell for a good 20 minutes. No sound was made since there was no air to carry the sound.

Everything was pitch black. Responding to him, his medallion began to glow a brilliant green so that he could see. Ben walked along until he found the entrance to the chamber he was in before.

Ben “So… Gravitron is made of gravitum… and when gravitum is formed into a circle, a universe is made…. So where is this universe?” Ben strolled around until he got to center of the chamber. Then he got another question “What does gravitum turn gravity into? The energy has to go somewhere…”

Ben decided to test it out. He took of his necklace and then… nothing happened.

Wait! Cross that. The intense pressure at the center of the planet was already huge, but now there was something else increasing the pressure. Ben’s gravity stabbed at the planet. The only reason that Ben’s necklace didn’t collapse is because its was made of near infinite gravitum. The amount of gravitum in his necklace was larger than the universe in order to counter act Ben’s gravitational pull. Gravitron was no where near enough.

The chamber grew smaller and small as it collapsed on itself.

------

On the surface, ground was shaking. Gwen and Amy had cast a spell to counter act Ben’s gravity on anything beyond gravitron.

Gwen “That idiot! He took of his necklace.”

Amy laughed “He’s just being curious. I guess he thought that Gravitron would counter act his gravitational pull.”

Nick “Well! He thought wrong. How’s the spell holding up?”

Gwen “Its fine. We’re using Ben’s mana field as a power source. We’ll be fine.”

Amy “Yah. His mana field expanded so much that its beyond this universe.”

-----

Ben was looking for some changes. first off, the chamber was getting small, so his gravity was having an effect. However, the majority of his gravitational pull was being converted into bond energy (energy that holds gravitum together). The more energy in the bonds, the more unique the gravitum is. This also how Hearthstones are formed. They are one of a few things that the gravitum can turn into. One other is the metal that protects Amy’s hearthstone. However, those are formed under intense conditions. What will be made from the beyond extreme conditions that Ben makes?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Who remembers Ken? Lets see what going on in sp...

choices: As Nick would say "Now can we visit Ken?"
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Then suddenly, chunks of gravitum got ripped off the wall of the chamber. As they rocket towards Ben, they shank down and then collided with each other. Slowly, the newly amassed chunk of gravitum began to glow a metallic silver as it converted Ben’s gravitational pull into bond strength. Quickly, the strength grew massive and the mass of gravitum began pulling at the walls of the chamber. Thin strings of super charged gravitum webbed its way towards the ball. The string was as thin as an atom, but as strong as Ben himself (since its formed using the strength of his gravity). The string began to weave around the ball/chunk of gravitum in a random, yet ordered, pattern. However, it was impossible to copy. With every passing moment, the ball gained more and more energy (in its bonds), and the string wove even faster. The ball was flaring iridescent silver, white, and black all over the chamber walls. As soon as the web of string finished weaving itself around the ball, it burst into brilliant metallic silver light.

Something told Ben that he should put his necklace back on, or the gravity that isn’t absorbed by the gravitum will rip apart the universe. As soon as the necklace touched his neck, the tremors in the planet stopped. Floating in front of him was the a ball of Nexus Gravitum. A ball held together by bonds that are stronger than the universe itself.

Ben looked at it. It was glowing a hazy silver. Ben reached out and grabbed it. He felt a shock run up his arm and then it stopped. He could feel the ball controlling his gravitational pull. It was containing every bit of it inside its infinite bonds. This tiny ball has more anti-gravitational powers than the planet gravitron itself. Ben let the ball go and it began to float just above his hand. He could still feel it containing his gravitational pull.

Ben grabbed it again and began to walk out. As the green and silver glow of his orb and the gravitum mixed, it revealed of much the chamber was changed. Its once rough contours had been stripped till it was smooth. Ben looked around for the exit and saw something he hadn’t before. The chamber was pulsing with energy now. The exit/entrance was covered by a thin silvery film.

Beyond it, he saw a colorful terrain filled with multicolored plant life (well… they looked like plants), and other peaceful looking animals.

Ben “Is that this planet’s universe?” Ben made his way towards it and touched the silvery film. His hand passed right through it. Ben pushed on through.

As soon as he got through, he felt his body being repelled by the planet. What ever it was made of, it didn’t listen to gravity. It was tugging on everything else… why not him? Then Ben saw something. The plants and other living things had tiny silver dots. They were the only plants that grew on gravitum. They were made of it! Ben pulled out the Nexus (I‘m going to call it the Nexus because calling it a Gravitum ball is to much of a hassle), and prayed that it would be attracted to the planet.

Like a magnet, the nexus pulled Ben toward the planet the moment there were no barriers in the way, such as skin of cloths.

As soon as Ben landed, he grabbed a nearby plant and held on. He slowly let go and finally released the plant. The Nexus has attached Ben to the planet.

Ben “Where and I?” He looked around until he realized what he was standing on. The soil felt like soil, but it was grey and metallic. “What is this?” Ben knelt down and picked some up. He let it trickle between his fingers. Then he stood up to his fullest and towered over the vegetation. There were tree like things, but they were a mix of green, blue, and yellow. He looked up and saw 3 great suns blasting down on the planet. When he looked off into the distance, he saw a dozen more. This planet was huge! It was like a copy of Gravitron, but with life. Where did those suns come from?

Ben pulled out a small container and put some of the soil inside, and then he picked a few plants. “I hope I can come back here. This place is pretty awesome.”

Ben didn’t have his bag, so he had to settle with putting this stuff in his large pockets. Then he made his way back to the portal/gateway and went through. He was back in the chamber now. He looked around and realized that the portal was the only exit, but he didn’t want to break that. Then he remembered that he could talk to Amy telepathically.

Ben thought “Hey Amy. I have a small situation.”

Amy let out a small laugh. She could hear the sarcasm in his voice. “Well… that’s not good. How can I help?”

Ben “Well… I discovered a parallel universe that is connected to Gravitron. A portal to this place formed when I took off my necklace. However, the portal formed at the only exit in this chamber at the center of Gravitron. Care to teleport me out?”

Amy’s thoughts were silent “What! You found another universe. You mean one that hasn’t been obliterated by your semen?”

Ben laughed at how nonchalant her statement was “Umm… Yah.”

Amy “Well alright. Did you bring something back?”

Ben “You bet, but I can’t show you till you get me out of here.”

-------------------

There was a white flash and Ben appeared on the surface.

Amy “So what did you find?”

Nick “You’re back! What happened down there?”

Seth “I thought this place would implode!”

Gwen stormed up to Ben and glared at him. Suddenly, with lighting speed, she slapped him so hard that even his super dense muscles couldn’t protect him against it.

Ben’s cheek started to turn red from the impact “What was that for!?!?!?”

Gwen “That was for nearly obliterating the universe!”

Ben “Oh… I thought the planet would contain it. Wait a minute… how did that slap hurt?”

Gwen scoffed “I put some mana into it. That’s why!”

Ben sighed “Well… its alright because I found life!”

Gwen paused “What in the name of Andromeda do you mean?”

Ben reached into his pockets and pulled out some plants and the container of soil. “This life. Gravitron has a parallel planet that is filled with these things. Everything is made of gravitum. I think the liquid there is too! Though, the moment I stepped through the portal, I was shoved off its surface.”

Seth “Hey guys… guess what?”

They looked at him “What?”

Seth picked up a plant “We have a present for Ken. He’s going to love this!”

The others paused and thought about what he just said and then agreed.

What now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Nexus Gravitum Core

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Nick “Now can we visit Ken?”

Gwen “Well…”

Amy butted in “Sure!” She snapped her fingers and the vanished in a flash of white light.

------------------------

(Note: I do not claim ownership of The Thing. The movie just gave me a lot of ideas. =D)

The OOPS (Olympus Of Plumber Scientist) was formed and funded by Dr. D. Matter along with Co-funder and creator Dr. G. Matter, or better known as the Matter Twins. They are the revolutionary new thinking scientist of the millennia. In their search for knowledge, they discovered a planet and named it Gravitum since it went against gravity. Their discovered branched off into new studies, namely Gravitology. The study of Gravity and all its tiny quirks.

The facility had an amazing start. Studies in a vast area of subjects expanded and grew. They found away to turn common graphite into diamond with a simply contraption, and vice verse. Four years of this type of progress, and then they had a fall out.

-----------------------

One week prior (earth time), Ken was in the bio synthesizer lab. He was trying to make a life form that could basically become a clone of another organic life form. If this were to succeed, then he’d finish his dream to create a second chance at life. If someone died of an unnatural causes, then this life form could be put into that body to copy it and continue living as though it was never killed. It’d be live a video game, you have more than one life. (Memory and all)

He was taking notes of any changes in what he saw before him. In front of him, a large vat/contain fill with a special liquid contained a strange life form. It was a basically a pinkish clump of goo that could potentially bring back the dead.

An assistant comes on “We have a dead sample for out test. Where and when shall we proceed.”

Ken paused writing “Here… and now…”

The assistant nodded and called for the body. The assistant, a diamond head/ghost freak hybrid, was Ken’s assistant because he’s the only one that would talk to a freak like her.(No one even knows how that happened). However, Ken thought differently.

Ken watched the other transport aliens come and go. “Thank you Rika (short for Rikaringabinta). I really appreciate you helping me out. I don’t think I could do this with out you.”

Rika blushed (well… it looked like a blush. Who knows what a hybrid blush looks like?). “It was my pleasure Doctor. No one else lets me work with them.”

Ken smiled “I don’t know why. You’re such a nice person. If they spoke with you once, they would be able to tell instantly. They’re just a bunch of discriminate hypocrites if you ask me. I’ve seen citizens of their own species commit more treachery than you. And that doesn’t take much effort seeing that you haven’t done a single wrong thing.”

Rika simply glowed with adoration for the doctor “Doctor…”

Ken “Oh… and one more thing. If you want to continue working with me, you have to call me Ken. Understood?”

Rika paused “Of course Doc… of course Ken” she said correcting herself.

Ken smiled “Ok. Now lets see if all our work has paid off. Rika, can you drain the vat?”

Rika smiled “Already on it Doc… I mean Ken.” She thought… Oh! This is so weird calling him Ken. She did what he asked and collected the pick organism inside an air tight container. “Retrieval complete… Ken.”

Ken smiled “See? That wasn’t so hard. Now can you please inject the specimen with the organism please.”

Rika smiled and did what he said.

The specimen was a Wildbeast killed in an accident with a space cruiser (orange with fangs… remember?).

Rika stuck a tube into the wildbeast and one into the sealed container. Slowly, the pink organism worked its way into the wildbeast.

Ken was watching and taking notes like never before. You could barely see his hands because they were so fast. Rika moved away and stood by Ken.

The wildbeast began to bulge and ripple as the organism did its job. Suddenly, the stomach ripped open and out stepped a wildbeast. An exact copy as well! It started sniffing the air and looking around.

Rika burst with joy “Doctor! I mean Ken! You did it. You’re a genius.”

Ken smiled “I didn’t do it alone.”

Rika blushed “Now guess what! You can present this to the Matter Twins and rank up even higher than you are now! With something like this, we can minimize war casualties.”

Ken sighed “Yah…”

Rika “What’s wrong?”

Ken “Only the creator and the specimen can go before them.”

Rika “Oh… Its ok. You’ll do fine. I’ll try to see if I can watch you from a window or something.” She already knew that there were no windows.

Ken sighed “Well… Unless we were co-creators. Then I guess they’d have to let us both go.”

Rika gasped “You’re… you’re… going to share credit??? This could be the greatest find of the century. I‘m only on the first rank. This could ruin your chance at the 11th rank.”

The wildbeast began to move around and sniff things. However, it was acting strange. Almost aggressive, or stalking its prey.

Ken smiled “Well, credit is due where credit is deserved, and you’ve worked far harder than I have.

Rika denied it “No… not more! At most is equal, but I doubt that.”

Ken continued smiling “Well, in any case, we’ll be going tomorrow.”

Rika was bursting with excitement.

Ken was looking at his notepad and saw the wildbeast stalking Rika. Suddenly it jumped to attack. “Rika! Look out!” Ken charged at Rika to shove her out of the path of assault.

Rika look turned and saw the wildbeast, and froze from surprise. Just before its large jaw clamped down on her, Ken shoved her out of the way. “Ken!”

The wildbeast managed to sink its teeth into Ken’s lower spine and abdominal.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: The Past Part I

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
In a rage, Rika used abilities that she had sworn never to use again. She fired shadowy crystals at the wildbeast tearing it apart. A dark ghostly energy surged out of the crystal and dissolved the wildbeast. It thrashed in pain and agony, and then it lay still.

Kira ran up to Ken. “Ken! Ken! Stay with me. Don’t go. Come on… come on!” She was shaking his head lightly. Trying to nudge him awake.

Ken coughed a little and looked at Kira. She had a single tear on her beautiful geometric and crystalline face. Ken reach out and collected it on his finger tip. “Such a beautiful and horrible thing this liquid is…” he grasped the tear in his hand and place it over his heart. Then his eyes closed.

Rika “Ken… Ken… KEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You can’t leave me. Not now. We were going to present it…” She realize that this was all it’s fault. She looked at the decaying carcass of the wildbeast and fired assault after assault of dark crystals. Suddenly, she felt something grab her leg.

Ken’s eyes were bugging out from the strain of staying alive. He reached for Rika and grabbed her leg. He tried to instill a sense of calm in her mind, and it worked.

Rika didn’t wait a second longer. She picked Ken up and went ghost freak. She phased through wall after wall after wall, and each time it hurt her. She had discarded this form a long ago.

She appeared in the infirmary “Quickly! Ken’s hurt.”

An assembly of nurses and a doctor can rushing out. The nurses took Ken from Rika’s arms and put him on a gurney. They rush him into the ER.

-------------------------------

A few minutes later, Rika was brought into interrogation. They were exceptionally hard on her, and terribly bias.

Interrogator 1 “What did you do to him!?!?”

Rika “I didn’t do anything. We had just finished an experiment, but it went wrong… really wrong.”

Inter 2 “Lies. There was a decaying wildbeast when we searched. It was to violent to have been a simply accident.”

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The gang appear in front of OOPS in a blinding flash of white.

Nick “Finally, we’re here. I’m dying to see what Ken’s created.”

Seth spoke in a diabolical voice “He’s created life!” The irony is that he’s right.

Gwen did a face palm.

Amy “Ok. Let’s be on our best behavior. We’re representing Ken as colleagues. Act more your age.”

Ben “She’s right. We’re not kids anymore.”

Nick and Seth sighed “Yes mother…”

Then everyone laughed.

Ben “Don’t use that tone of voice with me young men.”

This got them laughing again.

Suddenly, OOPS was put under lock down. Alarms sounded and light flashed.

Intercom “OOPS is under lockdown. No one is to leave or enter. Disobedience will be considered an act of hostility. Punishment will be severe.”

Right after that, a series of red lasers shot out and surrounded the gang.

Intercom “Sorry… no visitors. Have a nice day.”

Nick and Seth’s mouths were hanging open from shock. “What just happened?

Ben’s face got serious “Something’s going on inside. We better get in there. Ken might be hurt.”

Gwen and Amy looked at each other and thought of a spell to use. Just as they began chanting…

Nick and Seth unsealed themselves and grew to massive sizes. They jumped into the air and smashed the lasers. Then they shrank down. At that same moment, they felt the divine fury of women. They could feel the angry glares of to mana users.

Then the feeling stopped.

Intercom “Hostile actions have been recognized. Prepare to be terminated in 10... 9... 8...”

Then they felt the divine fury of women again, but even angrier.

Gwen “The idiocy!”

Nick looked down feeling ashamed like a small school boy being lectured by his mother. “Sorry.”

Gwen sighed “Don’t let it happen again.”

Amy sighed “Gwen… spell?”

Gwen “Follow my lead.”

Then they started to chant. A purple and white sphere began to form around the gang.

Seth snickered at Nick, but got a glare from both girls. This shut him up.

Ben was doing a face palm… “My friends… are all crazy…”

Amy “Ben… what was that?”

Ben smiled “My friends are all crazy!”

Amy smiled “That’s what I thought you said. don’t you forget it.”

Intercom “3... 2... 1... Terminating.” a red laser fired at the gang. As soon as it hit the shield, it was reflected back on itself thereby destroying the laser.

The shield went down and Ben stepped up to the main entrance of OOPS. He unclipped his medallion and punched the enforced barricade. It never stood a chance. The structure crumbled into nothing but rubble and dust.

The gang moved forward.

OOPS was one giant facility. In summary, OOPS is a planet all to itself. The Matter Twins funded a dig out of a death planet and hollowed it out. The overly compulsive twins even paid extra so that the surface of the planet was made smooth (like a giant marble!). The surface of the planter is completely black. The reason is that OOPS created a liquid solar panel. They spilt it all over the planet thereby turning it into a giant solar planet. It collect enough energy to power hundreds of planets and more.

The main building that Ben just open up is kind of overly extravagant. OOPS allowed visitors in to inspire new thinkers and ideas. The moment the gang strolled in, they saw a room filled with countless display cases. Only some of them were filled in.

Nick looked around and saw a giant signed with hundreds of languages. The one in English said “Welcome to OOPS.” and right below it was a hologram showing how this place got its name and how it was formed.

Nick “So what now? It doesn’t seem like the place is under lock down. Everything is running.”

Gwen “There’s no activity. Where is everyone?”

As if on queue, a dozen armed aliens marched in and surrounded the gang.

Nick and Seth were about ready to pounce, but Ben told them to stop.

A larger than average fourarms walked up. He saw Ben, and assumed Ben was in charge.

Fourarms “You are trespassing. This is considered an act of hostility. Name your purpose.”

Ben started at the fourarms eye level. “We came to visit an old colleague Dr. Ken. Is he well?”

Fourarms narrowed his four green eyes “You are friends of Ken?”

Ben nodded “Yah. Though, when we got here, this place just went into lock down. What’s going on here?”

Fourarms watched Ben cautiously and then turned to his minions “Arms down. They don’t appear hostile.” Then he turned to Ben “We’ll trust you for now, but don’t think we aren’t watching you.”

Ben raised his arms in resignation “I couldn’t ask for more considering the circumstance.”

Fourarms “Follow me.” He turned and walked down a labyrinth of corridors. When he stopped, they were in front of a dead end. He walked up to the wall and tapped a few spots. Then the wall phased out of existence and they continued through.

They were in a white room with white lighting and white desks and chairs and white everything.

Ben narrowed his eyes as he adjusted to the bright setting “What’s with all the white?”

Fourarms frowned “I don’t really know, but ever since lock down, all the lighting in this place has gone on the fritz. The coloring should tone down soon.” Just like he said, the white coloring faded away into variety of other colors. He sighed “Much better”

Ben “So what’s the issue?”

Fourarms “We need help, and soon. Your friend Dr. Ken created something. No one has any idea what it is. Our only clues were from this lady we interrogated, but the idiots were discriminate to take any not of what she said. Now its taken her too. This thing… it’s supposedly pale green. Its supposed to basically bring someone back to life. Not the original body. Some of our men have been attacked by it, and… Well first off, it enters the body and I we assume it copies the victim from the inside. Then it bursts outward as an exact replica. Well… without the cloths and other things. The victim is reborn, but with out old injuries. Unless they were born deformed. Then the thing comes out deformed.”

As soon as they enter, they felt a backlash of energy. It whipped through their bodies energizing them. For Nick and Seth, it closed the wounds on their punctured organs and re-grew their drained muscles.

Ben “Something’s off.”

Ben looked around. There were the usual green planets and stars, and the occasional rogue meteor. However, everything was warped. Even more so than usual. Suddenly, a flair of energy stabbed at them again. Ben looked and saw the source. A little while off, the orb was attracting stray planets and stars and absorbing them, and as soon as they touch, the orb releases a spray of untamed energy. Its gotten so dense that the rules of the universe were being warped. Everything was slowly being devoured by the orb. However, the paradox recreated the absorbed stars and planets at the boundaries of the universe. First it was the liquid. Now it was everything else.

Gwen “Is your orb attracting everything?”

The sight was like two galaxies colliding. Energy was sprayed everywhere as the nexus tried to tame it and put a leash on it. The nexus expanded until the orb could fit between its strands. Once the orb was in, the nexus shrank down encasing the orb. Suddenly, the nexus began to glow grey, but that quickly turned to green as the orb’s energy morphed the nexus. Slowly, the nexus’s atomic geometry changed to better handle the awesome power of growthium.

Ben looked around and saw that the planets and stars had begun to follow their original orbits.

Amy giggled “Its alright. I’m cool with it. Your crazy hormones must have made the orb a little crazy too. Together, you get a monster growth spurt.”

Gwen chimed in “Nuh uh. Do you know how much I had to hear from Nick about your body’s growing addiction? He complains that he’s too short! Ha! He’s taller than ¾ of the school!”

Gwen sighed “Sadly, yes. Its got to be stronger than both you and Seth by now, so only Ben could stop it. However, on the bright side, Ben’s universe restored your maxes. The moment you came in here, it grew you back to your previous size.” Gwen was trying to cheer Nick up. He probably felt bummed out that he wasn’t strong enough to defend Gwen.

Nick sighed “Yah, I guess that is good. Its not good enough though. If I’m going to save someone, I have to be able to save them. Its not right to try to save them and then get caught.” Then he looked at Ben. “Hey Ben. Can I have a word with you?”

Ben sense the seriousness in his tone. “Sure. What about?”

Nick made a gesture saying that he’d like some privacy.

Ben understood, so he made a pocket dimension for them to talk in, and they both pop up inside of it. “What’s up?”

Nick “I want to get stronger.”

Ben was shocked by the demand, but he understood why. “You want to protect her?”

Nick nodded “Yes. I’d give up my life if I had to. Back then, when I was duking it out with that thing, I was scared. Scared enough to piss myself. I didn’t because I couldn’t. If I lost, then there was no way Gwen could handle that thing. If I lost… she would have done the only thing she could.”

Ben nodded because he knew who Gwen was. She was brilliant, but totally devoted to her companions. She’d only interfere if it was totally life threatening. However, if someone died… especially Nick… she would have gone toward the brink of insanity. She’d have thrown her life into a spell so disastrous that it could eradicate all life within that hemisphere of the universe. To make it worse, if she needed to, she’d have tapped into Ben’s mana to add fuel to the spell. That would have killed all life! “I understand, and I’m willing. However, do you understand what you’re asking?”

He tried to pry them open, but he couldn’t. He looked at his handy work satisfied that it would keep him safer than before.

What do they plan?
