Gwen “Ready guys? Its going to try to drain from you guys again.”

Seth sighed “I don’t understand why Ben can’t just throw it into the sun himself. He’s more than strong enough to do it.”

Ben smiled “But I’m going to be lazy and let your two do it. Plus, Nick has a bone to pick with this Thing.” Ben looked over at Nick, and Nick nodded in reply.

Gwen looked over at Nick’s determined face. Something was different. She sensed his mana was different, but she couldn’t tell unless she really looked. Once she tried, she gasped. His mana spanned the entire galaxy, and then some. “Nick! You gr-”

Nick ran up and covered Gwen mouth. He smiled “Shh… don’t let Seth hear, or I’ll never here the end of it.”

Gwen nodded and smiled. She knew why he’d done it, but she wished the Ben would end it quickly. Although she knew Nick was strong… like really strong, she couldn’t stand the thought of losing him. She almost lost him before, she can’t deal with the actual reality.

Amy was standing next to Ben. She could feel the warmth coming from his goliath body, so she stepped closer. She grabbed his hand. Ben looked down and they stared at each others eyes for a little while. “I don’t want to be friends anymore.”

Ben let out a silent thanks “I don’t either.”

Suddenly, they felt the ground shake.

Seth “Seems like our eight armed friend is awake.”

Nick cracked a few knuckles and smiled deviously “Awesome. Payback time. He’s going to wish me never messed with me.”

There was another thud, followed by another, and another.

--------------------------

The Thing was in agony. Its exoskeleton was shattered by something. It didn’t know what. It got up and summoned a few of its smaller minions. The thing made them grow a dozen times larger, then it ate them. Slowly, the Thing healed. It could sense that there were thousands of uninfected scientists on the lowest levels of this science planet. During its one week freedom, it had infects about 20,000 scientists and paid military soldiers. Slowly, each soldier and scientist grew to abnormal sizes, and quickly, each one was eaten. With each one it ate, it grew some more and got denser.
The Thing would not lose again.

---------------------------

Amy “It’s mana… its so dark and evil.”

Gwen “Yah… and its getting bigger. You can see it right?”

Amy “The mana of hundreds of things vanishing. Its so… I can’t even describe it.”

Nick popped a few more knuckles. “Well that ends now. Seth, are you ready?”

Seth was leaning against a wall nonchalantly “Duh! What do you think I’ve been waiting for?”

Nick smiled “Alright. Lets go.” The gang started moving. Nick and Seth bolted forward at their minimums. They were two 17 year olds that had giant hulking bodies that could dwarf any junior bodybuilder and fill any pro bodybuilder with envy. Following them were three other 17 year olds. Two magically intoned girls and a towering giant.

-----------------------------

Outside the main entrance, the Thing has gotten so large that it needs to go outside. Standing at about 3 miles tall, its learnt that it could grow to the size of 20times the planet it stood on. However, if it did that, it’d suffocate to death.

The Thing waited for its earthly victims to come so it could drain them for all they were worth. It knew it was getting smarter. It was slowly absorbing the intelligence of thousands of scientist. Its senses were sharper than before, and its armored skin was next to unbreakable.

Suddenly, it felt the earthlings come out the main entrance.

Thing spoke “Hello earthlings. I’m overjoyed that I didn’t have to hunt for you.”

*Breaking Fourth Wall*

Gwen “Ok Author! Since when could he talk”

Author “Just now actually. He’s been fully capable of think words, but his brain couldn’t get the words out. Duh… I thought you were the smart one.”

Gwen fumed “I am!” In here hand was a glowing ball of purple energy.

Author freaks out “Oh god! Must repair fourth wall.”

Gwen yells “Not before I’m done with you.” She hurls a hailstorm of mana onto the author, but just before they hit the author, the fourth wall is repaired.

*Repaired Fourth Wall*

Gwen was in the back of the group mumbling hatefully “Stupid author and his superior attitude and his fourth wall. Wait till I get my hands on you.

Suddenly, a giant voice in the sky declared “Watch it Gwen. Ben may be strong, but this is my realm.”

Gwen yells a string of curses at the sky and fires a giant ball of mana at it.

Up front, the Thing was very much confused. He turned to the few remaining minions he had “What just happened?” Even his multitude of scientific brains couldn’t decipher what just happened.

Nick was now restraining Gwen again while trying to calm her down. “I know… I know. The author can get a little cocky, but you aren’t so calm yourself.”

Voice in the sky “I though I repaired the fourth wall. How can you still be talking like this! Maybe I calibrated it incorrectly. Oh! Here’s the problem.” You here a lot of stuff falling and crashing.

Suddenly, Gwen and Nick look at each other totally confused.

Gwen “What was I ranting about?”

Nick scratched his head “I sincerely do not know.”

The Thing had enough of the distractions. He roared a roar that shook the planet.

This got Nick and Seth’s attention. They released their seals and grew to match the monster in size. If they grew any larger, they wouldn’t be able to breath I the thin atmosphere.

The Thing charged at them with its eight cocks standing to attention. Nick and Seth split up and attacked from opposite sides hoping to disorientate the Thing. However, it used its eight arms and grabbed both giants. Quickly, its cocks went for a strike.

Nick and Seth reacted quickly. Nick easily shoved the arms away with his galactic muscles. Seth had a little more difficulty, but he managed. The cock was only inches away from puncturing him.

The Thing bellowed in rage as Nick and Seth began to run circles around the Thing. “Stand still! I will not stand for this treatment!”

Seth “Then don’t!” Seth kick the Thing’s legs, and nick punched his front. The Thing did a back flip landing on top of his cock crushing five of them.

The Thing roared in pain “You will pay for that dearly.” It got up and grew them back again and attacked with renewed energy.

Nick and Seth looked at each other and nodded. They had practiced this move a thousand times in their free period at school.

Nick “Ready?”

Seth “Ready!”

Nick jumped and Seth grabbed his feet. Slowly Seth began to swing Nick around in a circle and they built up the speed. Soon they looked like a giant top. WHOOSH! Seth Let go of Nick and Nick went fly at the Thing.

The Thing saw this and braced itself.

They made contact…

What now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Hurl it into a star. (bye bye eight arms... hel...

choices: Lets see what the Twins do.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
They landed throwing up miles of debris. Seth stood up trying to see through the cloud of dust.

Slowly, the dust began t settle… to slow!

Gwen was to impatient. Was Nick alright? She cast a spell and blew the dust away.

Once it was gone, you saw that the thing was down and unconscious. Nick was miles off to the side, also unconscious. The Thing’s armored torso was shattered. It was cracked and splintered. Nick’s forehead was bleeding lakes.

Gwen saw this “Nick!” She teleported to him and began to do her best to mend his wounds.

Seth saw that Nick was out for the count in this match. It was up to him to finish this. Seth ran up to the thing and began to spin it like he had for Nick. However, now he aimed for the heavens. When he got enough momentum, he released the Thing and it flew up racing towards the sun of this planet.

With the thing out of the way, all he had to deal with were the remaining minions. There were very few of them, and they were so small that he had little to worry about. His skin was to thick for them to pierce it.

He went about collecting them in his hand and he lodged them into the sky so fast that the air friction burned them into oblivion.

Suddenly, off to the side, Nick coughed “Is it over?”

Seth smiled “You betcha!”

Nick had already shrunken down, so not he was resting in Gwen’s lap.

She was crying over his face. Then she slapped him “Don’t you dear ever get involved in something like this ever again!”

Nick smiled and then sighed “you know that if it does happen, that only the three of us could deal with them. Well… Ben could probably finish it before it starts. But you get my point.”

Gwen let out a short laugh “I wish I didn’t understand. I wish I could force you to stay with me all the time so you didn’t go running off into these crazy situations.”

Nick smiled “but…?”

Gwen “But I guess that I’m going to have too. it’s the Tennyson’s curse. We always get dragged of into space.” She turned to Ben “Right Ben?”

Ben smiled and gave her a thumbs up. “Yup, but its not so bad. It makes life interesting.”

Amy chimed in “To interesting if you ask me.”

Suddenly, Seth yelled “A few people is coming out!”

The gang turn around to see a pair of twins, Azmuth, and a strange Diamond Head.

The grey twin “Oh dear. We’ll have to start fresh now I guess. Good thing we have the funds to do it.”

The dark twin “It is good fortune indeed. No we can redesign the whole planet!”

Azmuth mumbled “Brothers…”

Ben heard this with his enhanced hearing. He was still unsealed just incase things went wrong. Ben did a mental double take. AZMUTH HAS BROTHERS!
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Its injured badly, but so is Nick.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Azmuth “So Rika, what did you want to show us?”

Rika “The thing Ken created. It killed so many people, and I couldn’t stop it. I tried, but then the cell caved in on me. I barely got out, and when I did, that when I found you guys. I thought you guys might be able to stop it. You know… Everyone knows that when you three are together, that you three can manipulate space and time with your mind. Now the thing is gone.” She pointed to the group of teens.

Azmuth looked shocked “Is that? Yes it is.” He yells “Well hello Ben Tennyson and friends. What brings you here?”

Ben “We wanted to visit Ken, but we ended up having to kill a Thing that could have potentially taken over the universe.”

Azmuth “Oh. That’s nice. Was it fun?”

He heard groans from two largely bulky boys off to the sides “Sounds like a yes! Well come in. Come in. We were just about to go free the other scientist when we ran into Ms. Rika here.”

Amy “Who are the other two?”

Dr. G and D Matter “We are the Matter Twins, and all three of us are the Science Triplets.”

A voice in the sky “What the. I didn’t write that! What is the meaning of this.”

Rika “I think that their reality manipulation powers influenced the story a little.”

Voice “Ha! What ever. You guys write the story for a bit. Ima go take a nap.”

Dr. G and D spoke simultaneously “Where were we? Oh yes. We are the matter twins and we created this laboratory facility here in the name of science.”

Gwen “and you didn’t take any precautions against crazy, psychotic, invasive, parasites?

Twins “Well, we can’t think of every situation. We did however protect against giant muffin invasions. Though we did have a giant rat problem afterwards, but that’s besides the point. We would like to thank you for your service not only for this facility, but the universe. You have diverted a terrible disaster.” The twins walked up and the group. They looked at Ben “You have something strange in your pocket. Something that hasn’t been in this universe for eons. How did you come across Gravitum soil, Gravilotus, and Gravitlilies?”

Ben pulled the plants and soil out of his pocket. “These?” The twins nodded “Well… I found a portal to Gravitum’s universe.”

The twins looked flabbergasted. “What? It was supposed to be impossible.” Then they came to the conclusion. They knew Ben was probably the only one capable or surviving such conditions. “We see… your growthium orb… and wait. We sense a Nexus Gravitatus Corax in that medallion of yours. The only one of its kind. You are an interesting one. You hold two immensely unique and powerful objects. Ben, you see… we created Gravitron. At its birth, we knew it was special. The life on its was extraordinary, and capable of amazing things. We knew it would we stripped of all life in the hunt for fortune by other species. First, we made it difficult to get to by making it so that it would repel any other form of matter. This worked for only a millennia. Then the Anodites came into being. Born from the only purple star, and nothing less. Beautify creatures. Except one was corrupted into aiding fortune hunters. With spells, he, the anodite, helped battalions of fortune hunters mine at the planet’s surface for its plants. The plants were special. They, for one part, lower cholesterol by up to 90%, but they also increase your life span. However, if someone were dying, then these plants could heal any injury, but they grew so slowly, and only in one place on earth, Gravitron. To protect our most beautiful creation, we sealed the planet in itself. Turned it inside out so to speak. The universe, the original, was actually shoved into Gravitron, and what we live in now is a dimension of Gravitron. We asked the Anodites to help us construct a spell so strong that it copied the universe to replace the old one. Now, the old one is inside Gravitron. We sealed it off until recently. We went to check a few hours ago because we felt someone had accessed it, and we were right.”

They looked at Amy. “And you have something equally as amazing as Ben’s Growthium and his Nexus. Your hearthstone is the heart of this universe. During its creation, Ben fused the pieces together into that, and his mana help link it to this universe. For a brief moment, darkness was eradicated. Protect that stone with your life, and it will protect you.”

Then they turned to Nick and Gwen “Hmm… interesting. I don’t recall there ever being an Anodite/Human hybrid. Powerful combination of Human imagination and anodite will/pride. We wonder what you will do when you hit your ten anodite growth spurt. Wait! And she has a brain! We can’t wait for you to come join our ranks here at OOPS.” Then they focused on Nick “Human, you seek power to protect. Right?”

Nick nodded “Yes. Anything to protect what ever I hold close.”

The twins “Very well… we will help you more by adding another gift on top of what Ben has given you. This is something we long waited to give to someone worth giving to. It is the only one of its kind.” They put something out of thin air. A red orb. “It is a twin of Growthium, though it will always be weak since Ben has been interacting with his Green orb for more than half a decade. His bonds with his orb are only rivaled by his bond with his mate. And you, the bond you form with blue orb will only be rivals by Ben, and your bond with your mate. Oh! And remember this date. The Dragon’s Inferno Rudy star will super nova in a 30 earth days.”

Then they turned back to Gwen “Seeing that we’re giving these stones away for some reason, you can have the Amethyst purple stone. It will give you mana that is only rivaled by Ben’s mana field.” They tossed a purple stone at her. “For you, the Purple Mana star supernovas at the same time as Nick’s star.

Finally, they turn to Seth “You sir are most peculiar. Strong believer in bachelorhood we see. Well good for you. So are we.” They wink. “We see you wish to grow. Why is that?”

Seth shrugged “Its just fun I guess. it’s a healthy hobby I guess.”

The twins chuckle “Know what? We like you, so you can have to the most prized Blue stone. Its something we created. It is similar to the green and red orb, but its doesn’t grow with out a little help. It takes a lot of hard work, but it will make you grow, and the feeling will be so much sweeter. Though you will always be smaller than the other two, you will feel that you have accomplished so much more. This should help you with your hobby.” they tossed a blue orb as Seth. “Quick note. The star we made for this orb is located at the mid point between where the Red, Purple, and original Green star were. It was formed with help from all three stars giving a little start up energy to get it to form. Now that the green star is gone, and the other two are going soon, the blue start will end at the same time. It isn’t like other blue stars. This one a deep brilliant blue. Almost untamable, except with the blue orb.”

The twins said to all three. “I would spend the next month hunting down the pearls to put into the orb after you absorb the core of your stars. They will be harder to find since no one has been looking for them. Vilgax’s family did Ben’s work for him, though, he still has about 2000 pearl left to look for. He’s amassed about 99.9999999999999999% of the originals.”

Ben fakes fainted “Only 2000!”

Then the twins remembered something else “Amy, you may want to get down to the whitest star near at the center of he universe. If you don’t this universe will begin to unravel. The hearthstone is needed to hold everything together.”

To everyone “Warning to all, you will experience something like none other when you absorb your stars. As time wears on, you will experience changes to your body. The boys will have more effect than the girls, but just putting it out there that you will change.” Then they turned around.

Azmuth “Now I think we should go free the scientists, or what’s left of them at least. They’ve spent the last week down at the core of the planet, and that should be long enough. We’ll have to fix their discrimination problem though. If that never existed, then Rika could have told them everything they need to do to stop the Thing before it got out of hand.

Twins “True… True…”

What happens?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Rewards are Due.

choices: Lets get back to Earth. Its about later saterday now.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Nick “Can we say meet Ken now?!?!?!”

Rika spazzed “You know Ken!”

Everyone “Duh!”

Ben “It’s the reason we came here in the first place. Didn’t you here?”

Rika sighed “No, but he was the purpose he created the Thing. The experiment went horribly wrong though. It was essentially going to brick the dead. However, it ended up copying people’s bodies and growing them to huge sizes instead”

The Twins “That deserves a reward! You guys were the first people to create intelligent life! Though it did try to kill everyone. All other attempts simply created giant amebas.”

Rika scoffed “I don’t know if this is what I want to be remembered for.”

The twins laughed “Suite yourself. Now lets go.” They followed the Twins. However, just before they go in, something came crashing down to earth. There was a thud and a mushroom cloud formed.

A deep pitch scream was emitted “You will all pay. Pay I say!”

Everyone looked back as a giant ominous figure tried to stand.

The twins “Oh dear… someone’s a little cranky.” They look at Ben “Excuse us Ben, but would you mind tossing the Gravilily into that creature’s mouth please? I do think that it will work our marvelously.”

Ben pulled it out and did what they said.

The Thing gagged as it went down it’s throat. “What was that.” then it stated to shake “What’s going on!” Slowly, it started to throw up chunks of sacs that popped open on the ground. It said between barfs “What is this. What’s going on!”

On the ground were hundreds of scientist and soldiers. And thousands of more were coming.

With every surge, the Thing shrank down considerably, however, its jar and throat were still huge in order to throw up the others. Its muscles deflated rapidly. Its eight giant cocks shriveled down. Four fell off leaving the remaining four. Soon, all the people it ate were released, and it was a relatively large fourarms again. Then it convulsed once again, and a small green pearl was released. With that, all the muscle it drained from Nick and Seth vanished, and it shrank down to a normal sized fourarms. Then one final convulsion and a pale green substance was released.

It moved “What is this. What just happened!” It gurgled and bubbled in anger.

Nick “That’s what we fought?”

Seth “That’s what I was fighting?”

The Twins walked closer and watched it “Fascinating. Its some time of liquid solid organism.” They took out some surgical knives and other things and started to poke and prod the Thing.

Thing “Stop! I command you! This Is humiliating. Stop! That tickles! Please. You’re forcing my hand. You will feel my wrath! HaHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAH!! STOPP!!!!!”

Nick looked down dejectedly “I was fighting that!”

Gwen sighed “I guess this shows that you can’t judge a book by its cover.”

Amy giggled a little “Is that the mural of this story?”

Ben sighed “I guess so. It only took thousands of near death to accomplish it though. Nothing to big.”

Suddenly, a surge of scientist charged out of the facility. “FREEDOM!”

Rika walked up to the group. “I got tired of wait. Azmuth and I went and freed the scientist ahead of you guys.”

Ben “Did you find Ken?”

Rika pouted “No…” Then she stared to cry. “That thing ate him already probably.”

Then some tapped her on the shoulder.

Ken “Now why on earth are you crying now? We have to present this thing eventually. Are you going to help me?”

Rika looked up and saw Ken smiling. “Are you nuts! You want to present that!” She pointed to a slimy thing that was being assaulted by the Twins.

Ken “Why not? No one got hurt. Actually, everyone’s not even hurt. I’ve never felt better. That old scar of mine is gone and so is that strange click in my ankle. The experiment was even more of success, though I will need to find that last ingredient. It really put it over the top.” Then Ken saw his old friends. “Why hello! I didn’t see you guys. How have you been?”

The gang stared at him in awkward silence. How can he be so perky after being swallowed by a monster?

Ben smiled. At least he was happy. “We’re good. Thanks. OH! And the last ingredient was Gravilily. It only grows in a certain place. I think I have another one in my pocket some where.” Ben reached into his pocket. After a little rummaging (So many pockets!), he found another gravlily and a few other things from Gravitron. “Here you go. You’ll have to ask the Twins if I can tell you where they are found. Its classified.”

Ken stared the at the gravitum based material and was astounded. “Thanks you. MY research will go much further now.” Then he paused and grabbed Rika “I mean our research.” (So very sorry for this very corny moment).

Rika “Aww… Ken! Stop it. You’re making me blush”, and it actually looked like a blush. Her emerald face was turning as red as a ruby.”

Ken “One more question.”

Rika “What might that be?”

Ken paused and pulled something out of his pocket. “I know that your planet did not practice this earth custom, but on earth, this question is answered Yes or No. Yes would mean life long commitment, and devotion while No may lead to broken hearts.”

Rika felt the air leave her diamond lungs. If the rumors she heard were true then she would have to respond…

Ken kneeled down and opened his palm to reveal an ocean blue diamond (of the highest quality). “You have been with me for the last 3 years, and I haven’t found a time when I was happier, so this leads me to this question. Will you Rika, Queen of my heart, Marry me, Ken your devoted knight?”

The gang stared at Rika expectantly.

Suddenly, Rika burst with joy. “Yes!” As if by will, the darkness of her ghost half was converted into the purity and joy of an angel. Her darkish emerald coloring flared white with new joy.

Ken stared at his white angel. His eyes brimming with tears of joy (and not because the light was hurting his eyes).

Amy and Ben stared at each other and smiled. They felt they passion for each other grow stronger simply bathing in this white light. Then they accepted that they could not longer be friends, so they gave each other a kiss signifying their renewed relationship.

Nick and Gwen looked at the light and felt a sudden calmness to their lives. They looked at each other and embraced each other. They knew that no one else would love them as much as their chosen partner.

And Seth… he was covering his eyes as he tried to maintain his status a strong believer in bachelorhood.

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Nick "Now can we see Ken?"

choices: Lets go home. To much to think about.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
For the rest of the day, the gang decided to take it easy. The Twins had created a new floor plan for OOPS, and Ben happened to get a glance at it. Then some how, the entire planet of OOPS was remodeled in less than a second. *cough cough*.

The THING slowly became less evil, so to speak. Once it finished absorbing all the memories, it actually found a way to relate to the scientists and it told some pretty funny jokes. So, they decided not to kill it.

With in the next hour, a wedding plan was made for Ken and Rika. And within the next second, the wedding plan was brought into reality some how *cough cough*.

Be the end of the day, it was like the THING had not even gone berserk.

Before they left, the Twins had to tell them something.

The twins said to Amy “Do you want us to awaken your hearthstone?”

Amy was curious “What do you mean?”

The Twins “It mean that you can communicate with the hearthstone using emotions and feelings. Ben can already do that with his deep connection to his orb, and his strong mana connection to yours. That the reason why the hearthstone has a strong will to protect. Its copied Ben’s strong desire using his mana connection. Now you can communicate with the orb as well, if you wish. However, Ben’s will always be stronger since he was the creator. It will follow your will on any thing you choose, but Ben’s first command is priority. Even now, we can see that the command is to protect you at all cost. Up until now, you’ve controlled the orb with spells, but now you can do it with feelings and desires. Is this something you want?”

Amy thought about it and then asked Ben “Ben, what do you think?”

Ben shrugged “I don’t talk to the orbs very much. I just let them be, but when I need something really badly, then I might approach them with the thought. My orb prefers the solitude. Totally loves my clone’s cum though. Your hearthstone is a little different. It is always listening to you. I can feel it. Its always listening to your heart beat. Listening for irregularities, but it also desires something. I don’t know what.”

Amy paused and considered what Ben said. She looked to the Twins “Ok. Please awaken my hearthstone.”

The twins nodded and blinked in unison “Done.”

Nick and Seth were expecting something more extravagant “Is that all?”

The twins nodded “Yup. All we did was vibrate the strands of their connection waking the orb up a bit.” They turn to Amy “You should be feeling something now.”

Amy listened for a moment, and heart the crying of a child. This activated Amy’s defensive and loving instincts. She asked it what was wrong, and the child was thirsty for her milk. This got Amy to wake up a bit. She looked at Ben and sighed “I know why my boobs are so huge.”

Ben raised an eyebrow “Is the answer genetics?”

Amy sighed “No… the hearthstone craves my milk. It listens to my heart, but also the churning of me lactating. And I can’t call it a pervert either. Its only a small toddler. Its growing them just to meet its need.”

Gwen looked at the hearthstone partially horrified and partially scared. What was her stone going to do to her?

Nick and Seth stared at the stone in amazement. It gave Amy the body of a goddess because it was a thirsty toddler?

Ben sighed “Well, a toddler wants what a toddler wants.”

Amy “Its not done though. Its wants me to grow a few more cup sizes.”

Ben’s mouth dropped “What! Let me talk to it. No one messes with my girlfriends body! Not even a semiconscious toddler contained in one of the most powerful objects in the universe.”

*Note that the toddler symbolizes purity. Children are pure because they don’t know what they do it wrong, so they are easily forgiven. Or they are scolded lightly. That’s why the stone is one of the purest things in the universe.*

Amy smiled at Ben’s defensiveness, and was glad that he didn’t like her for just her body. The same way she felt about him. The bodies were a plus, but the personalities are what matter. “Ben… its ok. There’s no dissuading the kid. He’s to uninformed. Maybe in a few years, he’ll learn what he did was a big uncalled for, but now, he’s only 4 or 6 years old at most. That’s about how long the stone’s lived since you made it. Your stone must been lonely all those eons, so its just old and wants some pleasure.”

Ben’s face turned red “Nope. Its about 13 years old, and is totally defiant in everything I tell it. Its just a phase that has currently lasted as long as I have had it.”

Amy face palmed, and turned to the Twins “Are all the orbs like this?”

The twins smiled “Up until they reach 20-25 years. However, that because Ben’s orb was dislodged about a 17 years ago (On the same say and moment Ben was born), and yours was formed about 4-6 tears ago. The purple, red, and blue ones have been around for eons, so they are well past their phases. Actually, you might even turn to them for advice as soon as you connection grow strong enough.”

Gwen let out a sigh of relief. The purple orb in her palm flashed purple in response.

The twins “Also, just letting you know, we gave you those orb not just because of what you want, but also because they match your personalities the best. Gwen, your purple orb matches you tomboyish character, the red matches Nick’s loyalty and desire to get stronger, and the blue matches Seth’s easy going personality and “committed to a cause” type of character. Eventually, and hopefully, the white and green orbs mature enough to not demand such things. Though, the green orb does have a steady supply of cum, so it should be satisfied. It will eventually mature, but the cum desire will probably stay. It’s a powerhouse in simplicity. Amy’s orb will hopefully grow into something that stands tall and proud. Ready to defend Amy at any moment. A child can only be expected to do so much at any given time.” They turn to Amy “Maybe now that you can communicate, you can begin to teach it the rights and wrongs of society. You can help increase it maturity by doing so.”

Amy nodded and stared at the hearthstone.

Ben sighed and rolled his eyes at the thought of his green orb.

Gwen, Nick, and Seth were anxious to see their orbs personality.

The twins turned to the three “Just letting you guys know, you can start communicating to your orbs once you absorb the star of their origin.” To Amy “Amy, once you absorb your star, be ready to see a sudden growth spurt occur in your hearthstone’s character. May anywhere from 5 to 10 years of growth. So you might not even have to worry to much about getting it to mature. It will do most of it naturally upon absorbing the whitest star. However, I can’t say that it will not have already expanded your assets before then.”

Amy sighed and wondered how big they would get. “Nothing I can do about it now. A child does what it wants because it can’t tell right from wrong.”

Ben was thinking “Wait a minute. If absorbing the star ages the mind or spirit, or what ever, of the orb, then isn’t my orb really only a little older than Amy’s?”

The twins laughed “Nope, in your case, it got younger. It matured past the desire for cum, but regressed back and realized what it missed, so now its trying to get as much as possible.”

It possible he might get apart time job as a manual labor worker. He has the body for it. This is what Ben did for the next month.

Nick and Seth both knew they’d head into body building. They were already starting competitions and gaining more than decent amount of cash. Seth actually planned on dropping out to go full time. He had the body. Nick wanted to stay in high school. “A safety net… just in case.”

Amy was still going full on medical. Her goal was to become a doctor that always had a trick up her sleeve, so that even when things seemed doomed, she would be able to come up with a solution.

Gwen was studying the brain, and is going to look at some in a state funded internship for the highly educated. Plus, if she wanted to go abroad for college, she might decided to go to one that Gramps made. It was for people like her who were Human/Alien hybrids. MIT was an amazing place full of new ideas because its students were from totally different backgrounds and opinions. (Plus alien technology helped them stay ahead of the game quite a bit).

Their high school devoted hundreds of man hours I getting their students working on their college plans, and it worked for the most part.

As the month drew to a close, the group planned a small excursion into space.

Apparently, the Red star could grow people just like the green star, but it was not as appealing as the green star. Mainly because if anyone got with in a light year of it, it would sent out raging solar flares. However, once it started nearing its death, aliens prepared, once again, to take its energy for their own purposes.

The Red energy was the same as the Green energy, but it was more unstable. It needed the Red orb to not run amuck and eradicate everything.

The Whitest star was left to be because anyone who tried to get to it found that it hurt them emotionally to attack it. Its purity expanded their guilt if they tried anything with evil intention.

The Blue energy is sought after, but no one can get to it because, like gravitum, the Twins had made it so that the Star repels everything, except the planet, Poseidon’s Heart.

Finally, the Purple star, the spawning point of the first Anodites. It is guarded by ancient spells, that will destroy anyone who even though about taking it. They would have to face the wrath of the entire Anodite race.

Plumbers across the universe began to gather at the Red star in preparation to stop any alien armies. The had scout posted near the Red, White, and Blue stars. The purple one is being defended by the anodites.

----------------------------------------

In a large, continent sized space ship… (Max‘s brother Xam is preparing for battle.)

Xam “Where is my coffee!” He’s been awake for the past 72 hours getting the plumbers ready for battle.

They were just 1 light year away from the star, and would have to go hyper speed to reach the star before the enemies. To soon, and they’d be fried by a super solar flair.

A small alien came in with a Dunkin Donuts coffee. “Message Commander!”

Xam took the coffer and sighed “What is it?”

Alien “Five earthlings come saying they can keep the enemies from getting the energy of the 4 remaining colored stars.”

Xam was intrigued. “How did they get up here?”

Alien “They appeared in a blinding flash of purple and white.”

Xam was curious now. Purple, was mana, but white… what could it be. “Thank you. Send them in.”

The little alien left and in walked Ben, Amy, Nick, Gwen, and Seth.

Ben looked up at Xam “So this is my Great Uncle. I was wondering if I even had one.”

Xam was bewildered. They were just teens! “Who are you people? How did you get up here?”

Gwen “A little rude if you ask me. No hello? Can I offer you a drink?”

Xam frowned “Greetings are a waste of time. They waste precious Oxygen.”

The group realized this guy was more high strung than they thought.

Ben “Max was our Grandpa, to all of us, figuratively and literally in some cases.”

Xam “I see. That is how you know he is my brother…”

Gwen “He mentioned you once or twice in his stories of your more chaotic childhood.”

Xam sighed “He was older than me by 10 years, and that makes him the boss… He can tell all the secrets he want right?”

Ben “No… not really. He only saw that his brother was a little impulsive, but got more control over it as time went on. Well, that’s what he hinted at.”

Xam nodded “Ok then. Now why are you here?”

Ben nodded to the others. For the past month, they were a bit anxious to get things over with. Amy had grown another cup size bringing her to HH cups. The others found little to no change. Ben grew another inch making him 7ft 9in. Both muscle heads gained 5 lbs of muscle. Gwen began to feel stronger and more flexible, but her shape was pretty much the same.

They reached into their pockets and pulled out their orbs. Even Ben brought his out for the heck of it. Ever since infusing it with the Nexus Gravitatus Corax, the orb has been completely stable. The green orb floated in his palm while the others held on to theirs. Amy’s was dangling around her chain.

Xam “What are they?” The he saw Ben’s orb, and was almost lost in its complexity. “Ben, what is the orb you are hold?”

Ben “This is growthium. The last, and only bit of it. It absorbed the Green Star. Which is what the other orbs are going to do to their respective star.”

Xam “What?!?!?” He was flabbergasted. “Wait… those things are supposed to contain a super nova? I’m sorry, but I can’t believe that. I didn’t believe it when Azmuth told me that you absorbed the Green star’s super nova.”

Ben smiled “I’m full of surprises. Aren’t I? Anyway, we just wanted to let you know so that you didn’t attack us. Ok? We’ll be going.”

Xam was fuming. These kids were leaving without being dismissed “Insolence! Know you place. You come on my ship to tell me that I have to surrender the colored stars to you!”

Ben turned around and smiled “Yup!” Then he turned to leave, but stopped “If you want, I can knock out the enemies forces for you, and you can collect prisoners or what ever. I have the ability.”

Xam was silent. He wanted nothing more than for this to be over. The past 72 hrs have been hell for him. However, he just couldn’t give up all that preparation to an adolescent. “Ben… you have no idea how much I want to say yes. However, I can’t put the life of the universe in your hands. I don’t know how capable they are.”

Ben sighed “Ok.” Though he knew he’d be doing it whether or not Xam said yes. “Bye.” The group walked out.

What now?

Ben sighed “That’s what we are trying to fix.” Ben turned to Rob. “Hey Rob, any luck getting your sister to listen?”

Rob sighed “She’s waiting to Nick to wake up and ask himself.”

Ben brightened up a bit “Oh. Nick just got up. Send your sister over.”

Shortly, a red orb began to float over. It asked Nick “Hello? Master, are you awake?”

Nick was confused “Master? What?”

Ben explained “The orbs are bonded to an organism that they call master. It’s the person that they will listen to and obey. However, they hope to be equals. Any way, each orb has a personality and desire. Such as yours. Your orb is female, and it wants you to be huge! Not like normal huge, but like immobile huge. If you want, she’s willing to compromise.”

Nick tried to nodded yes, but couldn’t “Anything to be able to move!”

The red orb “Anything?”

Nick paused “Well… maybe not anything, but I‘ll compromise.”

The red orb thought “What do you have in mind?”

Nick “You shrink me down to manageable size, and I’ll let you grow me so that it appears that I have pituitary gigantism, but make it believable. But you also have to make it so that I can move.”

The red orb “Aww… but I don’t want to make you taller though. I just want you to have giant muscles!”

Nick groaned. He was hoping to get taller, but he’d have to deal with muscle anyway “Ok. Fine. You do that, but remember! I have to be mobile.”

The red orb “Yay! I’ll get right on it.”

There was a rumbling sound as bones became compressed, and muscle tissue merged.

Nick let out a moan as the stiffness and tightness of his muscles were relieved. It stopped when he got to a size just a smidge larger than before. “Thank you. I can see again.” Well… he could see anything above his pecs. He had long lost the ability to see his feet.

The red orb was able to zip around freely in Ben’s universe. It kind of wanted one for itself now, but it could wait.

With all the commotion, Seth began to stir, but immediately regretted it. He felt a world of pleasure once again. Ben would have to do something.

Ben walked up to Seth, and used the energy in his universe to block the signals coming from Seth’s nerves.

After a moment, Seth began to think clearly. Sort of… he had a huge migraine from the sudden lack of pleasure. “Oh…. My head. What’s going on?”

Ben was careful not to touch Seth. He was just barely blocking the intense pleasure signals. “Seth! Do not move. Wait for a second.” Ben asked Rob to go get his other sister.

Soon, a blue orb floated up to Seth. “Hello Seth. How can I please you now?”

Ben explained “Nick, your orb is obsessed over you . It will do anything to please you and to give you pleasure. Right now, any move you make will send a wave of pleasure to your brain.”

Seth groaned “Fine! Start by getting rid of this head ache.”

Orb said in a cheerful voice “Ok!”

Instantly, Seth felt the throbbing in his head die down. He let out a sigh of relief “Thank you.”

Ben “You should ask her to tone down the pleasure factor. The moment you start flexing a single muscle, you’ll get lost in pleasure. All I can do is make it so that your breathing and heart beat don’t cause you to enter an episode.”

Seth looked at the orb. “Can you?”

The orb flashed blue “Ok. Done!”

Seth started to move his arms a bit to see if anything was triggered. “Ok. Thanks.”

Ben let out a sigh of relief.

The blue orb “You are soooooo welcome!”

Ben turned to the girls now. “Rob. How’s Gwen doing?”

Rob “Gwens currently in a private chat room with my other sister. They’ll be finished shortly I think.”

Ben “Thanks. How’s Amy?”

Rob “I think she’s waking up soon actually. Her hearthstone isn’t doing anything to her. She’s just sleeping.”

Ben exhaled the remains of his stress “Ok… so now we wait…”

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ben moved them into his world for protection.

choices: Interruption. Some huge fell back down to the planet.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben “AZMUTH HAS BROTHERS!”

The Gwen “What!”

The others “Who?”

This is when Azmuth reached them “I am Azmuth.” He turned to Ben “Why are you here Ben Tennyson?”

Ben scratched the back of his head “Well… we wanted to go visit Ken, our old friend, but we ended up finding a monstrous infection that could grow its infected victims to abnormal sizes. And he found that we had to remove it or else… well… or else something bad would happen, I guess.”

Azmuth nodded. “We three hear were on our way to evacuate the trapped scientists on the lower levels of OOPS when Rika here dragged us to the surface.”

Rika “I guess it was a bit uncalled for.”

They heard Seth whisper in Nick’s ear “Who’s the tiny guy, and who are the two brain heads in the back?”

Azmuth and D and G Matter. “Hey! Watch it!”

Azmuth “I am the great Azmuth. Creator of the Omnitrix. Though, I doubt you earthlings have heard of it. Other than Ben and Gwen over there.”

Amy walked up “So this is the Azmuth that Ben talked about. I’m glad I got to meet you. Ben’s said a lot of good things.”

Azmuth did something unexpected. He actually blushed. “H-he did, did he?”

Amy nodded “The Omnitrix is supposed to hold every known alien DNA inside its matrix right? And you can turn into any one of them?”

Azmuth nodded frivolously “Y-yes.”

D and G “Azmuth, brother, are you alright? You’re face is turning red?” Then they realized something “Ooooohhh! Azmuth! I think you are what the earthlings call a play-er. Whatever that is. Have you finally chosen a mate?”

Azmuth basically exploded “Shut it you two! I have found one before, and I will never again! Now stop it.” After that, there was an awkward moment of silence.

Seth decided to break it “So who are you two brain heads?” He said to the two strange metallic android twins with a strange glass dome covering an abnormally large brain.

D and G “We, excuse us, are the Matter Twins. We created this planet here, but we also created a few other things. Such as everyone’s favorite metal, Gravitum, and a variety of colored stars.”

Gwen “Wait… you said you made gravitum and some stars? How’s that possible?”

Twins “Well, it was easy after we made gravitum.”

Ben was wondering “Then why is it lifeless right now? I found these…” He pulled out some plants and a jar of soil.

Twins gasped and grabbed the plants and other things from Ben “How did you get these?”

Ben was a little nervous now “I went into the center of Gravitron and found a portal. I think you’ll know the rest.”

Twins thought about this. “Ahh yes… it would seem that only you could have done that. Do you know what you have done?” They said sadly.

Ben could tell that something was off. “What? I just went through and grabbed a few plants, or else I would have been shoved off the planet.”

Twins said hopefully “Did you happen to create a ball of some sort? And did you bring it to the other side?”

Ben was careful “Yes… and yes.”

Twins slightly more nervous “Did it create a connect between you, itself and the planet? As in did you hold it out, and it pulled you towards the planet.”

Ben was nervous now “Yes…”

The twins sighed “I guess there’s no more reason to keep it a secret. Azmuth. Should we tell them?”

Azmuth nodded. “Yes. Now that the cycle has been initiated. It is crucial we try to stop the merge or else…”

The Twins nodded and began to reach into their multiple pockets.

What’s going to happen?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets see what the Twins do.

choices: Lets get back to what the Twins wanted to say.
Something else equally or more important then Choice 1.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The sky turned bright orange and yellow as a giant billowing cloud of smoke charged towards the planet.

Twins “I guess explanations will have to wait then.” They sighed.

Amy “Is that what I think it is?”

Azmuth “Ken’s experiment that went loose… yes. Now where is Rika, we could use her advice. They looked at where she was and saw a yellow paper.

Note “Hey guys. If you read this, then I’m not back yet. I got tired of wait, so I had to go free the scientists myself. Sorry if this causes a problem. =D” Then there was a little chibi version of her self at the bottom doing a thumbs up.

Then there was a crash. Mountains of dust and debris flew into the air clouding up the how hemisphere of the planet. There was a deep piercing cry. “I will absorb you all! Painfully and slowly…”

Twins “Tut tut! Looks like someone’s angry.” They turn to Ben “Ben, could you please put this Gravilily inside that eight arm’s mouth? We find that it would be most beneficial.”

Ben grabbed the Gravitum plant “Gravilily inside that thing’s mouth? Gotcha.” He unsealed himself and the lily disappeared from his hand.

Twins “My! You are fast.” In shock.

The Thing coughed “What was that? What am I feeling?” Suddenly the Thing fell to his knees bending over in convulsion. He began chucking up strange sacs, and he had shrunk a bit. “What is this? What’s going on? What’s happening to my body.” He sent another surge of sacs/pouches.

The whole group walked over to the edge of the crater and saw that some of the sacs ripped open to reveal an alien at normal size.

Nick “He’s throwing up everyone he ate!”

Amy was glad it was happening, but she as also slightly disturbed. She turned and hid her face in Ben’s shirt “I can’t look anymore.”

Ben smiled “I’ll tell you when its over.”

After a few more convulsions, the Thing had finally shrank down to a giant four arms. Then it hacked up something like it had a hair ball. A green sphere rocketed out of its mouth. Then the Thing began to shrink down again until it was the size of a normal fourarms. Something was dripping out of its mouth. A light green substance began to pull itself together.

The Thing “What is that! What has happened to my body!”

Nick and Seth fell over in embarrassment “I was fighting that!”

Amy “I guess that’s the mural of this. Don’t judge a book by its cover.”

Gwen looked around “Hey. Where is Ben?”

Ben reappeared “Here I am.” He was holding a green pearl in his hand.

The Twins were amazed “Its some type of solid/liquid organism. It can talk!” They looked at each other and began running at it with surgical knives and pocket probes. “We must examine it!”

The Thing saw the two brainy scientists running at it with knives and probes, and it freaked out. It started to ooze away from them. “Leave me alone! You will feel my wrath. I will return to glory once again.”

The Twins “Its alright. We only want to cut you open and see what’s inside.” they finally caught up and did a final jump stabbing at it

The Thing let out a high pitched scream “AHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!” Then suddenly there came an explosion of gurgled noises “AH!! Stop it! That tickles. You will feel my wrath! No!!! Stop!!!!!! PLEASE!”

Amy looked at the Thing squirming around and looked at Ben “You know? Its kind of cute now that it isn’t out to destroy us.”

Gwen walked up to Amy “You know what? I kind of agree.” Then suddenly the two girls turned around smiling and batting their eyelashes “Can you get us one?”

Ben and Nick recoiled from the sudden change in tone.

Seth strolled on over and put her arms around the two boys “You two have yourself a couple of keepers, right?” Then he let out a laugh and started walking towards the pile of sacs.

Ben and Nick were still frozen in their shocked posture and the started to run next Seth as though he was their only living shield against their girlfriends.

Amy and Gwen let out a laugh and they high-fived each other. “Good one.”

Off in the distance, the sound of scientist cheering was heard “FREEEEEEEEDOM!!!!!!!!!!”

Rika walked up to the group sniffing and wiping away a tear. “I couldn’t find Ken!” Then she fell to the ground crying. Suddenly, someone covered in slime walked up to her “Now why on earth are you crying now?”

Rika looked up and came face to face with a younger looking Ken. “Ken!!!!!” and she jumped up and hugged him.

Ken smiled and returned the hug. “Ok. So where’s out pad, I have a bunch of notes and observations to write down. Experiment success, plus more actually.” Rika handed him a note pad. “Now only if I could get that last ingredient. What ever it was, it completed the process.”

Ben chimed in “I think you’re talking about gravililies.” He handed Kent the remaining plants he had. “You’ll have to ask the Twins about these. The most I can do it give them to you. I don’t know much about them.” Then he paused “Oh! And this is you present as well.”

(How big can Ben‘s pockets be? We may never know…)

Ken took them and was about to burst with scientific aura “I’ve go to study these.” Then he paused as though an opportunity had just arisen. “With my lab partner of course.”

Rika looked at Ken and smiled, but then he did something else.

Ken began to kneel down on one knee and he pulled out and object “I’ve held onto this for a long time, and its about time I used it.” He paused a moment “Rika, there is a custom on earth, that you’re people to not practice. However, this ritual I’m about to initiate is answered Yes or No.”

Rika’s crystalline heart began to pulse and glow. Is he doing what I think he’s doing?

Ken coughed “Rika, the queen of my heart, will you marry me, your humble servant?”

Rika paused unable to answer “Well, I don’t really know. That was pretty corny. Servant… really?”

Ken’s face shattered into a billion pieces. “Is said yes or no! Not a tirade.”

Then Rika smiled “Then yes.”

Ken’s brain was still trying to catch up. When it did, he burst into a smile and place the ring on her crystalline finger. The purest blue diamond ever created in the universe now belonged to her.

Suddenly, Rika flared a brilliant white. The darkess of her ghostly half was purified and turned into the light of hope and love.

There was a clap from behind them.

The Thing gurgled “You player!”

Then even further behind, a bunch of aliens had woken up to a romance scene, and they couldn’t help but applaud the ending. Most of them, prior to today, had seen Rika facing off the Thing trying to defend them. Now they were willing to give her a chance.

Ben and Amy bathed in the light feeling the strength of the emotions. The light began to dig up an old feeling.

Amy “I don’t want to be friends anymore…”

Ben sighed in relief “Ok. Good, I don’t know how longer I could have called you friend.”

They smile and stared at each other, and then they kissed starting off their reborn relationship.

Nick and Gwen saw this and they smiled. Nick held Gwen close and they simply bathed in the light, and the presence of their partner.

Seth was turned away from the light chanting to keep the thought out of his head. How long can he remain a believer of bachelorhood when he hangs around a group like this!

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
After that, the Twins designed a new lay out for the planet, and a wedding was planned. Somehow… that all got built within 5seconds of when it was planned. *cough cough*

Oh! And Big news. The THING is now OOPS’s mascot!

--------------------------------

Twins “Alright, where were we? Oh right! You and that orb.” They turn to Ben “The thing you created was a Nexus. Its is created by increasing the bond strengths of gravitum to Infinity. The only way to do that is to feed it a source of ever increasing gravity. Thereby forcing it to absorb more energy to neutralize the source of gravity.”

Ben nodded “Ok, so what does it do?”

Twins “For the most part, nothing. However it is the key to the Original. You see, we live in a copy universe, though it is as real as the old one.” They paused “Long ago, eons before intelligent life was common, we created Gravitron. It was our most prized jewel. However, it didn’t have any special properties itself. It was the life on it. The plants there were special. They could extend life itself, and if you weren’t dying, it could restore you to your prime, and heal any fatal wound. We called these plants Vitas, or life in Latin, and then we broke them down into their sub groups. For example, Gravililies are more adept at expelling dangerous poisons and curing infections. That’s the reason we had you feed the Thing it. Now back on topic. We prized these plants, and we knew they’d be hunted down into extinction, so we took precautions. We changed the planet. We gave it the properties of repulsion. Enough to match the universe’s attraction. However, it was not enough. A millennia later, the first Anodites were born. They were beautiful creatures. Born from the purple star, and nothing less.

We befriended them, and they became our companions. However, centuries later, a group of them turned dark. They had heard of the power of the Vitas and wanted it for themselves. They snuck out in the dead of night and harvest acres of our beautiful Vitas, and they devoured them. This gave them… immortality. Gods among mortals!

With this life, came a surge in the magical powers. They grew greedier, but we had to silence them. We told them enough. We banished them to the farthest corner of the universe. We could never destroy such life, even if it sought to destroy us.

They came back, and they had raised their own children… mortal anodites. When the first of their young died, they knew they could not live like this, so they must make their whole race immortal. They rose an arm so great, powered by mana, we feared them.

We had only one choice. With the remaining anodites, we pleaded for their help, and in return we would give them eternal life. For that was the only way to match the army. They were not greedy like their counter parts, but they knew of the power it brought. They agreed, and together, we banished the Dark Anodites again.

This would not work every time. They would return, and return again. There would be a time when we are off out guard, and they would succeed. There was only one choice. We had to seal away our greatest achievement.

Our anodite allies constructed a spell so strong that it changed the planet and the universe. The metal, Gravitum now had mana related properties. It became more susceptible to change, via mana, and it could bend space and time to create a new reality. With this new ability, they seal the entire universe inside of it, and replaced it with a new one. The one that we live in now. To this day, both universe have been separate. The anodites that were banished have stayed banished in another universe. But now they will start to merge.

This universe is in the middle of the other two, and the creation of the nexus as created a connection between all three universe. His universe will be caught in the cross fire of the collision of the Anodite Prison and the Original!”

The gang was silent. Ben’s hand was shaking.

Amy saw than and hugged his arm. Hoping to calm him. Ben stopped shaking, but his frustration and guild turned into heat. His body was giving off a lot of steam. Amy held on anyway. Her hearthstone kept her safe.

Ben choked out some words “Is there… a way to stop it?”

The Twins “Maybe. The nexus simply created a hole that punched a two holes in this universe connecting the other two. You will have to find them and close them somehow. However, there will be strange things happening. First off, the core of Gravitron will burst into bloom as the spores and pollen from the Original Gravitron phase through the portal. This will awake the Immortal Dark Anodites from their dark sleep and who knows how they will react, or how they will look. Untold eons have pasted since they were locked away. They will probably cross over and try to get to the Vitas.”

Ben was still shaking, but there was hope “So I need to find these holes and close them some how. Any idea how?”

Twins sighed “No idea.”

Ben frowned.

Gwen tried to come up with an idea “Why not encase the hole in gravitum and lock the hole away in a pocket dimension?”

Twins “The Anodites, or what ever they are will try to break through, and eventually, they will succeed.”

Seth chimed in “Oh well, I guess we’ll have to wing it then. Right?”

Everyone looked at Seth incredulously. How can he be so optimistic.

Amy “There’s Seth for you.” Everyone smirked. The future didn’t look as bad as before.

Even Ben smiled at Seth’s optimism.

The Twins “We can not do anything for our powers have gravely weaken past our primes. However, it doesn’t mean we are out of hope. Ben, alone, you will fail, but with your friends, you may yet succeed.”

Ben looked at his friends, and they looked determined, all but Nick.

Nick frowned “I’m not trying to be negative, but none of ass are at Ben’s standards. He’s the STRONGEST living thing in basically any universe!”

The Twins “But he can not use mana. That is where he will fail. And! After all this time, the Anodites’s bodies have only gotten stronger. The Vitas are never done influence the body, and they consumed a lot of them. We presume that they may be on par with Ben, if not more!”

Then ever one’s mood drop.

The Twins “That is why you guys will have to grow stronger than them magically and physically. The growtium orb is only called that because it is the only accessible one. However, there are others. The green one is just simply a famous ORB. There are two other orbs with the same capabilities. The Blue and Red Orb, and there is a mana orb which is Purple. We had to lock those away when this universe was made, or else it would be unstable.”

Nick and Seth were a little anxious as to what was going to happen.

The Twins paused and looked at Amy and Ben “Ben… you also created an orb. However, you have it to your mate, Amy. Is that correct?”

Ben’s face flared red “Uh… I guess.”

The Twins approached Amy and picked up he necklace “Yes… this orb is fueled by the green, and it is almost on par with the purple. However, it is now above the purple because you have infused it with Magnus Gravitus. The only piece of its kind. It can amplify the effects of anything. You even shaped it into leaves and a necklace to hold the purest of the stones. It is exceptional craftsmanship.”

Ben was shocked by what it was.

The twins turned back to Gwen, Nick and Seth. “You three will need your own orbs. Take note though that each one is inanimate, but they have a will and goal to achieve.

For Ben, it seems like it wants Ben to have a tall and balance body. However, it wants it to be the size of infinity. Ben however, subconsciously compromised and compacted it down. In return, it gets the sweetest substance Ben can make, or his clone rather. The orb will continue to grow Ben a little at a time by using his periodic surges in hormones. It may or may not end when you finish puberty.

For Amy, the hearthstone wants her to be happy, but it also follows it first command from its creation. It must protect Amy with its life, but it wants you to have the body that no one can resist. It feels that when some one is desired, they will be harmed less, and be guarded more from danger.”

Amy stared at the orb between her giant globes, and saw the reason she was so huge.

Ben’s face turned red as he realized that Amy’s body was a result of him giving her the orb in the first place. He sagged as he realized that he made it harder for himself to maintain abstinence.

The Twins “Now you three… We don’t know the desires of these three orbs. They could do a bunch of things to your bodies, and we do not know what. Do you wish to accept them?”

Gwen and nick stared at the orbs cautiously, and then Seth burst out “YES! Can I have the blue one?”

The Twins were surprised by the willingness. “Um.. Ok?” They give him the blue orb.

Nick and Gwen sighed and then nodded. Gwen got the purple orb, and Nick got the Blue orb. They all felt a tingle as they help the orb.

Twins “Now some other things you should know…”

What are they?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets get back to what the Twins wanted to say.

choices: Lets see how they change, and what Ben does to occupy his time.
Amy and Ben experiences something odd in the presence of all these orbs.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Twins “To establish a connection so that they can begin increasing your strength and mana, you will have to swallow them. It shouldn’t be to hard. They are only the size of pearls. However, once they exit your body, you will have to begin searching for their planet of origin and absorb their stars. Luckily, they are all about to super nova!

Ben had some how accomplished all his tasks. Which is a good thing, however he still has a few lingering pearls to hunt down. That won’t be to hard. Just sense for them and get them.”

The group looked at the Twins like they had two heads… each.

Nick, Gwen and Seth looked at their tiny colored pearls. Seth was the first to do it. He swallow the pearl. Then Nick who gagged a bit, and finally Gwen.

The Twins “Over the next 24hrs, you should start feeling some changes. You boys should ask Ben to tell you those changes, and Gwen, you will feel like your mana is super charged. You may want to start casting spells or you might pass out from the surges.”

At this time, they all felt a tingle.

Gwen saw purple static running up and down her body as her mana exploded in growth. She felt her boobs grow another cup size and her muscle strengthen a tiny bit.

Nick felt his muscle push out a bit more. He saw his chest expand more into his vision, and his shirt started to stretch out more.

Seth felt his muscle burst out more, but he also felt a weight in his groin increase. What could the orb possible want to do with him?

The Twins “Seems like its starting…”

Sorry this was a relatively short chapter. I just wanted to make this a diverging point incase I wanted to go in a different direction later. I don’t want any repeats of my have to type the same story line twice because I mess up and fused two separate ideas together again…

What happens now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets hear this important info. =D

choices: The pocket dimensions were acting weird.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben briefly explain the changes he went through to Nick and Seth, and left them to their growing.

Ben “I’m going to hunt down the rest of the pearls. See ya!” Before any one could disagree, he had unclipped his medallion and jumped off through space at such as speed that he was back in a second. “Back. Did you miss me?” His pockets were glowing green as some of the peals releases a dull throbbing light.

Amy “How big are your pocket!”

Ben shrugged “I don’t quite know. There are gravitum strings in this that, so that might make it so I have a universe of space in my pockets. I haven’t been able to fill them up yet.”

Amy “That makes sense.”

Suddenly, our three teens were experiencing increased horniness like Ben had when ever he had grown. Amy, in hope of saving their pride, cast a spell to put them in their own little pocket dimensions for the next 24 hrs.

Ben however, at the caught sight of it for a brief second, and felt his large endowment fill with blood. After they were gone, he calmed down a bit. He wondered what the orbs wanted to do to their bodies. He had recently learned that the orb wanted him to have a perfectly balance body with large muscles and a large endowment, but it want him to grow forever to infinity. (You already know the compromise). What does it want in their bodies?

Ben asked the Twins “Are you guys going to wait here for the next 24hrs?”

The Twins nodded “Since we can’t fight any longer, we’ll help where we can. We might be old, but not helpless. Such as keep an eye on their development, and make sure they get to their fullest potential. We’re going to need it… to face off them.”

Ben “Ok. Thanks. One question. What happens when I put these last few pearls into the green orb?”

The Twins thought about it “First off, it will be complete. Second of all, you may feel a surge in testosterone and other growth hormones as the orb tries to have its way with you. I wouldn’t worry to much. You’ll probably just get taller and stronger over the next year or two. Also, did you happen to merge the Nexus with the Orb?”

Ben nodded “Yah. I kind of had to or else my universe would have eventually collapsed from the surges of gravity from the orb. Now the orb is totally stable. Forever I hope.”

The Twins nodded. “Good, but also, the Nexus acts like the Magnus Gravitus. It will make your maximum that much larger. And fair warning. We take back what we said about 1 or 2 years o growing. It might be 5 to 10... Sorry.”

Ben fell sideways in shock. How tall would he be in 5 or 10 years. The tallest person on earth was about 9 feet all. He was already nearing 8ft tall. Currently 7ft 9in. If he kept growing at this rate (about 4-6in a year), he would be the tallest person in the world! It would just matter how much taller! If he grew at four inches a year for the next 5 years, he’d be 9ft 5in, or if he grew at 6 in a year for 10 years, he’d be 12 ft 9in. He didn’t want to be twice the average height! He was already almost 2ft over it!

Amy came rushing over to help Ben wake up from his shock. As she leaned in to put his head on her lap, her orb made contact with Ben’s medallion. There was a small spark and Amy felt bust grow another cup size. “Oh my god!”

Ben heard this and sat up causing the orb to touch again, and Amy to grow another cup size. Ben saw this and passed out again. His face was fiery red.

The Twins walked over and clonked Ben on the forehead “You may want to put those pearls into the orb because you’ll need to the extra strength to face off the Dark Anodites.”

Ben got up, extra careful not to let the medallions touch. He mumbled about being far to tall and how this gave him unnecessary attention. The twins were insistent though, so Ben said “Fine! I’ll do it.” He went in to his medallion and gave his orb the last of the pearls. As soon as the last one entered, it burst into a brilliant green and than the light faded into a life filled pulse. Ben sighed as he knew he was done getting and putting stuff in the orb. However, he felt his balls stir a bit as they began to produce copious amounts of growth hormones. He groaned “I’m going to be huge.” One part of him hated it, but another was kind of excited.

-----------------------------

The them, outside, Ben was only gone for a fraction of a second. He went in and out basically at the same time.

Ben looked at the Twins “There. Happy?”

The twins smiled “This isn’t for us. Its for the universe.”

Ben sighed “I know…” Ben look and Amy looked at each other. He saw how tight her bra was getting… again. Then he got an idea. “Be right back Amy. I’m going to make life a little easier for you.”

Amy scrunched her face trying to think of what.

Ben vanished as he jumped off the planet and landed on Gravitron. He began spinning Gravitum strings like crazy and then he made a set of cloths for all his friends. They would act like his did, and they’d be able to change shape… to a point, and match a style his friends like to wear.

Ben appeared back in front of Amy with and arm full of cloths. He gave Amy a pair. “I hope this helps. They should act like mine and be pretty stretchy. I’m depending on the graviton’s strange ability to change so that it matches something you like, so umm… yah…”

Amy looked at the grey clothing and smiled. Ben knew how to make cloths? Then again, since he works at such a fast speed, he does have a lot of free time. I guess he could have learnt how to do it then. Amy pulled up some walls of mana to change behind and when she was done. She stepped out in a set of cloths that fit her perfectly and were very comfy. She imagined a designed that would keep her hearthstone from coming in contact with Ben’s orb, and that would be able to support her large bust. “Ben, what do you think?”

Ben smiled “Its very functional and I think its stylish. I’m not much of a fashion expert.”

Amy laughed “Trust me. Its fashion. So it can change?”

Ben smiled “Yah. It can, but not to much. It can’t like cover a planet or something, but it should be able to imitate cloths back on earth.”

Amy yipped. He just saved her thousands of dollars on wardrobe. She ran up and gave him a hug. “Thanks a lot.”

Then something happened… What?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Amy felt a sudden decrease in her mana as her pocket dimensions expanded. She used a spell to see inside. “They’re growing faster than you had described.”

Ben frowned “Maybe because of all the orbs being so close together. Even I can feel my maximum growing several times faster. How’s Gwen holding up?”

Amy’s smiled “She’s doing actually pretty good. Her muscles are a little stronger and her boobs grew a bit, but that’s it. Now her mana field is exploding in growth.”

Ben “How about Nick and Seth. I assume their muscles are huge.”

Amy nodded “Definitely. Nick’s are bigger though. So big that he can’t move. Nearly a dozen times larger than Seth’s size, but Seth is still pretty big. Though…” Amy’s face turned red. “His… umm… penis is huge.”

Ben raised an eyebrow “I wonder… Maybe Nick’s orb wants him to be hugely muscled, and Seth’s orb is trying to get him out of bachelorhood by making it difficult for him. Can you tell me if he’s… umm… extra sensitive?”

Amy’s face burned “He’s exploding in it right now. Its blasting out.” Then Amy ended the spell “I can’t look anymore. Its not right for me to see.”

Ben held onto Amy “What?”

Amy “Gwen has a purple glow in her ovaries, Nick has a Red glow in his pituitary gland, and Seth had a Blue glow in his testes.”

The Twins over heard “That makes sense. The orbs are influencing their hormones to accomplish its desires. They are going to need some motivation to strike a compromise with their orbs.”

Amy “Gwen’s fine. I know that. I think the orb sense he desire to be ninja like. She looks like a goddess, but strikes like a cobra. Its probably molding her body to make people underestimate her, so she can take advantage of that. Gwen probably won’t complain to much.

Nick wanted to grow stronger to protect Gwen, so it made his stronger… to strong actually. His only problem is moving around. I wonder what the compromise might be?

Seth… his orb is being defiant. He’s totally against relationships, but the orb his giving him the mother of all cocks. Excuse me for my language, but there is no other way to describe it.”

She was interrupted by Ben “Even bigger than my clone’s was?”

Amy gave him a grim look “I’m talking about his sealed state. What will he look like in his unsealed state?”

Ben froze and tried to picture it, but stopped. He was going to lose his sanity if he thought about it to much. He turned to the Twins “How much longer?”

The Twins laughed “Its only been thirty minutes!”

---------------------------------

23hrs and 30mins later…

Amy and Ben were asleep on the ground. Amy was sleeping on top of Ben, and his arms were wrapped around her gently. His body heat was keeping her warm. Once or twice while they slept, Amy’s boobs almost suffocated Ben, but they got in a different position that prevented that.

*POP!*

Amy and Ben got up and rubbed the sleep out of their eyes. What the woke up to was… different.

Gwen was fully clothed, though her FF cups were stretching her shirt. Which looked kind of off proportions on her 5ft5in tall body. However, she didn’t have to worry about falling over since her tome muscles kept her balance in check. Not to much of a physical change.

Nick was a bulky monster still, and his muscles were just a little larger. Though he need cloths badly.

Seth was also naked, and his muscles were just a smidge larger. Though, his endowment was hanging past his knees at 16in long. 4in longer than before.

They all looked worn out as though they had spent the last 24 hours working out and arguing. In their hands were full sized orbs the size of baseballs. Bens was an inch larger in circumference due to the Nexus core inside and the nexus surrounding it. Amy’s hearthstone was the size of a small-ish chicken egg.

Suddenly, the orbs in their hand sent out a shock and they were energized again.

Twins “Congratulations you survived the changes.”

Ben “They weren’t going to die… were they?”

Twins shook there head “Of course they weren’t. We were using what you earthlings call sarcasm.”

They chuckled nervously.

Ben “So how do you guys feel?”

Nick smiled “Like I could kick some real *** right now. I couldn’t move when the orb exited my body. It wasn’t to hard a compromise. It just wants to make me huge. I asked it to keep my minimum the same, but I have a feeling it’ll try to sneak a growth in every now and then. I won’t complain. Right Ben?”

Ben sighed “Yup… no complaining here at all…” Oh he’s was going to be to tall. At least he’d be balanced. Super fast, strong and relatively flexible limbs all contained in a more or less than 10ft body… He sighed again.

Gwen “The purple orb was highly reasonable. I felt like it simply wanted to help me where I wanted help, though… I can’t tell why it wanted me to have this size bust. I simply don’t know…” She wasn’t going to complain. It said it was done messing with her body, and was increasing the maximum of her mana field. It would never match Amy’s since Amy’s field is growing as fast as Ben, and its amplified by the Magnus Gravitus. However, Gwen’s field would get pretty darn close.

Seth groaned “This thing almost didn’t listen to me. I couldn’t even get my thoughts straight for nearly an hour because of the distraction… It wants me to feel pleasure like none other. It said it’d shrink my down to a manageable size is if get a girlfriend and do it every night! I flipped out on it. Eventually it gave and said I had to at least get a girlfriend. How am I supposed to get a girlfriend and explain aliens to her! How am I supposed to focus on working out if I get a girlfriend.” he groaned again.

Ben “You could use her as motivation. Like I kind of did in 6th grade.”

Nick “Yah… what he said. I’ve gotten really competitive lately. I blame this thing right here.” He wraps and arm around Gwen.

Gwen “Who are you calling a thing!” Then she elbowed him with a bit of mana.

Nick coughed and wheezed “That’s right. I also trained because it’s the only way I can get my muscles hard enough so that her punches don’t kill me.” He gave Gwen a wink.

Seth sighed and thought of the prospect of being motivated by the opposite gender. “I don’t know guys… I don’t really have any experience with girls, and I don’t talk to many…”

Ben laughed “Do you think I had any idea what I was doing? It took me about 4 month to ask Amy out, and I had a crush on her for about 3 years. The orb didn’t say it had to be right away right? Just take it easy. Don’t make who ever she is feel nervous or like you’re rushing her.”

Amy gasped at Ben “Since when did you become a relationship guru?”

Ben smiled “Ever since I had practice trying to get you. And a long chat with mom… They really do help.”

Twin let out a loud cough to get their attention “Ok… so now that that is done. You all want to go and absorb your stars when they super nova. You have a few days before the countdown ends. Warning, once you’re exposed to the light wavelength of your star, you will start growing faster, so you might not compress fast enough. Ben probably knows this from experience. Then, when you absorb you correspond planet, you should be all set.” He turned to Ben “Any advice for them?”

Ben “You guys probably know most of what happens, but just a warning. You will want to stable live your orbs as soon as possible. My is set now because it collected all the pearls, and the Nexus permanently stabilizes it, but it also make my max grow exponentially faster than before.”

The Twins “That’s a good warning. You all could potentially have to make a Nexus like Ben has, though that may depend on how you interact with your orbs. Ben just happened to make his universe collapse on itself thereby creating a paradox universe that is the same as his orb. Anyhow, if you don’t do that, then you should be all set. However, I’d like you to refer to Ben every now and then to ask him how he dealt with some stuff.”

Gwen remembered something “Hey Ben, don’t we still have the Book of Memoria?”

Ben “I think we should let me check.” Ben flashed into his world and then reappeared “Bad news… The orb sucked that in too.” Ben felt a mountain of mana smash down on him.

Gwen “That was one of the greatest relic of Anodite history and all you can say is bad news? Its catastrophic!”

Nick was restraining Gwen again trying to calm her down. “Gwen! A better question is what will it do to Ben’s orb now.”

They all turn to the Twins for their opinion.

Twins “So you guys had the Book of Memoria, and Ben’s orb absorbed it during one of it mana episodes…” Ben felt a pair of eyes land on him. Then the Twins began to talk again “It may or may not do anything at all. Personally, we think I may just simply be sealed away forever since someone has to write something for something to be changed, and the orb can’t write anything in it. Unless the orb absorbs the book’s powers in which case it becomes an orb of wished in simplicity.”

What is it?
