1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben “I doubt it. Back when I went inside, I tied wishing for something and it didn’t work.”

Amy smiled “Let me guess. You wanted to stop growing?”

Ben chuckled “There is a fine line from normal tall and too tall.”

Nick “I wouldn’t mind some of that. And what do you mean stop growing. Aren’t you already done?”

Ben sighed “No… after adding the last few pearls, and the Nexus, the Twins told me I’d grow for the next 5 to 10 years…”

Gwen, Seth and Nick tried to imagine how tall he’d be in that much time.

Ben saw their faces “My thoughts exactly.” Ben looked at Amy who was about 2 or 3 ft shorter than him right now. If he grew any more, she’d only be at his waist.

Twins “Maybe you can try wishing for something else. It may not allow that since the orb is against it.”

Ben tried to think of something “Ok… I wish that those dang holes in the universe would seal themselves before the dark anodites get here.” They waited… nothing.

Twins “Try a less demanding wish.”

Ben “I wish that I had Snickers bar in my hand right now.” Still nothing.

Nick “Looks like it’s a dud.”

Ben smiled “It one less thing to worry about.”

Twins “We assume it will let you wish to grow more, but not less. Then again, you wouldn’t need a wishing orb to accomplish that. The orb would do that normally.”

Then something dramatic happened. They all felt like their world had been stretched and torn apart, and then put back together.

The Twins looked extra frantic “The holes have begun to expand. Its only a matter of time before they are large enough to for the Dark Anodites to come through. We can only hope we finish all out tasks before then.”

What do they do now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben remembered that he had made cloths for everyone. Nick and Seth were especially grateful since they were in the nude. Gwen was glad that Ben thought of them enough to make cloths as durable as his. Even better actually.

Twins “Ok… so now, we recommend that you all store your orb’s original planet. Once you absorb the colored stars, you will absorb the planet, and then we’ll see what we have to do from there. We might actually have to make a Nexus to contain the explosion of energy.

Seth, I believe your symptoms should parallel Ben’s when the orb starts making liquid energy. Actually worse so because that is the orbs main objective. To get you off as much as possible.

Nick, be ready to be immobile. You might end up as a chunk of super dense muscle.

Gwen, you don’t have to worry so much. You might pass out from the over laod in mana, but that’s about it.

And Amy, you are the odd ball in this group. Everyone else had their orbs formed when their star was born. However, your orb was made after your star. I sincerely do not know how to deal with you. I don’t know if you need to absorb a star or planet at all, but possibly…

There is an anomaly we have been wondering about. There is one star in the universe that is brighter than any other, and the is the purest white wavelength we have ever seen. Orbiting it is a milky white planet that is perfectly round. Not a single blemish.”

Amy “So I might as well let my hearthstone take it. It won’t hurt to do that right?”

Twins “No, it shouldn’t. However, we can’t say that the hearthstone won’t try to make you more goddess like. You know what we mean right?”

Amy sighed and poked her large breast. It was already the size of her head and totally disproportionate to her body. Though, most of the boys at high school don’t care. They just get red faces and wished they were Ben. “I can’t imagine them any larger with out making me look ugly.” Her hearth stone flash in recognition of her words.

Twins “Looks like the hearthstone understands your concern. It want to make you happy, so it might not make it grow anymore, or maybe a minimal.”

Amy smiled and mentally said please. Her stone flashed again. She let out a sigh of relief.

Nick “What are we going to do about school or our families? They’ll wonder where we are.”

Gwen “I we could make mana versions of ourselves. They’ll record everything that happens to us back on earth and then it fills us in later.”

Ben “Yes, I think that’d work. Can you do that?”

Gwen frowned “I need to know the person’s body though. I could do Nick, and maybe Seth since they have similar builds, but I don’t know yours.” She looked at Amy.

Amy “Don’t worry, I got it.” She patted Ben’s arm. She spent so much time around Ben that she could probably name all his muscles sizes.

After a brief moment, exact copies of out friends were made. They copied the minimums, etc. They felt the same and acted the same, except for one thing. They obeyed the command of our friends, and had little free will to go against that word. To anyone else, they’d act normally to.

Ben walked up to his copy and poked him to make sure he was real. The fake Ben was pushed back a bit by the poke. Ben could tell that the flesh was pretty tangible.

Gwen “Ok, these copies should last about a week, and then we’ll have to send over another set of clones.”

Amy “Lets get these bad boys back on earth.” She snapped her fingers and the copies vanished.

Twins “Down to business…”

What now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Suddenly, the Twins fell over clutching an area that would have been their hearts. They started hyperventilating and screaming.

The gang was shocked, and Amy and Gwen’s protective nature kicked in. They ran up and cast a spell to ease the pain.

Slowly, the Twins got up covered in blue sweat. They were breathing heavily and their eyes looked unfocused.

Amy “What happened? Were you attacked somehow?”

The Twin spoke between breaths “Sort… of…” They paused as they thought about something.

Nick and Ben felt like they were keeping something hidden, and Seth was still oblivious.

Nick “What are you keeping from us? What’s going on?”

The Twins smirked “We guess there’s no point in keeping it a secret. Do you want to know why we can’t fight when they enter this universe?” Everyone was silently waiting for a response. The Twin stood up and took off their lab coat revealing pale blue skin with purple and green veins. One area was pumping up and down like there was a heart there, but just above it was an Anodite symbol. It was glowing iridescent purple. “Just after the battle ended, we begged the Anodites to seal away the Dark Ones in a universe in our body. While they were there, we could activate a part of our immune system thereby sending them into deep sleep.”

Dr. G. Matter “I am the seal. “He points to his purple seal.

Dr. D. Matter “And I and the universe.” He points to a black star gazed type seal.

Both “They will break through the seal and then aim for the universe…”

Ben “Wait… you two? You two are the holes! I have to close you two?”

Twins shook their heads “No. Not you. All of you as one. No one person can stand up to the might of the Dark Ones… no matter how strong. Brute force will end in failure. The opportunity to seal them once again will arise just a moment before we merge. Our bodies will be consumed and converted into a rip in space and time. When Prison and Original become one, then things will be to late.

Amy was crying “Wait. You two are going to die?”

They nodded with monotone expressions “We knew that this day would come one day, and we have had eons to accept the outcome.”

Gwen was fuming “No! I can’t accept that. There has to be another way! We could enhance the strength of the seals, right?”

They nodded “Yes, you could, but it was only prolong the inevitable. The Dark One have awaken, and they will not return to sleep. The seal will eventually be broken. The seal is of mana, and so are they. However, their mana will eventually triumph.” they paused. “Unless…”

Amy was tearing up and had hid her face in Ben’s shirt again, and Ben held onto her. Nick had grabbed a hold of Gwen arm. If he let go, Gwen would have let loose. He was keeping her mind and soul grounded. Seth knew the situation was grim, but he was oblivious to how bad.

Seth “Well ok then. You two are going to die. Let’s take the time we have to get ready. Crying and mourning before they even die is a waste of time, and it appears to be that we are short on that too!”

Amy had let go of Ben’s shirt to hear Seth’s short speech.

Nick “Seth’s right. Lets just do what needs to be done.”

Ben smile as he saw the sudden turn around in his friends. “Lets do this!”

Amy and Gwen smirked and they let loose a giant burst of mana to show their resolve.

The universe, for a brief second, was flooded in the light of hope and the warmth of new will.

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Messenger “Commander, our engineers are almost finished constructing our Mana Blaster 9000.”

Xam smiled “Very good. Tell them that if they finish before the deadline, they’ll all get a 500g of gold.” Xam was swing money every where ever since they discovered the gold planet. They had a near infinite supply, well, he did at least. No one knew about except him and a few individuals. The planet was now funding the entire Plumber organization, and a few large projects.

Xan looked out the window and stared into space. What was going to come? A week after he met his Grand Nephew and his posse, he had a horrid nightmare.

------Entering Dreamscape------

Alarms were wailing.

Messenger “Commander! The whole east hemisphere has been conquered. The southern hemisphere is quickly losing.”

Xam “What do we have on the enemy!?”

Another soldier “They appear to be humanoid in figure, but they aren’t affected by any form of energy that we shoot at them. Even human bullets do little damage. Any damage they take quickly heals. However, the northern hemisphere to fairing better than any of the others. The anodites are shooting off them off slowly, but they are taking more damage than they are returning. What should we do commander… commander?”

Xam was silent as he thought, What kind of hell have we entered?

Soldier “Commander! What should we do!?”

Suddenly, the ship was assaulted by bolts of black mana.

And all Xam could do was watch…

-------Exit Dreamscape-------

Xam “Whatever they are… they aren’t getting the universe while I’m here.” He turned to the messenger. “Nevermind. Tell them if they finish it on time, I’ll give them 1000g of gold.”

The messenger gasped “Each!” It started backing up.

Xam smiled “Each! Now hurry!”

The messenger started to back fast and tripped itself over. It got up and ran.

Xam smiled and then looked in the mirror. He saw a deranged type of smile on his face. “Oy… I think I’m going crazy… last year I would never! 1000g indeed!”

---------------------------------

Back on OOPS, the Twins were having another spasm. Gwen and Amy’s magic helped at a minimal. When they were done, they said “Ok… the stars should super nova soon. You guys should go.” They told each person where it was and they were sent there by mana. “Ben, stay here. We need to have a word with you.”

Ben walked over. The Twins looked like they aged decades in the past two days. Their once smooth blue skin has gone purple and has wrinkled up. Their eyes were beginning to sink inward a bit. “What do you need?”

Twins wheezed “You must know this and tell the other when they return.” The have another coughing fit “When out seals break, our bodies will disassemble and create two opening. One two the prison universe, and another one that leads straight to the original.”

Ben nodded “Yes, you told us that.”

Twins “Wait. We’re not done. The portals will not appear where we are. The Prison portal will actually appear in four place. They will appear in the northern, southern, western, and eastern points of this universe. Gravitron is at the center of the universe, if you didn’t know that. It’s the reason the universe is expanding.” They paused “Ben, remember the portal you went through?”

Ben nodded “Yes, I do.”

Twins “That portal will expand like a bubble until its boundaries consume this universe, and ultimately touch and merge with the four prison portals.”

Ben was silent “Why didn’t you tell us sooner?”

Twins sighed “We didn’t know there they’d form until recently. We could not give you false information, or that alone could doom us all. We discovered the locations in our last attack, and we think that we can only survive another one. Two tops. We are sorry we can not help more, but we are trying to give you all as much time to prepare as possible.”

Ben was crying dry tears. He had learned to steel his heart against pain and not cry, but some how… looking at these two suffer for them… he let loose a single drop. “Its not…”

Twins knew what was going to happen “Ben… you didn’t know.”

Ben felt all the steel in his heart give way. The dam holding back the tears surged forward “Its all not fault!” He started punching the ground. “If I hadn’t gone and done that stupid experiment at the center of Gravitron, then you two could still live!”

Twins smiled “But if you hadn’t… Thousands of lives would have been lost to the Thing, and we wouldn’t have a mascot. And further more, if you hadn’t made the nexus, the green orb would have collapsed your universe and then it would have eventually collapsed this one. You see, that mistake has saved many and all lives. Now it can be used to save them again.” The wheezed some more.

Ben stared at them.

Twins “Now wipe you eyes and soften your heart. Tears are the essence of emotions. They could save someone someday. Do not be ashamed of them for they do not make you weak. The young can cry for the are weak, and the young can grow stronger, and yet they can still cry. They cry tears of joy… tears of mourn… tears of pain… and tears of longing. The strong can cry because they are strong.”

Ben was shocked. “Th-Thank you.” He felt a sudden lightness on his chest. The world wasn’t pressing on him so much anymore.

Twins frowned “Don’t say it now! Say it to us after you save the universe!”

Ben stared at them. WHEN he saved it and not IF. Ben nodded and looked up to the heavens. His gaze was filled with new resolve and a willingness to do anything necessary to save his favorite realm.

What happens now?

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben stared into the sky seeing thing with a more opened mind. Suddenly, he saw a flash of Red, Purple, Blue, and the brightest of all was White. Ben then saw his medallion flare green as the orb inside of it flared in unison with the powerful supernovas.

--------------------------------

These stars were hidden behind rings of asteroids and shrouds of dense gas. No one has ever set eyes on any colored stars except the green one who’s powerful green light extinguished any type of cover that the Twins had tried to surround it with.

Back when the universe was being copied, the Twin knew that they would eventually lose and a new guardian of the universe would be needed. So for the next eon, they devoted ever ounce of their energy, and the energy of even the unknown worlds into the creation of these jewels of the sky. To protect them, they hid the stars, and it worked for the most part. The green star was defiant. The green energy wanted everything to grow, so it pushed the dust and rock away and bathed the universe in its light… and thus creating life in place that were once desolate. The other stars were dormant and less active than the green one, so they stayed hidden.

Until now…

--------------------------------

The red star, after waking up was volatile and aggressive. It blasted the dust and debris away with such force that they broke down into atoms and even their subatomic particles.

As soon as Nick entered its light, he felt his muscle grow and compress at an astounding rate. With every heart beat, he bulked up a tiny bit more. He wasn’t getting compressed fast enough. Suddenly, the Red star started to convulse as Nick neared it. Then it went super nova. Flares of red energy shot outward and bent as they nose dived toward Nick’s red orb.

At this point, any compression was pointless. In seconds his size grew to that of a planet, and a minute later, he could have passed off as a tan star. Rapidly, his size increased, and on top of this chunk of muscle was a tiny minuscule head that was moaning from lust and pleasure. Nick was learning to enjoy his growth.

---------------------------------

Seth found that the blue star was really energetic, and that its light made him feel… happy. The light was the essence of joy. The energy matched Seth’s personality pretty well. As soon as Seth neared it, the star did something never before seen. Instead of exploding, it simply popped… like a bubble. Inside was a gas was drifted to wards Seth. He felt himself fall deep into pleasure.

With every breath he took, he took in some of the gas, and his cock grew… and grew… and grew! Soon, he simply stopped exhaling and breathed in a continuous stream of gas. At the same time, the orb was also absorbing that gas and feeding a stead stream of energy into Seth.

It looked almost comical, like Nick. A giant cock, almost the length of a galaxy had a tiny muscular body attached to it.

----------------------------------

Gwen had passed out the moment she entered the purple light. The purple star is unique. The Twins did not make it, but their allies the original Anodites did. They had invested every particle of mana and energy they had into this purple star in hope that it would serve to stop their dark counter parts. Half of the immortals sacrificed their bodies the solidify the mana and to amplify its power to almost infinity. All that power overwhelmed Gwen’s mind, and now she just simply floated in space as the giant ball of mana floated towards her and entered the purple orb. There was a tiny stark going between the orb and Gwen, and the amount of energy in it was beyond description. Gwen’s mana field burst past this universe and stopped just millimeters short of Amy’s intense mana.

-------------------------------------

Amy felt safe again. The white light surrounded her and gave her warmth. The white hearthstone glowed softly as it soothed Amy’s mind and body. Like a cloud, the entire white star drifted over the Amy and surrounded her, and then fading away. As the hearthstone absorbed the white star, it made a few final changes.

It made Amy’s bones infinitely dense like Ben’s so that her internal organ would be protected from physical assault. It made her skin stronger to with stand more, also like Ben. It made her muscles a just a bit stronger than they look without changing their structure, so that she could partially defend her self. They were more so that she could run and climb, etc. However, it didn’t make her so strong that she needed a seal. Just a ‘bit’ stronger, that’s all (and it used magic so that she could actually lift her super dense bones and skin). Then finally, it made her goddess like assets grow to a pair of KK cups. They were so big that she could suffocate herself if she wasn’t careful, thought the hearthstone will prevent that. It did want to protect her after all.

------------------------------------

The lights began to shrink and then flare once again as the orbs burst with energy. Ben sighed… they were done. He could actually imagine how they must have felt.

What now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets check out how out friends are with the stars.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben was pacing in agonizing anticipation and worry. The twins were gasping on the ground in what could possibly be their last attempt at aiding humanity. He knew that if the Twins died now, the seals would break, and he would have to postpone the Dark Ones himself… at least as long as possible. Long enough for the others.

Twins gasp “Ben!!! We can’t… its to much. We can’t…” They were crying bloody tears as their body was being tortured.

Ben saw this and ran over. He knelt by them “You can do it. You have to. They haven’t finished yet. Please. You must live. At least through this one. Just a little more time. They are almost ready.” The strength and need in his body saturated his words giving the Twins a pinch of will power.

They gasped once more and then the pain stopped. They panted, taking in deep breaths as they tried to tame their still beating hearts. “Behh…behh.. Ben… come closer.”

Ben leaned in and they said, “Call Azmuth… call him and bring him to us. We must have one last word.” Ben nodded and pulled out his plumber badge.

Seconds later, the creator of the Omnitrix was standing by his brothers.

Azmuth came without another word, nor did he cry…

----Flashback----

Azmuth “What do you think you are doing? If you seal them inside of you… you’ll die…” Azmuth screamed. He didn’t want to lose his elder brothers.

The twins “Now Azmuth… this is our decision. Don’t be burdened by our choice. It is for the good of the universe.”

Azmuth was weeping “I don’t care. We can seal them somewhere else. Some place even harder to get out of.”

The Twins “It will be only temporary. Nothing can with stand the constant assault of mana for more than a century!”

Azmuth yelled “I don’t care. We’ll do it again! And again! Until they get bored of breaking free.”

The Twins smiled and picked p their little brother. “Now is this a away for the next emperor of the Grey Matters to act? You will continue where we left off. We think we might start raising money for a scientific community, and you can stop by every now and then. We won’t die today, or tomorrow. We think… But we’re alive right now, so lets enjoy it. Right?”

Azmuth continued to cry…

-----End Flashback-----

Azmuth walked up to his brothers “You have called for me? What is it that you want.”

Twins smiled “Just to see you once more… that is all.”

Azmuth frowned. “I see… Is there anything else you wish from me. I am busy preparing my forces for the coming battle, and so are the Plumbers… surprisingly, they had begun preparations before I notified them.”

Twins smiled knowingly “One of them had a bad dream.” They chuckled and then that turned into heavy coughing and wheezing.

Azmuth felt his walls beginning to crumble. For the past eons, he had hardened his heart for this moment. He knew it would come. “Stop… stop laughing. You’ll die quicker if you keep it up.”

Twin smiled “Little brother. What is life to you? Is it just prolonged existence, or do you really want to live it. Do something dangerous. Like it really was the last moment of your life… you must enjoy it, and have no regrets. Unlike us. Our only regret is not getting to see those blasted Anodites finally get destroyed. By kids, and nothing less!” They wheezed and coughed. “Brother… make sure they succeed will you? That is the only favor we will ever ask you. It is not your duty as king of our people. No it is a request from your elder siblings. Please…” They reached out there hand to hug him one last time, but they fell limp just micrometers short.

Azmuth’s wall crumbled. He let out a wailed that was not heard since the first sealing, and tears that had not fallen since. When he stopped he walked over to their bodies and picked our a bit of skin from both. “You will be remembered in the greats grave of all times…” He opened his pocket and pulled out the Omnitrix. Then he placed the flecks of DNA inside. “And brothers… I will help them. With my life if I must. I won’t let you guys down.” Azmuth wipe his tears and turned around to see Ben a little while off. Azmuth smiled and thanks him mentally for the privacy.

As he walked away, he did not turn around. He knew that what he saw would tarnish his memory of them.

There was a rushing of air and two bodies vanished.

It has begun…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: The Twins have another episode... will they las...

choices: Something else that is of more importance than stopping an invasion!
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben knew that Azmuth would be taking charge of the whole operation. He was one of the few living things left that remember the first sealing.

Azmuth “Ben. My battalion of troops will stall the Dark Anodites. You will go and speed you friends along with what ever needs to be done. The twins have done all they can to give you time, and now its my turn. Waste not a moment Ben Tennyson. It has begun…”

Ben nodded… unsealed himself… and then he vanished.”

---------------------------------------

All in a single moment 5 people, 4 star cores, and 4 planets disappeared.

--------------------------------

At the four corners of the universe, the largest gathering of alien forces congregated. They stood around massive black holes. Then suddenly, they black hole imploded revealing a much smaller black veiled ring.

The commanders screamed to their soldiers telling them to maintain their positions. Order soon returned. The people of the front line were warned of what was to come. Azmuth has gone after delivering a speech and through explanation of what they were facing.

Brute force will not work. You have to fight magic with magic, so they created mana guns. These guns took mana that was in the surrounding space, and compressed then into laser bullets. Kind of like when Gwen throws mana.

They had anticipated thought that they would have to build mana converters to change ordinary light and heat into mana, but it turns out they did not. Something or things were acting as mana generators. Actually, the strength of the mana bullets had nearly tripled just recently. As though some entity had evolved into a mana monster, and created a mana field so larger it covered the universe. There was more than one source…

-----------------------------------

They were in Ben’s universe. He had to get as much time as possible, and no time passed inside his universe, so he waited. Quickly, the energy of his universe healed their body and minds until they were ready to wake up.

Nick and Seth had shrunk down now that their growth and compression had stabilized. Gwen and Amy’s mana field were still growing. Ben was also experiencing burst of muscle growth that shrank down to his minimum. All the orbs had come together causing huge amount of energy to be created. Even Ben was influenced by it to a significant degree.

Amy saw that they were in Ben’s universe, and it could only mean one thing. With the Twin’s gone, Ben had to move on and speed things up to fight the Dark Ones. However, she did not cry. She couldn’t because she knew she had to stay strong for the coming fight.

Gwen and the others came to a similar conclusion.

Nick, wanting to move onto the next step “What do we do now?”

Ben reached into his pocket and held out the cores of each of their stars. “Put these into your orbs. These will increase their power, but mostly their stability. When that is done, go to your planets. I put then behind you guys.”

They turned around to see massive looming pearl like planets floating right behind them. They proceeded to put the core into their orbs. Nick had an iridescent flame shaped core, Seth had and ocean wave crashing on top of each other, Gwen had an iridescent purple star complex/matrix, and Amy had a perfectly white and smooth sphere. Then they place them inside.

Nick expanded for a brief moment, and then shrank back down. The core grew him very little since its main purpose was stability.

Seth felt his muscles pop a bit, but for and instant, his pants were filled 90% with one organ.

Gwen’s mana field flared as it filled about 9 universe in Ben’s realm.

Amy’s heart stone pulsed and her mana field went further than ever and filled 9 like Gwen’s, but the mana she emitted was 100 times purer and stronger. It was a type of healing mana. Gwen’s mana was about 75 times stronger than regular mana, and it all went into power and magical force.

Ben floated there watching his friends experience the changes their orbs gave. Ben felt explosions of growth happen with in his muscles. Explosions that he hasn’t felt since he first got the orb.

Now they proceeded to absorb their planet.

Nick’s flaming red inferno of a planet blazed as it entered Nick’s red orb. Ben had to encase him in a pocket dimension to keep the sudden burst of his growth from blowing his friends away.

Same with Seth, his cock became unsealed do to the growth it experienced and it stretch the entire length of Ben’s universe. And Ben though his cock was big before.

Gwen passed out as the brute strength of her mana grew exponentially. Before it was 75 times the strength. Now it was immeasurable. If you could say the biggest number you knew, it could be assured that she was greater than it. Her mana field spanned the entirety of Ben’s world.

Amy’s mana field spanned out just beyond Ben’s universe and was greater than Gwen’s in potency, but it was not so much for attack as it was for healing and defense. The mana was going to protect Amy, and as many people as possible. However, if the Mana guns wanted to use her mana, they could turn it into brute force be compressing it.

Ben’s orb flared green as it responded to the growth in power of the other orbs. The energy was sporadic. Not even the nexus could keep track of it all. Then suddenly, it even out and balance itself.

Ben knew they were done…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Azmuth takes charge of things.

choices: Ben's group gets a phone call.
Have we forgot that there is a portal on Gravitron?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Soldiers were fighting for the universe and their lives. Ten Anodites have crossed, and that’s all its taken to create wide spread panic. They were beautiful creatures. Their pale skin was rejuvenated in this universe. They regained lost color and looked less evil. With a sweep of their arm, they released eons of stored mana killing thousands. Yet millions were sill arriving.

Jets of purple mana came out of strange guns. They were thin streams of concentrated mana. Then suddenly, as if someone hooked them up to a generator, the stream of mana turned into a river and then into a waterfall! Thousands of soldiers found that their weapon had exploded in power. They trained then all onto the Anodites and began to slowly drive them back.

The anodites found themselves have to drift back a bit. It did not matter. They had expected a large fight when they first left. This was to where them out. The first 10 anodites went back to the portal and went inside.

There were cheers of victory as the Ten were gone. Then suddenly, they felt an ominous presence. A strange black sphere began to appear out of the portal. They fired at it, but it did no damage.

Suddenly, one gun had tuned into Amy’s mana and fired it. A an of white mana reigned down on the strange black ball and extinguished it.

On the other side of the portal, there were sounds of screaming and yelling. Unintelligent words came streaming out.

Billions of black mana missiles shot out of the portal in a single instant. It blazed a line through the battalion of soldiers.

-----------------------------------------

The gang had just left his world. Nick was twice as big as before, and his strength was creating a man field that just currently shrouded the universe.

The same with Seth. However, their fields will eventually grow beyond it along with their increasing maximums.

Ben’s mana field was infinitely larger than even his own large universe, so it’s a waste of mana. And since his orb didn’t like to compress things or make things smaller, Ben had made a deal with his orb in order to help out the forces that were at the front line. He asked it to concentrate his ever growing mana field so that it could only fill what ever universe it was in. If he was in his universe, it would only go as far as the boundaries. Then it would just start getting denser and stronger. In return, Ben had to swallow his worries, and let the orb grow him more. He would have grown to 10ft exactly, according to the orb, but now it had a little more freedom. It would grow him until he got out of college which should be around 22 or 23 years old. Which was a shorter time than before, but now the orb could grow him to 15ft tall. With was about 5 ft over what he might have been. Ben let out a small cry. That’d be about a bit over a foot a year.

Ben told himself to suck it up and do it for the universe.

Gwen and Amy did the same thing. Since their mana fields were larger than Ben’s universe, it’d be a waste of mana if they weren’t in the current universe, so they had their orbs compress it down to fit the universe they were inside of.

Suddenly, the already potent manas increase billions of times, and still increasing.

------------------------------

In the front lines, soldiers were trying to fight off the guerrilla tactics of the Anodites. They appeared in different places send of blasts of mana.

Then a major break through for the good guys came. After Ben, Amy, and Gwen’s mana got compressed, the waterfalls of mana each turned into an ocean or planet worth of mana. That’s how concentrated it was. Some of the guns were even running nonstop. The only reason they hadn’t broken yet was because of Amy’s healing and defensive mana. It was guarding the guns and joining in occasionally.

--------------------------------

Messenger “Sir! The our forces are withstanding the Anodite forces currently. However, out guns are finite and their’s are not. We have lost about a third of out mana guns. However, it appears that their strength had grown exponentially several times.”

Xam hearded what was going on with the guns from a transmission with Azmuth. So Ben’s gang is the reason behind all this. Now isn’t… “That is good news.”

Suddenly they got a transmission. On the screen can the image of massive black balls of mana surging our of the portal in a continuous stream. There were flairs of white mana that got rid of most of them, but some of them got through in between shots. The ones that did get through shot off into the distance and joined together with other spheres that had gotten through. Rapidly, the sphere had grown huge, and not match the size of a star.

Xam was waiting for something like this to shoot at. “Prepare the Mana Blaster 9000!”

Messenger nodded and left. Various controllers in the room began to punch in numbers and calculate locations, etc.

Outside the ship was a giant ring. It was the latest design for a mana shooter, but blow up in proportions. The ring floated near by the ship awaiting its command. Then suddenly it began to light up as it powered up.

Some yelled to Xam “Sir! Its ready and fully functional.”

Xam nodded and was given a remote with a large red button. He smile like a child who just found his favorite toy. He pressed the button…

Outside, the ring began compressing copious amount of mana. All the mana within a light year was being turned into a giant beam. Them it fired.

A beam of Purple, White, Blue, Red, and mostly Green exploded out. It was a terrible beauty. It cut through various dead planets and a couple stars leaving giant gaping hole inside of them. Then it made contact with the giant black sphere. The sphere never stood a change. It fell apart into nothingness.

Suddenly, on the other side of the portal was a single screech of anger. All of them were ready to charge out.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Facing the Anodites.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Ben’s plumber badge rang and Xam appeared on it.

Ben nodded in recognition. “How can we help?”

Xam smiled “You already are by simply being here in the universe. All of your manas are powering our mana guns, and our giant Mana Blaster 9000. We’ve destroyed dozens of black mana stars with the help of your mana.” Then Xam looked to the side and moved out of the video.

Azmuth stepped in “Ok. No time for greetings. We are holding them off. The next step is for you guys is to seal the portals. The one one Gravitum is being monitored it has currently grown to match the planet itself, but its speeding up. You all must hurry before it consumes this universe and merges everything together!”

Ben nodded and ended the transmission. “Guys. You heard that right?”

They all nodded.

Nick sighed “Just how are we supposed to close a portal?”

Suddenly, Ben got another call.

Azmuth “You all may need to must as much mana as you have to spare. You have to force the portal to close by creating a pressure differential. Its like a balloon. If the outside pressure increases, the balloon shrinks. If the outside drops, the balloon expands. You guys have already slowed it down once you re-entered this universe. Now you have to bring it up higher. Some how…”

Amy “But if we do this, then won’t the mana guns lose their source of power?”

Azmuth sighed “We’ll have to deal with the loss. Be hasty though. Every second spent talking is a hundred thousand lives.”

Then they heard voices. “Commander! The anodites have started crossing in massive numbers now!”

Azmuth looked back at the screen “Cross that! Millions of lives are going per second. No pressure!” Then the transmission ended.

The group waster no time. In a flash, they vanished and appeared just above Gravitron. Instead of the planter though, there was not a grey bubbly mist surrounding the planet.

Gwen “Every one cover an angler. We’re going to form a square pyramid.” (since that will make the distance from one person to another equal, and they will thereby be applying equal force on each side).

No one argued, and they obeyed.

The orbs suddenly flared as they remembered the reason they were created. They threw away their desires for this one act as they pulled in all their owner’s manas and concentrated it on closing the portal.

--------------------------------

At the battle front… silence…

--------------------------------

Their manas had started to surround the portal, and stopped its expansion. Quickly, the mana increased and the bubble shrank. Slowly, but surely, the bubble got smaller and smaller. The gang stood in the place with their arms and legs outstretched like they were making snow angels.

The bubble grew smaller and smaller until you began to see the surface of Gravitron again. Was it this easy?

Suddenly, a wave of black mana entered the portal increasing the pressure on the other side.

The gang didn’t need to look to see that every Dark Anodite was there to stop them from foiling their plans of immortality. They fed every ounce of mana they had into the bubble to counteract the pressure that was being applied outside.

Now it was a sumo fight. To giant mana entities were pushing against each other trying to get ahead of the other.

Ben thought, so this is why we couldn’t win with just brute force. This was a battle of mana against mana. The stronger you were, the greater your mana. Unless you’re an anodite. Then you were just weird.

The bubble stopped shrinking and it began to expand again. The gang was sweating now as they tried to oppose the numerous Anodites.

--------------------------------------

From a distance, they could see each other, but they could take with their minds via their stones.

Nick “Guys! We’re slipping. Keep up the force!”

Gwen “Nick! We know. We can see it.”

Amy “There is just to many of them!”

Seth “Come one guys don’t lose hope. We can still do this.”

Ben smiled mentally “What he said!”

Gwen sighed “Really Ben? Is that the best you can come up with.”

Ben laughed “Umm… yes.”

Gwen “You’re such a…”

Nick “Guys! Focus. We lost more ground! Its getting bigger again.”

-----------------------------------

The bubble was growing faster now. The numerous Anodites replenished their mana much faster than 5 teens who were quickly running out.

Suddenly, the Dark Anodites changed tactics. They blasted a surge of mana so strong that it blew the gang out of position. Their concentration was shattered, and the orb’s glow was suppressed by dark mana.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Ben's group gets a phone call.

choices: Something is fired out of the portal.
Amy's orb reacts to her emotions.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Their minds thought in unison “Have we lost?” They all floated in space unable to move. Their bodies were being held down by the sheer force of the manas of hundreds of powerful Dark Anodites.

The Dark Anodites cheered, and yelled in very human sounding voices now. They had grown back into their old shapes after having forgotten them in that prison.

The gang could hear it, but they simply didn’t have the will to do anything about it.

-----------------------------------

Seth yelled in their minds “NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Not yet. We’re still breathing. don’t give up yet.”

They all looked at him.

Nick smirked “Leave it to Seth to be the first to pull himself out of a deep dark ditch.”

Ben sighed and shook his head in shame “I can’t believe I was giving up.”

Amy touched Ben mentally “I wouldn’t call it that yet. You simply got lost. There’s still time though.”

Gwen had momentarily lost her aggressive fire, but that returned in greater force “Am I crazy! I can’t believe I thought about giving up!”

Nick laughed “That’s it girl. Turn up the heat!”

Ben smirked “Ready guys?” He looked and caught all their gazes.

The nodded in unison.

Seth yelled “Yahoo!! Lets do this!”

Every smiled “Energetic as always.”

---------------------------------

Outside, the orbs were reacting to their conversation. Then the orbs let out a piercing light that cut through the dark mana freeing the gang.

The Anodites stopped their cheering and looked in surprise as their foes got back up.

With out need for instruction, the gang turned there focus from the portal to the Anodites. They sent oceans of condensed mana onto the Anodites causing their strong senses for mana to get over loaded. Hundreds passed out, but hundreds remained.

The remaining realized that they were being attacked and began to fight back. The gang shifted from suppressing their enemy to actually attacking them.

Gwen fired billions of purple mana missiles at the Anodites causing then to go on the defensive. Ben, Nick, and Seth were muscling their way around distracting the Anodites. Though they couldn’t break their enemies skin, they were able to disorientate them. Amy on the other hand was sending off giant pulses of pure white mana to neutralize what ever the enemies managed to shoot out.

Quickly, the tides turn. The gang pushed the Anodites to their limit when suddenly the Anodites nodded at one another. The all turned and stared at one Anodite who crunched over screaming.

Suddenly, that anodite exploded into pure dark mana. Its atoms were ripped apart into energy and that energy was turned into dark mana. Suddenly, another anodite burst open, and then a dozen more followed. The hundreds of remaining anodites focused on the mana and pulled it together into a giant dark star.

The gang stared at it suddenly losing hope. The ball of mana was oozing despair and hopelessness. Gwen fired a ball of mana at it, and it got absorbed.

Then Amy’s hearthstone felt its first purpose calling. Amy was going to be hurt if it didn’t act. Suddenly, Amy raised her arms and blasted a torrent of pure white mana into the darkness of the mana ball.

The gang felt their minds clear as Amy’s mana pushed away the darkness. They to joined in to help Amy. They funneled all their mana into Amy, and the Hearthstone converted it into pure white mana.

The Anodites were fuming. They lost 14 immortal brethren, and they do not want waste their lives.. They began to funnel their own mana into the ball to strengthen it. And once it was strong enough, they’d send it hurling toward the mortal nuisance.

Once again, it was a sumo fight. The gang were at their limit now, and so were the anodites. The winner was unclear. Then an anodite sacrificed its body and turned into dark mana. Then 3 more joined. The dark ball expanded and began to over power the gang. They were starting to lose.

Amy’s white mana beam began to waver and dim. Then suddenly it was gone. The gang had run dry. The anodites had won…

The Dark mana ball began its decent of destruction. It floated toward the gang ready to obliterate them. The distance shank smaller and smaller.

They could barely move because the mana was so powerful. All they could manage was to drift closer to each other.

Amy start to whimper, and so Ben grabbed onto her. Ben looked at the ball with hate and anger. He has all the strength in countless universes, and yet he was powerless to a giant ball of mana. He hated that feeling of weakness and hopelessness. That’s the very reason he chose to become strong. He need to guard Amy.

Amy clung closely to Ben. He presence helped block out a lot of the dark mana. She felt the warmth in his body seep into her and make her feel safe despite the situation. She heard his heart beat strongly and continuously. She felt his hold hew tightly as to protect her. She felt… safe.

Suddenly!

What?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Is all lost?"

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
A giant purple beam of mana burst out of the portal and smashes into the black ball of death. Then suddenly, hundreds of anodites cloaked in purple surged out of the portal to aid the friends. They had been waiting on the other side gathering their strength to make one large fatal strike at their dark counterpart.

The Dark Anodites have been storing their energy for eons to fight off the Light Anodites. That had not anticipated fight another force as well. Quickly, they began to fail. Even with their larger numbers, their mana has been severely reduced. However, they did not retreat. They could not willingly go back to a dark and desolate would where famine rules a land of immortals.

They counter attack and drive at the Light Anodites, but they do little damage.

Our friends sit floating around dumbstruck .What just happened? Were they just saved? After a brief moment, they collected their wits and returned to fighting.

Amy and Gwen were next to each other sending burst of mana in every direction. Nick and Seth had grown to a massive size and had begun swiping at the Dark anodites like pesky mosquitoes. They were careful to avoid the White anodites.

Ben, on the other hand, simply disappeared. Every Dark anodite that wasn’t being attack suddenly fell unconscious. Though they were not bleeding, they had broken several bones and received a severe head injure.

With in moment, the Immortal Dark Anodites were defeated, but still alive.

The most authoritative Light Anodite floated up to the gang. He spoke to them “Thank you all. We are sorry we were unable to join sooner, but we had to gather our forces and our mana. We are fewer in number than they are, so we could not risk a prolonged fight. We needed you five to drain them of their mana.”

The gang was some what angry, but mostly cheerful. They had won!

Seth “I’m cool with it. You did what you had to do. The merge should be stopped right?”

The LA (light anodite) nodded. “Let out people deal with that. You guys have another thing to do.” The LA reached into a pouch and pulled out a Vita “Use this to heal your wounded friends. If you infuse it with enough healing mana, it could even bring some of them back. Depending on how long they have been gone.”

The gang finally realized that since the DA (Dark Anodites) were here, then they must have defeated the plumber forces.

Ben took the bag of vitas “Thank you.”

LA “No… thank you. No be swift. The power of the Vita can only call them back if they are not gone to long. You have but a few minutes left.”

The gang looked at Amy, and she knew what to do. She grabbed a hand full of vitas and channeled every particle of mana she had into it. Suddenly, the vita glowed and then it vaporized into pure healing energy. The energy traveled faster than the speed of light touching everything that was injured. Cleaning its wound and healing it. Suddenly, Trillions of things woke up fully healed, and only a few million were far to gone.

The LA was socked by the display of healing he had just witness. “What is your name, Goddess of Life and Healing.”

Amy was shocked and then she blushed a the complement “I’m not a goddess or anything, but my name’s Amy. My source of healing comes from my hearthstone. It was made and forged with the will to protect and defend my life, and this caused it to also have a strong healing affinity.” She raised her hearthstone for the LA to see.

The LA looked at the lustrous pure white pearl. “It is beyond description.”

Suddenly, the DA’s began to stir.

What happened?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Something is fired out of the portal.

choices: They get dragged to a thank you speech.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The LA took a fighting stance and were prepared to attack.

Suddenly, the DA’s dark misty aura began to fade, and they were replaced by a purple cloak.

Seth “What’s going on?”

LA was smiling the widest smile ever “It is a miracle. They have been healed of their greed and their anger!” He turned back to Amy “Thank you Amy. Even though you say you are not, we believe you are the embodiment and the Goddess of Healing.” Suddenly, a dozen LA’s bowed.

Amy was blushed “Aww…. Stop it guys. It was nothing… really.”

The LA’s continued for a time and then stopped. They turned their attention to the new LA’s. Their emotions were scanned with mana and eventually it was found that their greed and anger was indeed gone. They were cured of it.

With that, the Original LA’s and the newly recruited LA’s left and returned to the original universe.

Seth “That’s it? Nothing else?” Then he started to mimic the LA. “Oh thank you goddess of healing! I will bow for like ten years. Oh look! My brethren! Ok. Time to go home.”

The gang stared at Seth and realized that he was actually right.

Nick “Well, there’s nothing much we can do about it now. Lets just close the rest of the portals.”

An hour later, they closed the portal on Gravitron, and the four prison portals. Now to mention that they now had a bag with enough vitas to heal an army of trillions.

Nick sighed “No what guys? I don’t really want to listen to a thank you speech. You want to just go home?”

Then the rest of the gang realized something. That’s exactly what they wanted, so they went home, and lived relatively happily after never.

Remember, life as a Tennyson will always be hectic.

What now?

(Sorry guys, but I was getting tired of this arc, so I ended it abruptly.)
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Amy's magic healed them too!

choices: They get him a girl friend!
Lets go see our three giants as high school seniors.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Its been nearly 6 months since the DA invasion and he kept bumping his head on doorways. The orb was definitely keen to get it end of the bargain. Over that period of time, the orb rushed him along into a super growth spurt making him grow 8inches! He was now 8ft5in tall with strong, fast, and flexible limbs. Every other boy would have slowed down in their growth around this time, but not for Ben. He sped up.

Ben watched slowly as the 10ft ceiling at home and at school got closer and closer.

Ben spent every other night trying to think of how a relationship at such a size difference would work. Amy would only be as tall as his thigh. She’d be like a child in his hands. And how were they going to do ‘it’. By then, he assumed that ‘it’ would be to massive for her!

Now, he was just wishing it was over. The crazy hunger spikes were driving him nuts. He was eating constantly to fuel his crazed orbs desires. The high level of hormones were urging him to do ‘it’ once with Amy, and it was hard to ignore. Every time he was near Amy, he’d be able tower above her, so that when he looked down, he saw the two massive globes underneath her shirt. He tried not to think to much about her body, but the surges of hormones were making it difficult.

Amy had noticed Ben’s change in feelings. He still loved her, but he was battling himself out of respect for her on will and decision making. Probably, if she had asked to do it once, he’d jump at it unable to contain the thoughts his hormones gave him. She realized what was going on when they were standing next to each other in the lunch line at school. She was standing a foot away, but she could feel the heat coming of his body as he struggled to keep his urges in check. She’d have to give the orb a little talk.

Ben being big was perfectly fine with her. However, once it started playing games with her boyfriends mind, then it crossed the line. Amy, one day stormed up to Ben and demanded to be sent into the orb for some reason, and he obliged after a series of half truth/lie scenarios.

Once inside, Amy went up to the green orb and started spazzing at it for making his hormones all whack. Was that really necessary?

The orb had actually communicated with Amy… to an extent, so they made a deal.

The bold of black lighting sparked and crackled in Ben’s hand. It tried to push him down and smash into the ground. If it did that, it would create a large enough explosion to do some serious damage. Ben was having a little trouble holding it away from him. He could feel the malice in the bolt, and its sense of destruction. Ben looked over at Amy for help.

Amy saw this and fired bolts of white mana at the lighting bolt. They collided and the lightning bolt weakened enough for Ben to throw it back at the ship.

Ben stood up sweating not from exertion, but from fear. He remembered this black aura from when they were almost killed by the black star.

The student as and other staff had just seen what happened. Some of them were video taping it. They whispered “Did Ben just… How on earth… Was that lightning bolt black… what just happened… is Ben human…. Did Amy just shoot white light?” There were hundreds of questions coming in.

Ben looked around “Guys… don’t put that on the internet please. I have a hard time not getting noticed already.”

The student body felt the plea in his voice and obliged. He’s respected them for a long enough time, so its time they return the favor. They deleted the images and video. Though, they’ll always remember it in their minds.

Ben sighed “Thanks guys.” He looked over at the table he sat at. His friends were staring at the sky. The dark cloud had left along with the ship.

-------

The gang had gotten up and unsealed themselves just for precautionary purposes. Nick had a silver gravitum ring with a tine blue stone as the centerpiece. He just had to twist the ring in his hand and it would release him.

Nick “That couldn’t have been… could it?” He said as he carried Gwen who was casting spells of defense.

Ben was carrying Amy who was building up a magic purifier around the school to neutralize and dark magic.

Seth was carrying Molly who helped where she could. She was still relatively new to mana, so all she could muster where the basic calming charms to prevent mass panic. They worked pretty well at convincing the students to delete the pictures of Ben’s heroic act.

Ben “We’ll have to assume that it is here, and we have to begin to fortify earth. I’d hate to have to construct a whole planet.”

Seth laughed “Fixing up OOPS wasn’t so hard.”

Ben laughed “Yah, but OOPS didn’t have a molten core.”

Seth “Oh… good point.”

With in an hour, the gang had concentrated all their mana around earth creating an area of highly dense mana. People found themselves less tired, and plants were growing like crazy in the mana rich environment. However, it did throw off an experiment or two that were worth a few billion dollars. Nothing big.

Nick “Is it safe to have this much mana in one place?”

Gwen “It should be. All mana is, is life and energy combined into very reactive particles. They change and mold readily.”

Amy “If anything, it should be beneficial for anything that’s alive. They find that they heal faster, have more stamina, think clearer, etc.”

Ben “So we should do it more often. Earth has gotten pretty lazy lately. With the obesity problem and such.”

Gwen “We could potentially end up doing just that if we stopped using dangerous type of spells.. However, if anyone of us does a spell, we’ll need to have increasable control because the pressure of the mana is great it will try to escape through any exit. So a small flame could become a raging inferno, and a small light could light this half of the universe.”

Seth “So maybe we should just let it spread back through out the universe again to prevent that from happening, but keep a large chunk here lay dormant.”

Gwen looked at Amy “You know? That’s now a bad idea.”

Ben “So what now? We’ve gather every particle of mana we have onto earth. If any anodites decide to flash over here, they’ll get knocked out as the mana tries to escape through them. I assume. All our mana is tied up into defensive spells and a few powerful offensive spells. If that things returns, it might just end up getting obliterated.”

Amy “But its going to do everything it can to not get that result. Who knows what it will plan.”

--------

Far away, the cloud felt stupid. It should have waited and come up with a better plan. First off, it has done everything the kids have done. So its orb is at peak performance. It even created a Dark Nexus. That’s the only reason Ben had difficulty stopping the bolt.

So now it was going to get stronger, so Ben couldn’t do it again. It was paying a visit to the planet of the Anodites…

What could possible go wrong now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: A cloud of Dark Mana!

choices: Its a nebula sized cloud of Dark Mana now!
Something that is worse. Like a galaxy of of Dark Mana...
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
I don’t really see the point I naming Ben’s stats since he’s going to change again, but whatever.

Ben - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Amy
Age: 18 years old
Height: 9ft 6in and growing.
Weight: Getting close to 450lbs. He looked like he weighs less, but his build keeps it all tight and compact. When you see his strength, you’ll believe his weight. (spell keeps things from breaking under his weight.)
Description: Ben looms over absolutely everyone. He is the tallest kid in his school… the tallest person in the world now actually. News reports try to get an interview, but he vanished mysteriously somehow. How do you lose someone like him?

4ft1in taller than Amy thus giving him a perfect view of her perfect globes. Generally this awakens his near 19in python. Its grown ahead of his body to match its future size, but its not quite done yet. Oh… and Seth was the big one. Wait till the orb’s done with Ben. His muscles bulge of his body and every move he makes looks like he’s flexing. His muscles ripple underneath his padded skin. His skin has gotten a little thicker at Ben’s request so that when he held Amy, or when he leaned on him, his hard muscles didn’t make her sore. However, they did nothing to diminished the look of strength and power in his muscles. He simply oozed respect and an aura of command.

*Quick note: Despite the fact that the Red and Blue orbs are main for growing muscle and a certain organ, Ben will forever be ahead of the game even though his growth is meant to be a fusion of both the Red and Blue. He‘s had the Green orb for so long that it does not matter. Therefore, his maximum is forever the strongest and largest.*

Amy - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Ben
Age: 18 years old (a month older than Ben actually)
Height: 5ft 5in
Weight: 125lbs
Description: A good 25 of those pounds are on her KK cup chest. She still has her mom’s long black hair and a type of grace. He skin was the tanned color of a person who was from the Philippines. She had hazel colored eyes and loved life.

Nick - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Gwen
Age: 18 years old
Height: 6ft 7in since the orb grew him a smidge to fit more muscle
Weight: 400lbs (a spell keeps things from breaking under his weight.)
Description: Muscle muscle muscle! That what he really is now. He could bench press nearly 1000lbs for ten reps. Ever since the Anodites, he’d been growing nonstop. Even when he stopped working out for a month, he still grew. Now at about 100lbs heavier than before and 3in taller, he would dwarf even the king of body builders. He walked with a slight waddle, but he could still run if the need came. Gwen could sit on his shoulders with little fear of falling of since they were so broad. Though, his skin was to thing, and it hurt Gwen to sit for to long. She spoke to him about it and he considered asking the orb for thicker skin like Ben’s. Though, recently he’s been having strange dreams of them being in bed and him banding her. Though, sometimes she takes control of the situation and plays with his 16in glory rod. Sadly, its just a dream.

Gwen - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Nick
Age: 18 years old
Height: 5ft 6in
Weight: 125lbs
Description: Actually, Gwen’s weight is from slightly higher muscle density. Not much denser, but still dense. They keep her on balance countering the weight of her EE cup breasts. She’s memorized a few dozen spell books and has given them to Amy, who gives them to Molly. Gwen is looking to secret combine mana and the mind to help heal concussions and improve memory permanently.

Seth - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Molly
Age: 18 years old
Height: 6ft 9in
Weight: 350lbs of slightly less dense muscle. (When sealed.)
Description: He’s like Nick when it comes to size. He has a slight waddle to his walk, but as he walks there’s a mass in his groin that swings with his waddle. It was composed of a 23in tube with softball balls. He could spew buckets and recover with in the hour ready for more, mainly because of the orb’s meddling. Seth and Molly’s relationship is still going strong.

Molly - Senior
Status: In a relationship with Seth
Time Age: Almost 1 year.
Physical Age: 18 years old
Height: 5ft 6 inches
Weight: 120lbs
Description: The 20lbs above a hundred are devoted just for her HH cup chest. She has little muscle mass, but don’t let it fool you. Her body is strengthened by mana, so she could punch a tree to splinters. Her hair color matches Gwen, but they grow like Amy’s (They grow fast and heal quickly. No split ends).


Sorry if I get weight and proportion wrong. I just winged it. o.O’’

Now back to the story…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Recap on stats since its now their Senior Year.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The ancestral home of the Anodites was being attacked. Anodites were fleeing. Trying to get free. They have lost thousands. There bodies consumed by black magic and turned into even darker magic.

Up, at the highest tower, their ruler sat watching.

Servant “Sire, we must evacuate. We have lost this one, but we can make a new one.”

King Rex Imperius nodded slowly. “Is the chamber ready. Is my son on it yet?”

Servant nodded “No sire. We are retrieving him now. We must make haste.”

Rex stood his ground “No. I will wait for my son.”

Suddenly, another servant came “Sire! Your son. He’s being approached by that thing!”

Rex exploded with mana. The royal family has always had an exceptional amount of it, but Rex was different. He had the largest amount in centuries. No other pure anodite matched him. Except his son.

As he grew older, his power only grew with him. Now at the age of 18 (Anodite years, but for all intensive purposes, he looks like any other 18 year old), his power surrounds the entire planet. If only he could tap into it.

His son, when born was encased in golden mana. The first of its kind. That monster must seek its power.

Rex blasted the roof off his observatory and saw the strange dark cloud in more detail than before. It was large, massive actually. It had sent down millions of black bolts transforming his people into dark mana. He would stand it no longer.

Off in the distance, a thickly built teen lay sleeping under Anodites famous albino tree. He rest peacefully indifferent of anyone else’s affair. He spent his days working the living lights out of himself to gain strength to make up for his weakness. He was told he had the greatest power of any anodite, but he has yet to see any of it. But somehow, his physical strength increases easily with little work. So his mana must be strong. (The males grow larger muscle to match their original mana levels, and the females gain assets to match the original mana lever. i.e. Mana level with out the aid of any magical items. )

Thunder shook the earth, and he began to wake up. What he saw was the greatest and more fearsome thing ever to behold. His father was fighting like never before, and it was against this… this thing. This teen yearned to join the fray, but he was with out mana.

Rex was shooting hailstorms and tsunamis at the strange dark cloud. He created gaping holes that would have killed anything else, but they healed them selves immediately. The monster began to lose interest in him, and decided to go for a much larger meal.

It turned in the direction of the teen.

Rex Domino (King of the Masters) was the boys birth name, but he is called Rick since that’s how he pronounced his name as a child. He watched as that dark cloud closed in on him, ad he could do nothing about it. He ran…

King Rex would not allow it. He flew with the speed of a thousand anodites and breezed past the cloud. “You will halt. Continue no further. You shall not claim my son!”

The cloud paused and thunder reigned down like laughter. Suddenly, the cloud morphed into the image of a Vilgax. “Puny Anodite. You do not interest me. Move and you will live that much longer.”

Rex stood his ground “Begone I say. I will not be swayed”

The cloud laughed “Very well. You have been warned.”

Rex pulled all his mana together and released it in one gushing wave of power. The cloud was halted for a moment, but then it proceeded. Slowly, it surrounded Kind Rex and shrouded him in darkness.

Rick saw what was happening. The king of the anodites was beaten? His father was gone? He screamed “Father!!!!!!!!!!!”

Suddenly, the a torrent of purple light exploded out of the cloud. It seemed like hope had returned, but then slowly, the purple began to fade and its color turned to black. All that remained was a single beam of pure royal purple. It separated from the cloud before it was to late and charged at Rick.

It surrounded him, and he was gone…

-------

Ben and Amy were spending the afternoon in the woods. They were going to have a picnic.

Ben was snoring on a lounge chair. His arms and legs resting on the ground since the chair was not large enough for Ben’s height. Amy was sitting by a small stream/creak. It was strange. Like the cloud had never been there. Life seemed to move on. She looked in the water and saw something strange in the reflection of the sky.

There was a purple dot in the sky smashing into all of their defenses. The sky rippled with mana as their powerful shield repelled the intruder. Then suddenly, the purple dot flared gold for a microsecond and then back to purple. It began its rapid decent to earth.

Amy “Ben! Something is heading to earth!”

Ben, with out much think, turn onto autopilot. He unsealed himself and picked Amy up. She told him where to go. She looked for traces of mana and followed a straight line to a near by pond.

*Splash… sizzle*

When Ben and Amy arrived, they saw the pond covered in cool steam a glowing entity floating in the middle. What they saw a thickly build 18 year old wearing golden robes and a small crown and amethyst encrusted armband. He was floating and glowing gold, but he appeared to be asleep.

Ben stepped forward to see who or what he was, but Amy stopped him.

Amy “He’s an anodite…”

Ben assumed she meant dark anodite and was about to assault the teen, but Amy held his arm still.

Amy “As in an anodite from this universe. Not the prison one.”

Ben “Oh. How can you tell? isn’t he supposed to have purple mana?”

Amy “It’s the signature on the mana he is releasing. It matches that of an anodite, but is unusually strong. Everyone’s signature is different, but a family may have a similar Base signature. Like you have a similar base signature to you parent. However, the strength is just hugely different.”

Ben nodded “So he is an anodite. Why is he here and why is he unconscious?”

Amy “I don’t know. Wait look! He’s waking up.”

Suddenly, Rick’s eyes open and the golden glow around his body vanished. “Wo-ooe-oo” He yelled as he began falling back. Suddenly, he found himself standing on soil. He closed his eyes and tried sensing for the mana of anything nearby. His mind was rammed with so much mana he had to grab onto a nearby tree to stop himself from falling. “What the! How can anyone have mana that strong?” He opened his eyes and looked with normal vision. He saw a giant.

Rick recoiled at the sight of Ben “By the love of Andonia! Why are you so… huge!”

Ben sighed. First impression has not started off well. Then he raised his hand and did the star trek thing with his hands. Suddenly, the Anodite broke into a smile. Did this sign actually work?

Rick stood up “Ok. Now I know where I am. Earth! Only they can come up with shows like that.” Then he composed himself. “Please pardon me for my rudeness, but my home planet was just attacked by a strange cloud. I know it sounds weird, but I-”

Ben “We believe you. It attacked us too.”

Rick was astounded “What! How did you beat… wait. Did you say we?”

Amy stepped out from behind Ben “Yes… we.”

At this point Rick had to grab onto a tree again. He’s see some big girls as prince of his people, but never before has he laid eyes on someone like Amy. “Your mana must be huge!”

Amy looked stunned “What?”

Rick paused “Oh… sorry again. Considering this is earth, and not mana people use mana, I can understand that you are confussss----”

Amy snapped her fingers and a blinding ball of light appeared (It covered the their half of the galaxy).
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: THE CLOUD PART 1

choices: Rick meets the powerhouses of Earth.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Rick stumbled back. She was a power house of mana. “S-ss-sor-sorry miss, but I guess I have assumed wrong. What I meant earlier was that on my planet. If you have a large mana, you have large physical attributes. They are a symbol of power. For a male, you grow stronger physically, and it doesn’t necessarily have to be bigger. It could be strength. For the female, it is generally in their milk production, but that generally implies larger boobs. Sorry if I have offended you, but this is common language on my planet. They are rarely covered since they are a symbol of our strength and pride. It seems that you partially practice that custom here on earth.”

Ben and Amy looked at each other and saw why he would say that. Ben was wearing his usually T-shirt and cargo shorts, but they hugged his body so that you could see most, if not all his muscles, and they hinted at the size of his penis. Amy on the other hand simply couldn’t get the cloths Ben gave her to morph and cover all her assets.

Ben chuckled “No, some of us do. Today, you caught us at a bad time. Amy here is unable to find cloths to cover her fully, and no cloths are large enough for me.”

Rick “Oh… so you two are larger than average on this planet?”

Ben “Yes…”

Amy sighed “A lot actually.”

Rick then slammed his forehead with his hand “I for got my manners. My name is Rex Primus, but my people call me Rick.”

Ben smiled “Ben” He raised he hand to shake hands.

Rick looked at it and thought, what a peculiar custom. Wait… “Oh. Right Earth custom I didn’t know what you were doing. Good thing I saw this on Nick as Night” He returned the hand shake.

Ben looked at Amy “See? TV does help.”

Amy sighed “Well, I’m Amy.” And she did a tiny curtsy.

Rick bowed in return “Thank you for you kindness so far, but I really must find a way back home.”

Ben “Its gone by now… probably. That is unless you had any Immortal Anodites living there.”

Rick looked quizzical “What? No. My people need my help. I must save them.” He smiled, but felt less confident than he appeared.

Amy looked at Ben “Should we help?”

Ben “We’re going to face it eventually. Might as well do it away from earth.”

Amy looked at Rick, and saw that he was trying to jump off the face of the earth, and failed miserably. “Are you alright? Why aren’t you teleporting?”

Rick frowned. He was frustrated the he could not get home “Oh? And you can? Only the most elite spell casters can teleport.” Suddenly Amy disappeared in a flash and appeared next to him.

Amy “Like this?”

Rick swallowed his words. He croaked “Like that.”

Amy stormed back to Ben “Lets go. Looks like he doesn’t need out help.” Ben and Amy were laughing together mentally.

Ben thought “You are so mean! Forcing him into a corner like that.”

Amy smiled “Well he deserved it. Talking to me like I’m lower than him. I demand equality.”

Ben sighed “He should be ready in 3...2...1...”

Rick “Wait! Come back. Please. I don‘t have any control over my mana.” He looked down in shame and embarrassment. When he looked up, he came face to face with Amy smiling.

Amy “Ok!”

Ben “I’ll get the others. You two chat for a bit.” Ben turned and left.

Amy “So what’s this about no control over your mana?”

Rick “They say I was born covered in gold mana, and that it was the strongest thing they ever saw. But I can’t even use it. I have no control over it. Though, I know there’s a lot of it. I gain muscle without much effort, so that proves that its real.”

Amy looked quizzical “Are you sure you can’t use it? When Ben and I first saw you, you were floating in the middle of the lake, and glowing gold. It disappeared when you woke up though.”

Rick looked shocked “I was? How did it feel? Was it like they said?”

Amy nodded “It was pretty strong. Especially for an anodite. Though, did you see Ben?”

Rick nodded. “Wait… I tried to sense for the mana of others, but there was this one mana that shrouded everything. It was super dense and made it flooded my mind.”

Amy nodded “Most of that is Ben. There are some others like me, Gwen, Seth, and Nick. We pulled our mana fields together and forced it to cover earth. Right now, the earth is covered in a shroud of the densest mana ever made. Though, most of it is still Ben.”

Rick gasped “You guys had that ability? Is it difficult to do?”

Amy “Not really. You just have to imagine your mana field coming together in the shape you want it to be. Ben has decent control, but he can’t mold mana into spells. He can, however, encase his hand in dense mana and catch a spell or block things mana related. He gave me this hearthstone and it lets me use spells like an Anodite.” She lifted her white hearthstone our of her shirt.

Rick looked at the stone “Its so pure. I have never felt such a strong healing affinity.”

Amy blushed “Yah. When Ben made it, he had only on intension. It was to protect me, so that’s what it does. It wants to protect my life, and I want to protect all life, so the stone does that for me. It creates its own mana and I can channel its mana. Plus, if it runs low on mana, it can tap into Ben’s massive reserves and use that instead.”

Rick gasped “Then it has to be one of the most powerful mana relics in the universe. And you say he made it himself?”

Amy “Trust me. If he were to release his true strength, he could tear the universe apart with a snap of his fingers. However, he always has himself on a leash. Occasionally, when something bad comes out way, he unlocks a smidge of his strength to take what ever it is down.”

Rick was open eyed in shock.

Amy “Yup, and I’m proud to be his girlfriend. Not because he’s strong, but because I love his personality. I don’t even know why I’m telling you this, but I feel that you don’t mean any harm, and neither does my stone.”

Rick looked at the stone with amazement “How did he make it? I heard that hearthstones are beyond rare and that there were only around 5 inexistence.”

Amy smiled “This one stone has nearly a Billion billion hearthstones combined together. Each hearthstone merged together and focus in one spell type which was defense. Defense of the body, soul, and life. It protects basically.”

Rick was still shocked. How did one fuse hearthstones? “I think I need one… I can’t even touch my mana field, but I can touch others.”

Amy “Wrong! You can touch yours. You just need to find out how. Up there, in the sky, are hundreds of defensive spells. Each tuned into our mana. You got through it somehow. For a brief second, you exploded in golden mana, and you got through our shields. Its just hidden very deeply.” She raised her hand and placed it on his left pectoral, but she was trying to get him to think of his heart.

Ben “Ah-hem. Done yet?” Ben saw Amy touching Rick’s pec, and he was kind of flustered. it’s a good thing he heard her last few statements.

Amy paniced “Ben, wait! Its not like that!”

Ben turned around “Like what? You trying to help him find his strengths. Amy… I trust you ok? Do what you need to do.” Ben smiled “Everyone is around the bend on the path. Come when you’re ready.”

Amy smiled and gave Ben a big hug “Thanks.”

Ben smiled “What for? I didn’t do anything.”

Amy smiled anyway “Well thanks any way. I’ll get be there soon.” She waved Ben off.

Amy walked back over the Rick “You understand this if you try to hit on me that I’m going to have kill you right? That’d be merciful. If Ben though you had other intentions, you’d wish you’d never been born. He’s very protective of me which is what give the stone its power.”

Rick paled a bit at her words “Understood Ms. Amy.”

Amy laughed “No Miss please. Just Amy. Now lets go. We might just be able to save your planet and its people.”

Rick scoffed “How?”

Amy smiled evilly “I can revive the dead if they aren’t gone to long. Now lets go.”

Rick looked at Amy like she was a spirit. Oh my god! I’m in the presence of a Goddess! What were her friends like? Other gods and goddesses. What is Ben? What have I gotten myself into!?!?!?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: THE CLOUD PART 2

choices: Time for cloudwatching... I mean hunting.
It looks like a bunny! Wait... nevermind its just a deadly shroud of black mana.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Rick followed behind Amy. The sun was beginning its decent.

Gwen “You found another anodite? How did her get through out defenses?”

Ben “Amy said there was a flash of gold and he broke through. He’s the prince of his planet, and he was born with a different mana. Maybe his mana can slip past ours more easily than other. Do you sense any holes in out shields?”

Gwen shook her head “No.”

Ben “Plus, if he had forced his way through, he would have shattered all the shields right?”

Gwen sighed “Right.”

Nick looked at Ben “Since when did you know so much about mana?”

Ben scoffed “How long do you think I’ve been around Gwen and Amy? Its bound to rub off on me. Look! I can even mess with my mana to a finite limit.”

Molly “Oh look. Here they come. The guy looks pretty hunky if you ask me.” and she looked at Seth and wink playfully.

Seth had half a heart attack. “Don’t do that. You just made me paranoid.”

Molly “Aww…. Sawwy (sorry).” She said like a little kid.

Ben “Hey. How are you liking earth so far?”

Rick paused “Its people are very… interesting.”

Nick chuckled “You know what? That definition works.”
