Gwen walked up to Rick and looked him in the face. She had to tilt her head because he was 7ft tall. He also had a tight build similar to Bens. Strange. “Your magic is perfectly fine if you want to know. Your mind is just out of sync with it.”

Rick was curious “How do you know this? I have never heard of this before.”

Gwen “I used a spell to test for the vibrations in your mind, body and mana. You body and mana are in sync, but your mind if not.”

Rick “What?”

Gwen “I did a few tests. Everything living, and some dead things have mana. That is well known. However, the ones who can control it match the mana. The mana of anodites are generally very broad, so its easy for their mind, body and mana to match up. They have a large area of error. Others have it harder. They need to be more closely tuned into their mana in order use it. Even Ben could use it if his mind matched his mana. He’s gotten closer, but no where near close enough. However, he’s able to control the density of his mana field, and that should be enough for him. I don’t think he wants that much power. It could corrupt him.”

Rick “So how do I change my mind?”

Gwen “When I say mind, I mean personality. Your golden mana must demand more from you. Some crucial requirement they you have not met, so they can not vibrate in sync.”

Rick scoffed “I don’t think there’s anything wrong with my personality. Everyone calls me perfect. Except at spell casting. I can do everything else like build a house, but spells are just out of my reach. Other than that, I’m perfect, so I let myself relax under the albino tree most of my day since I can do most anything.”

Gwen scoffed now “Nope. Not yet. What you need is something that is difficult to learn. You are to cocky and apparently lazy. Maybe once you fix those, you can use this hidden power we’ve hear do much about.”

Rick laughed “I and the most humble man in the world. I know not of what you speak of.”

Amy walked up, and Rick paused his rant. “Only the least humble person says they are the most humble. Rick… Gwen is right.”

Rick looked at Amy’s eyes for any sign of deceit, but all he found was the naked truth. He slapped her face away. “No. I cannot acce-” Rick flew through the air and landed 10yds away.

Everyone watched as Ben walked up to Rick.

Nick sighed “Now he’s done it.”

Seth “Ten bucks says that he learns humility from this?”

Gwen looked at Seth “He’s to cocky. You’re on.”

Seth smiled “I hope you have those ten bucks to give to me when this is over.”

Gwen laughed and then sighed “I hope so too.”

Everyone’s face grew serious. Gwen was hoping to lose the bet. She want the guy to learn humility. They focus on Ben again.

Ben “Who do you think you are? Slapping my Amy like that! Huh?”

(Amy thought “MY Amy?” Then she blushed. He was just in a protective mood.)

Rick looked at Ben, and he rubbed his cheek. He could feel the swelling fade away. He’s always been a super faster healer. Like really fast. “Who do you think you are punching the prince of all Anodites in the face!”

Ben “I think I’m a guy who can beat your sorry little *** back to your home planet for you. You won’t need any mana to get there!”

Rick was fuming. He knew Ben was powerful, but was he crazy enough to potential face the wrath of all Anodites? He got up in time for Ben to land another punch, and another. Rick’s think muscles blocked most of the damage, but it still hurt like crazy. “Ohf… Are you crazy? You could face the wrath of every Anodite in the universe! They’d turn you into dust.”

Ben frowned “I doubt it. They’re nothing by the decaying powers of the Original Anodites. Worthless scum.”

Rick, Oh now’s he’s done it. “Do you challenge the power of Anodite?”

Ben scoffed “Possibly.”

Rick spat at Ben and started to ran to punch. As soon as he was bout to make contact, Ben vanished and punched him from the side. Rick flew another 10ft to.

Ben began to repeated beat Rick into submission. “Admit it. You are weak, and you know. Say it so everyone can hear.”

Rick was unable to move. All he could do was survive each punch. How can someone be this strong? I didn’t believe Amy when she told me This guy made the hearthstone, or he could rip the universe apart if he wanted to. How did he get this power? Could he possible help me? Suddenly, the punches stopped. Rick was pounded badly. Even his fast healing was taking a while.

Ben loomed over Rick’s limp body “Admit it… you are weak.”

Rick looked at the giant before him. He felt all the power of the universe in has gave, and it was all directed at him in spite and hate. “Fine. I’m weak.” he mumbled

Ben asked “What did you say? Let us all hear it.”

Rick “I’m weak.”

Ben “What?” He bent over to hears.

Rick yelled “For the love of Andonia! I am WEAK! W - E - A - K! Are you happy?” He lay there. A steady steam of tears rolled down his face.

Ben “Nope, but that can wait for now.”

Rick “What?”

Amy yelled “You learnt humility! How do you feel?”

Rick heard her words. Humility… I am weak, but I can get strong. No… I WILL get strong. If it was for anything. It would be to show Ben humility.

Rick “Ben. I won’t thank you. Partly because I can’t feel my face, and two. I consider you a rival now.”

Ben nodded “Next time we fight, I’ll beat you until you say sorry.”

Rick coughed “No… Next tim-”

Suddenly, the skies were darkened. The cloud was already here.

Amy “Ben! Look out!”

Ben looked up and saw bolts of black lighting reign down towards him. He pulled his mana together to catch it, but as soon as they came near his hand, they split apart and surrounded him. He could feel the mana pulling him into another universe.

He saw the gang was out of hearing range, and there was only Rick next to him. “Rick. Protect Amy. Understand? If you don’t then I’ll hunt you. You got that. But if she’s safe I’l-” He was cut of as he suddenly vanished into another universe.

Then the clouds were gone. That one spell took nearly all of its mana. Ben was a hard person to contain. Luckily, that old king had quite a large reserve. For now, it would leave to let its mana replenish itself, and it would let its commander have a world with their captive.

It started to float away when suddenly a beam or white mana cut through the cloud.

Amy “BEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!” And she fired wave upon wave of mana.

The there was a scream inside the cloud and they cloud sped off away from earth. Now it really needed to heal.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Rick meets the powerhouses of Earth.

choices: Fast forward to Prom or somthing...
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Freshmen 1, “Hey! That looks like a plane!”

Freshmen 2, “no way. Its more of an elephant.”

Ben and the rest looked. “Are you sure? I see a giant raspberry smoothie.”

Amy “It’s a brain!”

And this continued for the rest of lunch, with occasional breaks as Ben scarfed down another slice of pizza.

Suddenly, Gwen felt something ominous appear. Gwen’s mana field covered the universe. She was aware of an huge changes. The only reason the others didn’t feel it was because they were having to much fun. Last year, Ben was doing a lot better in Astronomy because his mana field detected every star in the universe.

Gwen “Excuse use seniors. I forgot to tell them something important.” Gwen dragged the gang away leaving the two freshmen with a quarter of a box of pizza.

Ben “Gwen! I was almost done with the box.”

Seth snickered “Watch it Ben. That 8 pack of yours might tern into a 1 pack.”

Ben sighed “To bad its all going into my bones. In ten months, I’ll grow 2.5 ft. I don’t want to have to crawl through the hallways.”

Gwen “Guys. Focus! Something evil is in the universe again. Its like the Dark Anodites, but worse. Its like us. I can feel another orb. Ben, can’t you sense it?”

Ben closed his eyes and tried to get in touch with his mana. He remembered Gwen’s explanation.

-----Flashback-----

Gwen “Guys, I did a few small test, and I found something out.”

Amy “What?”

Gwen “Anyone can use mana. Even some people from earth use it, but on the smallest scale. You know fortune tellers?”

Nick scowled “Yah. One of them ripped me off.”

Gwen smiled “Then that was a fake. I’m talking about the real deal. People from earth usually have small manas, but that doesn’t matter much. What does matter is how in touch they are to it. The more they relate with their mana, the more they resonate with each other, the more they can do with mana. Fortune tellers resonate with their mana through crystal balls, magic cards, golden compasses (good book in my opinion), and just about anything else that can help them focus.”

Nick “Then those witch doctors, are they?”

Gwen scowled “I wish they weren’t, but yes. They use bits of dark magic that I’d prefer not to touch.”

Ben wondered “Then could we?”

Gwen smiled “That’s what I was heading towards. I want to get us practicing on resonating with out manas. Then you can do things with it despite the fact you can’t fully use it.”

------End Flashback------

Ben focused. He grabbed his medallion and tried to see what was going on with the universe. Suddenly, he notices a gaping hole that was devoid of life or mana. It was utter darkness. “Is that?”

Gwen nodded “I think that is a Dark Mana Star. However, its going to super nova soon, and I felt another life form there that went dark. I couldn’t find out who before they changed.”

Amy “Should I just blast it with healing magic to purify the darkness before it become a larger problem?”

Gwen “Be our guest.”

Amy snapped her fingers and the all the healing mana in the universe flashed in response. The dark ball was eradicated.

Ben opened his eyes “Its gone!”

Gwen nodded “Yah. It seemed like all the left over dark mana collected together in a final attempt to destroy us. It’s a good thing we got to it before it got worse.”

(I felt like I was digging into a plot I didn‘t want to bother with, so I had to end it quick before I got sucked in and wrote long dull chapters).

Amy “So its gone?” She checked it out herself, and it really was. Yay! Quick victory.

Gwen sighed “Ok! Back to your stations! The school day isn’t over.”

They sighed. Ben’s stomach growled, and they all looked at him.

Ben sighed “Don’t tell me I need to eat three pizzas. The number just increased last week.”

Amy giggled and elbowed his stomach “Keep it down in there. Auntie Amy is going to get you another box.”

Ben looked at Amy like she was his savior.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Nope! Its just an innocent white cloud.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Its been 5 months and its impossible to see Ben without a smoothie. His appetite has been growing and growing. Now crouching in the halls at 10ft 9in, Ben was, and forever will be, the tallest person on earth.

A freshman was passing Ben in the hall “Hey Ben! You have Dr. Comet right? Can you quiz me sometime before mid-terms? I think I have most of the names down, but I’m not sure.”

Ben nodded “Sure. Tadpole galaxies?”

Freshman sighed “Yup…”

Ben smiled “Don’t worry. You’ll muddle through. Meet me in the library after school. I’ll help you then.”

Freshmen “Awesome. Thanks!”

------

The kid knew his stuff pretty well….

------

Amy “Ben! We have to focus if we want to ace AP STATS, AP CALC, AP PHYSICS, AP WORLD, AP ENGLISH.”

Ben groaned. His brain was pounding from the consistent flow of information. How did scientists do it… “Ok.. Know what? Its time for a break. I’ve stared at these book for 5 hours. That’s good enough for now.”

Amy sighed and closed her textbook “I guess short break won’t hurt. Midterms are next week. We have to push on threw.”

Ben sighed “To bad I can’t muscle my way out of this like I did for all my other problems.”

Amy smiled “If life was that easy, then it’d be no fun.”

Ben sighed and opened the fridge. He began to construct the mother of all mother sandwiches. When he was done, he had used the whole loaf of bread and several bags of deli meat. He didn’t feel guilty eating all this since he was paying for it all with his summer cash. He made a separate smaller sandwich for Amy.

He brought them back out into the living room so they could continue studying and eating at the same time.

Amy looked up and saw her sandwich “Thanks. No mustard right?”

Ben nodded “Yup. Light mayo and a thin slice of tomato.”

Amy “Yum. My favorite.” She picked up her sandwich and then she saw Ben’s sandwich. “Oh my god…”

Ben held in his hand a 3 ft tall tower of bread and meat. “What? What happened?”

Amy laughed “I know you’re hungry, and its probably because you growing, which is the orbs fault. But does could you break it down a little? Have a bunch of smaller sandwiches instead of one skyscraper?”

Ben smiled “Sorry. I would generally listen to advice like that outside, but I’m at home, and I like my sandwiches big and scary looking.”

Amy sighed and looked down. “It was worth a shot. How are you going to eat that?”

Then she heard the sound of licked fingers, and she looked up. The sandwich was gone. She stared and was confounded “I’m not even going to ask. I would ruin my understanding of the universe.”

Ben smiled “Good. I don’t think I could explain.” He stomach was pushed out a bit.

Amy looked at his abs and saw the bulge. “Yup… its in there.” Then suddenly, you could see his stomach visibly shrink and return to its tight 8 pack as it digest the sandwich at an extreme rate. “Still not going to ask…”

Ben smiled “Please don’t. Even I don’t know.”

------

Midterms… They endured…

------

Grades were out. The school printed out all their exam grades on a single paper so they didn’t need to hunt each of their teachers down.

They gang gathered at their usual table after school.

They counted off “3...2...1!” They unfolded their paper to see their grades.

Seth “Awesome! I got B’s on all of them!”

Ben and Nick studied a little harder than Seth “Yes!” They got a mix of A’s and B’s.

Gwen refolded hers and held a smile on her face.

Amy sighed “This is awful!”

Ben saw Amy and went over to ask what’s wrong?

Amy “I got an A- on one of them.”

They all rolled their eyes.

Gwen smiled “Hey. Why so glum? You did better than me!”

Amy scrunched her face. And Ben picked her up and put her on his shoulder. “You got all A’s and an A-. Do you realize how mush teens would pay to have those grades in an AP class? Well, it’s a lot, so stop feeling glum. Lets all go out got ice cream. My treat.”

Moments later…

Everyone went out with a single scoop cone except… you guessed it. Ben felt extra hungry and got a triple stacker. Amy was sitting on Ben’s shoulders like an adult would do to a child.

Amy “Is this how you feel all the time?”

Ben “What do you mean?”

Amy “I can see the tops of everyone’s head! And they all have to crane their necks to see me. That’s what I mean.”

Ben shrugged with Amy on his shoulders “The feeling’s neutral. I don’t think much about it. Well I do think about the fact that I have to almost kneel down to go through doorways. That about it, and the fact that I have 1ft3in to go…”

------

They were all at the park. Amy was babysitting for extra cash, and Ben decided to tag along. He was pretty much known by every person in town since he walked everywhere. He couldn’t even fit in a care comfortably anymore. (much to his parents unease).

The two kids Amy were baby sitting were Mike Spim (5) and Clare Spim (5). (fraternal twins.)

Mike “Again! Again!” Ben was them into tossing them lightly into the air and catching them.

Clare “Is it my turn yet?”

Ben “Ok. Mike, I think its your sister’s turn ok?”

Mike sighed, but he smiled anyway. “Ok. Can we play something else afterwards?”

Ben laughed “Sure… Why not?”

Then he began to toss Clare around. Amy was sitting on a bench keeping an eye on them, though she was really watching Ben. He was so gentle, but he was so strong. I guess that combo works. A gentle giant…

Mike “I want to grow and be big just like you. So I can toss my sister up and down like that too!”

Ben laughed “Wow there! One step at a time. Wait until you’re done playing small. Because once you’re big, no one can toss you like this.” And Ben proceeded to toss him up into the air.

Amy smiled. What would our kids look like? Then she caught herself. Slow down Amy-san. You aren’t even out of high school yet.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Mid terms!

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The next 4-5 months vanished like no time passed at all. Well, except for Ben who had to crouch lower and lower throughout his growing ordeal in order to get through a doorway. He simply suffered.

Prom!!!!!!!

The one of the greatest and most feared high school rituals. Boys and girls alike went above and beyond this one night and strut their stuff.

------

Ben was 11ft 9in now. Over twice Amy’s height. She was at his waist line.

Ben’s face was red, and he was sweating. He’s been with Amy for near 7 years, and still he could not ask her as easily as he had hoped. He crouched down to get to Amy’s height “Umm… Amy? Would you… if you don’t mind… and you have some time that night… be willing too… umm… join… me and be…umm……………”

Amy was nodding her head egging him to continue.

Ben stood up and picked any up now. “Amy, will you be might date to prom?”

Amy smiled “I thought you’d never ask!” And they hugged each other. Amy was only about 6 of 7ft off the ground right now.

------

Nick had called Gwen over to the park.

Nick was sitting in a bench, and Gwen came over to sit by him.

Gwen “You called? What’s the situation?”

Nick was trying to hide his tension, but failed utterly. His shirt was already starting to cover in sweat.

Gwen had a feeling she knew what was going on, but she ignore the cold sweat her boyfriend was breaking into.

Nick “Well… I heard that Prom was next week, so I didn’t ask anyone out as a date yet, and I was wondering if there was someone out there who wouldn’t mind going with a sweating oaf like me. Someone who was at the this park. Someone…”

Gwen waited “Go on…”

Nick “Someone who had orange hair, and could kick my *** to Timbuktu and back again.”

Gwen smiled “Continue?”

Nick groaned “Will this someone say yes already?”

Gwen pulled Nick in closer “Fine… yes.”

------

Seth was flipping out. “Why am I being so high maintenance right now? What’s going on.”

His mom “Seth! Is everything alright in there?”

Seth was shocked and he spilt the cologne all over his shirt. He groaned “I’m fine mom…”

-

Molly walked casually over to the town pond. She saw a massive bulky shadow that she recognized. “Hello there stranger.” She ran a finger down his spine.

Seth shuddered from the feeling “Hey Molly. I have a question.”

Molly sniffed “What’s that smell? Cologne?”

Seth chuckled nervously “Umm. Molly I have a question…”

Molly “Why are you all wet? Did you jog in your suite?”

Seth pulled down his tie. Oh why did he dress up. “Umm… Molly I ha-”

Molly “Is that gel in you-”

Seth grabbed Molly and yelled “Molly! Will you be my date to prom!”

Molly laughed “Finally! The assertive Seth that we all love so much. Yes!”

--------

Prom night… the pick up.

Nick and Seth, no matter where they went, could not get a suit the didn’t show off all their muscles. They eventually turned to Ben who told then to use the gravitum cloths he gave them. They faced palmed themselves for idiocy.

Ben did not have such luck. He spent the remainder of his summer funds on his suite. It was twice as big, and twice as expensive. Ben cried handing over the wad of cash.

Ben, at 11ft10in, and massively strong. Stronger than either Seth or Nick thanks to his orb. But most of that strength was compacted into his tight build. He weight at about half a ton, or more. Though, they used a spell to make his minimum lighter, or he’d never be able to enter houses ever again.

The suite had to be streamlined to match his body. Since he was proportionally thinner than both Nick and Seth, he didn’t need to worry about looking like a wide rectangle. When all was said and done, Ben had himself a sharp, cut, clean look. He even took the time to wax (like gel but looks more natural) his hair the way Amy liked it.

The boys went into the limo to get their gals. Seth was first and they discovered Molly had taken a liking to black. Nick and Ben looked unsure, but Seth was all for it.

Nick was next and he brought back the purple queen. Gwen was garbed in royal purple. From dress to nails to jewelry, and charm bracelet.

Nick smiled “Its so you!”

Then finally was Ben’s turn. They pulled up to the house that he helped fix up. The yellow cream colored home of his trials.

Ben stepped up and rang the door Bell. Zia opened it and welcomed Ben in.

Zia “She’ll be right done. You know girls and their make-up.” Zia craned her neck to meet Ben’s brilliant green eyes. “I can’t believe how much you have grown. 7 years ago, I could look straight and see your eyes. I could say thank you for fixing that place up. Now I have to lean back to look.”

Ben blushed at the complement.

Then they were a voice. Amy “Mom! Leave Ben alone.”

Zia smiled “I’m just messing with him. Can’t an old lady joke around once in awhile. Right Ben?”

Ben smiled “Right. Keeping life fun as always.”

Zia sighed “You don’t know how much that means to an old lady like me. Thank you.” Then she shifted moods “Now hurry out. This night happens only once. Not out! Out is say.” Zia grabbed her daughter’s hand and dragged her down the stairs towards Ben.

Amy and Ben looked at each other for a moment and they smiled. Ben ducked out of the doorway, and gave Amy his hand “Follow me to the carriage Swan Princess?”

Amy was dressed in white everything. Her mom even gave her a dress she had been saving just for this day, and a diamond wristband. These were things her husband had given to her from his parents, and now she gave them to Amy.

Amy’s presence seemed to brighten the night. “Don’t mind if I do tall black knight!”

Ben was dressed in all black and he had a tiny red rose in his pocket. He reached into his pocket. And pulled out a pouch. Then he opened the pouch and pulled out a bouquet. “I hope you don’t mind a rose/vita hybrid, but I didn’t want them dying to soon.”

Amy “Aww… you shouldn’t have.”

Suddenly Zia opened the door again, “Here let me hold onto that for you. I’ll get it in some water.”

Amy scrunched her face the way Ben liked “Mom!”

Ben laughed “Its ok. Its better for the flowers. Besides now your hands have room for another present. Now open your hands.”

Amy complied and suddenly felt a strange ball on her hand. She looked down and saw a pure white Nexus. It glowed with a warm energy, and it you could see it was made of interconnected Doves. “Ben! Its beautiful! When did you?”

Ben “Last week while I was waiting for my suit to be tailored. I had a lot of down time waiting for a large suite to be made. This nexus, when you place it on your other one will merge with it. Next time you enter your world, you’ll see doves flying around freely. And, you see the branches on your hearthstone? There will be doves perched their too. I kind of made it more animated basically.”

Amy laughed “I love it! Thanks so much.”

Ben kept quiet about the other purpose. He wanted no one to know about it unless it was an emergency.

*HONK HONK*

Seth “Hurry up! We don’t have all night! Its Prom. I want to get their before the limo line for the Red carpet gets to long!”

Ben and Amy looked at each other and smiled. They walked hand in hand to the limo.

------

Best night of their life…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Prom and Graduation.

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Guess what! Cap and gown were free!!!!!!!!! They did a lot of fundraising while they were freshmen, sophomore, and juniors.

Amy was laughing as Ben ran down the street. She was on his back barely hanging on “Ben!” She was screaming with laughter.

Ben was waiting for this day for nearly a year. That blasted orb was done! HAZZAH!!!! But was his natural body??? Oh well he didn’t really care “Sorry Amy, but I’m just so happy that deal is finished.”

Amy laugher the way she normally did as she was just barely holding on. Ben got her on his neck again. Being 12ft wasn’t as bad as he though, but he didn’t want to get any tall. He had to bend over to get through doorways now, and some times he had to sit to move around a house. That’s why he barely ever visits anyone anymore.

Amy sighed as her heart stopped pounding “That was exciting. Its kind of nice being up here. If you know what I mean.”

Ben laughed “Nope. Its been so long since I was short that I can’t quite recall the feeling.”

Amy scrunched her face “I see. Anyway, we should get to the ceremony. They have our cap and gowns already there this year!”

Ben smiled “Good. I’m broke.”

------

The school was amazed. They lied about the fundraising saying that just to get questions off their back, but it’s a good thing students didn’t really pay attention to what other students do outside of school. Some person stopped by and dropped off a check for half a million dollars for this years senior class.

The seniors had to line up outside the cafeteria to get their gown. They already told them their sizes before hand. However, they knew of Ben’s issue with the ceiling and had his brought outside. They even set up a decent booth for him to change in. Apparently, there was a not with the check.

When Ben left the booth, a few teachers and student had brought a gift that was dropped of. “Someone left this for you. Do you know who because they are funding this graduation.”

Ben was stunned “I really don’t. Do you mean the whole entire graduation?”

They nodded.

Ben opened his rather large package and found two things. A letter and an envelope. He opened them.

Dear Ben Tennyson,

In the name of knowledge, we give you a copy of our will. You and your Friends may want to go collect their things before a few sneak hands try to grab at them Anyhow, we learnt just prior to our death, we assume, that Earth has a strange way of educating their young. They must pay?!?! What way is that to stimulate learning in a society. Its outrageous, so we have enclosed the largest sum of money we dare send with out compromising OOPS to pay for the education of whom ever you choose to share it with. Learning is out greatest desire, and now that we are gone, then we want others to bath in the light of knowledge. Please accept this gift.

Sincerely,

The Matter Twins

P.S- If you’re reading this, then the universe survived! Jolly good my friend. (We have always wanted to use that word. Jolly indeed).

Ben’s heart pounded as he read the letter. They had prepared something before they sacrificed them selves?

Ben opened the envelope and pulled out a check to his meager bank account for
$3,141,592,653,589,793,238,462.00.

Ben passed out.

-------

Amy “Ben… Ben… Wake up. They’re about to call an ambulance.”

Ben groaned. “Huh?”

The faculty and students “Hey! He’s up.”

Ben looked around “What happened?”

A student “You looked at what ever was in the envelope and passed out.”

Amy raised an eyebrow questioningly. Did her really? “Ben, can I see what it was?” She gestured toward his giant hand.

Ben looked in his hand and started shaking again. He handed it to Amy and got ready to catch her.

Amy looked at it for a moment, and slow began to fall back. Ben had caught her by now. “Ha…ha… its pi!”

Faculty “Pie? Have we all gone nuts? :et us see what’s wrong.” One of them marches up and had to grab onto Ben when he saw the number. The others join and then some of the students. By the end of the day, its was known around the school that Ben was the richest guy on earth.”

------

Amy stepped out onto the podium. As valedictorian, she had to give a speech…

One speech later, the students got their diplomas, etc. Throwing of hats, etc. Screaming, etc. Yelling, etc.

Ben stands up to his fullest height and yelled “Who here is going to college!” He got a lot of me’s and woots. “Well its free, is that ok with you?”

Everyone was silent. “Seriously?” They were trying to see if the high school giant was telling the truth or not.

Ben nodded “I’m rich now. May as well invest it in the future.”

Everyone screamed again, and some students who did want to drop out now decided to stay and go to college.

Amy walked up behind Ben and yanked his silk robe “That was nice of you.”

Ben laughed “It was the Twin’s request. They asked me to do it in the letter. Now that I have so much, I might even start my own school!”

Amy laughed “You’re still going to college right? You aren’t going to drop now that you’re rich, right?”

Ben nodded “Of course I’m not, and besides. The Twins said this was learning money. Not spending money. I can use it for anything in the search of knowledge.”

Suddenly, a group of student told everyone to gather around Ben. Suddenly, the cheer team burst out and circled Ben. The Big Ten came up to him and began to toss him in the air. The rest of the school circled around their hero!

As Ben was going up and down, he picked Amy up and tossed her lightly into the crowded “Hey guys! Catch.” Every one was shocked, but they let it go and started tossing Amy into the air.

Gwen, Nick, and Seth stood off to the side. Molly was running the cheer squad.

Gwen sighed “Knuckle head. First thing he does when he gets money is he throws it away to everyone!”

Nick laughed “I’m cool with it. I might go to college now that its free.”

Gwen froze “You mean you will go to college. Its definite.”

Nick sighed “I was only joking…”

Then Gwen went onto a tirade.

Seth was glad he had someone like Molly. She didn’t really flip out when he said he as going into body building. He was already making some money from competing. They had to up him up to the pros. He simply outshone everyone…

-------

Everyone at the ceremony went to a Ben funded party…

What now?
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Graduation and relief for Ben.

choices: Not as bad a start as I thought it'd be.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Any was standing next to a rather sad Ben “What’s wrong?”

Ben sighed “I grew another inch.”

Amy laughed “Don’t worry to much about it. I’m sure the orb is done meddling.”

Ben “But how do we know?!?!?!”

Amy smiled “Do you want me to check with a spell? Will that make you happy?”

Ben nodded. Amy smiled and began a small chant. A white haze covered Ben, and then it faded. “What?”

Amy sighed “The orb is done, but it purposely postponed your natural growth until after it was done so that you could grow more.”

Ben flipped “What!” Then he saw that Amy had more to say.

Amy “And… it knew that you enlarge pituitary gland and… umm… testis would well…”

Ben “What?”

Amy “They would take your supposed natural growth even further than it would have before. Instead of 5in, its now a 1ft.”

Ben yelled “What! I can believe it. How long will it take?”

Amy scrunched her face. “About until you’re 21year old, so this really is just a somewhat natural growth.”

Ben sighed “If that orb had a body, I’d pummel it.”

Amy laughed “If you did that to anyone that made you angry, earth’s population would be seriously reduced.”

Ben thought about it “Really? I don’t get mad that often. Do I?”

Amy laughed again “Just joking with you. Now what were we going to do today?”

Ben “Oh right! Colleges. We can either go to the ones that exist today, or I could make us one. Then we’d know we’d get in.”

Amy laughed “How good is the on you are going to make?”

Ben thought about it “Well, I’m hoping that since it’s another intergalactic school, that it’d be greater than any IV Leagues. That way, I can meet some tall aliens. And get Earth accustom to aliens.”

Amy “Isn’t that what the plumbers are preventing? To keep aliens of earth?”

Ben chuckled “Nope. They just keep the peace. Remember MIT? They are school of aliens. That’s why they are the best.”

Amy “Oh. Right. I forgot about them.”

Ben “So what do you think? Tennyson University?”

Amy thought about it. It had nice ring, and besides, maybe after attending Tennyson university she might actually become a Tennyson. “Know what? I like that. Lets do it.”

------

Over the summer, a school magically appeared right next to Yellowstone national park. It was connected to a large cave system and it had its own river of lava, courtesy of the volcano. There hung a sign “Welcome to Tennyson University.” Then it showed the world in the palm of your hand.

The school was a massive single structure with 5 main sections. It was a giant FRACTAL pentagon. Each new pentagon added was a whole new room. Eventually the pentagons got to small, but the smaller ones were just outside for decorations. The main ones were where the class rooms were.

The main pentagon, in the center was the area for school events and sports. It had the massive area of 50 football fields. Coming off of it were 5 smaller pentagons on its 5 sides. Each one fore something different.

Business and Communication, The Sciences, The Maths, The Arts and Literature, and the last was the office section. Each sub-pentagon had their own five sub pentagons, and those had their own, and it continued the pattern for a few more hundreds times until they got down to atoms. For some reason, the small pentagons can not be shift or broken. As though it were magically enhanced *cough cough*.

Earth hadn’t reacted to pleasantly to an alien school. They were to different… However, there were the curious humans who had to meet one in person, and others who were the children of plumbers and had want to learn to be one as well, since the school taught the earth curriculum and the plumber curriculum.

Ben’s school got over 5million applications from around the galaxy. Earth had sent in about 250 students. To keep things equal, they had to take a little of each species of planet. They ended up have to create a system to weight out the species on the each planet to the number of planets in order to the fair number of students from each.

September… there was a platform floating in the sky waiting for space cruisers and other space ships to come and drop of their kids. Quickly, the school filled.

Most of the gang joined. Molly went off to model. Seth went off to body building. They were going off well.

Amy hung closer to Ben “There’s only 6 students from each planet or species allowed right?”

Ben sighed “For the most part. To bad I don’t have a planet. That would have worked better. I might build that next.”

Amy laughed, and sighed “But is it ok for the 6 students from earth be us 4? Some other kids wanted to get in.”

Nick patted Amy on the back “Its perfectly fine. We know people. That’s all.”

Gwen “They’ll have a chance next your. This year is the opening year. Anyone who goes to this has bragging rights.”

Ben “Is that the only reason you are going?”

Gwen laughed “No! I came to force the science build to submit to my superior intellect.”

They all looked at her, and she smiled “Just joking. Guys! Take it easy.”

They laughed nervously.

I wonder how much different this will feel going to a school of aliens…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: College time, and odd discovery...

choices: The meeting of the super humans.
Lets just get through the first day.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
There was a planet that was directly in the middle of space between the Red, Blue, and Green stars. Its became known as the large planet. It if the home of the WayBigs. But it was also home to some others.

With in the last century, a whole space shuttle of human plumbers crash landed on the planet, and saw it beautiful abundance of large life. They stayed there and had children. What they did not know was that there was a reason that things on the planet were huge beyond proportion. With each passing generation, something from the planet changes the DNA of its inhabitants so that they are bigger and stronger than the last. Since the Waybigs were there for eons… that’s why they were so um… big. Now the plumbers have never done this before, so what came was a shock.

Their kids were born normally. Nothing could look wrong had all. They grew normally until they hit puberty, and then their world flipped. Some of the kids experience a 1-2ft growth spurt with in their first year. One kid even got 3 ft. However, each year, they had another surge, but it would shrink down each time. By 18 or 19, they were practically done at about a range of 9 to 10 ft tall.

However, there was one kid who was bigger than all the rest. He was absolutely huge in every way possible. His parent, the Jones, kept a secret…

The Jones lived by a small waterfall that tasted purer and rich than any of the other pools. They claimed it as their own. During Mrs. Jones pregnancy, that is all she drank, and it nutrient fed her body and their son’s. The day came for him to be born and he was delivered. However, something was off. His body was normal, but he had an abnormally large set of testis, pituitary gland, and large penis. He came out having a 6in erection. They kept it a secret all these years by covering him in bag cloths, etc. because of how he was born, they called him Tent.

Tent strolled down the dirt street almost completely exposed. The society there gave up on trying to cloth their giant young ones since they grew so fast. Once they start to settle, they might put something one them. He stood at his proud 11ft stature. The young here have developed a hierarchy based off of your height. The taller, you were, the higher up you got. Also, their height directly corresponded to their strength, so Tent was the strongest. Even the cloth he wore around his groin barely held back the strength of his two 20in long 3in think monster.

He simple exhumed cockiness and arrogance. He had the kids at their small school worship his and if they wanted to talk to him, they had to praise his god like muscles. This society was mostly farming, so the kids there had to develop strong, but non bulky builds. Tent wound ever since puberty, they farming wasn’t to hard since he actually did have a bulky build unlike the others. His muscles were twice as large as there for some reason, and he did the same amount of work. Though, most of it was compacted together.

Tent walked up to a group of kids “Guess what? I get to go to college.”

The kids “What? How? We don’t have any here.”

Tent laughed mockingly “Well maybe one of you guys can follow me and be one of the 5 kids I can bring back to earth. I hear that we are like twice the average adult height. I’ve got to be over that by now. No one is teller than me!”

The kids were excited. Who would he take?

Suddenly, their elected chair person of their small colony walked up “What’s this I hear about you, Tent, picking who gets to go?”

Tent paused and glared “Well I’m the biggest, so I should get to be in charge of who goes.”

Chair person sighed. He mumbled the arrogance in this kid “I was planning on letting you go, but considering your attitude, I might just pick someone else to go to that college.”

Tent froze and picked the man up “You will let me go!” He yelled. He was used to forcing people to his will.

Chair person glared at him stone cold. He would not be told how to run this colony “We are looking for respectful people to go as representation of the maturity of this colony. The founder of the school has enough money to buy a trillion school and that’d be only a fraction of 1% of his riches. We are hoping to impress him and gain a donation of some sorts to help fund out own school and further our lives. He might even boost the economy to something beyond farming! But with you up there, we might as well give us his money for us to throw back at him!”

Tent had never been talked back to like that, except by him mom, but he respected her. He knew how hard it was raising a giant like him, so he was good at home. “But you will let me go.”

Chair person paused and thought. The founder was also the tallest person on earth, so he heard. He was currently 12ft1in, and growing steadily. “Tell me Tent. Has your growth level out yet?”

Tent was surprised by the question, but he smiled cockily “Not yet. Unlike the others. I think I still have another foot and a half to grow. I might end up being 12ft 6in when I come back.”

Chair person smirked inwardly. Lets see how he reacts to a normal earthling who’s DNA was not affected by this planet, and was still teller than Tent. “Fine… You can go, but you can not pick anyone else to go.”

Tent smirked. He put the chair person down. “Deal. Peace out losers. I’m going to college.”

The chair person sighed and felt a sudden disturbance in the force “What have I done…” Then he looked back at the other giant teens. He craned his neck and they looked down respect fully. “Where is your school teacher?” They pointed to a lady down the street.

The chairman went over “Hello Ms. Sully. I have an important request for you.”

Sully smiled “Yes, Chairman. What can I do for the person who keeps this place running?”

The chairman nodded in recognition of the compliment “Thank you Ms. Sully. It has come to my attention that a University on earth was made, and it is accepting student across the universe. Each planet gets 6 students. I would like you to pick 5 students who you know are studious, hardworking, and have decent manners.”

Sully scrunched her face “Why not 6?”

Chairman “Because I have promised Tent a seat. The reason is that I’m hoping this will teach him some humility. There is someone on earth who is 12ft tall! He’s not from this planet, so he’s just another person from Earth! And he’s taller then Tent already. Maybe that will show Tent that he doesn’t have the right to be arrogant and self-centered.”

Sully pondered the idea “You know what? I kind of agree.” And they laugh the way adults do.

-----

Mom, Mrs. Jones “Hey, I heard you were going away.”

Tent looked up from his packing. “Hey mom. Yah. You heard right.” He saw his mom was about to burst into tears. Tent was shocked. He’s never seen his mom like this.

Mom knew he’d be back, and that he’d be smarter when he returned, and a whole bunch of other good things. But she couldn’t let go so easily. She fell to her knees, and Tent went over and picked her up. Mr. Jones just got back from the fields and had heard some of what they said.

Dad “What’s this I hear about going away?”

Tent stood up and looked at his father “I’m going to college.”

Dad froze “I see. Have you packed?”

Tent nodded “Just about.”

Dad “When are you leaving?”

Tent “Soon. Tomorrow or the day after.”

Dad nodded slowly. His eyes looked far away. “Is see… Ok…” He patted his large son and walked away.

Mom had gone silent and slowly followed Dad to where ever.

Tent finished packing up.

------

It is now tomorrow. Tent was dressed fully now because the colony had the motive to actually make a full set of cloths.

Tent was saying by to his parents.

Mom had stopped crying and accepted that it was for the better. “Now be good ok? I don’t want you ruining the family name by embracing the colony.”

Tent smiled, but he grimaced inside “Fine mom. I’ll make them bow down to me by the time I graduate.” He was really cocky right now.

Dad sighed “Son. I want you to take this. Its given us a lot of luck over the years, and I’ve added a few things to it, buts it been in the family for centuries. When you need something, just hold it and hope.” He hands his son a jade tablet. At the bottom was a tiny carving of this planet and a large man. “Maybe you can continue the tradition. I finished the last two last night to have it in the record. Maybe you could add something when it come to you.”

Tent held it in his hand. He help something old and meaningful in his hands. And it was his now. His ego swelled. Wait till I show everyone else. “Thanks dad. I will.” He gave them a hug and started to walk toward the Plumber Space Cruiser 300.

It was just him, one other, and 4 other humans from earth. He couldn’t wait to dominate them… to bad for him.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Trouble some human-thingy

1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Tent got off the ship on onto the platform. They directed him towards a hole. He followed the others and jumped in. It levitated him to the ground.

They continued into the school to gather for an assembly to celebrate the school’s grand opening. He heard that the founder of the school was also a student. “Kid must be some snooty rich kid. Small and weak. I could get him to submit to me.” Tent smiled. The chairman won’t have to worry about not getting a donation. He’d make sure of it.

The university was trying to prevent a massive bubble from forming, so they only let 1500 students in. In total, they could house about 6500, but the extra was just in case they end up with a larger class on year somehow.

Tent walked In confident. Most of the aliens were smaller than him, and based of his logic, he was their superior. He found himself a seat and decided to be nice to his follower. He shoved some other alien out of a seat so his follower could sit “There you go. Right next to me. You should be honored.”

The other 10ft6in tall teen rolled his eyes, but took the seat. He apologized for his colleague’s rudeness. Lucky for him, the alien was from a planet of very nice inhabitant, and they accepted the apology. This guy’s name was Nowen.

*You may be wondering why there are no girl giants or anything. Mainly because, by total chance, the people of that colony only had sons, partly because boys had balls, and the planet itself encourages the male race. I’m sure there is some planet in space the encourages the female race as well. One of you just need to write about it in another interactive… unless you already did. Then congratz! =D*

Tent grumbled “Would they start the dang ceremony already? The long I sit here, the less time I have today to make people bow down to my godly body.”

Nowen sighed. People have tried to talk sense with this kid, and they have all failed because he was always bigger than them. And he won’t care if an alien is bigger than him. His excuse is “They aren’t human, so it doesn’t count.” Nowen looked at Tent smirking cockily. At this point, he promised to associate as little as possible with Tent since it could impact any friends that he does happen to make.

Speakers “Testing testing 1 2 3. Thank you all for coming here on time. We were waiting for the last couple of late comer to arrive. But now ever person who enrolled is here. Starting the University off strong I see. Jolly good. Now…” The person speaking was a representative of the Plumbers who was sent to over see the schools effectiveness and co-operations. “Now with out further delay. I bring you Ben Tennyson. The founder and student of this soon to be fine establishment.”

There was an applause and Ben stepped out.

Everyone in the audience paused and looked at the giant human. They had not heard about his size. All humans they have met were small and puny. Tent was especially threatened.

Tent turned to Nowen “How tall is he do you think? Are my muscles bigger than his? I’m sure there are. Never mind, I’m just talking nonsense.”

Nowen stared at Tent in surprise. He was being extra defensive. Did he feel threatened?

Ben and was about to talked when someone yelled out.

Someone 1 “Wait. Did the guy say Ben Tennyson? The guy who blasted Vilgax back into space?”

Then there were murmurs. They all started remembering the name, and they saw someone great standing before them. There were those who were jealous of Ben’s reputation.

Someone 2 “Where’s the Omnitrix? I don’t see it on your wrist.” there were yells of agreement.

Ben was feeling nervous and didn’t stop it. Amy was sitting there. He patience was growing thin. No one did this to her Ben.

Amy walked up from her front seat and stood up next to Ben. “QUIET!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!” She amplified her voice 1000 times with mana.” This shut the room up. Their ears stilling ringing “Thank you.” She said normally, and then she sat back in her seat.

Ben looked at Amy as he waited for the ringing to stop. “Thank you Amy.” She smiled happily and innocently. The aliens that were sitting near her shook with a silent fear.

Ben “Right. The Omnitrix. I have it back to Azmuth because I had to much power.”

Tent scoffed in his seat and stood up “So now you have none right? You gave up one of the most powerful weapons, so now you’re powerless.”

Ben frowned… is that another human he saw. “Now necessarily. Though I’d rather not say what I can do.”

Tent laughed “Because you can’t do anything that a relatively large human can do. You’re nothing special. The only reason you beat Vilgax was because of barrowed power. Now that’s gone, so you’re weaker than me. I am a god to all humans.”

Ben sighed inside his mind “Who are you? Can you please come up here.”

Tent smiled. Nore attention for him. He got to show these people their size difference. As he stood up and walked up to the center of the large Pentagon, he noticed something. Ben was bigger than him, but his muscles were a little smaller! “Name’s Tent. You should be honored.”

Ben frowned “We’ll see. Give me a punch. The hardest you got.”

Tent recoiled slightly from the request “Excuse me? You want this muscles” He pointed to his giant over inflated basketball bicep “To punch you?”

Ben nodded and smiled “Considered it a handicap. We’ll duke it out if you want. I don’t take kindly to insults from ignoramuses.”

Tent scowled. No one insulted him and got away with it. There were oohs from the crowd “Fine. Its your hospital bill.” Tent swung the hardest punch he ever gave at Ben’s chest since this was the first time he actually received and insult. There was the sound of crushed cartilage. Tent fell to the ground grasping his shattered hand.

Ben sighed “Amy, I know you’re angry, but would you mind healing his hand please? I don’t want the infirmary to deal with this right now.”

Amy got out of her seat and cast a quick spell. His hand healed immediately, but the pain was still fresh in his mind. He felt as though it were still broken.

Tent stood up “What do did you place under your shirt? No one had a chest that hard.”

Ben felt like he’d heard that somewhere before, and smirked. “I can assure you there isn’t. Now go back to your seat. You’re lucky you aren’t expelled yet.”

Tent fumed “No one tells me what to do.” He ran for another punch, and when it was close to hitting, Ben vanished, and Tent found himself flying through the air towards his seat. The aliens near it fled to the sides. Good thing too because the seat he landed in collapsed along with some other chairs from the crash.

Ben wiped his hands against each other and resealed himself. “Now where was I… right. This school exists because of two very special twins. You may know them…” Ben told them a short story of how the twins had saved their universe eons ago, and what they wanted no. “So lets finish what they started and embrace knowledge. Now go. You’re dorms have been given the basic essential. Pick any you like, but make sure that when you claim a room, that you mark it as yours. There will be a small touch screen panel. Type in your name. If you can’t spell it, say it into the microphone. If you don’t have one, pick a symbol in our grand selection of pictures to call yourself, or just take a picture and put it in. Now go. Today is exploration. Learn and understand the school as best as you can.”

Everyone left excited to get their own room. However, some did linger around. That human was still knocked out.

Ben walked over along with Gwen, Nick and Amy.

There was another one there sill face palming from the humiliation.

Nowen walked up to meet Ben “I’m so sorry for my colleagues actions. I don’t know what the chairman was thinking when he sent Tent over here. He has thing where he thinks that he’s in charge, and he’s a god among men. I really am sorry.”

Ben looked at Nowen shocked. These two people were opposite each other. However, they were both huge. Almost Ben’s height, but not quite. Ben was still at least a foot taller. “What’s you name?”

Nowen “My names Nowen. It really nice to meet you. I’ve heard quite a bit, but to actually meet the Ben Tennyson. I was shocked. How did you move so fast, and how did you get so strong.”

Ben smiled. He had a fan. Lolz. “Know what? I like you’ll, so I’ll tell you.” He turned to the other “Do you guys mind?” The didn’t mind. “Can tell you why, but not how. The reason is that my body is super dense. When I through him, I used about 1/infinty of my strength. If I weren’t compressed, the universe would cease to exist. That’s why I gave up the power of the Omnitrix. Now you know you can’t tell anyone else. Ok?”

Nowen looked at Ben disbelieving “I don’t know… I know you’re strong and famous, but really?”

Ben nodded “I don’t have any reason to lie. Besides, I’m almost positive that this school will be attacked someday. You may or may not see me in action then.”

Nowen saw Ben’s confident smiled, and decided to play the innocent believer “Fine then. I will wait patiently for that day.” He reached out his hand to shake hands. Ben returned it. “Now where’s the infirmary?”

Amy stepped up and cast a spell “Just saving the nurses there hours of annoying arrogance.”

Nowen let out a chuckle “Sorry, you don’t know how right you are.”

It looks like Nowen has made a group of friends…
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets just get through the first day.

choices: He makes himself a Christmas Present.
Someone plays a prank that goes horribly wrong.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
Tent groaned at he picked himself off the pile of crushed seats. He was sore, but perfectly fine. Nothing was broken. “That kid has to be a face. Its not possible!” Tent was trying to pull the bits and pieces of his shattered ego into something that was whole. Ben will pay for humiliating me like that. When he was insulting Ben, he was stating fact. Ben was just to weak to accept it, so he resorted to some trick to shut him up. “It won’t work you hear? It won’t work…” Tent promised to beat Ben down and making Ben pay. He was the strongest of all humans, and that’s final.

He was debating: However, if he approached Ben now, he’d only use that cheap trick again. I’ll have to get that much stronger to stop him and reveal him for the fraud he really was. So he plotted.

Back at his planet, he had taken classes in a bit of everything, but they were incomplete. He also didn’t want to waste time taking things that weren’t worth it. He planned on taking all the sciences such as Chemistry, Biology, Anatomy, and other things that will help him reach his ultimate goal. He wanted to make something to boost his growth spurt this coming Christmas. Something to make him taller, bigger, and stronger than Ben. (The teens of that planet have had periodic growth spurts near the day they were born, but the strength of the spurt diminishes each time. He sought to replenish it).

------

Tent was more studious than ever before. The thought of beating Ben drove him to learn everything he could about the body, its chemical, and all its other stuff. He aced the first quarter exams and was starting to get the school to buy a chemical synthesizer. He would need it for his plans. He felt like he was getting closer and closer to his ultimate goal.

-------

Amy and Ben were playing catch in the center pentagon with a ball of white and green mana. Amy started it off with a ball of white, but as it was exposed to more and more dense green mana, it started taking on both colors. This helping Ben practice manipulating the density of his mana around his body and other areas. So far, he could only control the mana around his body, but he hoped to manipulate it from a further distance some day. His resonance with his mana was steadily increasing. Slowly…

College was everything they hoped for and more. Gwen was still going full blast neurosciences. Nick was starting to delve into deeper aspects of anatomy and organic compounds of the human body. Amy was marching off and getting all the things a universal doctor would need. She spent all but 9 hours of her day studying. 8 were for sleeping, and 1 hour was for hanging out with Ben, and then they might go study advance Chemistry together.

Nowen had joined the group more and more often. He hasn’t really spoken to Tent in ages, nor did he mind. Nowen was looking into being a magician at mechanics. He found he had a natural skill at it. When he saw a broken car just outside the school, he started to tinker until a student came screaming at him. He said sorry and they left with their car. They came back and gave him 20bucks and said “Thank you! You got rid of that awful clanking sound.”

Life was going good, and they were all studying hard.

------

Tent “Really! You’re letting me buy one?”

Ben sighed “I looked at your grades and asked your teachers. They think it will make you strive harder and find something that was never seen before. You have a skill at the sciences they said.”

Tent smiled “Really? Cause I didn’t know much when I started, so I kind of freaked.” Though he was yelling with joy. The person he was trying to beat was helping him! Take that you loser!

Ben smiled “Well, keep up the work. It should arrive come midterms.”

------

Once again, our studious learner practically aced all their midterms. Amy and Gwen neck in neck for the highest grades. Ben and Nick had decent grades. And Nowen being declared a prodigy at machines of all sorts. Tent was offered a place in the student hall of fame for sciences, as was Amy and Gwen for other places. Nowen simply built himself a moving room/hall of fame, and he was really appreciative of the support of Ben, Nick, Any, and Gwen, so he instilled their names in his masterpiece.

------

Tent was shaking. He studies above and beyond the norms pace guide of all his classes. He could even out due some of the professors (some were GreyMatters… super smart tiny people). He was running dozen of calculations on his computer and a dozen 3D models. Suddenly he put down a sketch he had draw with a dozen explanations… “Its done. This is it…”

He had draw a molecule of Testosterone but different. It was about 100 times more effective, and that was because it used an element known as gravitum instead of carbon. If he could get some, he could inject himself with a serum of that stuff and it would last as long as his growth spurt.

He found created a formula to see how much growth he’d go though this Christmas, and he was pretty much done. Maybe a foot at most, but with the serum, he might gain double or triple that easily! That should be with one dose only.

He knew of a source of gravitum. It was in the science storage lab locked up. They had a rather large supply of it. “They won’t miss a little of it.” Tent went to a professor and asked for the key to the storage, and the Professor practically begged him to take the key. He was that good a student. He grabbed a chunk of gravitum and now he waited… The synthesizer should be in soon.

------

Its been another week, and finally it arrived. Ben came by to help Tent transfer it to the science lab for public use. Tent would get to use it first of coarse.

Ben saw the box at the drop off point, and he signed the paperwork. He turned at saw Tent ready to burst with joy “Hey Tent. We need to get this up to the main lab. You can use it first if you want.”

Tent smiled “Awesome! Lets move this bad boy!”

Tent and Ben used their huge height, long arms and strong body to pick the half ton box. (FYI - Being at 12ft tall gives Ben more room for compressed muscle, at minimum size).

They let the box down gently.

Ben pat the box “Ok. There you go. The thing you’ve been dying to have. Right on time for Christmas too.”

Tent smirked. His growth spurt was coming soon them. On the day and time of his birthday, he will (like all the teens of his planet) experience irritation in his pituitary gland thus causing more growth hormones to be made. With the serum, he’ll easily get to 14ft tall with in a month. That’s 3ft of growth compared to the 1ft he would have gotten. “Hey, did you know my birthday was on Christmas?”

Ben looked at him “No… I didn’t. Interesting. Less presents for you at that time of year right?”

Tent laughed “Yah. Even though we aren’t earth, we trying to match its holidays. My present was either one big one, or two small ones. Oh well. At least they sent me to college. I’m cool with that.”

Ben looked at Tent “You know… you aren’t the cocky, arrogant person I punch senseless. Not anymore at least. I thought you’d amount to nothing, but you really proved me wrong.”

Tent looked at Ben with shock. He smirked inwardly. Loser. He can’t see a lie like this because I’m just that awesome. HA! “Ben. Thanks. That means a lot.”

Suddenly, someone came running into the room. “Ben! There’s a fight outside. None of the students can get near them with out getting hurt.”

Ben stomped his foot down “What! I‘ll be right down.” Ben ran out and saw two Anodites fighting each other. No wonder know one can get close. Ben walked up to the two of then. Waves of mana lashing out and bouncing off his hardened muscle. Lets see if his exercises with Amy worked. He focused on his mana that covered the universe and pulled it together. He made it condense around him in a giant ball. He stepped forward and covered the two battling Anodites with his mana.

Suddenly their purple glowing skin flared like it was on fire and they fell to the ground screaming from the over flow of mana. They returned back to their flesh and blood bodies, and got rid of the purple glowing skin. They passed out but were still shaking as their bodies tries to expel the excess mana.

Everyone who was there saw a giant green fog settle over the area. Mana is usually clear when it isn’t being used since they were tiny particles with huge amounts of space in between particles. Ben however made it so compact that the particles combined into large enough particles to give off a certain amount of light.

Anyone breathing the mana rich air felt rejuvenated and powerful. Quickly, the fog faded as the mana condensed mana rushed out to the boundaries of the universe.

Ben picked to the two limp anodites up and carried them to the infirmary.

Tent had seen the whole thing. He saw Ben’s power, and saw size. He’s heard about mana, and he’s read a little bit about it in some anodite text books. Ben must be massively strong…

Tents only hope of domination was the serum now. He must complete the serum.
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.title: Lets fastforward through a bit.

choices: Nope, they were too busy yelling again. What happens now?
Yes, They talked themselves out of ruining Ben by accident. Lolz
1411312111111111111211211111211111111122.content:
The anodites were pissed. Like really super mondo extremely pissed. How dare a human control such a large amount of mana! And to humiliate them. The two anodites struck a truce. They would ruin Ben…

They discovered the chemical synthesizer and had gone in. They had learnt about different hormones in the body of humans and how they mess with their mind and body. They would love to play around with Ben. They want to force him to do something he’d never do in public…

They turned on the synthesizer and got it to start making the essence of euphoric pleasure. What they did not know was that something else was being made prior to this moment. As soon as they turned to leave, they heard a ding and the machine was done.

Anodite 1 “That was fast.” (He a masculine looking boy with decent mana)

Anodite 2 “Who cares. Lets get it and go!” (She had the body and the curves, and above average mana. The boy can physically outmatch her, but her mana beats im most times.)

The machine popped out a vial filled with a transparent light grey liquid. They grabbed it and left. They failed to notice the machine flashing “Beginning 2nd Task Now.”

A little after they were gone, another person came in. Tent walked in casually and check on the machine. “Not done yet… It said about an hour and a half. Its been two. Maybe first time use needs to be broken in.” Tent waited patiently. He’s waited this long already. He could wait a little more. He picked up a vial of pick liquid as soon as it popped out.

He looked at his Christmas present and gave the vial a kiss. He had to wait until his growth spurt starts before drinking it if he want to have the ultimate effect. His calculation said that multiple doses at one time was catastrophic since it could possible sever the spine with over growth in muscle, so he chose to play it safe and take a single dose. Then next year, he’d go for another one.

------

The anodites had a little special Christmas surprise for Ben. They knew of that other Anodite hybrid and that healer human Amy. Now even their mana can detect a substance not made of it.

Anodite 1 (dubbed A1 now) looked at Anodite 2 (dubbed A2). They had planned this for nearly a week now. On Christmas day, all classes were given the same lunch so that students could go give gifts to other aliens and spread the human holiday spirit. They all gathered in the central pentagon.

A2 “Ready? Its his lunch hour now and he always has a kiwi crush smoothie. Lets give him a little extra now.”

A1 snickered “He’ll ruin his pants and his reputations right in the middle of the entire student body.”

They order a smoothie ahead of time and pour in the light grey liquid. The color of the kiwi crush is unchanged, and the grey liquid was flavorless. Then they approached Ben as he walked into the line.

A1 “Hey Ben, we’re really sorry that we dragged you into our fight.”

A2 “It was really stupid, and you could have been doing something important at the time.”

A1 “So tried to get you something you liked a lot, and its kind of hard not to see you with a smoothie, so we got you a kiwi crush.”

A2 looked all innocent, but really happy and out going. Nothing suspicious there.

However, Amy’s defensive instincts were flashing. Her white stone was neutral and uncreative to the drink, so no poison. Yet Amy felt compelled to stop Ben. However, she couldn’t bare to insult the Anodites. What if she was wrong? She did a quick spell check (pun intended) on the drink and saw nothing suspicious. Amy relaxed a bit. Ok then.

Ben smiled “Thanks. Its wasn’t a burden at all really. What was the fight about.”

A1 mumbled.

Ben what?
