141132.content:
There was this house on the outskirt of a suburban town. It had 4 bedroom: one master, two kids, and a guest. It had a kitchen, a living room, a stair case leading up stairs and one leading down to the basement, and 2 bathrooms. It had hard wood flooring, a chimney, and a grand piano that had rather intricate carvings on it. It was like any other house, except for minor things. First off, it was about 5 times larger than a normal house. The ceilings of each room was 30ft high. Each room was big enough to be a school gym, and had a HUGE Chair in each room. There was a giant who lived here, and his name was Ben Tennyson. With him was his wife, Amy, and their two kids, Kevin and Jenny (both 11 and turning 12 by the time they get to school).

The Tennyson were known around town for their kindness and willingness to help the community.

It was summer now, and the family was getting ready for vacation.

Amy “Did you two go to the bathroom yet?”

Jen and Kev chimed “Yes mom!”

Amy smiled, it was a smile of a youthful eighteen year old, but she’s actually 32 (don’t tell her I told you). “Ok. Ok. Lets get ready. Dad will be home soon.”

Ben, also 32 looked like he was an 18 year old body builder blown into a 20ft tall figure.

Kev “Hey! Its dad!” He pointed down the street.

Jen “Where! Oh! I see him.” She waved frantically trying to get his attention.

Ben smiled through the beard he grew to look a little old, and it worked some what. He saw his daughter and waved back as he was walking through the woods. “Hey, sorry I took so long, but I was getting the place ready. You guys wanna get going?”

Kev and Jen were jumping and pulling on their dad’s cargo shorts. Ben picked them up, one in each hand and put then on his head, and then he got his wife and put her on his shoulder.

Amy sat on his shoulder peacefully. She was used to looking at things from this height now. Ken and Jen were laughing as they played in Ben’s giant hairs. He let them since he knew they’d eventually grow to big to play in them at all, plus he didn’t mind.

Ben “Ok. Hang on ok? I’m about to start walking.”

They all clung to Ben’s body now, and he walked.

Kev chimed as his dad walked. “One day, I want to be big like you.”

Ben smiled “Really now? Did you know that being this big isn’t all that great?”

Jen chimed in “Why dad? Don’t you like it?”

Ben smiled “Its good to play with you, but I can’t go on roller coasters or going to anyone’s homes to say hi anymore. I’m to big. You understand?”

Kev thought about it with his 10yo logic. “But being bigger means your in charge!”

Jen “And you make less poll-ooh-shun” She tries saying the word so it came out right. “Pollution.”

Amy smiled “She’s putting that vocabulary calendar to good use.”

Ben smiled “Yah… I just need to walk everywhere. Cars are mean little things that cause global warming right?”

Jen jumped “Yah! They are!”

Kev “See? Being big helps the planet.”

Ben smiled “It sure does, but its not to fun.”

Kev “I don’t need fun! I want to help.”

Ben paused “Did I here that right? You don’t need fun. Ok then Lets go back home. No more fun vacations.” Ben started to turn around.

Kev freaked “Wait! I lied. I don’t need a lot of fun, but I need my vacation.”

Ben smiled “Ok then. Make up your mind already.” So they continued to their little vacation spot.

------

That night, they all slept around a campfire. Ben and Amy were talking since their kids were asleep.

Amy “Remember the deal I made with the orb?”

Ben smiled “Yah, I do. Its almost that time isn’t it?”

Amy sniffed “They’re growing up so fast.”

Ben smiled “Kev is a lot stronger than the other kids, and he eats like a buffet everyday.”

Amy laughed “The first month or so, I was so glad the hearthstone made it so I could breast feed for hours. Kevin could stop! When I pulled away, he started crying.”

Ben “He loves his milk. Though Jen was a little easier.”

Amy smiled “She started on the solid food a little earlier than Kev, but not to much.”

Ben and Amy stared at their kids. “You think they will ever take their seals off accidentally?”

Amy sighed “Its bound to happen someday. When they do, we’ll know. My spell will tell us.”

Ben sighed “Kev is as strong as an adult without his seal, and Jen’s mana is huge, but its not stable. What happens when they hit puberty?”

Amy “I don’t know. We know Kev is going to get those 3 ft. that you didn’t want, and Jen…”

Ben smiled “Might turn out to be a goddess like you?”

Amy smiled “Maybe. The boys in her class are going to go crazy.”

Ben “How bout Kev? He’s bound to get the attention of a few girl with the muscles he got from my genes, and his you know what.”

Amy sighed “I hope they stay innocent through all that. None of that gang stuff.”

Ben smiled “Or drugs. And if I see a boy with Jen and he’s… oh he’ll wish…” Ben saw the smirk Amy had. “What?”

Amy “You’re turning into one of those fathers.”

Ben paused “So?!?!? I love my little girl.”

Amy “Enough that it’ll drive her away from you if you don’t lighten up a bit. Be protective, but not overly possessive.”

Ben defended himself “But that’s who I am!”

Amy frowned “So if I left you?”

Ben sighed “I’d rip the other guy a part probably.”

Amy recoiled “Wasn’t expecting that.”

Ben smirked “No… I would… I don’t know what I would do. I can’t think of it ever happening.”

Suddenly, Kev and Jen shuddered. The fire had gone out and they were getting cold. Ben laid down and set them on his chest. Amy laid on his chest holding onto her two little angels.

That night, while they slept, Kev and Jen’s necklaces (The seals their parent put on them) glowed signaling the start of something.
141132.title: Kevin and Jenny Tennyson.

choices: Mana color, and lets start 6th grade.
Lets see how out other friends are dealing.
1411321.content:
Amy woke up with the sum shining in her face. Her kids were in her arms. She looked aver at her kids and saw them sleep. But she saw something else. “Ben!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

Ben’s eyes snapped open, but he didn’t move. His family was resting on his well muscles chest. “What? What happened. Is anyone hurt?”

By now, Jen and Kev woke up.

Kev rubbed the sleep from his eyes, but he paused. “Hey mom… am I dreaming, or is my arm bigger?”

Amy nodded “Yah… your arms are bigger alright. Maybe twice as big as yesterday.” (which was basically like all other kids. No definition). Today was different. Kev actually had a decent bicep. He pecs pushed half an inch off his body. He had a faint 6 pack. His legs were a little thicker and it looked like he could swim 20 laps in a pool relatively easy. He’d grow a foot taller.

Ben was listening to the conversation. So, Kev grew. Ben sighed… his kid just entered puberty.

Jen asked “Mom? What are these called again?” She pointed to her more inflated chest.

Amy turned around and saw her daughter had grown boobs! “Jenny!”

Ben heard that and instantly knew both kids had entered puberty. Curse the orbs… Ben picked his family off his chest and brought placed them on the ground. He saw what Amy yelled about.

His son was kind of like him. Its august… just about the same time Ben had found the orb, and it had grown him. Kev and his body matched pretty well at that age, though Kev was a year older than Ben was when the orb entered Ben’s life.

Amy was busy explaining the purpose and use of her daughter’s new above average assets.

Ben looked at his son and saw that he sported an actual bulge in his shorts.

Ben and Amy looked at each other. “Time for a chat with out kids.”

Amy “You take Kevin. I’ll take Jenny. Meet back here when you’re done.”

------

Kev “Dad? What on earth is going on? How did I grow like this?” He said sitting on Ben’s shoulder.

Ben sighed “It’s a long story. I’m trying to find a nice place to tell it.”

Kev “Oh. Why aren’t you sharing it with Jenny too?”

Ben “Your mom is going to tell her. What I need to tell you applies only to you like what you mom tells Jen. Now tell me if you see an open areas I can sit in. This is going to take a while.”

Kev stood up and climbed on top of Ben’s head. He squinted his eyes in the day light as he looked. “Over there. On top of the hill.”

Ben spotted it and went thundering over.

Ben leaned back against the small hill, and let his son lay on his thigh. “Ok. Are you comfy yet?”

Kev nodded “Uh-huh!”

Ben sighed as he got into the mood “It began at this mineral facility during august just before 6th grade… (read storyline from before for details)… Your mom did the only thing that was reasonable. She bargained with the orb, and the orb agreed to keep 3ft off my height and give it to my son later on when he hits puberty. Sadly, when I went to college, some nasty Anodites played a dirty prank that went terribly wrong, and it caused me to grow to this height.”

It was dark now. The stars were rising.

Kev was staring wide eyed at his dad “So you’re a Plumber? And you have this orb thing that makes you grow to infinity? Can I see?”

Ben smiled “What’s the magic word?”

Kev smiled a big toothy grin “Please!”

Ben chuckled “Ok, fine.” Ben tapped his now 9in diameter medallion. There was a flash of green, and a strange green orb popped out.

Kev looked at it curiously “Its like I’m looking at the universe, but from the outside instead.”

Ben thought about that. “Yah. That’s kind of true, but what you see isn’t this universe. It’s mine.”

Kev “What! You have your own universe? Can I see it… Please!”

Ben chuckled deeply “Ok. Fine, but only because your mom is letting Jen see hers.”

Kev “What! Mom has one to?”

Ben “Yup. Now lets get in mine before I change my mind.” In a flash, they both disappear.

------

Kev stared into deep green space. The air made his muscles tingle. “Why do my muscles feel weird. Its like they are growing, but they aren’t.”

Ben looked at his son, and tried to think of a reason. Maybe because Kev’s related to Ben, that the orb is making Kev grow in a similar pattern as Ben. “I think your muscles are getting denser.”

Kev tilted his head questioningly “Denser?”

Ben “Think about your muscles growing, but someone squishes it so its smaller. Someone is making you grow, but they squish it back into your body so you don’t get to big.”

Kev looked wide eyed and he looked at his muscles. He gave one a squeeze, but it wouldn’t budge. “Am I going to be stronger than you? How come no one squished you?”

Ben smiled “I am getting squished right now. Its just that they don’t want to squish me any smaller, so I have to stay this big.”

Kev “So if they didn’t squish you, how big would you be?”

Ben sighed. “Don’t think to much about this, but bigger than our universe. A whole lot bigger.” Ben spread his arms for emphasis. Then he remembered his son was growing in this universe. “Lets get out of here before you get to strong and hurt someone by accident. Ok?”

Kev stared at his muscles “How strong am I right now?”

Ben smiled “As strong as you look, but if you take off the marble on your necklace, you’ll get a lot stronger, but never do that. Ok? Never. Promise me that.”

Kev looked at his dad determined, and he saluted like the soldier he saw on TV “Yes sir!”

Ben smiled, and thought maybe you’ll be a great commander some day, or be someone in charge. That’s what your middle name is for… “Alright. Lets get out of here.”

------

Outside, there was a green flash. A giant and large 12 year old appeared.

Ben “Lets go check on your mom and sister.” Ben lay and arm down for Kev to climb up.

Kev “Alright.” A he ran up Ben’s arm. Usually, he got tired after doing that, but to day it was a breeze.

------

Amy “Give it a shot. Try to imagine a ball of light in your hand. Then we can see what color your mana is.”

Jen focus on a ball of light in her hand, and she felt something. It was like a small window in the back of her mind has opened in let something inside her. She took whatever it was and put it in her hand. Soon, she held a ball of pink light. “Oh… Pink! Just like my marble!” She held out her necklace. There was a transparent and glassy type of pink.

Amy smiled “Good girl” Amy beamed on the inside. Jen was going to be an amazing mana wielder. “Can you guess what color mine is?”

Jen smiled knowingly “Its white. Just like your necklace and all your dresses, and jewelry. Well… except your ring.”

Amy smiled “Guess what color’s daddy’s mana is.”

Jen thought about it “You got that ring from daddy right?”

Amy nodded “Yup.”

Jen smiled “Its green. Like the little stars in your ring.”

Amy smiled “Yup. Daddy’s mana is green, but he can’t control it like we can. Though, he can make it clump together and throw it like a spell. That takes more practice, and it isn’t as strong as ours. But since daddy is so big and strong, what does that do to his mana?”

Jen “Its makes it bigger and stronger too!”

Amy “That’s right. However, daddy doesn’t practice it that much anyway, so it isn’t to much stronger.”

Jen paused “Can I practice everyday so my mana can get super super strong?”

Amy “Sure. We’ll practice when ever you finish your home work, or when we both have some free time.” Amy laughed inside. Most of her time was free since she used her mana to heal everyone. Though, its more effective because she is pretty much a doctor. She spent all her free time reading medical book and understanding disease and other ailments. Understanding it helps her mana heal it faster and more effectively. “Now lets get back to papa and Kevin. Lets see if we can guess Kevin’s mana color.”

1422.content:
A girl with two pale blonde pony tails and large evergreen eyes was walking up an alley way towards a demon like him. Its eyes pitch black, its skin sickly pale, and its claws stained red from blood. It was about to swallow the soul of its impaled victim.

Behind this girl was a cool, laid back kid with white eyes and razor sharp teeth. He waited for his meister’s command.

The girl “Soul. Now!”

The white haired kid flashed red and morphed into a scythe. He flew into the air and landed in the girl’s hand. She twirled the red scythe and attacked.

The monster saw this and grabbed the soul of its latest victim, and ran.

The girl easily followed the monster and quickly caught up. Before the monster could see her, there was a streak of red that cut through the monster. It feel to the ground dissolving away into black bits leaving a floating ball that looked like it was made of molten lava.

The scythe in her hand glowed and turned back into Soul. “Good job Maka. This is our 99th ifrit egg. Now we just need a witch’s soul and I can become the greatest Death Scythe ever!”

Maka smiled “Yah, and I’ll be the one to get you that soul. Now we better report the mission to Lord Death.”

Soul yawn and sighed “You got that right?”

Maka smiled at her roomy and partner. She turned to the nearest glass window and wrote a series of numbers in the glass. There were blue ripples that formed and the sound of bells.

A strange black tree thing appeared with giant white foam fingers “Maka-chan! Its nice to see you. How was the mission?”

Make smiled at lord death “It was a success like usual. We just got our 99th soul.”

Lord D “That’s fantastic! I assume you are going to go witch hunting soon. If you succeed, then you’ll be the youngest meister to ever make a death scythe.”

Suddenly there came a sound of running steps, and a Red haired man appeared leaving a trail of dust and smoke “I heard Maka’s name. Is she alright?” Then he saw Death’s mirror and saw his daughter in his. “OH! Maka-chan! My daughter are you hurt! I love you so much. Did that lazy scythe mess up while you were doing something?” With each question, his face got closer and closer to the transmitting mirror.

Soul tried to suppress his growing frustration.

Maka “You’re not my papa! Now go away.”

The red haired man’s face started to tear up. “Oh Maka! Why does it have to be so. You are my daughter and I love you sooo-”

Soul had enough and punched the image of the red haired man. “Shut it!” the red haired man flew back away from Death’s mirror.

Death shook his head “Oh Spirit. What are we going to do with you.” Then Death turned back to Maka “Maka, once you get the witch’s soul, Soul will become a death scythe, but if you mess up and he does not eat a witch’s soul for his 100th soul, you will have to start over again. Do you understand? Then if you become a Death Scythe, you may consider stopping yourself from eating souls to give other weapons a chance to gain those souls. Do you understand?”

Maka nodded “We do Lord Death.”

Death “Good. Most meisters and weapons give away the souls that they get that are not a witch’s soul once they get to 99, so there has never been a person who has needed to start over. Just letting you know so you don’t think about being the first.”

Maka looked down flustered “Yes Lord Death. Can you give us a mission with a witch in it?”

A moment later, she gets one “Thank you Lord Death. We’ll get right on it.” Just as the transmission ended, Spirit jumped into the image and screamed “MAKA!!!!!”

------

Soul “Are you sure this is the place?”

Maka looked around and saw all the candles and cobwebs of the dead trees “It looks like it.”

Soul smirked “Alright then! Lets get that soul.” He was about to go charging, but Maka caught him.

Maka “Change into a scythe please.”

Soul grumbled “Fine” and he changed.

Make smiled and began walking down the path until she saw a pumpkin house. “Looks like a witch house to me.

Soul eyed the place greedily “Come on. Walk faster!”

Make glared at her blade silencing him. She walked up to the house and rang the door bell.

A feline like lady opened the door and smiled “Oh. Hello? I wasn’t expecting anyone.”

Maka smiled “Sorry, but is that Pumpkin Pumpkin Pumpkin Ave?”

The lady smiled “Yes. It is.”

Make smiled “Does anyone else live around here?”

The lady smiled “Nope. I like my privacy.”

Make sighed “Oh. Ok.” Before the lady could react, Maka jabbed the scythe between the lady’s two giant breasts.

The lady looked at her and had a look of surprise, but she smiled in the end as she vanished.

Maka looked at her scythe and saw an image of soul having a nose bleed.

Soul “Did you have to cut the witch there?”

Maka frowned “Stop complaining and eat her soul already!”

Soul transformed back into a human and grabbed the floating purple soul “This is it. The moment we have been working for.”

Maka smiled “It is. Now quickly. I feel like something bad is going to happen.”

Soul smiled “Watch me as I eat is real cool like.” He lifted the soul and simply put it in his mouth, and swallowed.

Quickly, his body was covered with a strange tingle. “Maka! I can feel it. I’m turning into a Death Scythe.”

Does he?
1422.title: Soul Eater

choices: Stein had arrived, and he in for some dissecting.
Lord death? How did he get out of Death City?
14221.content:
Suddenly, the lady appeared again “That wasn’t very nice stabbing me when I just met you.”

Soul stared wide eyed at the lady “What!”

Make looked back and forth between Soul and the Lady “Didn’t we just kill you?”

The lady laughed and turned into a cat “Didn’t you know cats have more than one life?”

Soul’s mind did a triple face palm “What! I ate a Cat’s soul as my 100th soul!”

Maka sighed “Now we have to start all over again.”

Soul was very angry. Partly because the lady was a cat, and partly because he really thought he was turning into a Death Weapon/Scythe. He had felt something, but what was it? He kicked the ground lightly once releasing all his anger “Lets go. What a bummer.” He started to turn and walk.

Maka turned to the cat lady “So sorry. We needed a witch’s soul and we thought you were one.”

The cat lady smiled “Its alright. It was an obvious mistake. A lone woman in the middle of a dead forest living in a pumpkin house. I really should fix that. Shouldn’t it?”

Maka smiled “Yah. You should. I got to go. My partner’s already leaving.”

Cat lady “Bye! Good luck!”

------

Soul and Maka made it to their apartment. They skipped dinner. They weren’t in the mood.

Soul went to his room and started to change into his nightly attire when he thought he saw something in the mirror. He was wearing a sleeveless-T, and he thought his arm looked bigger. “I must be more tired and pissed than I thought…” He shrugged it off as a thought his mind came up with to calm him down.

------

Maka called from the kitchen. “Soul! Get up! We have to train if we want to be ready to get those souls… again.” She was moping inside. The first pair of weapon and meister to mess up their 100th soul. Previous one’s either never got past 99, or they waited till they met a real witch.

Soul groaned. He wanted to stay in bed. He felt tired, sore like he just lifted weights and ran a dozen miles, and his ego was still pulling itself together from last night. He Didn’t answer her.

Make “SOUL! We Have to train!”

Soul grumbled into his pillow “Fine!” He finally said. It was not forth fighting her. She always got her way.

Maka smiled in the kitchen. That was easier than usual. Maybe I’ll make him something nice for breakfast to cheer him up. She hummed a tune her mother use to hum when they were cooking in the kitchen.

Soul sighed and dragged himself out of bed. As son as he stood up, he felt top heavy and lost his balance. He fell over and he put his arms out to catch himself. When he landed, he noticed something. His arms, they were bigger! Not a huge difference from his usual muscular physique. Before, he was skinny, so it made his muscles show easily. Now, he actually had some size. His sleeveless-t was hugging his chest, and his shorts felt tighter. Even his briefs felt like they were containing more meat. “What the. When did…” Then he remembered how he messed up on the 100th soul, and he felt a tingle all over his body. The tingle was focused mostly on his muscles!

Soul looked in the mirror and did a bicep flex. Yup! It was definitely bigger, and so was the rest of his body. He couldn’t help but smile despite the fact that he had to start over. “Maybe I’ll surprise Maka while we train with this. This muscle makes me look cooler.” Soul changed into his usual attire which hid his growth pretty well considering it wasn’t that much of large growth anyway. Soul felt his cloths hug him more closely, but it was still indistinguishable from his previous size.

Though, it would feel like he emitted a bit more power than yesterday.

Soul stepped out into the kitchen “Hey Maka.” Then he smelt his favorite. Scrambled egg with powdered souls (Fake souls. The real ones are to expensive). He ran into the kitchen.

Maka smiled as she was placing his meal onto his favorite plate. She could see that his mood had visibly improved. She smiled “Hey. I knew you were bummed out, so I may this.”

Soul looked at it. Saliva was slipping through his sharp teeth. “Maybe we should mess up on our next set of 100.”

Maka laughed “Not a chance. One time is more than enough. We’re the first to ever get a non-witch soul for our 100th soul.” Her spirit sagged a little.

Soul saw that and he really want to boost it back up. He ate his break fast with gusto and said “Lets go. We have to train you said.”

Maka looked up shocked that Soul was being so willing today. Maybe the shock from finding out he wasn’t a death scythe had hit him a lot harder than she had thought. But anyway, Maka smiled happy that Soul was going along with her idea.

------

Maka held out her hand and Soul turned into a scythe. Something felt off… his soul felt stronger than usual. Like it had double or maybe even tripled. She ignored it. Maybe he was turning a new leaf. Possibly, because he was willing to train this time, he soul was more open to hers, so they should resonate more strongly. Which could make it appear like his soul had gotten stronger.

Maka “Lets practice soul resonance today. I feel like we’re closer today than ever, and I want to build off of it.”

Soul nodded “Yah.” Then he felt something odd. Like his body hadn’t finished completely changing. “Wait! I feel something.”

Maka was about to get into her resonance stance, but stopped “What Soul. Is something wrong?” Suddenly, the scythe in her hand began to glow. It flashed once and another scythe blade had appeared on the other side of the handle. “Soul!”

Soul was moaning inside his dark little world. The last soul he ate was finally getting into his system and finishing off his growth. Soul felt his chest puff out some more, his biceps pop, his butt harden a bit, his 6 pack abs grow deeper, his legs grow thicker with muscle, and his 5in penis stretch another inch. “Oh… this feels sooooo good.”

Maka didn’t notice Soul’s activities as she was to busy looking at the changes in the scythe she held. “This is… how the… when did… why… huh?” Then it hit her! It had to be the 100th soul.

By now, Soul was done changing and was panting from the pleasure he felt from his growth. Then he began to stand again. He felt power in his limbs. More power than he ever had before. He saw Maka staring at his scythe form’s changes and he prided himself on how cool he looked now. “Hey Maka! I look cooler now!”

Maka stared amazed at the scythe. It felt even more balance now. The blades seemed sharper too!

Soul “Are you just going to sit their mute or are we going to train!?!?!” He was super pumped now. He really wanted to see how strong he was now.

Maka looked into the blade and saw Soul’s face. She nodded.

They say at the same time “Soul Resonance!” Suddenly, Maka’s soul flared into existence. It was now giant Red and Blue sphere as it merged Maka and Soul’s souls together. Suddenly, the soul surrounding Maka grew a pair of scythes that rotated around them cutting at the air.

Soul was using Maka’s eyes to see their soul. “We look so cool!”

Maka smiled “Ready?”

Soul laughed in his current muscle pump “Lets raise our resonance even higher!”

Make and Soul screamed to bring up their soul resonance. Suddenly, the two blades of Maka’s scythe grew huge! They were an iridescent rainbow thaw was mostly blue. The two blades were so huge that they practically made a full circle. Maka raised the handle high over her head and began to twirl it. Quickly it sped up until all you saw was the pure force of soul power emitted from it.

The soul image surrounding Maka doubled in size. The blades that were spinning started to speed up even more. The air began to rotated with it.

Maka saw the huge amounts of soul energy they were giving off. Maka tried to stop now before it got to high and hurt someone else training near by, but she couldn’t. Their soul resonance was sky rocketing out of control. “Soul! I can’t stop!”

Soul was inside his dark space and saw Maka was having trouble. Suddenly, he felt a pang as his scythe form changed again.

Maka stared in awe as the blades grew even larger. The were a deep royal blue now with white veins, and the occasional glowing red spot. “Soul! I can’t stop spinning it! Help!”. There were sparks coming off the blade now.

Inside Soul’s world, he felt sparks running around his body. He felt pain like none other. He looked up and saw Maka was getting hurt too. They couldn’t control this yet. He screamed to anyone who could here “Some one help us!!!”

Maka was yelling. Lighting was dancing around her body. A tornado of power was surging around them. The soul image around Maka had been stretched vertical to match the tornado, and it had grow hundreds of more scythes. It seemed like they might kill themselves by accident. Then suddenly, a lighting bolt from the tornado made its way to strike at Maka.

Soul “Maka! Look out!” He tried to do something, but he couldn’t get out of scythe form. He yelled “Someone… anyone… help…”

Then it all stopped. The dual bladed scythe flew out of Maka’s hand and was sent spinning through the forest cutting down dozens of trees. Some one’s hand was holding Maka’s wrist.

Who was it?

142211.content:
Maka’s arms stayed in the air. Someone had stopped her twirling.

A pale skinned, white haired man was standing before her. “What was that?

Make was still in shock from the display of power that she just performed, and she passed out.

A little off to the side, Soul had just changed back, and he partially regretted it. His favorite hoodie was at the bursting point. It clung to his muscled torso almost like a second skin. It showed every single one of his bulky muscles. He started running towards Maka to check on her “Maka! Are you ok!? Answer me!”

When he got back to the clearing, he saw that every tree that was within 100ft of them had been cut down. They all had perfectly smooth stumps. We did this?

The pale man “Weapon. What is you name?”

Soul looked at the man now. He saw her holding Maka’s wrist. She hung limp In his grasp. “Maka…” He charged and grabbed Maka from the man. He heard a rip as the seems along his shoulder had ripped from his arm pumping motion.

The pale man sighed “That’s now a nice thing to do. Grabbing something from your hero.”

Soul glared at the man with his razor teeth. Then he calmed down. He had Maka in his hands, and she was safe for now. Who ever this man was, he was insanely strong. He got through the tornado shaped soul along with its razor blades, and he stopped a the giant dual bladed scythe. However, he saved Maka, so he swallowed his pride “Th-Th-Thank yoooooo… Thank yooooo. Th-”

The pale man “You’re Welcome.” He replied nonchalantly. He took out a cigarette and lit it.

Soul glared, but sighed in relief. The words were harder to say than he thought. He picked up Maka in his larger arms now. And began to walk away.

He kind of looked like this: http://th04.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/20...

The ash white man “I asked you your name.” He let he let out a breath of smoke.

Soul paused his walking “Soul Eater. You saved a girl name Maka.” Soul felt somewhat at peace right now. He held Maka who was sleeping basically, and he felt kind of odd. He wanted to keep her safe.

Then he continued walking. His shirt and pants were incredibly tight. They constricted every movement. However, Maka was priority right now. He brought her to an infirmary.

------

The man was standing there and he started to walk into Death City. Lord death had summoned him.

------

“Hello Stein!” Death said in his cartoon-ish accent.

Stein “Lord Death. You have a pair: Weapon and Meister…”

Death nodded “I felt it. Thank you for helping them.”

Stein “I wanted to dissect them…”

Death started to make gestures with his giant foam finger like hands. “No. Do not please. You can save that for Spirit.”

Hearing his name, Spirit charged out into Death’s room and found him self crashing into a wall of a human. He looked up and saw…

Stein “Hello Spirit. How have you been?”

Spirit yelled the way he usually did when he was freaked out. He used the be dissected secretly at night by this man, but his divorced wife had saved him long ago. “Get away! Death! Why is he here?”

Death “I called him here. Its about your daughter and her weapon Soul.”

The topic brought Spirit to full attention. “What happened?”

Death exhaled “They had gone to get a witch’s soul, but they did not. Soul had eaten a cat’s soul as his 100th soul making them the first pair to ever have a non-witch soul as their 100th.”

Stein sighed “So this is why you called me. You called him Soul? Is he Soul Eater and his partner, Maka?”

Spirit was worried. This guy knew his daughter! It made her that much closer to being dissected by this man. “You know Maka!”

Stein smiled creepily “So she’s you daughter?”

Spirit recoiled and backed far away. “I didn’t say that!” Slowly, he was dreading the possible future.

Death “Stein! I want you to keep an eye on please. You will take Sid’s place as teacher at the DWMA for a while as you observe them.”

Spirit “But Death. What will be Sid’s cover story?”

Death “Sid will have an accident” then Death did this thing with his hands “OOPSIES!”

------

Soul was in class today, alone. He was debating: Why and I here again? Oh yah… Maka was in the infirmary recovering, and the brief 5 seconds she was awake, she begged him to take notes of the classes she was going to miss. So why was he here again? And why was he early? What was the world coming to!?!?

There was chatter in the class room, but that soon ended. They heard an annoying squeaking sound coming down the hall. Suddenly, a pale-ish man in a lab coat appeared on a rolling chair. It got caught in the bump in the door and tipped over sending the man flying into the classroom. He got up immediately, acquired his chair, and sat backwards in it. “Hello class. From this day forth you will refer to me as Stein, and I am you current teacher since Sid has had an accident.”

There were murmurs of worry and questions.

Stein “Quite down. We will begin class now. Today…” He looked up at the class with a mad look “… we are going to do dissections.”

OY! What’s going to happen now?
142211.title: Stein had arrived, and he in for some dissecting.

choices: Stein does a small experiment, and Soul reacts dramatically.
1422111.content:
Soul “MAKA! Wake up for Death’s sake!” Suddenly he felt a presence in his mind.

Death “Who has called me?”

Soul “What the!”

Death yelled “Soul! Its you. Where is your image. I do not see you in my mirror.”

Soul “Get out of my head! What are you doing in there!”

Death froze “Are you saying this is telepathic?”

Soul felt awkward from Death sudden seriousness “Uhh… sure….”

Death “That can’t be! Only someone who has magic can converse with my telepathically!”

Soul paused “Well, I did eat a magic cat’s soul as my 100th soul. I guess that would do something magical.”

Death was silent.

Soul “Yo Death! Are you still there? Death? I guess he’s gone.” Soul turned back to focusing on Maka. He held her hand in his now thinker and stronger hands. He felt stronger than he looked. Ever since yesterday’s event, he’s never felt better! He needed to go let off some of the power he built in his muscles earlier today. He ran and did a whole bunch of exercises because he kept getting the urge to. He had no idea why.

Death “So you are feeling different after eating a non-witch soul, but a highly magical cat’s soul as your 100th.”

Soul fell out of his chair “What the! I thought you were gone!”

Death sent him am image of him going “OOPSIES!”

------

Soul walked into Death’s room. He saw another kid there as well. He wore a tailored suite, and had a set of bangs. The right one had three parallel horizontal stripes.

Soul sighed “You called me Death?” His hands were in his pockets as he looked off in the distance. There were fake clouds everywhere.

Death turned around “Soul! You’re here. Have you met my son? Death the Kid? Just call him Kid, ok?”

Kid turned and faced his father “Father! I decided my nicknames. And besides, only you call my Kid.” Suddenly, the two guns in his hands changed into two cowboy style dressed girl.

The short, younger on smiled “We call you Kid too!”

Kid turned and faced her “You aren’t helping!” He yelled.

The other taller one yelled “Kid! Its you name. Be proud of it.”

Kid sighed “I guess I have no choice.”

The taller girl smiled. At least he wasn’t crying about symmetry.

Soul coughed “Can we speed this up. I have to go check on someone.”

Kid looked up and saw Soul for the first time. Soul had gotten rid of his hoodie and just wore a sleeveless-t now since he didn’t have the funded to buy a whole new wardrobe.

Kid gasped “Liz… Patty! Look at that symmetry!”

Soul put his hand on his hips and tilted his head “What?!?!?”

Kid screamed “Don’t do that!” He ran up to Soul’s body and fixed his tilted head. Kid repositioned soul’s arms. “Its amazing! A sculpted body of symmetry!” Kid’s eyes started to sparkle. “I must know your name!”

Soul recoiled and moved out of position.

Kid panicked “Freeze!” Soul froze in place. Kid ran up and put everything back where it was before. “There we go. Perfectly symmetrical again.”

Liz and Patty stood where they were sighing.

Liz “Kid… he needs to move eventually. He needs to go places.”

Patty was clapping her hands “Freeze Freeze! He froze!”

Death spoke up “Kid. Liz is right. I need to speak with him.”

Kid cried “But father! The symmetry! Its perfect!”

Soul getting very pissed of at Death’s son. Hurry up and unfreeze me so I can chop you to pieces!

Death wagged a giant finger at Kid.

Kid “Fine… Unfreeze.”

Soul was release immediately. He turned his arms into scythes and was just about ready to chop him up when Death called him.

Death “Soul. Turn into a whole scythe.”

Soul shocked “Full?” Death nodded, and Soul transformed into his dual bladed scythe form.

Death reach out a hand and caught him. Death twirled the scythe and sent his soul into it. It came back hundreds of times stronger. “My my…”

Kid was watching the scythe with interest. He saw it swirl and look the same as before only after a 180degree spin. “Father! Do that again!”

Death “Waa!!!!” He made a face and hand gesture.

Kid “Spin him 180degrees.” he waited anxiously. “Please!”

Death was surprised, but he obliged. He spun the scythe 180degrees.

Kid fell to his knees. This weapon… it has this symmetry. “What is this! Its not reflective, but its still the same image! He spun it and it looks the same. What symmetry is this!”

Soul looked at Kid like he was mad. He changed part of himself so his head stuck out. “Dumb***! That’s called rotational symmetry!”

Kid’s eyes opened as a whole new world of symmetry opened up to him. Then he saw Soul was partially untransformed “Ah!!!!! Change back! Change Back! Go back to your weapon form!”

Soul felt like being disobedient, and did the opposite. Suddenly, he found himself frozen as Kid tried to put him an a symmetrical position. “What the!” At least he could still talk.

Kid stood in front of Soul and started to bow down to him. “So much symmetry… so may ways! How! Are there others?!?!?”

Soul paused “If you let me go, I’ll tell you one more.” The moment the words came out of his mouth, he was unfrozen.

Kid screamed “Tell me!” He ran up and grabbed Soul by his shirt.

Soul recoiled a way a bit. “Its called translation symmetry. You move thing up and down and if they are still the same, they are symmetrical.”

Kid looked at soul. His left eye twitching “I refuse!!!!! That’s not symmetry. So many flaws! So many imperfections.” He started to curl up in the fetal position an rock back and forth.”

Liz “Now you’ve done it!” She ran up to him and tried to calm him down.

Patty was giggling “He go baby!” She started doing the loony sign with her hands.

Death stood to the side of all this. Soul wasn’t a death scythe, but his power exceed it. What was going on? Could it have been the magic cat soul, or the just the non-witch 100th soul? Cats have always been a mystery. He’d have to tell Stein. “Soul. Thank you. You may go back now.”

Soul sighed in relief. He could get away from this loon.

Kid was still rocking back and forth.

What now?
1422111.title: Some more changes for Soul.

14221111.content:
Stein looked at soul’s soul. It was a red sphere about 6ft in diameter. Its had a pair of blades spinning slowly around the out part of the sphere. “Soul appears to have stabilized. The body…” He looked to see any change in muscle mass and any new growth “Stabilized.”

Stein kept staring “What did they hide? Why was he so strong? What gives him his huge soul?”

As student walked up to his and heard Stein chanting “Dissect… dissect.”

The student “Excuse me. Dr. Stein… Should we begin class?”

Stein looked down as he snapped out of his thoughts “Yah. Go back to your seat.” He turned to everyone “Today, we’ll be dissecting the Iridescent Pink Peacock.”

Some students murmur and some gasped “There are only 5 left in the world.”

Stein nodded “And its very fortunate we can dissect one before they are all gone. Very fortunate.”

Soul was looking at this man. Was he mad!!!!

Soul was leaning back in his chair. People had asked questions about how he grew so huge! He shrugged them off and said “Good genetics.” After a week or so, people stopped asking. Though, he did get a postcard from Kid asking him to stop by so he could pose for a painting. He tore the card in half and burned it. Now, in class, there was this other kid that kept eyeing him.

This kid had blue hair, ninja stealth cloths, and he was a meister.

Next to him was a tall lady who appears to be from northern Asia. She had really long hair and a tolerance for anything stupid his meister did. Its said that her weapon forms (plural) was immensely powerful, but she has yet to eat any souls.

Soul saw the kid looking at him from across the room, and he was beginning to feel more and amore uncomfortable.

Then a loud ringing ended the tension. Dr. Stein went and picked up the phone. “Oh! Is he really? Interesting. Thanks you for the warning.” Dr. Stein turned to the class. “Class, it appears that a new student is coming today. His name is Death the Kid, and he’s Death’s son.”

The blue haired kid heard this and charged out the door to meet Kid.

The lady charge out after him “Black Star! Wait!”

You could head an echo reach the door “I will transcend god!”

Soul was sitting in his chair smiling. The guy was gone now. Then he grimaced “Why did Kid, a god, want to go to school at the DWMA?”

Someone stepped in “Excuse me Professor. The student hand book says that if a fight were to break out, a teacher must be present.”

Everyone looked and saw a girl had been out all week.

Soul whispered “Maka…”

Maka glared at Stein for replacing Sid, but she new there was no point. Sid was gone, and this lunatic had taken his place. Too much dissecting.

Stein stared at the girl he saved. She had forgotten him. Oh well.
His hand was holding a medical knife and it was about to cut into the flesh of the rare bird. He sighed “Very well. Lets go.” He set down his knife, and the bird stopped spazzing. Then he gave it a greedy look, and the pink peacock paled. Stein left. “Maka. Come with me. Soul, you too.”

As they left the class, someone stated “I think the peacock just went albino.”

------

Black Star was standing on one of the thin cones sticking out of Death City. His first test of surpassing god is by beating Death’s son in a match. “Tsubaki, are you ready?” He got a nodding image on the blade. He began to say The Three Rules to assassination…

- Blend into the shadows...Hold your breath...And wait for your target to let down his guard!!
- Tune into your target; know his thoughts and actions!!
- Strike your target down before he is aware of your existence!!

Walking up the steps to death city, Kid was making his way to his first day. Liz and Patty stood beside his walking in almost perfect symmetry.

Kid started to get irritated “Liz! Lift your leg higher! Its to low. Patty! Keep up with the pace! Ah!!!! This isn’t working.” Then he heard the voice of some obnoxiously loud and out going kid.

He looked up and saw some blue haired kid jumping on a spire. Kid froze “Death city has so much symmetry. Its just like my dad to do something like this.”

Liz whispered to Patty “Probably to make sure his son doesn’t flip if he decided to come here.” Patty heard the word flip and started to do back flips.

Kid stared at its beauty when he heard a crack. That kid’s jumping broke the tip of the spire he stood on. “AH!!!!!! You will pay for destroying the symmetry!”

Black star smiled. The god was angry, so he’ll fight harder! “Fight me! I will surpass you.” He got into a fighting stance with two mini scythe blades connected by a metal chain.

Kid got ready for an attack “Liz… Patty! Now.” His two weapons transform and fell into his hand in perfect symmetry, and he went through his onslaught of poses. He held the gun upside down with his pinky on the trigger instead of the preferred index finger. “Come. I will punish you for ruining the symmetry of my father’s city.”

Black Star runs at Kid and they duke it out.

Kid “Your weapon has such unstable symmetry. It disgusts me.”

Black Star kept mumbling “I will… transcend… god.” However, this made him get distracted.

Kid took this opportunity to strike. Black Star was knocked out. “One who destroy symmetry can not hope to pass a god.”

Tsubaki changed back into a human and held BlackStar in her arms. She turned to Kid “Thanks for going easy on him. He can’t see people’s souls like I can.”

Kid nodded “Hmm… you are getting closer to perfect symmetry in your human form. If you stop by my room, I can fix that crooked eyebrow.”

Tsubaki stared dumbstruck. “Huh?”

Kid turned around to continue into the school when he saw the reason for his coming. He charged forward “Freeze!” He said exerting his god soul and power over Soul in order to keep him from moving.

Soul was watching the fight from them main entrance, and when it was done, he saw Kid charging right at him with Kid’s eyes were dazzling with awe. Then he couldn’t move. Now he was angry. He felt pressure build up in his soul.

Kid got up to Soul’s body and began to reposition his arms and legs, etc. “Perfectly sculpted body in perfect symmetry.” His eyes were glazed over in amazement.

Maka just stared then suddenly, he heard Soul start screaming.

Soul was pushing his soul as far is it would go to throw off Kid’s FREEZE. Suddenly, he broke through.

Kid stared wide eyed. How did he break a God’s freeze?!?

Soul walked up and grabbed him by the shirt “That was not cool. Got it?” He pulled Kid back and threw him away from the main entrance on top of Black Star.

Maka was shocked by Soul’s strength, but while the fight was going on, Soul explained how the changes happened. He didn’t really know how, but he explained the process.

Suddenly, Stein turned and faced them. “Soul… how’s your body. Anything new? Eaten any new souls? Have you done anything different?”

Soul recoiled from the loony man’s sudden outburst of questions. “No… I haven’t eaten any souls recently. I’ve been waiting for Maka so we could start on out 100 again.”

Stein smiled “Oh! Right. You have to start over. Let me help you out.” He reached into his pocket and pulled out a molten lava looking soul, but it was green instead of the usual pink/red.

Soul “Why is it green?”

Stein smiled creepily “No reason. It’s the soul of a Magic Maker. The creatures, in life give off a huge amount of Magic Soul energy. When they die, their soul enhances the magic of who ever eats it. Though, the amount of increase varies from person to person. Death wanted me to give it to you to see if you really did have magic.”

Soul paused and sighed. He reached a hand out for Green soul.

Make stood there to keep an eye on his partner. She gave him a nod signaling that he could take it. “Its from Death, so its probably safe.”

Soul nodded and tossed the soul into his mouth. “Strange. Its mint flavored. Kid of tingles as it goes down.” He sighed and waited. Suddenly her felt a pang of pain in his gut as his body began to absorb the strange soul.

What happens now?
14221111.title: Stein does a small experiment, and Soul reacts ...

choices: His body grows taller to accomodate his growth.
142211111.content:
Make “Soul! Are you ok?”

Soul was keeling over in pain. Suddenly, his body turned into a scythe involuntarily, and he was inside his dark world again. (This isn’t the room with the piano. That‘s when a deep resonance is reached). He was moaning as pound upon pound of muscle grew on him. His already think body got thick. His pecs blocked more of his vision, hits biceps grew more making it hard to touch his face (just a bit harder, but not impossible), his 6-pack abs grew more defined as the indent between then got deeper, his thighs bulked up to support his increasing weight. Not to mention his raging 15in hard-on. He started to jack off in his private little world.

Outside, his dual bladed scythe form started to glow. Suddenly, the blades doubled in length, and another smaller blade sprang out of the blades curving the opposite direction. The other smaller blade popped out on that one, and another, etc. It was a strange fractal pattern.
Both ends were sparking as tiny red lighting arched over the blades.

Stein sighed “Test observed… Magic is present in the subject.” He lit a cigarette and inhaled.

Maka looking at the blades in wonder. She reached out and grabbed the handle. Suddenly, the smaller blades retract and its back to it two giant blades. “What the.” She focused on the smaller blades again, and they sprang out again. She a large amount of pleasure coming from the handle off the dual bladed scythe and looked into its blade to see Soul even larger than before, but he was also doing something un-Soul like.

Maka’s face burned red, and she looked away. “I didn’t see anything.”

------

Stein “It appears that the magic cat’s soul has implanted magic inside of Soul. The Magic Maker expanded it.”

Death thought about it “The reason Death Weapons are called that is because…”

Stein “They have been giving the magic of a witch’s soul, but Soul isn’t a death scythe. A cat has weaker magic and has probably began to change Soul because of it. In order for him to be a death scythe, he really will have to collect the souls again and a witch‘s soul. However, thanks to the Magic Maker… each soul he eats will increase his magic again. Death, this could get pretty ugly. Why didn’t you just test for magic the usual way?”

Death covered his face with his giant hands “OOPSIES!”

Stein shook his head. Death… what has happened to you all these centuries. Then he focused on Soul again. “I couldn’t find out why their soul power went out of control before, but no I have an idea. Does the girl, Maka, have an anti magic wavelength?”

Death froze. “That could explain the intense spiraling power. Magic and anti-magic are polar opposites. No wonder Maka and Soul are such a great pair. They fill in what the other lacks.”

------

Maka “Soul, how are you feeling?” She was letting Soul rest on her lap. Her hand was on his very beefy chest making sure his heart was beating still.

Soul sighed “Yah… I’m fine.” Then a though occurred to him. One, why was he laying on Maka’s lap, and two, why was Maka’s hand on his chest? Not that he was complaining. He just assumed he looked super cool. He got up and began to rip off the remains of his shirt. When he changed back into his human form, his tight sleeveless-t was tearing in the back. His pants were about to burst, and his briefs were uncomfortably tight.

When his shirt was off, he let out a sigh of relief. He simply glowed with power.

Maka stared at his muscles almost drooling, but she caught herself. She was his meister, and she had to maintain composure around him. “Ok, lets go home. I’ll see if I can find any change of cloths.”

Soul sighed and tossed her his wallet. “There’s 20 death dollars in there. If you could get something large for me to grow into, I’d really like that.”

Suddenly, they heard some students heading out to go home. However, on voice stood out. He just got out of the infirmary with minor injuries.

Kid was mumbling “Ah ***** his symmetry. There are other people who are better.”

Liz nodded encouragingly “Yes. That’s right. Who needs him? Lets just more on and forget him.” She was trying to do Kid a favor by not getting him involved that that jacked white haired guy. The guy looked like he could tear a tree apart. And what was with his teeth! Why were they pointed!

Patty was skipping totally ignorant of the situation.

Suddenly, Kid looked up and saw Soul without his shirt on, and with larger, more symmetrical muscle. “AH!!!!! The symmetry is too perfect!” He ran up to Soul and yelled “Freeze!”

Soul saw this coming and forced the freeze to break again. Then he punched Kid while he was running at him. Kid fell to the ground looking up at Soul. His arms were on his waist and he looked down. He turned and walked away leaving Kid in his daze. “Maka, forget the shirt. Lets just go home.” Maka followed beside him.

Kid’s eyes had glazed over again. He was mumbling about perfect symmetry. Just wait till he see’s Soul’s scythe form!

------

Soul “Finally! We can get started!”

Maka “Technically, we already did. 1 soul down, 98 ifrit eggs and a witch to go.”

Soul smiled “That’s why we picked this mission. There are about 500 ifrits marching off towards a town right now to collect souls for the year.”

Maka “You think we can handle them all?”

Soul nodded “It’ll be a cinch.” He was still feeling the pump from his latest growth. He can’t quite explain it. He loved the feeling. He didn’t know what it was though. He left home before being told to taught anything on the subject.

Maka sighed. Over confident as usual. Then again, there last soul resonance was immensely powerful. “Fine… lets go.”

------

Mosquito, a short, long nosed, snooty rich guy with a monocle. “Now go! Collect a years supply of souls and them return so we can go to the next town.” He has lived for centuries like this and no one has ever beaten all his minions. They have tried, and they failed. Though, he did come back with 10 fewer. Oh well. More souls for everyone else.

His minions, dressed in suits and wearing strange white masks, charged toward the chosen city. Its population was about 50,000. Suddenly, they lost 10 of the 500. There was a red slash that cut through there ranks, and a hand that pulled all the souls into a dark world.

Soul “Keep at it Maka! I have about 70 right now.”

Maka nodded and continued spinning and cutting the ifrits down.

Mosquito, however, had returned to the inside of his car, waiting for his minions to returned with a bounty of souls. Suddenly, some of them had returned banging on his windshield. He glared at them and lowered the window. Five of them jumped in and another one took the drivers seat and drove off.

------

Soul laugh “They were weaker than normal ifrits!”

Maka smiled “Maybe because there were so many. Did they ration their souls? Because they all felt about the same strength.”

Soul smiled “Who cares! We have so many souls now.” Soul looked at his mountain of 494 souls and grinned greedily. “Maka, this is going to take a while to digest.”

Maka laughed “Fine, stay in your scythe form, I’ll carry you home today.”

Soul smiled evilly “Thanks…” He turned to the souls and started to much away.

------

Maka sighed and leaned her scythe against the wall “We’re home. Are you done eating?”

Soul was in heaven. His tight stomach had swollen like a beer gut. He poked it and sighed with content. He had eaten 98 souls saving the other 396 souls incase they messed up again. Which was totally plausible. “Now where can I put these so I don’t lose them.” Suddenly, a door appeared that said Soul’s Room. He opened it and he found a quite little room playing an old jazz record. “Perfect. He put the souls inside of there.” He though, I hope I can get back to that place.

The scythe glowed and turned back into Soul. His gut was still swollen, his he still didn’t have a shirt. He rubbed his stomach. “Thanks Maka, I think I’m going to had a soul coma (like a food coma).”

Maka smiled and nodded “Yah, I’m going to turn it in for to night.”

Soul went to his room and laid in bed. He quickly fell asleep. During that, the Magic Maker soul was turning the other souls into magic weak magic souls. Soul’s body was slowly absorbing its bounty.

What happens to him now?
142211111.title: He grows even larger!

1422111112.content:
Mosquito was raging. He had lost 494 minions to a couple of brats he didn’t even know. Who ever they were, they could cut through the diamond hard skin of his minions. They probably didn’t even realize what they were doing was hard in the least.

Mosquito looked at the 6 remaining footmen. His nose extended and drained the blood from all 6 before they could even protest. He was pissed…

------

Maka “Soul!!! Read to go witch hunting?”

Soul groaned and then paused. His voice… it was even deeper than before. “What the.” He covered his mouth in shock.

Maka was curious “Soul? Is everything alright? You sound coarse.”

Soul tried to raise his voice “Yah. I’m fine.” It totally failed.

Maka was worried “I’m coming in. Are you decent?”

Soul sighed “I guess… but…”

Maka came in to see a massive Soul who was covering himself in his blankets. “I thought you said you were decent.”

Soul “This is as decent as I could get! I don’t have anything that fits!!!!!”

Maka yelled “You don’t have to yell!”

Soul said in his deep masculine voice “I’m not! My voice is super deep. Pretty cool right?”

Maka sighed… her partner was about a foot taller than yesterday, and his muscles appeared to me three times larger. His biceps were like bowling balls now, and his pecs covered most of his vision to his lower half. He was developing an 8-pack and such. His neck was super thick and so were his shoulders. His legs looked as though they rubbed slightly when he walked. And the thing that dangled in between, she couldn’t see, but the imprint in the blanket made it seem pretty big. “I guess its time to spend your 20 Death Dollars.”

Soul frowned “I don’t know if that will caver all of the expenses. Lets see if we can sneak anything out from DWMA.”

Maka “That’s stealing!”

Soul laughed “Its for a good cause. Do you want everyone to see me naked??”

Maka sighed and tried to think of an alternative, but she couldn’t come up with one. “Fine! We’ll BARROW some clothes from the school. As soon as we get some new one, we’re giving it back.”

Soul smirked “As long as I don’t grow out of them.”

Maka thought “How did you grow anyway? You did only eat 98 yesterday, plus the 1 Stein gave you. So that 99. We didn’t get 100 a second time yet. Right?”

Soul shook his head “I was careful when I was stuffing my self yesterday. I only ate 98. Even though they taste like heaven, I really want to be a Death Scythe.”

Maka nodded “We should ask Death, or Dr. Stein. It seems like they know more about what’s going on. Now change into a scythe. We’re going now.”

Soul protested “But I haven’t eaten breakfast!”

Maka sighed “Aren’t you still full from your binge last night?”

Soul thought about it, and sighed “I guess I’m not hungry right now, but I will be.”

Maka smiled “Maybe we’ll eat out later or go to DWMA’s cafeteria.”

Soul nodded “Fine.” He turned into a scythe, but looked even more different.

Maka caught the scythe in her hand and stared at the blades. They were glowing red, and black lighting was streaking across the surface of the blade. The grey handle had morphed a tiny bit and had started to form red and black veins beneath the metal. It looked like something was moving along the veins. Maka wanted to test something out. She pushed some of her soul into her weapon.

(Note: A weapon amplifies the meister‘s soul. The meister shoves their soul into the weapon, and the weapon amplifies it and send it back. Its like a large circle.)

Spirit “Maka… its ok. Its gone. Come on… please. Wake up.” he was patting his daughters face like he used to.

Maka’s eye lost their glazed look. She said weakly “Papa?”

(Movie moment…)
------

Arachne reached into a sack of skin with three eyes, and hugged it. She filled it with her magic. Slowly, the sack of skin morphed into that of a human.

A moment later, a man appeared clothed in baggy skin.

And then… they disappeared.

------

Death looked at everyone “He is gone…”

They all turned to him in shock. Stein was sitting in the fetal position rocking back and forth.

Suddenly, someone walked into the room.

Marie was smiling… some how her rather charming personality deflected the madness around her and made her oblivious to it all. She looked in and saw Stein “Oh dear. He’s got it bad.” She walked up to him and turned her hand into a giant golden war hammer. It glowed brilliantly as she clonked him on the head.

Stein woke up “What the…” For the first time in his life, he was confused.

Spirit’s face looked down as he contemplated what its revival meant.

Maka “Papa… who… you don’t mean…?”

Spirit “Kishin has escaped.”

Soul scoffed “So? We’ll just knock him down and chop him to bits.” He was still feeling the power from his previous eating binge. He flexed his giant muscles and expanded them further to emphasize his point. They were about 3x the size of his head.

Stein quickly assessed the situation in his mind. “You will now. Not yet at least. Arachne will begin to feed Kishin’s more genie souls after she has turned them dark. It will now take to long before he can’t be stopped, so we must act fast. Even now, he will be able to survive your attacks.”

Maka “Then how do we stop him?”

Stein smiled “We have three wishes. Remember?” He turned to Soul. “Soul, your don censed body is mass producing magic right now, but thanks to the large pores between your body and soul, the magic is quickly turned into more body mass and that makes more magic in turn. This is also happening to Kishin, but it is even more exponentially thanks to his long life. Therefore, we have to speed you up before he can speed himself up even more.”

Soul thought about. “So all I have to do is grow stronger faster than Kishin?” Stein nodded. Soul said “Ok then, I wish the rate I grew at was exponentially greater than Kishin. That should solve our problem.” He smiled cockily as he felt that he had diverted a large problem.

Stein frowned “That would have been wish two, and a less extreme wish as well. Wish one is so that your body could handle the growth so that you didn’t have to stay in bed for the next month letting your body reach equilibrium. You best make that wish before your first wish takes effect.”

Soul felt his insides burst suddenly. He gasped as he fell to the floor. “I… wish… I could… handle… any growth…” He felt his skin want to rip as a torrent of muscle surged underneath. His heart was racing and his body was arched in pain. Then suddenly, the pain faded away. Though, the feeling was still fresh in his mind. “You could have warned me this might happen!”

Stein rolled his eyes.

Marie (The Hammer Death Weapon) frowned “You should listen first. I bet Stein anticipated 1 month, well since it was growing exponentially, you would have been on a bed for eternity! ETERNITY!!! YOU HEAR!?!?!” As she spoke, a torrent of air pushed everyone back.

Soul was gripping his ears to dull the sound, but all that did was let him hear the throbbing in his ears. He was afraid he might have gone deaf.

Stein stared at Marie in shock, but smiled “Thank you.”

Marie frowned “Now, I better get going. I was looking for an old trinket of mine. I think I dropped it in here, but I don’t see it. I hope it turns up soon.”

Stein smiled and reached into his pocket and pulled out a gold pocket watch. It had leaf like designs and cool hammer design etched in as the center piece.

Maria gasped and grabbed it. “Where did you find it! I looked everywhere.”

Stein “I found it in the pockets of a sneaky pickpocket while he was trying to get my wallet. Its safe to say that he will not return to DWMA.” He smiled kindly.

Marie blushed “Thank you…” she opened the locket to reveal a picture torn in half. It was a picture of her and some other unknown man. “My dad gave it to me.”

Stein saw the missing half. There was another man that held his arms around Marie, but it was clear that their relationship has come to a halt. “Ms. Marie, would you happen to have anyplace to stay at while you are here at DWMA?”

Spirit was shocked along with Soul and Maka.

Maka whispered to Soul “I think he’s hitting on her!”

Soul smiled “I know! I don’t know how this will work out. He’s insane, and she’s… well… she’s also a tiny bit crazy. My ears are still ringing.”
14221111121111121111111212.title: Arachne breaks the seal prematurely and sneaks ...

choices: Phobius and Arachne had other plans.
142211111211111211111112121.content:
Death coughed “Stein… Kishin?”

Stein looked over as he remembered what he was talking about. “Yes! Right… my apologies. I had intended for Soul to make the third wish again, but I realize that now, even with all you magic turning into muscle, so much is made that I doubt Maka will be able to resonate with you to attack Kishin. Her anti-magic production is just not high enough.”

Soul was shocked. He had endured 100 needles and weeks in fear of going in the nude so that Maka wouldn’t have to change her body. Now look at what it finally led to. “I could just limit it even more and forever this time.”

Stein frowned “Don’t. You’ll need a bit of magic to withstand the madness of the Kishin.”

Soul “But…” he looked at Maka and saw that she stopped caring.

Maka “Fine then. I guess it needs to be done. My partner endured his changes, and so will I. What kind of partner would I be if I am always being protected and spoiled.”

Spirit looked at his daughter. He had given up his time with other women, and occupied his time catching up with his daughter. “Maka… are you sure? There are other people like how I was. They will be tempted by… you know.”

Soul yelled “And if they do, I’ll slice them down to their atoms, and even further down!”

Maka smiled “I’ll be fine. And like soul said. They will wish they never tried it.” She looked at Stein “How large will they get?”

Stein thought about it “Infinity.”

Maka almost passed out. Then she realized that Soul was also basically growing to infinity as well, but was being compressed “Soul… you should word the wish like this…”

Soul listened “Ok. I wish that Maka’s anti-magic production will increase to match mine, but it will not make her… breasts… grow to infinity, but instead, it will get compressed into its current size and that he body was able to handle the changes.” (Black Genie souls allow for run one sentences if they apply to the same topic. Others are less free).

Suddenly, Maka felt a tingle pass over her body as the wish was made. Despite the wish Soul made, Maka quickly grew another cup size. “I guess getting compressed can only go so far.”

Soul sighed. “I guess so, but how about me? I haven’t gotten any bigger.”

Maka laughed “That’s a lie actually. Your muscles look a bit bigger than last week, and you pants…”

Soul looked at his groin and smiled. “Oh… this happened when I was eating the genie souls. It had to grow a bit… to… umm… handle it better. I didn’t make any wishes in there though.”

Maka looked at Stein “So do we got hunt down Kishin now?”

Stein shook his head. “Can you hold Soul as a scythe yet, or do wee have to wait more for you to be able to handle him?”

Make held out her hand and Soul turned into a scythe. He landed in her hand as a black scythe. He was releasing a dark light. Suddenly, in response to the sudden increase in magic, Maka’s chest expanded another couple cup sizes making her EE cups. Her bra was cutting into her now.

The dark glow around the scythe slowly dimmed down as anti-magic counteracted it. There were sparks running down the scythe as soul energy was created.

Maka sighed as she looked down.

Soul was in his world having a gushing nosebleed.

Maka “I can handle his magic now I think.”

Spirit sighed in relief. He was afraid of relapsing, but he controlled himself “Maka… they got kind of big, so I‘ll...”

Maka’s eyes burst into fire “PAPA!” She though he was messing with her like he would to another women in his old ways.

Spirit frowned and finished his sentence “… and go get you something from you mom to put on so that your bra stops hurting you…”

Maka stopped feeling angry and began to feel guilty “Oh…”

Spirit nodded “I understand. I thought I would feel tempted too, but you’re my daughter, and I’d never put you through that. Don’t feel bad.”

Maka smiled “You still have mom’s stuff?”

Spirit sighed “Yah. I keep it in a box if she ever decides to see the new me.”

Maka cringed. “Ouch.” She was starting to feel the straps dig into her flesh.

Spirit was gone in seconds, and back with a full change in 5 seconds flat.

A moment later, Maka stepped out in a white cloak and white gloves, boots, hair band, etc.

Spirit was crying “You look just like her!!!!”

Maka smiled with pride “Really?”

Spirit nodded.

Even Soul had to compliment her “You look pretty cool in that.”

Maka nodded “Ok. Lets go get that Kishin.”
142211111211111211111112121.title: Another mishap.

1422111112111112111111121212.content:
Phobius was stood in his thick, baggy cloths.

Arachne walked out to Phobius and wrapped her arms around him “Its almost dinner time. I think that one genie soul is almost done maturing.”

Phobius smiled. He loved this mad women, and she was mad for him! “Take your time. I’ve waited for a millennia. I can wait another hour or year if I have to.”

Arachne wagged her finger “That won’t do at all! I’ll finishes forcing them to mature long before an hour!”

Phobius sighed “Ok! You win. And anyhow, how many did you get?”

Arachne smiled “I had them go looking and I went shopping a bit. I hope 15 souls is enough. Those brats stole my other 30.”

Phobius made a sad face “Don’t be sad. I’ll kill them just for you. Ok?”

Arachne sighed “But your well come back present was taken! And they ate it too!”

Phobius smiled “Do not worry. They can not hope to beat me. Even with their wishes, I will beat them still. Know what? My first wish is going to be…”

------

Soul “Can you see their soul?”

Maka nodded “I just need to follow their trail of madness. Its so dense that I could see it from miles away. Finding them is no problem.”

Soul nodded “Maka… what do you think will happen to me after I eat its soul? Will I go beyond a Godly Death Scythe? Or something else…”

Maka thought about it as she ran through the forest and smiled “Well, what ever it is, I hope its good. I would rip you open and tear out its soul if the result was bad.”

Soul chuckled. “Tear me open? How would you do that?”

Maka smiled “Very Carefully.”

The laughed it out until the black scythe in her hand exploded in power. It blasted Maka off to the side leaving the scythe floating in mid air.

Maka managed to not get hurt by tumble rolling. “SOUL!”

Soul’s body was tingling. He felt the muscle under his skin ripple as streams of magic rushed into his body to feed his muscles. “What’s going on?”

Maka ran up to the scythe but was stopped by a force field of black lighting and magic. “Soul!” She started bashing at the invisible wall.

Soul tried to turn back into a human, but he couldn’t. It seems like he can’t change back between growth spurts. “Maka! I can’t get out.”

And still, his body was getting stronger and stronger. The seal on his right arm was burning black light and so was the one on his left arm.

Maka was screaming. Then suddenly, she felt her chest warm up. Anti-magic! Maka held out her ands and pooled the anti-magic in her hands. A white fluid of light collected in her cupped hands. Then she slapped them into the invisible wall.

The wall seemed fine for a second, but then it exploded. Black beams of light shot out into the distance. Inside of it was a floating black scythe. Lighting was lashing out of the ground turning it into black obsidian.

Maka ran up to it. A white aura covering her body deflecting the black lighting. Soul energy sparked as the two boundaries touched. Then she grasped the handle. She felt herself grow another cup size, but she didn’t care. She pooled all her anti-magic into her hands and shoved it into the scythe.

Soul yelled “Ouch! What are you doing?”

Maka’s forehead furrowed as she concentrated “I’m trying to control your magic! I could use your help here too!”

Soul smiled and focused on his magic. He began shoving it into holes that he opened up (spiritual holes. Not physical ones). His muscle mass increased dramatically. Slowly, the level of magic in his outer soul had dropped while his density grew like crazy.

Maka sighed as the scythe stopped lashing out at her aura. She fell on her bum and dropped the scythe. Then it started to float again, but in place.

Soul “What! I can float? That’s so cool!” He was beaming with pride.

Maka smiled. I think Stein would say his growth has reached equilibrium or whatever. He was stable now, and that’s all that matters. “Fine. Now lets get back to our purpose.” She looked away to search for the trail of madness…

Soul sensed a sudden hush of quietness “Maka… what’s wrong?”

Maka looked down disappointed “Its gone…”

------

Arachne smiled “Was it good? I spent extra magic making it denser. Just the way you like your souls.”

Phobius “Thank you.” He leaned back in his chair as Arachne’s castle. “Now… Arachne, please do not judge me, and think that I’m being paranoid.”

Arachne looked truly hurt “Never!”

Phobius calmed her down “Sorry! Sorry! I’m just saying. You know I fear everything. Especially losing you. I want to be able to be unstoppable. Even by a wish. Those idiots didn’t think a wish could kill some one, so that’s why I’m alive still. Though, not so much for them. I wish my power grew beyond the powers of a genie. That way, a wish will not kill me.” He smiled at his logic. It makes sense.

Then he felt his magic and madness levels shoot up and not stop for… (lets go with a while).

Suddenly, a beam of black lighting shot into through the wall and out again.

Phobius was shocked by its power, but he knew it was nothing to him. He took called his magic and redirected it. He managed to shove it up and out of the room.

Arachne scowled. She recognized this wavelength. “Blast those kids!”

Phobius was shocked. It had taken more than he thought he’d need to bend that lighting. It was almost on par with him. He started to shake with fear. Would they kill somehow?

Arachne stopped fuming and ran to her husband who lay shaking on the floor. She looked out the hole. “We will be back… I swear. And when we are, you’ll pay.”

------

Spirit was trying to calm his daughter.

Maka “We let them get away!!!!!!!!”

Spirit “Its alright. We can still stop him. What ever happened was because of their meddling.”

Stein “He’s right. He probably sensed Soul’s strength and wished to be stronger than it.”

Maka “Does that mean Soul is growing even faster than before now?”

Stein nodded “Yes. He’ll grow faster than before, but it seems that its for the better. His body and scythe form appear to have balanced out. The magic is flowing into him at a stable rate.”

Soul smirked “Yah, and now I can float.” He turned into a scythe and levitated in mid air. “I wonder if I can control myself.” He thought about turned and rotating. The scythe slowly spun in place. Too slow to be of use in battle. “Hmm… maybe I should practice a bit more.”

Maka frowned. If he gets really good at that, he wouldn’t need her anymore.

Soul smirked “If I get good, I can help rip any men that get to close to you apart.” He chuckled. “They’ll think that this scythe is possessed.”

Maka smiled now. He wasn’t leaving her. He was just trying to learn about his body.

------

Soul “Ah! My head. Its pounding.” He moaned as he got in bed.

Maka scowled, but laughed inside “Hey! That’s why you get for trying to concentrate that much for 5hrs!”

Soul smiled through his pain “Whatever. You think this is funny, so what ever. Enjoy my suffering.”

Maka laughed “I’ll do just that.”

What now?
1422111112111112111111121212.title: Phobius and Arachne had other plans.

choices: Similar to above choice, but with a twist.
14221111121111121111111212121.content:
Soul was laying bed. I wonder if this is a prop to being what I am? I’m huge, I’m strong, and Maka thinks I’m ******* sexy, and my voice too!
Soul felt like the world simply gave him all he ever wanted. Now if it weren’t for that dang Kishin.

Soul thought about Maka… As soon as his thoughts turned toward her body, his face burned red, but he couldn’t help it. They’ve been together for a few years, and they were roommates, etc. The only difference is that they haven’t been declared yet. They were simply friends who worked closely together.

But he wanted her. The thought of her filled his abnormally large endowment till it stuck up like a lightning rod. It called for her…

------

Maka “Soul! Get up! We have to find Arachne and Kishin again… and you have a lot of work to do on your own training…”

Soul groaned. He had been up all night with a never ending hard-on. It had just stopped an hour ago, and he’d just fallen asleep. He mumbled into his pillow “Hmm..HM..hmmm~!”

Maka “What?”

Soul peeled his face off his pillow “Too Tired! Goodnight!”

Maka tried to think of a reason. A lingering migraine from yesterday? “Soul? Are you feeling ok?”

Soul sighed “Yes… Tired…” He was already drifting into sleep.

------

Maka “SOUL! ITS BEEN TWO DAYS GET UP!!!”

Soul jolted awake. Two day? Was he really that tired? Or was… Did he seem bigger? His pecs were jutting out more now. He looked down and felt that his neck seems thicker.

Maka looked at Soul curiously “Soul? What’s going on?”

Soul reached and rubbed his abs… they felt harder and deep. “Nothing… its just that I feel like I got bigger. What do you think?” He flexed a bicep trying to gauge it size change.

Maka looked and reached out to it. It was still as hard as before, but her hands were more spread out now. Not a huge difference, but a difference still. “I don’t know. You feel bigger to me, and you look a bit bigger.”

Soul looked down over his pecs and saw his calves had bulged out a bit more and his thighs were touching. Not to mention his larger organ seemed to have picked up some mass. “I thought I was supposed to grow less and just get denser.”

Maka “Maybe its like me. The compression can’t handle the growth. Though yours is slower than mine. Actually, it appears like I’ve stopped, so that’s good. You seems to go in multiple mini bursts.”

Soul nodded slowly “Yah…” Then their entire apartment began to shake.

Maka stared at Soul’s stomach bug-eyed. “I don’t ever recall it being that loud!”

Soul smiled innocently “Me either, but lets feed it before it eats me.”

------

Phobius was pacing rapidly in his panic “How did they do that. What if… what would… when did… where… how?”

Arachne’s heart melted as she saw her beloved in such a frenzy. “Phobius! Enough! I can’t take this anymore. We will kill them tonight… after dinner. I have sent Mosquito to get more genies. Death, that old fool thought he could keep them hidden with his pathetic excuse for a seal! I’ve seen children guard their toys more effectively.”

Phobius paused as looked at his wife. He ran and cried on her randomly. He was really afraid…

Arachne was still fuming. She hated children…

------

Soul felt his heart skip a beat. He fell to the dirt ground clutching his body in agony. He felt himself growing at a tremendous rate again. What ever it was, it wasn’t from his normal growth. This was something else.

Maka wasn’t there right now. She had gone shopping for some things and had let Soul practice controlling himself while he floated. He had just gotten into human form when this happened.

Soul “What’s going on.” Then it hit him. He had wished to grow exponentially faster than Kishin. If the Kishin suddenly accelerated in growth, he would grow even faster and stronger!”

Slowly, the feeling died as his growth stabilized with the Kishin. He lay panting on the ground as his heart rate slowed back down to normal.

Maka was walking back into the clearing when she saw Soul laying flat on the ground. “Soul!” She ran over with her bag of groceries. They had gotten a raise in payment since Soul needed to eat more. He could eat the souls in his room, but he want’s to live off of other things as well. Even souls get bland after enough time.

Soul opened his eye when he heart Maka. “I’m fine. I just had a headache… just needed a break.”
