Maka sighed in relief. She had thought he had another episode. Well… she knew he did, but she wanted him to not have to worry about her worrying about him. “Lets go home then. I still haven’t found any trace of their madness. It seems like they dropped off the face of the earth.”

------

Phobius felt the soul slide down his throat. They provided some sense of relief. He felt his power increase tremendously the souls fused with his ever strengthening body. He sighed as his nerves calmed down.

Arachne smiled as she saw his shoulders stop tensing “There we go. How do you feel now?”

Phobius smiled “Much better now.”

Arachne smiled “Ok then. What do you wish for? You still haven’t used any of your other wishes except for one.”

Phobius sighed “That’s right. I guess I don’t have to worry about being the weakest because I wish I were the strongest…”

Oh dear… what will happen now?
14221111121111121111111212121.title: Practice makes pefect.

142211111211111211111112121211.content:
Maka walked up to Stein alone “Stein, I was wondering about Soul. Why does he feel pain when he grows faster? I thought that’s what the wish was for.”

Stein stopped and looked up from his book “It could be that he is growing past the power of a genie. A genie soul can only do so much. If all else fails, we’ll have to use 3 more wishes and word them specifically to controlling his growth.”

Maka “But if we do that, we’ll have to find another black genie soul?”

Stein nodded “If it comes to that, then yes.”

Maka tried to find a loop hole, and then it hit her “Why not just use another genie soul to get the job done?”

Stein raised an eyebrow “That’s a valid option. Good thinking Maka. Why don’t you two go give that a try. Ask Death where he his a genie, and you can get something from them.

A Red one is 1 weak wish. By weak, I just mean its not as effective as the others.

Orange is still 1 wish, but even stronger, though its strength varies from its age.

Yellow give 2 weak wishes or 1 really strong wish.

Green is 2 strong wishes. No weak ones.

Blue is 2 strong. 1 weak.

Purple is 3 strong.

Brown is 3 strong and a weak.

White is 3 weak run-on sentence wishes.

Black is 3 strong run-on wishes.”

Maka took mental notes as Stein spoke “Thank you Stein. I’ll get going then.”

Stein remembered “And Maka, the white soul has the potential to be the strongest. Instead of 3 weak wishes, you can make them into one wish that is stronger than the black soul. However, there were none when I last went genie hunting to Death. Maybe some have grown in power since then.”

Maka bowed “Thanks Stein.” She turned and left.

------

Soul “So why are we doing this again?”

Maka smiled as she ran with Soul in her hand. The scythe was practically weightless, and it made her feel lighter on her feet. She could sprint for miles if she had to. “Be honest. The pain comes back when ever you grow. Right?”

Soul chuckled “What gave it away?”

Maka frowned “You got a bigger. Duh! Only you are dense enough to miss a change from 6ft6in to 6ft 9in. And its looks like you put on 20lbs of muscle.”

Soul looked over his body in his dark world. She was right. He had gotten bigger. How did he miss that? “Fine. Yah… they come back once in a while, but I haven’t felt any in a long time, so I don’t think there’s anything to worry about.”

Maka sighed “That means that there is more to worry about. The moment we get comfortable, it could strike and then what do we do? Preparing ahead is always better than when it is to late.”

Soul grumbled “Fine. So we’re looking for a white genie soul? Why not a black one?”

Maka smiled “You ate them all. Death put seals on all the genies, and he knows what color their soul is. Even after they are released, he has a hidden spell that continues to tell him there strength and soul color. New black have been popping up which makes him worry. The kishin is eating more and more black genie souls to get stronger.”

Soul laughed “Yes. I know that, but why are we getting a white one?”

Maka “A white one can make 3 weak run-on wishes. However, if you combine them, you get one that’s even stronger than a black one. The black soul wishes can not be combined because all attempts have caused undesirable outcomes.”

Soul tried to think of some things that could go wrong, and chuckled when he got the thought of a tall lanky man combining three black soul wishes and some how getting even thinner. So thin that its negative? He chuckled.

Maka smiled “What’s so funny?”

Soul laughed “Nothing. Its just me thinking. How close are we to the soul?”

Maka looked off into the distance “Not close enough. Maybe another week of running should get us there.”

Soul exasperated “What! Couldn’t we just take a boat or a plane?”

Maka sighed “No… they are all being kept on standby for a kishin attack.”

Soul frowned “We need to find a way to get there faster.” Soul pondered of way to do this, and then he got an idea. “Maka, stop. Go sit on my handle like it was a broom.”

Maka looked at Soul (the scythe) “What are you planning?”

Soul smiled deviously “Just do it. Would I ever do anything to hurt you?”

Maka smiled “No, but you would try to make fun of me a bit.” She complied and set the scythe between her legs and sat.

Soul smiled “Ok. Hold on. I’m going to give this a shot.”

Maka frowned “Give what a sh-AAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!”

Soul focused on floating off the ground as best he could, and he found that it was kind of easy now. Maybe it was because Maka’s soul is focused and orderly, so it helps me focus… maybe. The scythe began to rise up in the air and it jolted forward. They were zooming through the air slowly climbing higher. They looked down to see a never ending forest and an ever shrinking Death City. “Nice view right?”

Maka’s eyes were shut tight. She hung onto the handle like her life depended on it, whish it kind of did. “I’m can’t look.”

Soul sighed, but smiled “Maka, this is nothing. Trust me. Just peek a bit if you want. Not the whole eye.”

Maka did what he said. She peeked and saw how high up they were, but its was to amazing to close her eyes again. She sat up slowly, and looked around. She reached out and grabbed at a cloud. Her hand faded through it. “This is… I can’t even put it in words.”

Soul laughed “Let me help. This is Super Cool! Look at how high we are. If only I had known that making contact with you would make this so easy.”

Maka looked quizzical “What do you mean?”

Soul “Well, your soul is very organized and focused, except for when you are fuming, then it gets all distorted. But right now, its calm and stable, so it helps me focus and helps me to manipulate my magic and soul energy to a better extent. If that makes sense.”

Maka nodded “Yup…”

Soul “So where to? I don’t know how to get there.”

Maka looked around for the soul signature that Death had shown her. “That way.” She pointed to the sunset.

They scythe turned and sped toward the setting sun (which was a strange kind of face if you asked me).

------

There was a giant Death Mask (the older scarier version) carved into the face of a mountain with a cave entrance at the mouth.

Maka “Here it is. Lets go in.” The scythe slowly descended and let Maka hop off. She grabbed the scythe and walked in.

What they found was a giant dome like room with Death Masks and hands outstretched touching each other. There was a hole in the floor that dropped down deeper.

Soul “Seems kind of gloomy in here. You think we should go into that hole?”

Maka nodded “Yah, but I can’t see anything. Before, there was this red and black aura around me. Now its just an invisible wall of dense magic.”

Soul thought of a solution “Pump some Anti-magic into my blade. That should create some soul energy to spark the way there.”

Maka did that. She felt the scythe grow warmer in her hands, and the blades sent a spark of lighting. Slowly, the blades themselves glow a hazy white as the magic and anti-magic mixed to created soul energy. The blades emanated energy.

Maka saw the light coming off of it and used the scythe to light her way. The hole revealed a winding staircase. When they got to the bottom, they saw a giant hallway and went down that. There were symbols of warning and other things meant to turn people away, but they kept at it. Slowly, the symbols turned into written seals and other spells of repulsion and binding. “Wow… a lot goes into these seals. I wonder how Arachne get them all.”

Soul replied “With magic of course. You can sever all of these at once with enough focused magic. These spells are all interconnected. You break one, and the rest soon follow.”

Maka looked at Soul “Can you see them? Cause I can’t.”

Soul nodded “I can… I think its because I have magic in me unlike you. But anyway, these spells would have sent us running back to the exit long ago if my dense soul didn’t keep the spells out.”

Maka nodded and looked down the hall. They were almost at a pair of giant doors locked by hundreds of Death Hands arranged in odd patterns.

When they got to it, Maka stepped up and tried to push them open.

Soul “Just slice through them. This place is getting boring.”

A moment later, pieces of door were falling down in angular shapes.

The thing on the other side, in the center of a room full of black death chains, was a single white lamp. It glowed a warm light.

Lets open it!
142211111211111211111112121211.title: Uncontrolled explosion of growth. Solution?

1422111112111112111111121212111.content:
Maka cut all the black chains loose with ease, and began to make her way to the lamp. Suddenly, she felt the scythe in her hands begin to burn. It was seething with its build up in magic. “Soul!”

Soul was jacking off now. Totally oblivious to all things in his pleasure. His compressed muscles were swelling larger and larger. Almost like there was never a seal in the first place.

Maka ran up to the lamp and saw hundreds of time symbols imprinted into the white metal. “Gah! How do I open this?” She looked at that words tried to rub the seal of. Nothing happened. She looked back at the scythe. Black magic was firing off in giant waves. A dark sphere shrouded it and pulsed larger and larger.

Maka swore and looked at the lamp. Were these seals made of magic? She pooled white anti-magic into her hands and began to rub at the symbols. Immediately, they melted off. As soon as the seal was gone, the lamp seemed to have erupted. At the spout, a jet of white smoke shot out.

A white genie appeared. It looked like a girl of around 17 years old. Its skin was pale white, with white hair, eyes, and cloths, but they were all different shades of white. She looked at them cautiously. Then she sensed the intense black magic in the air. She screamed “Ah!!! Get it away. It tainting me!”

Maka recoiled from the screaming. The genie did not like black soul magic in the least. Maka tried to help and pooled anti-magic in her hands. She tossed it into the air and created an anti-magic bubble that blocked out the black soul magic. “Genie! In here.”

The genie saw a white haven and darted into it. As soon as she was in, she let out a sigh. Even though she was a creature of magic, the anti-magic wasn’t being directed at her, so she was fine. “Thank you…”

Maka looked at the genie cautiously. Why was it afraid of the black soul magic. It said it was being tainted. “Who are you?”

The genie looked at the girl and sighed. She stood up “I am the one and only anti-magic genie, Bella.”

Maka was curious “Ok Bella, What does that mean… the only anti-magic genie.”

Bella replied “It means that I can do everything a regular genie can, but with anti-magic. You didn’t think that all anti-magic did was cancel out regular magic right? Very few people can control it. Such as I.” She pointed to her body causing her massive chest to wobble under its thin cloth.

Maka was interested in this anti-magic stuff now. “What else can it do?”

Bella “Well… this stuff.” She lifted her hand and streams of anti-magic flew out attacking the soul magic dense air around them. There were explosions of soul energy as the two neutralized each other. Quickly, the magic began to replenish itself. Bella sighed and saw the source. “Interesting… a weapon. I assume its yours?”

Maka nodded “Yah… I can here to get your soul, but I can’t do that with him incoherent.”

Bella wasn’t phased by the comment. She heard it al before. To bad each one them faced the wrath of anti-magic. “I see. Would you now?”

Maka shook her head “I doubt it. Besides… you seem like an interesting person. I wouldn’t mind getting to know you better, and who knows. We could end up being best friends. Though… I don’t know why I’m telling you this. My soul just tells me that you’re a good person.” She looked into Bella’s eyes with he own trustful and friendly eyes.

Bella looked back and smiled “Its our anti-magic wavelength resonating together. Unlike you and your partner. I don’t even know how you two can still work together considering that you two are polar opposites.”

Maka laughed “That’s the exact reason we can work together. We fill what the other one lacks. For me… I think it’d be control. Soul has always been cool and level headed in difficult situations.”

Belle snorted and covered her face in shock “Sorry about that. Its just that I can sense the pleasure coming out of his right now. He must be having the time of his life. Care to explain? Maybe I can help since you did free me.”

Maka sighed “Well… it all started when we ate the soul of this magic cat…”

Maka “So yah… we’re here now trying t put his growth under lock and key.” She glance over at Soul, and his scythe form was still sending out waves of black soul magic. Even faster and denser actually. The barrier she put up was starting to waver. “He isn’t going to stop… is he…”

Bella shook her head “No… it doesn’t look like it.”

Maka groaned and picked up a nearby rock. She threw it sending it out of her barrier. It suddenly slowed to a stop as soon as it entered the magic dense air. “What the…”

Bella sighed “How are we going to get out of here. I can’t survive in a place full of magic! It eats away at me until I’m nothing!”

Maka “Unless we can do anything about Soul, then we just have to sit.”

Bella frowned “I don’t like either choices, so I’m going to make a third one.”

Maka “What do you mean?”

Bella “You are going to have to eat my soul.”

Maka stood up in shock “WHAT!”

Bella nodded “Yes. That way you can make your wish. However, it may or may not make more trouble. I do not know. However, it is our only choice. Take it and have your body assaulted by magic, or let me help you and your partner. You two seem like good kids, and I guess a young genie as myself could make a noble sacrifice for such potential benefactors to the world.”

Maka stammered “But I can’t eat souls. It’ll turn me into an ifrit!”

Bella smiled “Not with a genie. How do you think normal people have been getting their wishes all these years? Now stop complaining. I’m going to convert my body into soul form so you don’t have to kill me.”

Maka was about to object, but Bella was already starting to glow. He body enveloped in light and morphed into the purest white soul ever to be made. And then, it shot itself down Maka’s gullet. She coughed and staggered from surprise.

Maka felt her body heat up as the anti-magic soul merged with her own anti-magic soul. Suddenly, before she made her wish, the soul created one powerful wish without words. Its used Maka’s feelings and intentions to get the wish to do what she wanted. A pure white beam shot out of her body and struck the scythe.

The room exploded with soul energy as the two forces exterminated each other. Maka closed her eyes against the light made by the merge. When her eyes cleared, she saw a scythe clattering across the floor.

The scythe was vibrating at a tremendous speed. Anti-magic that was equal the magic made by Soul was somehow rapidly appearing inside the scythe. The two forces battered at each other until two distinct sides formed. One blade had turned white with a black lightning bolt in the middle. The other blade was black with a white lighting bolt. The handle was both black and white and its shape was not constant. Lightning was striking at each other on the inside.

Soul groaned “Maka… what just happened?” In his dark world, he had shrunken down to 7ft tall with slightly larger than normal proportional muscles. He looked strong, really strong, but his muscles didn’t impede his motion, unlike before. His legs didn’t rub against each other, and he could reach his face with no trouble at all.
He looked around and saw cum as far as his eye could see. “What on earth happened?” Though he did have a guess.

Maka sighed “You were growing again. And before you ask, I wished for something to fix it. Though, I don’t know how I can word the wish. It was more of a feeling or desire.”

Soul was astonished “You wished for something? How?”

Maka laughed nervously “Funny story… I swallowed the genie’s soul. I’ll tell you on the way home. Lets go.”
1422111112111112111111121212111.title: Part 1

choices: Lets go test Soul out. How does his new form work out?
14221111121111121111111212121111.content:
Soul smiled “So how do you like it?” he asked her as they flew through the air.

Maka “What do you mean?”

Soul smiled “The taste! Do you like how a soul tastes?”

Maka sighed “I didn’t taste anything. She skipped the whole chew and swallow phase. Her anti-magic merged with mine, and now she’s gone.” He voice was filled with longing and regret. “Bella seemed like a pretty cool girl. I wonder why she was sealed up.”

Suddenly, Maka felt her soul expand beyond her body. It grew and grew until it was 10m in radius. “What the.”

Then she heard a voice “You didn’t think I was gone. Did you?”

Maka looked for the source of the voice “What… where… huh? Bella…?”

Bella screamed “Yes! Now we can start your training!”

Maka “That training?”

Bella laughed “The training so that your anti-magic can grow strong enough to make me a new body! Its going to take time for you to gain enough anti-magic control to construct me a body, so we’ll start now.”

Maka screamed “HOLD ON! How are you still here!” Suddenly, she started to jerk as the scythe shook.

Soul “Maka! Why are you screaming! I can barely keep us straight because of my recent change.” He lied. It was so much easier now. Before, it felt like he was being pushed in one direction, but now, there was a counter force pushing him the other way. The two canceled and now he was in perfect sync.

Maka “Sorry, but Bella is alive!”

Bella included Soul in her conversation “Hello Soul. So you were the one making all that black soul magic. Good thing you can make anti-magic too or you would have been lopsided. All that magic would push you over the edge. Now both forces should be increasing in strength at the same rate.”

Maka “Where are you?”

Bella laughed “I’m part of your soul right now. If you took a look, you might make out my image standing within your soul. I can’t leave it since I’m part of it, but I can eventually with your help.”

Maka was smiling “This is amazing. Is it a prop to being the only anti-magic genie?”

Bella laughed “No! If a genie was swallowed by a naturally magical being, it could potentially reform its body. The only reason you, Soul, can’t is because you became magical. You weren’t magic before.”

Soul was still very confused “So you are in her soul? What’s going on?”

Maka explained “Bella is alive in my soul, but she can’t leave until I gain enough control over my anti-magic. I assume that if I can condense enough anti-magic into the form of a body, Bella could take over it and create a new body for herself. Am I right Bella?”

Bella “Yup! Now with training. I want you to pool as much anti-magic into your hands as you can without letting it spill. This is for practicing control over the body and the soul. When they two harmonize better, you should be able to actually make the anti-magic float in the air in front of you. Then when you get further, you can make shapes and even weapons out of anti-magic. However, that takes years…”

Maka was amazed “How come no one has done this before?”

Bella laughed “There has been one living thing to do it, and that’s me! I am the first anti-magic being. What do you think I do with my time? Practice magic? Nope, I use anti-magic. Now start by cupping you hands. You’ve done this before, but on a small scale. We’re going to a whole new level now.”

------

Belle cheered “Yes! That’s it. And you’re doing pretty well despite the fact were are on a flying scythe miles above the ground.”

Maka smiled “Thanks.” Her hand was filled with white anti-magic, but really dense since she had been practicing the whole time.”

Soul “I can see Death City. They’re going to ask what happened. Should we tell them the truth?”

Maka nodded “Of course. And I also want to give Lord Death a strong word or two.”

Bella laughed “Lord Death didn’t lock me up because I was bad. He did it because I was impulsive. My anti-magic blew up an entire posse of witches. A dozen death weapons were made that day.” She smiled at the memory “Anyway, The head witch gave Lord Death a stern talk to, so he went and hunted me down. Sealed me away until I calmed down. 1,000 years can change a person.”

Soul “3000!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You don’t look older than 17!”

Bella smiled again “Aww… Soul… that’s so sweet. I try my best, but yes. I am actually 10,000 years old. I am young among my race.”

Maka “So how do you feel about Lord Death?”

Bella sighed “I put him in a tight spot. He had to either let me continue and let himself face the wrath of the Head Witch, or teach me a lesson so I won’t do it again.”

Maka “But how can he do that to you? What’s relationship with you?”

Bella “Well, genies pop up every few centuries or so. They are made randomly from the children of highly magical creatures. Lord Death is my dad, and the head witch is my mom. Somehow, I was made into a genie with a strong anti-magic affinity.”

Maka and Soul stared at each other… “WHAT!”

This is kind of odd…
14221111121111121111111212121111.title: Part 2

choices: He's back and ready to fight...
142211111211111211111112121211111.content:
Arachne looked at her husband. He was writhing in pain. “Phobius! What is wrong?” The she sensed it. His soul density and strength was growing so much faster, and it wasn’t slowing down. How can someone be this strong to force Phobius to grow this much stronger! “Honey! Wish the pain away. Wish it!”

Phobius cried out his wish “I wish it was gone. I do!”

------

Soul soured across the sky like a broom while carrying a single (two is you could Bella) passenger. He could feel his muscles getting denser and denser, but the feeling was neutral now. He didn’t really notice the growth. It was the same for his magic and soul. The feeling was still there, but his mind had put it aside. However, now he could feel his anti-magic being made. He felt his soul energy rocket constantly, but the feeling should go away after a few days. “My scythe form looks so cool.”

Bella “That’s it. Try to double the volume of anti-magic in your hand by the end of the week, and then we can try step two.”

Maka nodded “Ok.”

------

Maka and Soul walked into Death’s room quietly.

Death “Ohh! You’re back, and you brought my daughter! Now have you learnt your lesson?”

Belle spoke through her mind “I guess I have. I haven’t had time to test if I did learn anything, but I think I did.”

Death nodded “Good.” Then he turned to Maka and Soul “You two have changed. Did my daughter meddle with you a bit?”

Belle pouted in her spirit form “Hey! I was only helping Soul from tearing his Meister apart!”

Death raised his arms in resignation “Ok. Ok… I understand.” He turned to Soul “You keep growing!!! Stop it!!”

Soul scowled “Hey! I didn’t do this on purpose… well, I did kind of choose to, but its out my control now. Or… wait… its in my control now thanks to Bella.”

Maka smiled “But besides that, and Bella helping me improve my control over my anti-magic, we have nothing else to report.”

Death stood there “ok. Have a nice day.”

------

Soul “Was it me, or did Death seem a little to casual after seeing his daughter after 1000 years?”

Maka nodded “Yah, but he has lived a long… long time. 1000 years may be nothing to him.”

Bella sighed “Yup… “

Soul then remembered Kid “Hey… did you know you have a brother now?”

Bella yelled “WHAT! When did this happen?”

Maka “A decade and a half ago? I guess?”

Bella “Show me. How is he? What’s he like? What’s he look like? ETC.”

------

Kid “I HAVE A SISTER! AND YOU DID WHAT TO HER!”

Bella “Hey Kid. I chose this, so calm down.”

Kid tried to find the source. He saw a human shape standing in Maka’s soul. “Ah… so you are right there.”

Bella smiled “Yup… Well, my presence at least. I’m not really tangible until Maka makes me another body. That may take a bit of time, but I can wait.”

Kid tried to find symmetry in his sister’s foggy shape, but he couldn’t. He wanted to scream disgust and hate, but this was his sister. He would have to be more composed and wait until her new body is made. “So… how… umm… symmetrical are you?”

Bella looked quizzical “Umm… excuse me?”

Kid was twirling circles on his wrist “You know… how well does your left side match your right?”

Belle “Umm… I don’t know. I haven’t seen a mirror in 1000 years.”

Kid sighed disappointedly “Oh… ok. Sorry.”

Belle shook her hands “No! Don’t be. Its not your fault.”

Soul whispered “He’s obsessed with symmetry. I’m surprised he hasn’t harassed me about my body yet.” Then he saw kid charge at him “Spoke to soon…”

In moments, Soul was standing in a perfectly symmetrical pose. He sighed and changed into scythe form. At least the lightning was un-symmetrical.

Kid gasped in shock. His face turned to disgust, but then it froze. He took out a cameral and took a photo from an instant camera. He studied the photo and almost passed out. “The symmetry… its constantly moving, buts its has symmetry…” He looked at the scythe floating in mid air. He crawled up and started to bow.

Bella “Maka… is he…”

Maka “Yup… though, he’s usually not his bad. I wonder where Liz and Patty are.”

At that moment, those two people appeared.

Liz saw the floating scythe and her meister bowing to it. She groaned and dragged Kid away trying to calm him down.

Patty was smiling like usual “Hehe… its floating…”

The out of no where “YOOHOOO!” Black Star jumping in to the room via an open window. “Ohh…. Soul? Is that you?” He walked up and got shocked by a tiny bit of lightning “ouch!”

Soul smiled “Sorry. Only Maka can touch me as a scythe. Only she resonates with me.”

Black Star mumbled about how unfair it was for Maka to get the strongest weapon in the universe.

Tsubaki came running in through the door “Black Star!!!” She started to nag at him to come home and take a bath.

Bella was astonished “Are…”

Maka sighed “Yup… Lets just go while they are all distracted.” Maka walks up to Soul and grabs him. They left.

------

Maka looked at Soul as he turned into a scythe. His whole form glowed black and white and then it morphs into a dual bladed scythe. I wonder what that would be like…

Soul spun into her hands and lashed out waves of powerful anti-magic and magic attacks. The air around them crackled as the two forces eliminated each other.

Bella stared at the weapon in her astral form. Its was stronger than it looked…
142211111211111211111112121211111.title: Umm... Hi dad?

choices: Oh dear... what do you think will happen? (Maka has a surprise).
1422111112111112111111121212111111.content:
Maka suddenly looked off into the distance “Its back. The madness.”

Soul immediately turned into a scythe and Maka ran through the forest.

Bella “What’s going on. Is this the Kishin?”

Maka “Yes. We’ve been looking for it, and it’s finally popped back up.”

Bella “Well, who ever it is, they are about to go home empty handed. They don’t know how much either of you have changed.”

------

Up in the air…

Phobius was standing at his fullest height and looked at the world indifferently. He had learnt something through the recent pain he’s endured. Pain is madness… and if you are simply mad… then the pain is gone. Nice and simple. So that’s what he did.

Arachne looked at her husband nervously. She’s never seen him act so… open. He was always close to her and scared, but now he seems to be indifferent. He stood at the top of the world and didn’t have a single care.
She senses a dense soul coming closer.

Phobius “So they come. They will come to understand madness, and I will teach them. Isn’t that right Arachne.”

Arachne nodded “Of course you will, but we aren’t mad Phobius. We are enlightened. There is a difference.”

Phobius pondered and smiled “Enlightened. I like that. Yes… you and I are enlightened, and I am here to enlighten others.”

Out of nowhere, two crescent shaped attacks flew at Phobius. One was black with white lightning, and the other was white with black lightning. Phobius raised both his hands and held the attacks in his hands. He channeled a strong madness wavelength into the attack and caused it to disentigrate.

Maka was charging at Phobius (Kishin is you haven‘t picked it up). She cut at the air sending the two attacks again. Phobius simply destroyed the attacks by channeling madness into them. He was seething with madness.

Phobius smiled “Now… lets stop this. Why are you even attacking me?”

Maka glared and was about to be impulsive and attack again, but Bella stopped her.

Bella “Kishin. You were a human who ate souls. You have swallowed your weapon. You have killed innocent people for power. So now you will die.”

Phobius frowned “Aww… I was only trying to enlighten them. Show them that madness is good. You don’t feel pain and to you stop caring. It’s a wonderful state of mind.”

Maka frowned “Then you have nothing left to live for. Not caring is the same as giving up on life. Why do you live if you care for nothing? For the sake of living?”

Phobius smiled “Because now its easier to have fun. No more restrains. For example. I don’t care if my wife dies anymore! Ever since I chose this path… I feel so very alive…”

Arachne’s eyes opened in shock. She smiled nervously “Phobius… you don’t mean that do you honey? You love me. Right?”

Phobius turned around and smiled “Nope.” Then he turned back to the kids.

Arachne fell to her knees. She descended deeper into madness…

Maka, Soul, and Bella were shocked. How could he talk like that? How can he be so… so… indifferent.

Soul said finally “Because he’s mad. He is madness incarnated.”

Bella was looking at the creature in disgust “Kill him… before he “Enlightens” the rest of the world.”

Maka raised the scythe above her head and began to spin the scythe above her head. She was fuming and full of disgust. Quickly, a black and white halo formed above her. The blades lengthened until they touched. It looked like some tricked out yin yang symbol.

Phobius looked at it slightly surprised “Ohh… that’s not good. Better fix that.” He extended a finger and impaled Maka in the middle of her chest. “There we go. That should be good for now.”

The halo dissipated. The glowing scythe fell to the ground and the yin-yang symbol chattered and turned into soul energy. Maka fell to the ground.
1422111112111112111111121212111111.title: He's back and ready to fight...

14221111121111121111111212121111111.content:
Soul was frozen. Did the Kishin just… Maka get… “MAKA!!!” Soul turned back into his human form and ran to Maka. He picked her up and looked at her.

Her eyes were glazed over. There was a hole in her shirt that showed a hole in her chest. A thing stream of blood flowed out.

Bella spoke screaming at Maka “Hang in there. If you die, then I die.” She spoke to Soul “I can slow her bleeding, but I can’t do anything more. You have to-”

Maka sat up. He eyes were still glazed over an inattentive. She raised her toward Soul.

Soul was overjoyed that Maka sat up, but her expression sent a chill down his spine. “Maka…? Are you ok?”

Maka’s eyes focused on her hand as though telling Soul to grab it.

Soul finally understood and grabbed Maka’s hand to pull her, but something happened.

Maka’s body flared white as it morphed into a scythe. It was pure white, but it was iridescent like a pearl. The blade was attacked to the handle with a pair of doves connecting the two.

Soul looked at the scythe in his hands. It was longer than he was. Probably to match his height, speed, and strength. “Maka… you’re a weapon…”

Bella was breathless. “And you’re holding her… you’re a meister…!”

Phobius’s eyes opened looking at the course of events “Oh… That’s kind of neat. Oh well… you can die anyway.” He got ready to attack.

Soul felt the scythe send a wave of soul energy up his arm. It was warning him. Soul turned to see Phobius charging at them with sporadic purple madness in his hands. Soul blocked the attack with the handle of the white scythe. Purple madness running along the handle. Soul pushed Phobius way and tried to attack.

Phobius caught the blade in his hands and shoved it aside.

Bella “Soul! You have to send your soul into her! The scythe is useless if there is no soul going into it.”

Soul looked at the blade… could Maka handle his dense soul? He was going to have to trust that she could. He began to channel soul into her. The blade of the scythe began to glow white with the amount of energy going into it. Soul was wondering why he didn’t feel anything coming back into him.

Bella heard his thoughts “You are, but you are so dense that it makes little difference. However, if you put all of your soul into it, then… well I hope you don’t cut the world in half by accident.”

Soul smirked. He could do that much with his soul?… and with Maka…

Soul began to channel more of his soul into Maka. All the practice he had controlling his scythe form really helped right now. Quickly, the blade grew brighter and brighter. Suddenly, it doubled in length and continued to glow fight. Soul saw this and began to put more and more of his soul in. Quickly, the blade doubled again and out of nowhere, a second blade grew out the other end. Soul had to admit that Maka looked pretty epic right now.

Phobius looked at it strangely “What did you do to her?”

Soul smirked and shoved all of his soul in. There was a giant flash of white and every tree and mountain within a dozen miles was cut down. Soon, the light cleared to see a forest completely flattened and a mountain starting to slide off its foundation.

Phobius stared wide eyed and then he started to freak out “W-w-w-why am I afraid… I thought I wished it away. I thought being mad would send it away.”

Bella laughed in her mind “Because this blade is full of hope. Hope will outshine madness and despair. Hope instills courage and that’s all there is to it.”

Soul looked at Phobius and got into a fighting stance. “We’re ending this.”

Phobius stammered “N-no… get away.” He held out his hands pooling what ever madness he could into them. Then he saw his wife and smirked. He ran over to her and stabbed her through her heart.

Soul’s eyes snapped open wide. That ***. Soul charged at Phobius as fast as his long legs could.

Phobius held a purple soul in his hand and swallowed it. He turned to Soul cockily and he felt his calm sense of madness return “Thank you Arachne. I appreciate your last meal.” He raised his hands and a giant ball of madness began to form.

Soul saw this and knew that he had to get rid of this monster. He pooled all his soul into Maka and the blades grew giant. They took the form of two pure white doves in a symmetrical dance.

Phobius saw this and it only made him increase the madness he was putting into the ball. It was a giant 5ft wide ball of purple madness.

The two made contact. The doves sank into the ball and fazed through like a hot knife through butter. The ball turned white and exploded. Light filled the flattened landscape, and then it cleared.

Phobius stood staring straight ahead “I was going to enlighten the world…” There was a white blade cut into him midway.

Soul sighed “No.” He pulled the scythe through the rest of the way through.

Phobius started to fall in two pieces, but his body exploded in white light before he touched the ground. Thousands of human souls appeared out of no where, and a single ash white and charcoal black soul remained where the body once was.

Soul sighed and grabbed it “Maka… are you ok?”

As soon as he said that, the scythe in his hand flashed white and morphed back into Maka. The hole in her chest was gone. Suddenly, she sat up with a jolt. She looked around to see a chopped down forest and some significantly shorter mountains. She looked up and saw Soul holding a creepy white and black soul. “What just happened?”

Soul looked at Maka in astonishment, but then he laughed. “Hold on. Let me get rid of this thing before anything else happens.” He swallowed the kishin soul. “Ok. Done. I’ll tell you what happened on the way home.”

Bella screamed “MAKA!!!!! You and Soul looked so epic! Oh my god! You were the most gorgeous weapon I have ever seen!”

Maka looked at Soul for an explanation.

Soul smiled “I said I’d explain on the way home…”

------

Spirit was overjoyed “My daughter is a weapon like her PAPA!” He was jumping, and when he stopped he latched on to Maka and picked her up. He started to spin her around in the air.

Maka’s face was red from embarrassment “P-papa stop. People are staring.”

Soul, Death, Kid, Liz, Patty, Black Star, Tsubaki, Stein, and Bella were looking at them curiously.

Spirit saw this and set his daughter down. He coughed “Umm… Right. Continue please?”

Soul rolled his eyes “Right, so Maka turned into a pure white scythe. When I put my soul into her, she starts to glow and grow longer. I accidentally caused her to cut the forest down the first time I put all my soul into her. The second time, I focused it some more and her blades looked like… those birds… they’re white and…”

Bella sighed “Doves. Her blades turned into doves. The ball of madness that Phobius had made was purified by the doves and in the end. Soul impaled Phobius and killed him. When Maka woke up, he swallowed the Kishin’s soul. The End”

Black Star was estatic “Maka is a weapon! That’s so cool. I can use you?” He asked Maka.

Tsubaki looked at Black Star in shock.

However, Black Star saw this and smiled “You’re still my first pick Tsubaki. I’m just being curious.”

Maka sighed “I don’t even know how to turn into a scythe. I don’t remember a thing about it.”

Spirit was on the verge of bursting out again, but he got a glare from Maka, so he controlled himself “Just takes a little practice. That’s all. Just focus on the shape and will your body to change.”

Maka sighed “Fine. I’ll give it a shot.” She tried to imagine a white scythe in her mind. The felt like she knew the shape, but she couldn’t make it solid.

Bella advised “Try meditating or something. It helps clear the mind of distraction.”

Maka gave it a shot. She sat down and crossed her legs.
14221111121111121111111212121111111.title: Oh dear... what do you think will happen? (Maka...

142211111211111211111112121211111112.content:
Death, Stein, Spirit, Bella, and Soul were standing patiently for Maka. Kid had turned around and began to paint what he thought Maka might look like as a scythe. Liz and Patty were asleep on the side. Tsubaki was letting Black Star rest on her lap. She was twirling his hair as he slept.

Soul sighed “Maka… Lets go home and get some shut eye. It might be easier after some sleep. Getting impaled, changing for the first time, and healing takes a lot of energy. You’re probably just tired.” He looked at Spirit for some back up.

Spirit understood Soul’s concern, and as much as he wanted Maka to turn into a scythe, he wanted her healthy above all else. “Maka, Soul’s right. When you wake up and have had something to eat, it should be easier.”

Maka sighed and opened her eyes. She felt oddly calm. Her body was at peace after meditating for so long “Ok. I’ll give it a shot tomorrow.”

Soul held out a hand to pull Maka up. Maka grabbed his hand and felt an image enter her mind. Suddenly it was clear to her. Her whole body glowed white and it morphed into a white dual bladed scythe.

Everyone was awestruck. Spirit was beaming with pride. Death was going to put this in his memory as a historic point. Stein was analyzing and not thinking about dissections for some reason. Kid had turned around and gasped at its symmetry. Liz was still asleep and Patty was up looking at the pretty scythe. Black Star sat up and looked for the source of the light. Tsubaki was simply enjoying the sight. Soul on the other hand was thinking “We look so cool together.”

Maka was in a dark world like Soul’s. “Its pretty dark in here.” She looked up at an image floating in mid-space. It showed what ever the blades outside were reflecting. “Is this how you usually see things?”

Soul smiled “I’d guess so. Are you looking out of the blades?”

Maka nodded “Its kind of homely in here. I don’t feel afraid of this type of darkness.”

Spirit “That’s because you’re in your border land. It’s the place between body and soul.”

Soul raised an eyebrow “How come no one ever told me that?”

Stein lit a cigarette “I did, but you didn’t pay attention in class.”

Maka smirked “You were to busy making the room shake with your snores.”

Soul sighed “What else did I miss?”

Maka “A lot. I’m not going to explain it all. There’s to much to say.”

Stein “Soul, you also must have forgotten of our test next week. Better study up.”

Soul did a double back flip “What!”

------

Maka wondered “Soul, what are you know? How do you feel?”

Soul thought about it casually as they walked back to their apartment “Well, I don’t really feel any different. Kind of like when I eat any other soul.”

Maka scrunched her faces slightly “I wonder if it was because the souls was black and white. I kind of looked like your blade, but in soul form.”

Soul yawned “What ever. A sou’s a soul. Nothing else to it.”

Maka halted “We both know that’s not true.”

Soul sighed “Yah… but I kind of just want to keep it simple.”

Maka rolled her eyes “Fine. Lets get home. I’m exhausted, and I feel like there is a knife under my skin. Like I’m on the verge of turning into a scythe with the slightest thought.”

Soul agreed “Yah. I got that feeling at first. It dies down after a week or two.” He walked ahead “Hurry up. Its getting late.”

------

Soul opened his eyes. He felt strange… “What’s g-” His voice had gotten even deeper “Wha-” He covered his mouth in shock. Then he felt that his body felt different. He looked down and saw that he was pretty much the same as yesterday, but he felt stiffer. As though there was more mass on his body. He checked his seal, and it was still in place. “What’s going on?”

Maka was in her room thinking about life as a weapon when she heard a super deep, sexy voice. She bolted up “Soul?” She marched out of her room and knocked on his door.

-Knock Knock-

Soul looked at his door. So I woke her up? “Come in.”

Maka walked in to see nothing different about Soul “Oh… sorry. I thought I heard something.”

Soul said in his really deep voice “No. You heard something alright.”

Maka’s jaw dropped “Is this the Kishin’s soul kicking in?”

Soul looked over his body looking for anything to signify a change “I don’t know. I guess so… I feel different. I feel stronger than I look.”

Maka wanted to test it out “Maybe… how much could you lift before?”

Soul “300 for 3sets of 10reps. Why?”

Maka was astonished “Well, we could see if there are really any changes.”

------

Maka frowned “I can’t believe there weren’t enough weights for you!”

Soul laughed “I can’t believe how strong I am. The bar was bending! I couldn’t believe I was lifting that much.”

Maka sighed and looked up at Soul. She saw something “What’s that?”

Soul stopped walking “What’s what?”

Maka pointed to his face “That stuff around your mouth.”

Soul reached up to his face and felt/heard a scraping sound. “No way…” He looked at Maka “Hey, do you have a mirror?”

Maka sighed “No…0.O” Then she thought “Try looking into my scythe form.” She grabbed Soul’s hand and turned into a white scythe.

Soul held on as the scythe formed in his hand. He looked into the blade and saw his reflection. He was growing facial hair! His was less rounded as his chin had grown broader and more mature looking. He was getting older! “Oh my god…”

Maka looked at scythe through the blade. Soul had to be a year old that yesterday. He was aging? Or was eh simply speeding through puberty. Was this the Kishin’s fault? “Soul! To Death’s Room now!”

------

Stein looked at Soul with a magnifying glass. There was a medical knife in his shirt pocket where Soul could see it. “Yes… I see. Soul, you are speeding through puberty for some add reason. Probably an effect of the Kishin’s soul.”

Soul stood there eyes wide. His face was covered in more fuzz now. When he walked, his briefs felt all scruffy. There was hair everywhere! “How old am I then!”

Stein “I’d say around 16 years old body wise, and getting older. I have no idea if this reduces your life span. However, I doubt that it’d make that much of an impact. You may end up living forever because of your current circumstance.”

Maka was looked at Stein and back and Soul continuously. Forever? That’s like… a long time! How would she cope with aging while he stayed young forever!

Bella smirked and thought only to Maka “Don’t worry to much about it. You can always get a wish from another genie. And if that fails, I can go ask my mom for a favor.”

Maka thought “The Head Witch? Are you nuts! She’d kill me for killing all those other witches.”

Bella “Not necessarily. She understands that her kids are independent, so she lets them off to do their own things. If anything, she’s probably glad that this might teach her children some humility.”

Maka was surprised “Talk about tough love. Is that a little cruel?”

Bella shrugged in her astral form “Yah, well… she can’t baby them forever. There’s just to many for her to handle. And besides, some aren’t even her children. Some are grandkids and some are from distant families that probably originated from her.”

Maka sighed “Well… I’d go to her as a last resort.”

Belle shushed “Wait. Stein’s talking again.” They stopped mentally chatting.

Stein “Soul, I estimate that you’ll keep growing until your body hits its prime. That’s based off of the fact that it seems like with each consecutive soul you’ve eaten, it makes you stronger.”

Soul nodded “So maybe till I’m 18 or 21?”

Stein nodded “Probably around that range. Once people exit puberty, they start to shrink ever so slowly. You’ll probably be at your peak for the rest of your life.”

Soul “Any idea when I’ll stop speeding through puberty?”

Stein inhaled via his cigarette “Anywhere between a day and a week.”

Soul thought about it. He got to skip the pimple/acne/breakouts/hormonal surges/mid-teen crisis/etc, and he got to stay at his prime fore the rest of his life. Not bad… except for feeling all scruffy. I hope I get use to that.

Then he felt a slight pressure build up. His hairs lengthened. He grew 5in taller. His groin bulged out more. His muscles pumped up a bit. Must have been some huge growth spurt between 16yo and 17yo for him.

Stein paused “Sorry. You might stop between an 1hr or 1day. You’re about 17 now.”
142211111211111211111112121211111112.title: Umm... Soul... Are you ok?

choices: Fast Forward a Year or Two... or 3 or 4
1422111112111112111111121212111111121.content:
Maka almost passed out. She was only 14 years old and her weapon WAS 14 as well. He gained 3 years in a day!

Bella yelled at her mentally “Hey! Keep it together! Women must stay strong, or the idiocy of man will run amuck.”

Soul coughed “I heard that…”

Bella retorted “So????? You’re not the one watching your best friend grow older before your eyes. How would you feel?”

Soul paused “Nervous… anxious?” He waited for a response.

Bella stopped talking. She hadn’t expected a response to her supposed rhetorical question.

Soul “Maka, if that’s what you’re worried about, I’m still me mentally. MY body is just a bit older.” He tried to calm her down.

Maka nodded “Yah, I know. Its just that you look different and sound different. How long will if take for you to act different?”

Souls sighed “I kind already do. I almost squeezed the door knob into DWMA to the size of a thimble. I need to tone down on my strength. The **** seal won’t do its job for some reason.” he said bitterly.

Stein reasoned “Just a bit of magic to it. It probably can’t keep up with your growth rate.”

Soul “So I just need to shove some magic into it?”

Stein nodded.

Soul gave it a shot. He focused on the magic in his soul and pulled it towards the seal. Suddenly, he felt his limbs grow heavier. “Wow… I feel kind of weak now.” He rubbed his arms to make sure they were alright.

Stein “Its to be expected.”

Suddenly, Soul shot up another 5in in height, and he got hairier and buffer. “I should go shave… Just as soon as I buy a razor.”

At this moment, so one walked in.

Spirit looked around for Death, but Death wasn’t here at the moment. Then he saw the other… and Soul. “What in the name of Lord Death happened to you!?”

Soul looked over his body. His magic cloths still covered him, etc.

Maka sighed “Papa, the kishin soul is speeding him through puberty.”

Spirit looked at a larger and hairier Soul “I can see that…”

Soul sighed “I’m going to go shave. I may be 18 bodily, but this hair makes me look like I’m 25.” He walked away toward a bathroom.

Moment later, Soul came walking back. There were minor scrapes and cuts all over his face.

Maka held back a smile “How’d it go?”

Soul frowned “I’m a god **** scythe, and I can’t even cut hair off my face! Its embarrassing!” The he looked at Spirit smirking. “What’s so funny?”

Spirit laughed “Nothing to important. Let me guess. You turned your arm into a scythe and tried to shave that way?”

Soul frowned even more “So?” He said defiantly.

Spirit “My face looked just like that! Try turning just your finger into a scythe next time. It’s much easier than swinging at your face.”

Soul face palmed but screamed. His face still stung from his recent endeavor.

Maka and Bella were laughing their heads off in their minds.

Bella “See! What did I tell you! The world would have fallen apart millennia ago if not for women.”

Maka laughed “I’m sorry, but I did believed you. This is just funny!”

Soul’s cuts healed and a new beard formed. He jumped up 4 inches making him an even 8ft 2in now.

He groaned and turned back to the bathroom.

Spirit yelled behind him “Use your finger!”

A moment later, Soul came back rubbing his face. It felt all smooth and clean now. “How’s it look?”

Spirit smiled “Better. You used your finger?”

Soul raised his index finger and turned it into a small scythe. “Thanks for the help.”

Spirit sighed as he thought of his first time. Then his frowned… it wasn’t a pleasant time. “Well… you owe me. I just saved you weeks of cuts and scrapes.” then he mumbled quietly “Unlike me…”

Soul looked at Stein “I’m like 19 now right?”

Stein nodded “Some where around there. You’re practically out of puberty. Though, weapons tend to have a large spurt at the end to give their weapon form an extra bump in power. So be ready for it.”

Soul nodded as he stared down at everyone. He just realized that he’s grown over a foot in the few hours. He just prayed he didn’t get 8ft8in… Kid would be following him for eons to come if it was the number 8...

Suddenly, Soul popped up another 2in making him 8ft4in. “20 years now…”

During this whole process, Soul’s body had reconfigured itself. His back had spread out giving his a larger wing span and the much desired V taper that all bodybuilders have worked for. His biceps were thick as over grown cantaloupes. His pecs pushed out 3in and very defined 8-pack just below it. Under that was a more than decent package. The parcel contained a 36in hose with cantaloupes for water balloons. The only reason the pants don’t explode is because there was a pocket in his briefs had a pocket that held his engorged shaft. There was more space in it than there appeared. Then there were the two tree trunks holding up his goliath torso. His calves were like large diamonds and his thighs were as larger as over grown watermelons.

Soul looked at Stein “What age do you think I’ll stop at?”

Stein “The one after the largest growth spurt.”

Soul rolled his eyes “Thanks for being specific.”

Stein smiled “Your welcome!”

------

Maka “I wonder when it will happen?”

Soul sighed. He was anxious. “Stein said that when weapons finish puberty, their weapon’s strength is practically doubled, tripled, and in some cases, quadrupled. He said that once our body stabilizes, so does out weapon form, and that’s why it gets so much stronger. I wonder if this just increases the rate I grow at…”

Maka sighed “I guess we’ll have to wait then.”

Soul paused for a moment “Or not…” He felt his body heat up as it built up energy for a growth spurt again. Suddenly, he shot up a massive 8in bringing him to an exactly 9ft tall. His 36in hose got upgraded to a 40in long 7in thick pipe with two small watermelon shaped filters. His pecs pushed out another 1in and his 8-pack got deeper and even more defined.

Soul felt his shirt suffocate him for a moment, and then it expanded to match his growth. Everything about his was Bigger!

Bella had found herself drooling in her astral form, but caught herself before anyone could see. She maybe 10000yo, but she still had teenage hormones charging around her body.

Maka found herself wanting Soul a bit more. Some of Bella’s emotions were leaking into Maka’s mind and gave her some bad ideas. Luckily, her logical side took over and she stopped herself from doing something uncalled for.

A quick and sudden as it was, it was over. Soul was done.

Soul stood trying to regain his balance. It was thrown off a bit by his sudden growth. When he looked down, he realized how much he’d grown. Maka, at 5ft0in stood just above his waist. “Ha… you’re so tiny.”

Maka felt her anger flare. She jumped onto his head and gave signature move “MAKA CHOP!” She smashed her book onto his head.

Soul staggered and grabbed onto a lamppost for support. It snapped and fell on him…

What now?
1422111112111112111111121212111111121.title: Lets speed through puberty then.

choices: Life on Hawaii... good or bad?
14221111121111121111111212121111111212.content:
Kid looked at the two scythe weapons. He had been observing from a distance for a while now and he’s discovered that they were perfect copies of each other shape wise, but there coloring is a bit off. However, he was pleased with it enough that it didn’t bother him too much.

Maka was sitting down playing with a string of anti-magic. She had been practicing and she can weave a scarf out of this anti-magic string.

Bella smiled “We’re making good progress. Maybe I can get a body by the end of the month.”

Soul was sitting next to then thinking about stuff… just stuff.

------

Off in the distance, a dirty-blond haired kid with tanned skin and a decent build was charging at Death City. He was panting and drenched in sweat. The sun had not shown him much mercy, and neither did the thing following him.

------

DWMA main office.

The kid came running in “I need a weapon. Now!”

The clerk looked at the kid like he was crazy “Are you a student?”

Kid paused “No, but…”

Clerk looked away again “Not a student? No weapon.”

Kid was frantic “But its an emergency. If I don’t its going to claim me.”

Clerk was sensing the stress coming off the boy “It?”

Kid looked over his shoulders as though expecting it to arrive any minute “It… It! I need to get a weapon before it takes me.”

------

Soul and Maka were walking back when Maka stopped them.

Maka looked behind them and saw some dust rising in the distance “Soul. Something’s coming. And its fast. You want to take it, or should I?”

Soul yawned “I don’t feel like being meister today. You take it.” He turned into a scythe and landed in Maka’s hands.

Maka focused on the things soul and gasped. It was thrumming with madness. “Soul! This thing… its like the Kishin!”

Soul got serious now “Ok. Lets get ready.”

The thing got closer and closer, and it… it… it was a 2ft tall black colored humanoid type of thing. It had a white X on its face with two white marbles for eyes. It charged past them.

Maka blinked “Uhh….”

Soul was similar, but he recovered first “Maka! Quick!” Using his soul, magic, and anti-magic, he propelled Maka forward so that they were flying/gliding through the air.

As soon as they were over it, Maka impaled it with the scythe and sent a deadly does of anti-magic and magic coursing into the thing. It disintegrated.

Maka “We should go report this.”

Soul “Any trace of its soul left?”

Maka sighed “No… and also, it doesn’t seem to have one. Did you see a soul materialize?”

Soul “No.. lets go.”

They hurried toward the DWMA when they heard screaming “I need a weapon before it gets me!”

Maka pushed the doors to the Main Office open. “Hello? What’s the problem here?”

The kid turned around and saw Maka holding a scythe weapon. Out of desperation, the boy lunged for the weapon. He latched onto it and ran away with it.

Maka stood where she was… she was shocked. How is that kid able to hold onto Soul? Can their souls resonate?

Soul was pissed “Hey kid!”

The kid ignored him and looked around frantically. He was about 16 years old, Soul thought.

Soul repeated “Kid.” He was stilled ignored. Now he was angry “KID!!!!!!!!!!!”

The kid jumped from shock “Huh? Who said that.”

Soul groaned and turned into a human. “I did! Now why one earth did you just grab me from my meister, and my weapon.”

The kid was freaking out. He began to back away “Did… did you just… but you were a…. b-b-b-b…”

Soul screamed in his deep commanding voice “What on earth are you doing!”

The kid fell to his knees crying “The thing… past 3 months… running…so much running… needed a weapon… found a weapon… it’s a… it’s a… a… a…”

Soul was still pissed, but he could tell that something was off with this kid. “What’s your name.”

The kid looked up “Seth. And you were a weapon.”

Soul was shocked. The kid was just flipping out and now he was totally fine. “Yes… I am a weapon.”

Seth “A weapon that turns into a human.”

Soul nodded “Yah… Seth, Where are you from?”

Seth “Hawaii… We don’t have any good weapons there. No swords or anything. It followed me everywhere on Hawaii, and now its here. Wherever here is…” He started to rock back and forth in the fetal position.

Soul was kind of at a loss now. He didn’t know how to deal with the mentally insane… except for Stein. For Stein, all you had to do was show him a picture of Marie (the hammer death weapon). “Ok… is it a black thingy about this tall?” He made some hand gestures.

Seth looked at his hands and nodded “Yes… did you see it? Is it close?” He was extra paranoid now.

Soul nodded “He was here, but that girl you took me from killed it.”

Seth shook his head “No… No… Noooo!” He grabbed his head and began shaking again.

This is what Maka heard when she came by “Soul! What did you do?”

Soul was offended “ME? He stole me from you!”

The kid started to moan in his own agony.

Maka edged closer “Its ok… Soul won‘t hurt you anymore?”

Seth “Its not gone… its never gone. Not even under the boulder, or the fire, or the bombs, or the lightning, or the ocean… its never gone.”

Soul pointed out “He’s talking about that black thing you stabbed and disintegrated.”

Maka thought about it and asked the kid “Hey… its ok… We got your back ok?”

It felt kind of awkward talking to a 16yo this way, but Maka’s female defensive nature had already kicked in.

Maka “Nothing bad is going to happen to you.”

Bella spoke to Maka “Pump some anti-magic into him. Its should make his soul a bit more balance.”

Maka did that, but slowly.

Slowly, Seth stopped shaking and looked at Maka and Soul. “What’s going on… why am I here…” Then he remembered “Oh my god. I need a weapon!” he got up and ran for the main office again.

Maka screamed “Not this time!” She grabbed his shirt and threw him to the ground “Sit!” Her expression was filled with so much power and command that even Death might had sat down let alone a 16yo.

Seth immediately sat down and listened “But I need a weapon. Now!”

Maka “Not until you explain to us what is going on!”

Seth was about to counter, but Soul stopped him. His deep voice said “Give it up kid. I spent about 5 years with Maka and I have never won a single argument, and she has never lost an argument. She won’t lose now.”

Seth opened his mouth but closed it as soon as he saw Maka’s glare. “Fine… Its all started when…

What’s the story?
14221111121111121111111212121111111212.title: A new arc!

142211111211111211111112121211111112121.content:
There was a stereotypic Hawaiian teen surfing the waves of its beaches. Off in the distance, on land, there was another kid running. He was holding a flaming torch and shooting fire at this black creature.

Seth watched from a distance when he finally caught a huge wave. He ignored the torch guy.

Then he started to reach the shores of the beach. When he got there, he picked up his surf board and heard a screaming. “Run! Get out of the way!” Seth looked behind and saw the torch guy charging at him. They collided.

The other guy was freaking out. He pushed Seth out of the way and started to run again… it took to long. The thing jumped over Seth and latched onto the torch guy.

Seth stared wide eyed. The flame was dying. The other teen’s skin started to pale. And it seemed to shrink on itself. Soon, it was just a floating white ball. Then the ball turned purple and the thing ate it. Then it turned around and saw Seth. It jumped.

Seth was frozen in place. All he could do was stare as it got closer and closer, but it stopped. It landed on the ground writhing in pain. It was covered in fire. Seth looked at the torch and saw that it had relit itself for a brief moment. Then when he looked back at the thing, it was gone.

Seth almost passed out. He got up and kind of went on auto pilot. Like some part of his mind had acquired the instinct to move. He reached for the torch, and grabbed it. The fire came back, and they ran.

“Hope” was carved into its handle along with “Courage”.

Seth had it confiscated when he boarded a plane to “Anywhere… just anywhere.” It followed him to anywhere.

------

Seth shot fire at it over and over again, and it seemed to build a resistance to it now. The flames were getting smaller as well. It jumped and Seth dodged. It got the torch though. Its flames burned black and then it vanished. The whole torch just dematerialized.

Then he ran again.

------

Seth “I need a weapon ma’am.”

The lady sitting behind a gun display. She looked the teen over “No. not old enough.”

Seth tried to stay calm and polite, but that was getting hard to do since all it did was give IT more time to get to him. “Please. I need one. Anything. A knife, bow, arrow. What ever! IT is coming!”

The lady looked at the kid quizzically. Could he be one of those people? She reached into her pocket and pulled out a card “Go here. They might have one for you.”

The kid took it and looked at it “How do I get here?”

The lady smiled “Just ask!”

------

The lady “I can’t go any further. Just keep running that way until you see a strange city. Trust me, I’m not trying to trick you. This is their test of persistence. See how far you can go on your own.”

Seth looked at the lady determined. He got off her motorcycle and bolted.

------

He was still bolting… bolting for almost two straight days. He had seen a dark dot in the distance followed by a stream of sand.

He bolted faster…

------

He saw it! The haven and place the lady spoke about. He needed to ask for a weapon.

------

Seth sighed “So I ran here and asked the clerk lady for a weapon. I didn’t know I had to be a student!”

Maka smiled encouragingly “Trust us, this city has you protected. Ok?”

Soul scoffed “By the city, she means us.”

Maka frowned “Us and a about a hundred more weapons and meisters!”

Soul “What ever.” Then he heard a sound. The air rippled and got compressed. A dark form grew.

Seth flipped out and screamed. He started to back away.

Soul sighed “Maka, I’ll take this one. You did it last time.”

Maka nodded and turned into a white dual bladed scythe. She was not a death scythe yet, but she was close. She just needed a witch’s soul… only if they could find one.

Soul held the scythe at a readied position. It glowed and pulsed with white anti-magic.

Soon, the black form had fully materialized and it was angry. This was its worst time yet. It felt so much pain in a single moment that it almost went more insane if it could have. It turned to face Seth. It could sense the girl, but where…

Soul charged and struck at it, but it dodged. However, it wasn’t unscathed. The anti-magic in the air around the blade burned at its body.

It screamed and looked at them with hate. Soul charged again and sliced, but he added some soul into the attack. The anti-magic flared and saturated the air. Even before Soul got close to it, it had been dissolved into nothing again.

He sighed “Its gone… at least for now.” He turned to face the kid.

His eyes opened wide at what he saw. They were fearless… The scythe was glowing… What are these people? “What are you guys?”

Soul looked up from where he was looking at “Huh?”

Seth “What are you two? You can change into weapons and you attacked it without hesitating. What are you?”

Maka turned back into a human. She smiled encouragingly “We’ll tell you, but we have to report this to DWMA. We’ll tell you along the way.”

------

Seth tried to grasp all the ideas “So… there are two things basically. A weapon and a meister. They are both humans, but few people can actually be either of them. A weapon is basically a weapon, and the meister uses the weapon by shove their soul into it. This place, DWMA, is a place that trains weapons and meisters. Also, meisters can’t pick up a weapon if their souls so not match up.” Now he wondered “Then what are you two? I saw both of you as a weapon and a both of you hold each other.”

Maka nodded “Yah, we’re the only pair that is both weapon and meister, so we can change rolls when ever we want.”

Seth looked at the two. He saw how much older Soul looked. “Aren’t you a bit old to go to school here?”

Soul rolled his eyes “No… I just look older. I’m 14 like a lot of the other kids.”

Seth’s jaw dropped. This guy could pass off as a 21yo modeler. “Uhh…”

Maka smiled “Don’t think on it to much. We’ll lets you know us bit by bit. There’s a lot to cover.”

Soul “We’re here.”

There was a giant tower with spires and other shorter towers next to it, etc.
142211111211111211111112121211111112121.title: Life on Hawaii... good or bad?

1422111112111112111111121212111111121211.content:
Seth just repeated his story to Death, Stein, and Spirit (also with Black Star, Tsubaki, Kid, Liz and Patty eavesdropping).

Stein looked at Maka and Soul “Do you guys want to report anything?”

Maka “It was madness. Its entire body was made of it. I could feel it as soon as it got close enough.”

Stein was cranking the screw in his head. Could it be? “Death… do you think?”

Death sighed “There is no other thing that matches that description. That thing is a living force incarnated. That things is “Madness”. Its made of it and it thrives off of it. I thought I had sealed those things away eons ago.”

Soul scoffed “Sorry Death, but your seals haven’t been top notch lately. First there was Arachne, then the Genies, then the Kishin, and then your daughter! Seriously, how much energy goes into your seals?”

Death waved his hands “OOPSIES!” The tension in the room dramatically dropped.

Seth smiled… he was surrounded by lunatics! But at least they can help.

Stein looked Seth “So you want a weapon…”

Seth nodded sporadically “Well… I don’t know if I want one. I need one!”

Stein looked over at Soul “Seth could hold you as a weapon?”

Seth nodded and looked aver at Seth. How on earth did their souls resonate?

Stein looked at Maka “How about you?”

Maka shook her head “He hasn’t held me as a scythe yet.”

Stein looked at Maka and Seth “Give it a try. I want to see if it works.”

Maka nodded and turned into a white scythe. Seth freaked and barely managed to catch her. Then when he got his balance, he looked at the scythe.

Stein “Interesting” He looked at Soul “Now you turn into a scythe.”

Soul rolled his eyes, but played along. He morphed into a black and white scythe. The blades were like the darkest obsidian and the white was like a Maka’s pearly blades. He floated over to Seth, and Seth caught him.

Stein thought about it. Seth is capable of holding both weapons, and both are scythes (the strongest of all the type of weapons). Strange… “Seth. Can you try to swipe at the air?”

Seth smiled. He was holding two weapons. There is no way that thing could hurt him now. He confidently swung at the air, but he almost lost his balance. He wasn’t used to weapons. The white and black blade sparked as it cut through the air, but other than that, it was inert. Maka on the other hand left a glowing haze as it passed through the air. Seth was stunned.

Stein pondered “Ok. Maka and Soul, you can become human again.”

Seth felt his hands grow light as his two weapons vanished from his hands. He smile cockily “Alright, now I should be fine since you are both my weapons. I expect you to be with me at all times. That‘s a command since I am your meister.”

Soul frown and Maka raised a questioning eyebrow.

Soul could feel the arrogance coming off of Seth. Weapons don’t belong to people. They were companions. “Maka… I don’t really like this guy’s attitude.”

Maka sighed “Neither do I.” She gave him a glare. Who did he think he was!

Seth was confused “What? I could hold both of you, so that makes me your meister. Right?”

Soul countered “Wrong.” He held out his hand and Maka grabbed it. She turned into a scythe and he swung at the air. He pushed some of his soul into the attack. A white wave rushed out and flew off into the distance.

Then Soul turned into a scythe and Maka became human. She swung at the air and a black and white wave flew out. The waves attracted each other and exploded off in the distance.

Maka “We are not your weapons. We can be your companions, but it our choice.”

Seth felt himself becoming vulnerable again “B-B-But I need you two. I have to have you two.” He stammered.

Soul was still frowning “NOT have…” He commanded. “We can help you if WE want to, but it is OUR choice to make.”

Seth shrank down with each time Soul yelled.

Soul looked down at the kid “Do I make myself clear?”

Seth nodded. This guy was supposed to be 14? He could beat me to a pulp!

Maka put a hand on Soul’s arm trying to calm him “Soul, I think he gets the point.”

Soul sneered “He had better, or I won’t give a **** if that thing gets him.”

Seth whimpered in fear.

Maka gave Soul a stern look “Soul. He gets the point.” She focused on Seth “Right?!”

Seth nodded rapidly.

Maka smiled “Ok. Good. You’ll sleep at out place tonight.”

Soul protested “Wait. What? I’m not letting him sleep in our apartment.”

Maka looked at Soul “You look like a grown man! Act your age!”

Soul pursed his lips a smidge “But I’m only 14!”

Maka “With the body of a 21 year old!”

Soul “SO???!?!”

Maka “SO! People look up at you, so you have to act like a role model. Plus, that voice makes you hard to ignore. There is no denying that you could get anyone to do almost anything with your body and your voice.”

Soul thought about it and sighed. “I hate it when you do that.”

Maka smiled “Just doing my job.” She looked at Seth “We’re going now. Stay close behind. We don’t know when it’ll pop back up.”

------

Soul pointed to a couch “You can sleep there. Do not touch anything that we didn’t say you could. You can not enter either of our rooms. If you want to eat anything, go ahead. If you touch the chocolate pudding you will die. If anything happens tonight, give us a holler. If not, then I want it dead quiet. Understood?” Soul looked down from his towering 9ft stature.

Seth’s head was bobbing up and down.

Soul turned around and smile. Maybe Maka was telling the truth.
1422111112111112111111121212111111121211.title: Continued...

choices: Its back and madder than ever.
1422111112111112111111121212111111121211.content:
Later that night…

Seth screamed “GET AWAY!” There was the sound of breaking glass and running footsteps.

Both doors opened and an alert Soul stepped out and a bed head Maka came out.

Soul “Maka! Scythe!” Maka transformed and flew into Soul’s hand.

Seth was edged into a corner. The thing was edging up closer to him. Its dark skin mixing into with the shadows of the night. Seth was shaking and trying to find anything to attack it with.

Soul was partially pissed. He was having a nice dream about going to the Bahamas with Maka and there was no one there to bother him or her. However, he’d never admit to that.

Soul looked at the thing and started to shove his soul into the white scythe, but he did not execute an attack. Quickly, the blades flared white and tons of anti-magic was being pushed into the air. As soon as it reached the thing, it screamed and slowly dissolved. It had turned and looked at Soul hatefully before It was gone.

Maka turned back into a human and ran over to Seth. He was shaking and frantic.

Maka “Its alright. Its gone. Get up.”

---Mind Scape---

Bella sighed “You know that you’re babying him.”

Maka sighed “What else can I do?”

Bella “Let me or Soul talk to him. He’ll probably freak if he heard me. Soul is probably a better choice.”

Maka scoffed mentally “You want Soul to talk to this guy nicely?”

Bella laughed “No! I want him to rough this kid up a bit. Show him to stand up for himself.”

Maka thought about it “I guess that could work.”

---Exit Mind Scape---

Bella just finished filling Soul in on the plan.

Soul rolled his eyes… yay… more work. “Hey Seth. Get up.”

Seth still stammered. His eyes were glazed over.

Soul frowned and loomed over him “Get… up…”

Seth remains unresponsive.

Soul growled. This is what Maka and Bella asked for. Soul picked Seth up by the first and walked to the front door. He tossed Seth out and followed.

As soon as Seth hit the ground, an awareness of vulnerability came over him. “Wait. What’s going on?” He looked up in time to block a kick from Soul. “What the ****?” He flew back 10ft.

Soul growled “Get up.”

Seth was moaning “It hurts. What was that for?”

Soul’s face remained emotionless “Get up. If you want me and Maka to protect you, show us that you’re worth or time. If not, I’ll keep kicking you until… well you can take a guess at that.” His face was almost cynical.

Seth backed up, but was still on the ground.

Soul sighed and gave him another kick sending him back another 10ft. “Get up.”

Seth groaned. His gut and his left leg were killing him now. Not to mention his ass. He looked up to see Soul approaching him.

Soul “Get up.” He got ready for another kick.

Seth felt time slow down. What was he doing? This guy was going to kill him, and he was doing nothing. The leg got closer and closer, and he… well Seth rolled out of the way. “What’s your problem!” He stood up limping slightly.

Soul smirked “Nothing. I just wanted you to stand so I could punch you.” He raised a fist.

Seth back up again. This guy was insane!

Soul swung and Seth block with his arms. Seth felt burning fire run up his arm and he toppled over again.

Soul “Get up.”

Seth groaned, but got up. He saw another punch and ducked. Then he saw a kick and jumped. What was going on?

Soul smirked “That’s it. Now dodge this.” He swung twice and kicked and danced around Seth.

Seth tried his best to see where the blows were coming from, and he did for the most part. It was like some instinct in the back of his mind was telling him what to do, and he just followed it. Then suddenly, he felt something odd. He raised both arms to block and suddenly a pair of shields grew out of his arms.

Soul felt his hand strike at something solid. There was a clank. He looked and saw two shields over lapping to cover Seth from his attacks. “What the?”

Seth smirked but then he frowned. His body collapsed on the ground thoroughly exhausted. The shields on his arms disappeared and his world went black.

------

Seth was in the infirmary. He opened his eyes and blinked as they adjusted to the light. His body was on fire. “Oh…”

Soul chuckled “Don’t moan now. I was just starting to think you were cool.”

Seth’s head snapped toward Soul. Seth’s eyes narrowed as they focused on him “Are you mad!”

Soul laughed “Nope. Wait, I take that back. Everyone is a little mad. IF not, then the world would be a pretty dull place.”

Seth was still partially fuming.

The doors opened to let Maka and the school nurse, Medusa, in.

Maka smiled “You’re awake! I thought you might have decided to stay another week.”

Seth was shocked “How long have I been here?”

Medusa smiled “3 weeks. Just enough time for your bones to heal and some major bruises. Though, you are far from done.”

Seth almost passed out again “3 weeks!” He glared at Soul “You!”

Soul smirked “Yes… me. But on the bright side, we discovered that you are a Shield.”

Seth “A what?”

Maka “A shield. They are extremely rare. There hasn’t been any reappearances in over 5 centuries. At least until you.”

Seth was dumbstruck “But what is a shield?”

Maka explained “They have an incredibly strong defensive soul which takes the form of a shield. It is almost impossible to break or pierce. The person, you, who is a shield will grow stronger the more souls they eat. However, not human souls. If you did that, then you’d turn to the Dark Side.”

Seth was lost for words. I am a shield? Is that what happened when Soul was beating the **** out of me? “What else?”

Maka “Well, they can take the form of a shield attached to someone’s arms. Or, if you have enough experience, you can become a suite of armor.”

Seth was amazed. I can do all of that? “Can I become a shield now?”

Medusa shook her head “I highly advice against it. Your body s still recovering from your ordeal. If you transformed now, you might lose the ability. You’re body is still adapting to it.”

Seth sighed. He really wanted to change into a shield now, but he didn’t want to lose the ability, so he waits.

Soul “Being a Shield explains why you could hold be and Maka. A shield can resonate with anything! You’re basically universal and you are a nearly indestructible defense. You might be lucky enough to have a special ability.”

Seth “What do you mean?”

Maka “In the past, Shield could possible have an attribute or skill. Such as an attack such as coating yourself in lightning, or create raging infernos. Some had abilities such as healing or long ranges defense. Like a force field. None are the same. At least not that we know of.”

Seth groaned “I hope I get better soon…”

------

Seth was growing ocean blue. He was focusing on the shape of a shield. He remembered his arms becoming shields, and now he wanted to trying becoming one fully. Suddenly, his whole body was enveloped in a blue light.

Soul walked over and picked up the shield. It was shaped like a pentagon with an ice blue sapphire in the middle of it. Intricate designs flowed from the pentagonal sapphire. Its reached out and touched smaller ones.
