It was an ocean like wave that flowed over the shield. “I might be wrong, but I think you’re special skill has to do with water.” Soul held it up and saw that it was about a meter in diameter. It gave Soul decent coverage from any assault. “I have to admit, you do look kind of cool.”

Seth beamed “Well duh! The only shield in centuries has to be pretty cool. Now try punching me. You won’t leave a dent I bet.”

Soul made a face “Is that a challenge? Fine then. I accept.” Soul pulled back his arm and punch the shield with al her had. There was a loud thud, but nothing else. “Wow… nothing.” Soul looked it over and there really was not a single dent.

Seth smiled. This were looking up.
1422111112111112111111121212111111121211.title: Later that night...

14223.content:
Maka looked at Soul expectantly. They had been waiting to so long, and the time had finally come. She saw Soul’s soul pulsing with explosive amounts of soul energy. Then it stopped. “How do you feel?”

Soul was smiling as he felt power flowing through his veins, but the feeling soon fled. He sighed “Oddly normal, but I feel so pumped. Like there’s liquid energy running through my veins.”

Maka smiled “Well Death Scythe, shall we go home?” She pointed down the path.

Soul smiled “Race yah!” He started sprinting down.

Maka smiled “No fair!” She laughed as she ran to catch up with her weapon.

Soul was jumping past pumpkins and tree root when suddenly he smashed into a pair of flesh globes. “Oomph.” He pushed his face and looked up past the two fleshy mounds. His mind blanks out “What the…”

A cat -like lady pouted “That wasn’t very nice. Killing me while I was being nice.”

By now, Maka had caught up. As soon as she saw the witch, her feet tripped up and she fell over. She got up and ranted “How on earth are you still alive! I thought I killed you! Soul ate your soul!”

The witch turned into a cat and meowed “I’m a cat. What did you think I was?”

Soul tipped over in embarrassment “I… I ate a cat’s soul?”

Maka sighed as she felt humility take over her mind. They were the only pair to willingly eat a non-witch soul for their 100th soul… “Excuse me, but why are you alive?”

The cat meowed “Well… I’m a cat. didn’t you know we have more than one life?”

Maka took a deep breath “Ok Soul. We’re going home. Back to square one.”

Soul was still on the ground moping. There were comical wavy lines of depression floating above his head.

Maka sighed “Lets go. Get up.”

Soul still stayed on the ground.

Maka frowned “Get up!”, but he stayed down. She had enough “MAKA CHOP!” She took her book and smashed it down on his head.

Soul rocketed up and began to yelled “What was that for! Can’t you see th- Hey Maka, did you get shorter?” Soul was tilting his head down slightly. They used to be at eye level, but he was a good 3in taller now.

Maka looked at Soul wide eyed “N-no… but I think you got t-t-taller.”

Soul looked down at the ground. There was a slight change in view points, but nothing too huge. Then suddenly, he felt a tingle run over his body. He felt his muscles thrum with energy. “M-Maka… I feel something happening.”

The cat turned back into a human “Oh… that’s the weirdest allergic reaction I’ve ever seen.”

Soul and Make looked at the cat lady with surprise “What?”

The cat lady “You’re body is reacting strangely to the magic in my soul. Well, that’s what my eyes are telling me. Did I tell you that cats can see magic? We have such good eye sight.” She sighed as she thought about how great cats were.

Soul looked down at his body. He felt his shirt grow tighter and tighter as he grew bigger. Already, you could see the outline of some meaty pecs, and a pair of large biceps. If his shirt was off, you could see a 6-pack forming. RIP. The sleeve to his shirt started tearing off. With every heart beat, he grew more and more. The veins on his arms bulged out as they fed blood to his ever growing muscles. “Oh…” He felt kind of odd, his pants were really tight, and were getting tighter. With every pulse, his semi-erect cock lengthened. It tried to fill with blood, but it grew to fast to be filled. POP! His button popped off and the zipper ripped open. A pair of tight briefs were revealed, and they looked just about ready to explode. Soul continued to moan… it felt so good. RIP! His shirt fell to tatters as his growing torso expanded. His helf like pecs covered his view. His massive 6-packs were as big as CD’s. His biceps were larger than his head, and his forearm was like a football. RIP! His pants had torn off to show watermelon thighs and bowling ball calves. There was a CRACK as his bones started to grow to fit his growth. “Oh…” RIP! SNAP! His briefs flew off into the distance and a one-eyed snake flopped to the ground.

Maka’s face turned red, and she turned around.

The cat wasn’t as modest. She walked up and smiled into Soul’s glazed eyes “Big boy aren’t you?” She jiggled her chest to catch his attention, and then suddenly his snake turned into a 16in flag pole. The cat felt extra playful now. She looked at the giant mushroom head and then turned into a cat. She pounce.

Soul “Oh! Faster! Faster!” Pleasure was surging down his monster python and up his spine. White pre began to leak out and splatter over the cat.

The cat climbed up (without claws) and started swatting at the head playfully and started to jump and run around. It jumped off the head and landed on his baseball balls.

Soul screamed in pleasure and then his fiery rod erupted with white lava. Buckets were coming out and the cat was running all over for it.

Maka stood to the side chanting away the scene behind her.

Soul panted. His flag pole fell limp and landed on the ground. He lay still in his post orgasm glow. Then he realized “**** I’m naked!” He turned into a scythe so Maka could turn around. “Maka… I’m a scythe now.”

Maka turned around and saw a scythe laying in a giant pool of steaming white seeds. She sighed “I’m not touching that.” She remained abstinent.

Soul looked out of his blade and saw what she meant. He quickly turned back into a human, but he reappeared behind a tree. “Ouch!” He just bumped his head on a branch 7ft off the ground.

Maka “What happened?”

Soul “Nothing. Don’t worry about it. Catch.” He turned back into a scythe and Maka caught him. They started walking to the DWMA.

The cat was on the ground licking up its precious milk. She thought “What a strange allergic reaction. Maybe I should die a second time?”

What happens now?
14223.title: Yes! Something happens.

142231.content:
Soul stood in Death’s room with his make shift cloths: A blanket with rope.

Maka was reporting everything that happened.

Death listened intently and responded “Whoopsies!”

Maka nodded sadly “Yah… that’s what we did.”

Suddenly, there was the sound of running feet “MAKA! My daughter!” Spirit, Maka’s father whom she ignores, came sprinting into the room only to be stopped by a largely muscled arm. “Oomph.”

Soul smiled. He hadn’t felt a thing It was that easy…

Spirit looked up to see a mountain of muscle and then a head that he recognized “Soul!!! W-W-What happened to you?”

Soul smiled “Nothing bad, if that’s what you wanted to know.”

Spirit frowned “You know what I mean. How did…” He waves at Soul’s body “… all that happen?”

Soul “I’m allergic to magic, I guess, and it makes me grow.”

Spirit paused. Was that even possible? Then again, magic could do a lot of random things. Spirit sighed and turned toward Maka “Maka! How’s it feel to make a death scythe at only 14! That’s a huge achievement, and I’m very proud.” Then heard a sniffing sound. He looked at his daughter and saw her shaking slightly “Maka?”

Maka blurted out “I didn’t make a death scythe! It was a magic cat’s soul…” She started to cry.

Spirit recoiled. He had thought she would succeed, and that this would help repair their bond, but it did the opposite! Suddenly, he felt himself flying back a few yards as a giant arm tossed him back.

Soul fumed. His eyes told Spirit to stay away or else.

Spirit glared at Soul. Maka was HIS daughter, and he’d be as annoying as he wanted. He’d do anything… ANYTHING! For his little girl. But he could wait for now…

Soul bent down and tried to get Maka to calm down.

Death was watching and he decided to make a phone call. He went to his mirror and spoke “Stein. Please come to my room. ASAP.”

An image of a pale man wearing stitched clothing, and a screw in his head, nodded at Death’s request, and then the image cleared.

------

Death “Soul and Maka, I’d like you to meet one of the brightest students ever produced at DWMA, Stein. I think he’ll be able to help you two.” Death points to the man that was in the mirror before.

Seth whispered to Maka “Is it me, or does that guy have a screw in his head?”

Maka shook her head “No… I see it too.”

Stein was smoking a cigarette “I can hear both of you.”

They turned to face him.

Maka “Sorry… uhh… Mr. Stein.”

Stein “Just call me Stein.”

Soul “Fine Stein, do you know what is going on with what happened to me?”

Stein smirked evilly “I’ll need to dissect you first.”

Suddenly a voice yelled “WHAT IS HE DOING HERE!” Spirit had just walked in, but hid behind Soul the moment he saw Stein.

Stein’s eyes opened upon seeing Spirit “Oh! Spirit, good to see you. I’ve missed dissecting you at night before your wife came along and took you away.”

Spirit yelled “I’m glad she did! The scars have just all vanished.”

Stein sighed. He pulled out a surgical knife “Maybe tonight…”

Spirit shrieked and ran out of the room.

Soul was shocked by what just happened, but one thing was clear “You are not cutting me open.”

Stein resigned “Fine… it was worth a shot.”

Maka asked nicely “So, Stein, could you please tell us what’s going on with Soul?”

Stein “You both know that magic is a very volatile particle, and it reacts with everything and changes it.”

Maka and Soul stare at Stein with lost gazes.

Stein ignored the faces “Well, everyone reacts to magic differently in its pure state. An example of a non-pure state is a spell. The particles are changed to follow a certain order and to achieve a certain goal. The pure state, however, could simply be a ball of magic, or a magic soul. There are other examples that I won’t go into detail. For Soul, it seems that you react by growing dramatically.”

Soul nodded as the ideas flowed into his head “I think I understand. So it is like an allergic reaction.”

Stein “In a sense, yes.”

Soul “So if I were exposed to more, then I’d grow more?”

Stein nodded “Most likely.”

Soul nodded understating “I see… how about others?”

Stein “Well, some people get rashes, or their body simply blocks out the magic, but they could block it in different ways. Some people’s souls become increasingly dense to block out the magic, and some other absorb it and turn it into something else. It always varies.”

Soul thought about it, and the thought of growing stronger entered his mind. He was huge after eating a simply magic cat’s soul. What if it were an actual witch’s soul?

Maka was wondering how she reacted to magic. It’d help her, to know when she fought a witch or something. “Stein, is there a way for me to see how I react?”

Stein thought about it and nodded “Yes. You will need a Magic Mist Crystal and a full moon. When the moon beam passes through the crystal, the light should be turned into magic. Just touch it, and you should see. The beam is relatively low in concentration, so you should be fine.”

Maka nodded “Do we have a magic crystal?”

Death responded “Nope, but it’d be nice if you two found one for the school.”

Soul stared at Death with a sarcastic and lazy look “Really? Why Maka and me?”

Death “Because I asked you to!”

Soul was about to counter, but Maka told him to give it up. No one wins against Lord Death.

Stein “The crystals are mined in a cave inside Fog Forest. When you get there, you should be able to sense a strong source of magic. Follow it and you should find the cave. To get the crystal, you need to Soul as a pickaxe. Once you get it, just retrace your steps and come back here.”

Soul’s logic was screaming at him “If its that simple, why aren’t there more in the world?”

Stein “Because they are made very slowly. You’ll have to hunt for one that someone missed. Oh, and also. The deep you go, the more condensed the crystal is, and the stronger the magic it makes.”

Maka nodded and dismissed Soul and herself. “Thank you. We’ll be going then.”

Death “Good luck!”

What now?
142231.title: Info on his allergy

1423.content:
“GET TO WORK!”

I kid, of around 15 was sweeping at the sidewalk with increased vigor now. His skin, tanned from the beating sun, rippled lightly as muscles worked to swing the broom back and forth. “Yes Lieutenant!”

A large, plump man with rather bulbous features glared down at the 15. “That’s right. Know your place, and one day, you may be as great as I, the amazing Marechiyo Ōmaeda!” Then the great Marechiyo Ōmaeda suddenly found himself falling to the ground with a nimble foot in his face. He looked up “C-Ca-Captain Suì-Fēng. I-I-I was just telling Senju Daiken to get off his lazy ass an-” He found himself flying through the air with another kick.

Sui’s face was monotone and unchanging “Never use such low life language in my presence… even if you may be one with the low life’s.”

Omaeda’s eyes watered. He looked up to his captain (and feared her) to no ends! “B-Bu-” He stopped talking. Sui’s eyes were filled with so much will and fire that Omaeda thought he might be paralyzed for life.

Senju was still working diligently like nothing new was happened (which wasn‘t all a lie).

*If any of you could tell me what Senju means, I‘d appreciate it.*

Sui looked at Senju “Senju!”

Senju looked up and ran up to Sui. He was totally composed and waiting for his order.

Sui smiled. She liked this kid… reminded her of herself when she was his age… maybe a few decades ago. “Senju, you have been assigned to Karakura town to help Zennosuke…” She trailed off as painful memories of what the klutz was like.

Senju thought that was unusual “Sui…?”

Sui snapped back into reality “What! Do not interrupt my train of thought.” She silently thanks Senju from saving her from her own mind. “You will pack a change of cloths, and your Zanpakuto with you.” She waited a moment to let him think. She knew of his little issue “Are there any questions?”

Senju sighed “I know you know that I can’t use my zanpakuto… well, I can, but my spiritual pressure is so low that I can’t even cut a hollow… let alone defend a whole town. So why send me?”

Sui smiled “You may have heard of a certain substitute shinigami. His names makes my blood boil, but he is of use to Soul Society. But back on topic. You will accept what I will say as truth. Understood?”

Senju nodded and listened.

Sui sighed “You, other than my predecessor, are the only one who has ever been able to sneak up on me.”

Senju’s eyes opened in astonishment. Sure, he messed around one day and popped up behind the Captain, but she didn’t act surprised or anything at all.

Omaeda’s unconscious mind heard this and made him wake up “What! I-Impossible! Captain Sui, surly you are joking! Even I, as you second in command, could not do such a thing.”

Sui gave his a silencing glare, but decided to deal with him later. She turned back to Senju “Yes. I am not lying to you. You have great skills. Maybe the best… next to me at least.”

Senju argued humbly “Captain Sui, I-I… I’m not that great. Sure, I do well grade wise. I can pass the exams, but I can’t work with others. I mess up to much to be part of a team. The written grade is fine, but the actual application is couldn’t be worse.”

Sui raised a challenging eyebrow “Now really? How do you explain the fact that you snuck up on me?”

Senju paused and thought about it “It must be that my Spiritual Pressure was so low that no one could register me. “

Sui laughed “Do you think that is all I look for? I am always watching. Even when I sleep. I listen and a feel. The air moves when something moves. The earth vibrates with every step. I smell… well, I don’t usually have to resort to that because of…” She turned to Omaeda and gave him a hateful glare. “Well, I don’t just look for spiritual pressure. I listen for other tangible things as well.”

Senju couldn’t believe this. He couldn’t possibly be that good. He always goofed up in class, and when people looked at him. He liked it when he was alone with his surroundings. His favorite place is a small stream that existed next to a small waterfall. He could sit for hours and simply be. “But Captain Su-” His instincts told his to duck, so he did.

A lightning fast arm missed his head by inches, and continued past it towards a larger target. Omaeda found himself on his knees clutching his face in agony. A neon red hand blared on his left cheek.

Sui smiled “You will leave tomorrow morning. Meet me at the main Senkaimon Gate.” Sui turned and walked away. She thought “If anyone can help him, then that orange haired Spiritual Pressure monster of a human could help. Well, Him and Urahara.” She gagged at the thought of that candy seller.

Senju was shocked. What did he just do? Maybe Sui went easy on him. He couldn’t have evaded her attack. Then he saw a note place where Sui was standing. There was a cute chibi of her giving a thumbs up. It said “No… I did not go easy on you. Go ask Omaeda.”

Senju’s hands were shaking as he read the note. “Lieutenant Omaeda, how strong was that hit?”

Omaeda got up slowly as he looked out for his captain. There was a red hand still imprinted on his face. “Wa’th? Th’am it’th. I bi’th ma th’ongue!”

That was all Senju needed to hear. Could she really have been serious?

------

Senju looked at Sui. A hell butterfly flapped by his head waiting to take him over to the other side of the Senkaimon Gate. “Captain Sui… are you sure?”

Sui nodded firmly “You will go to that town and you will keep watch. Understood?”

Senju bowed as he said yes. He looked at the white portal.

Sui sighed patiently “You know… you might even learn how to call to your Zanpakuto.”

Senju felt his heart skip a beat. He’d have done anything to learn the name of his Zanpakuto. It was one of the few ways he could improve his abilities, and maybe even increase his spiritual pressure. However, he was told it was impossible because his spiritual pressure was far to low to even support a Shikai (the second form of a Zanpakuto that is initiated by calling out to the spirit inside the Zanpakuto). He stuttered “Y-Yes C-Captain Sui.”

Sui smiled “Good. Now go. Zennosuke will be waiting for you on the other end.”

Senju bowed respectfully and began to walk towards the gate.

Sui remembered something “Oh. One more thing. If you get the chance, please put some lice in his hair. Telling him that he doesn’t need to worry about the incident anymore.”

Senju listened. His curiosity was starting to peak, but he knew better than to ask “Yes Captain Sui.”

Sui “Good. Now go.”

Senju walked into the white portal…

What now?
1423.title: Other

14231.content:
Senju was slightly above average for his age, but then again, so were most people in the Academy. All the hard work went into developing stamina, strength, and speed. But still, he wasn’t like those giant muscle giants like Kenpachi or even the General Captain! His build was more modest, and built for speed and endurance. He was the fastest in his Squad, but when someone looked at him, he always tripped up. But anyway, he kind of looked like a stereotypic Hawaiian kid.

Take a look at this photo and see for your self. I’d like the thank Boo Boo Stewart at this time:
http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216...

Zennosuke was standing in his usual proud posture. The Sekaimon gates appeared and his guest appeared. “WELCOME TO KARAKURA TOWN! MY DOMAIN!” He yelled obnoxiously.

As the light cleared, Senju looked and saw where he was. He thought “Dammit. Why am I in that air? I can’t even walk on air yet because my spiritual pressure is so low.”

Zennosuke was bewildered. “Well come on! Get down here so I can show you my true strength!”

Senju was trying to think of what strength he could possibly be talking about. From what he could see, and what he collected from Sui’s actions, this Zennosuke guy is a buffoon. Almost as much as he was!

Then it hit him. Both buffoons of Soul Society were sent to the same town…

Senju sighed. “I knew I couldn’t have been that amazing.” He yelled to Zennosuke “Hey! How hard are the Hollows here?”

Zennosuke smirked “They are all pipsqueaks compare to my strength. Do not fear! For Zennosuke is here! Now come down. Let me show you around.”

Senju held onto the doors of the Sekaimon. “I can’t get down!”

Zennosuke “What? I don’t think I heard you right. You can’t get down?”

Senju bobbed his head in shame “Yes…”

Zennosuke smirked “Well fine them. I’ll be right up, and then I can show you around.” Finally! Someone to admire my strengths. Unlike that supposed Substitute Shinigami around the corner, or what ever he was.

------

Zennosuke was talking long strides “Keep up! Keep up!” His eyes closed in ignorant pride.

Senju stopped walking “Zennosuke, I’m in front of you.”

Zennosuke frowned “Get back here. I’m head of this town and you better listen. Got it?”

Senju was trained to obey superiors, and by rank, Zennosuke was superior… Though Senju felt like he could have taken him on. Obliging, he walked back and trailed byhind the slow Zennosuke.

Zennosuke smiled “Good. Know your place. Since its your first time, I will excuse you.”

Senju mentally rolled his eyes “Yes Zennosuke.”

Zennosuke “That’s Head Zennosuke to you!”

Senju’s head tilted in exasperation. A sweat drop formed o the side of his head. He thought “Captain Sui… what did I do wrong? Why did you do this to me…” Then he remembered something, and he smirked “I wonder where I can get some lice…”

------

Zennosuke was screaming…

------

Zennosuke’s face was beet red, and his ears were steaming “Get out, and don’t come back until you learn some respect.” The doors slammed shut. The last thing Senju saw was a disheveled head of hair, and some tiny bugs jumping around in it.

Senju pulled out his phone, and a message appeared “Video Sent.”

------

Head Captain Yamamoto “Sui, why have you asked my to call all the captains together? What has your stealth squad found out?”

Sui’s face was blank, but her mind was screaming. “Captain Kurotsuchi, if you would please turn your large screen on.”

The head of the science department rolled his eyes “If I must…” He pushed a button on a remote, and a screen appeared from the walls.

Sui went up and connected her phone. She pressed play.

One moment later…

“HAHAAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAH!!!!!!”

Even Head Captain Yamamoto was smiling, and then he frowned. “Captain Sui!”

Every captain and lieutenant grew serious.

Sui “Yes Captain Yamamoto!”

Head Captain Yamamoto “I order you to forward that video to every phone in all of soul society!”

All the people in the room looked at each other oddly. Did we hear Head Captain Yamamoto correctly?

Sui smiled “Yes Head Captain Yamamoto!”

Moments later, all of the spirit world was filled with joy. Drinks were shared and parties were started. “HAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAA!!!!!!!!”

------

Senju smiled lightly. “Now where do I go?”
14231.title: Getting to the other side...

142312.content:
Senju strolled down the street. He didn’t worry to much about sticking to the shadows since none of the humans could see him. Suddenly, he felt an increase in pressure. A Hollow had just appeared. “Dammit.” He started running to the source. I hope it’s a pip-squeak like he had said.

Senju passed by dozens of houses. Some were made of stone. One house, however, made him pause. Its was a clinic. “Kurosaki Clinic.” He sensed a strong spiritual pressure coming from with in the house. Immensely strong, but it was a human’s pressure. He’d have to hurry them. This human would most likely draw any hollow within a dozen miles.

Senju sprinted pasted the clinic with his Stealth Squad Speed and found himself in a park. He looked around, but the hollow seemed to have disappeared. He smashed into the ground.

A giant white gloved hand, and a heavily muscles eight-armed humanoid hollow stood above him. Its giant hand, bigger the Senju, easily held down the weak Shinigami. It pounded the ground once more to make sure its meal was ready.

Senju was broken bodily and mentally. His body was sending waves of pain to his mind, but it was so great that his mind could not comprehend it. It simply ignored it. He saw the hollow pick him up and he thought “Is this how it ends?”

But suddenly, it really looked at him and threw him aside. His soul was so weak in spiritual pressure that it wasn’t interest. It’d take more energy to process his soul than the power it would give. It turned and faced a small child passing by.

The child hadn’t noticed the sudden appearance of a crater in the ground, so it moved forward indifferently… until it was picked up. The little girl started to struggle and scream for help, but it was silences. Her eyes were filled with panic and horror. It was an invisible monster!!!

Senju was on the ground with a broken body. He was yelling at himself “The child! Don’t you dare!!! Come on Senji Daiken! Dai is for big and Ken is for strong! I need to be strong. GET UP!”

Suddenly, he heard a voice. His smaller than average Zanpakuto was glowing a hazy watery blue. “Why do you want to be strong?” The voice was a serene and calm voice, but it had incredible command.

Senju was silent. This was his Zanpakuto speaking to him. Like all the others, he had to pass its test to learn its name. “I…I…” Then he saw the little girl being held higher as the hollow opened it mouth. It revealed a dark and bottomless pit. “I want to protect!”

The voice was silent. Then there was the sound of crashing water. “You may call me Seishin Mizu… the spirit of water.”

Senji felt his body fill with spiritual pressure. It was like a dam had fallen and it had released a torrent of power into his body. His Zanpakuto pulsed as it grew larger and longer (Zanpakuto were swords that grew in size to match the spiritual pressure of their master. Their shikai form could be almost anything. And finally, their Bankai form is like the Shikai form, but to a greater degree.) Not in Shikai form, his sword had kept growing to match the ever growing pressure its master was now making.

Suddenly, like his sword, his body had started to grow. It was making to much spiritual pressure that it couldn’t handle it all. It needed to get stronger to handle it all. Quickly, Senji felt his body heal and his muscles started to tingle. He looked down at his arm and saw it was rippling. It got toner and slightly larger than before, but other than that, there was no huge change. However, the tingle was still there. He felt himself growing stronger still! One part kept growing though. His sword (not the Zanpakuto) started to grow longer and longer as it tried to break free of its own sheath.

Soon, his body stopped growing as it matched his spiritual pressure. It was a really tight build meant for stealth, strength, speed, and other things. Though, his knew endowment may or may not get in the way of things.

His Zanpakuto was still growing though, so that meant he wasn’t quite done. His body was getting stronger along with his growing pressure, but it seemed to get squished into his frame. His Zanpakuto had reached out 10 meters now, and his own sword had reached about 35cm long and 7cm wide. It carried two baseball sized ornamental bells.

The hollow had stopped messing with the girl as it sensed the growing power of Senji. It dropped the girl and made it way toward its first meal choice. A 50m long sword crushed the hollow…

Senji was still laying faced down. His arm was up holding his absurdly huge sword that was still growing longer. It was actually growing faster and was getting as long as a tall hotel. He looked to the side and saw the girl was on the ground bleeding and unconscious.

He heard himself saying “I call upon thee Seishin Mizu, the spirit of water.” His Zanpakuto glowed ocean blue and the scent of salt and ocean filled the air. Then it evaporated into the air as steam. Soon, though, a bubble of water formed around the girl and glowed. The girl coughed as she started to breath again. The blood stopped bleeding, and it was replenished.

As soon as that was gone, the water vanished and a sword appeared in Senji’s sheath. Then he passed out from all the changes.

------

Senji was sat up with a jolt and he felt something was wrong. He felt his world shatter “What was the name of my Zampakuto!!!”

He stood up and suddenly he grabbed onto a nearby tree. He felt light headed as he was at least a foot taller than before. Standing at 7ft tall now at age 15, he had to be the tallest for his age group in all of Soul Society. His build was slightly above average (compared to his height), but it looked good on his body. It did not impede his well honed flexibility, or speed. “I guess its not all bad.” But he was still screaming. He wanted to punch himself senseless until he remembered.
142312.title: His first Hollow!

choices: He becomes more of a man.
1431.content:
"Harry! I found something that could help you out."
Harry looked up from his textbook to see the happy expression on his friends face. "Help me with what?"
The bookworm of Gryffindor tower said, "Your height problem."
Harry frowned, "This isn't just som cruel joke right? You know I'm sensitive about my height."
"No, I'm hurt you think I would do that. But either way, it will help you and a person I know."
"Who?"
"Me!"
"You? What is this ritual?"
Hermione sat down across him. "Essentially, it transfers masculinity from one person and sends it to another, and vice verca with feminimity. It mentions that men and women are opposites, so here is my logic. If I send masculinty to you and you send deminimity to me, then we should gain the bodies we want."
Harry looked at her skeptically. "Hermione, are you sure this even works?"
"Well, its not to hard to test. All we need for the ritual is to be in contact with each other after drinking the transfer potions. And if we want to reverse it, we'll just trade potions and fix it." She puppy dogged him. "Please..."
Harry tried to fight it, but he gave in. "Fine. Which one do I drink?" Hermione handed him a potion and they drank their potions together.
1431.title: Harry Potter

14313.content:
Harry bathed in love and adoration as the reopening of Hogwarts began. The Boy Who Lived’s image was plastered on every available surface. The epic scene of Voldemort’s defeat was playing all ever the newspaper. Sadly, he didn’t enjoy it all that much. He never was a person who enjoyed attention... less it was quidditch. In his mind, he just never got used to the whole idea of being the chosen one. Now he was sitting in a large private room the school had given him in honor of his victory.
He heard a knock at his door. “Come in!”
He was greeted with the sight of his bestmate ducking through the doorway, “Harry, how’s it going?”
“It’s been ok. A lot of attention.” He faked a smiled.
Ron snorted. “More than a lot. The public’s gone bonkers! I saw t-shirts with your face earlier today at Diagon Alley. Girls were lining up at posters of you and kissing your face. I swear there’s more lipstick and ink left on those papers.” Ron warned, “You know you’ll be murdered if you go out there. They’ll suck the skin off of you with your suckers they call lips.”
Harry sighed, “I guess I’ll just stay indoors for a while. It’ll calm down eventually.”
Ron nodded, “Yah, I guess you could keep doing that. It’s been what? A month since you defeated Voldemort. The wizarding world is still recovering.”
“I just wish they would give other people the credit they are giving me. Like I couldn’t have down it with you or Hermione. Hermione had all the brains, which probably kept us alive all this time. And you, when we had to get Helga’s cup from Gringotts. Only all 9ft of you could have reached the cup since we couldn’t use magic in the chamber. That, and you won that chess match back in first year, and saved me from that cursed necklace. I just wish they would acknowledge that.” Harry said downtrodden.
Ron said, “Hey, I think I found a way for you to get away from all this. It’ll be like you were never the Boy-Who-Lived in the first place. People would leave you alone.”
Harry perked up, “What did you find?”
14313.title: Different storyline

143131.content:
Ron guided Harry to the school library. Harry had access to the restricted section where Ron then pulled out a dark leather bound book. After flipping through the pages, Ron stopped somewhere near the end. “This spell is the transfer of identity and destiny. It will allow you to pass over your identity as the boy-who-lived, and all the hogwash fame will be lifted off your shoulders.”

Harry was amazed. Being the boy who lived has been a pain since the first year of his life. His parents died, his relatives were Satan reborn, Voldemort trying to kill him, enemies, death, monsters, and so much more. But being able to get rid of it all would be… would just be a dream come true. And this was his friend Ron talking. He’d trust his best mate with his life. “How do we get started?”

“Well, I was hoping you’d say yes, so I had the potions all prepared. Just drink this and it will be done.” Ron handed Harry a golden colored solution.
“That’s it? Just drink this? What’s in it?” Harry asked.

“Phoenix tears, basilisk scales, willow bark, acromantula silk, and newt eyes. It was a complex potion to make, but I had help.” Ron explained.

Harry nodded as he lifted the small vial. “Well here’s to a quieter future!” Harry tipped the vial back and down the solution. He smacked his lips a few times, “Tastes like apple juice.” Suddenly he felt a burning feeling down in his gut. It was quickly spreading outwards to his extremities. “Erg! It burns Ron. Did you know this would happen?” Harry grabbed and leaned against a table for support. Then he looked up at Ron who was grinning almost madly. “Ron?”

“Don’t fight it Harry. The potion needs to mess with your body and soul for a bit. In order for you to get rid of your fame, you need to get rid of the thing that fame is attached to, and that’s your body.”

Harry couldn’t believe what he was hearing. “W-Why… what’s going to happen to me?” He felt the heat getting stronger. At some point, he lost grip on the table and collapsed on the ground, his body convulsing. He saw a golden light and suddenly he was ejected from his body. The pain and all physical limitations vanished. “W-what happened?” He tried to say, but no sound came out. What happened? I can’t speak. He looked around and found that he was floating in the air. Below him, he saw Ron crouching over his own body. Harry lifted his hand and was surprised to see that it was transparent. Oh my merlin… am I dead?

Then he saw his body being lifted over Ron’s shoulder and then forcefully shoved into a small bag. Harry followed Ron as they left the school and headed for the Shrieking Shack. There was a cauldron bubbling in the middle of the room already. “Alright then. Time to get famous.” Ron said to no one in particular. “Sorry Harry, but you weren’t enjoying your life anyway. Maybe I enjoy it for you.” Ron opened the small back and dumped Harry’s body onto the floor where Ron proceeded to rip Harry’s close off. He had a little trouble around Harry’s midsection, but he his pants and briefs came off, Ron was a bit shocked. “My god, how on earth did you pack that monster away every morning?” His face grew a bit red with envy, but then he smirked. “It’ll only be added to what I have anyway.” Ron took the now naked body of Harry Potter and slowly lowered it into the cauldron of bubbling, brown solution.

Harry had attempted to stop Ron, but found that his ghostly arms could only pass through solid material. Ron you lying bastard! This isn’t what I wanted! I thought we were friends!!!

The brown solution started to clear up into a perfectly transparent solution. “Fantastic, it’s down.” He started to strip off his cloths.

Harry, even in his death, finally understood a lot of Ron’s insecurities. Oh… he had that prick of a half man? Damn, no wonder he was always jealous of me. Heck, I’m even more fit than him… though he is stronger. But still, look at the tubby stomach of his. He’s lucky the school robes are baggy or everyone would see where all that food went.

“Lets see, is his body fully dissolved?” Ron looked in the cauldron and saw nothing. “Great, time to cool you down.” He whispered a cooling charm and the bubbling died down to a calm roil. He stepped in slowly as to not spill a drop. “Ah… cozy.”

Ron started to feel a tingle through his body as the potion did its stuff. He looked down and saw that his head was rising higher. “Yes, it’s working!” Ron let out a moan suddenly as she shifted slightly in the quickly shrinking cauldron. He felt something between his legs, and grabbed it. Thousands of pleasure signals surged up his spine as he rubbed his dream shaft. It was easily twice as long as before and just as thick. He cupped his gonads in his hands and felt the large spheres as they continued to inflate in the diminishing solution.

Harry stood to the side and watched as his friend grew taller and more ripped than ever before. Harry could only assume that Ron was assimilating all of Harry’s labored and sweat earned body into his own. At some point, Harry saw a mushroom shaped object grow over the height of the cauldron. Oh my Merlin. That potion gave him my dick too? But it’s bigger than before. Was it added to his own?

Ron had own hand stroking his engorged shaft and the other hand was left rubbing his expanding chest. He cupped the growing muscle as it expanded. He let out another moan. As the solution was completely assimilated into his body, he felt his massive testicles tense closer to his body as hot fire surged out of his third leg. A thick white rope surged into the air lassoing all over Ron’s chest. He fired that one load for at least a good minute. When he had finished, he was crouched in a small cauldron. He felt his chest rise and fall as it pressed against his bulky thighs. His pole deflated downward. He felt it rub against his stone hard abs as it shrank down.

“Alright, time to get out of this.” He started to stand, but found that his body was wedged into the cauldron. He struggled and grunted for a bit, before stopping to say, “Fuck, I didn’t think this through. I didn’t think his magic and body would grow me this much.” After a while longer, he grew increasingly frustrated. In a burst of accidental magic, the cauldron exploded to bits. “Ah… that’s better.” He started to rise, but stopped when he bumped his head on the 10ft ceiling. He had to stand on his knees, but even then his hair was brushing the ceiling. As he waddled over to a mirror, he felt his shaft and bells dangle and brush the floor ever so slightly every few moments. “Damn, I’ve got to the hottest fucking giant wizard in the world.” He flexed a few poses, kissing his giant basketball biceps, and feeling his hardened abs. It was surreal.

Harry couldn’t believe what he was seeing. It should have been anatomically impossible, but magic could do a lot of things. Now what? Harry felt his confusion slowly consuming his anger and will to live. What do I do now? He floated over next to Ron and stared at his ex-friend’s body. It was sculpted and bronzed from the potion, and his flaccid penis looked like it could rip women in half. Harry had yet to see a real giant, but from what he’d read, Ron was right in the ball park of descriptions. Damn, he could probably take on that troll back in year 1.

Ron used a spell and cleaned the cum off his body. Then he expanded his cloths to fit his new sculpted frame. Feeling a like showing off a little, he shrank his close a bit so they hug his every muscle closely. As he walked, he felt the threads tense and reveal his massive bulk. He could have jizzed again right there and then. Looking down, he felt basketball of a bulge between his legs grow tighter. He quickly distracted himself, and felt the pressure die down just a little. “Too sexy for my own good.” He smirked as he walked out of the shack and back towards the castle. He had to crouch as he went through the shack.

As he stepped outside, he stood as tall as he could and saw how he was eye level with some small trees. He wondered how strong he was now, so he walked over to one of the tree and tied yanking it out of the ground. He heard the trunk groan and stretch under his grizzly like grip, but it did not tear out of the ground. However, he did leave a serious imprint in the bark and deformed it’s shape with pure strength alone. He was satisfied with that for now. “Note to self, work on guns a little more. Need to rip a tree out of the ground.”

Harry rolled his eyes as he followed along. For some reason, he was finding it hard to pay attention to Ron. His eyes were getting heavier, and he let out a yawn. No! Can’t fall asleep yet. Need to follow Ron and fix this mess! He blinked the weariness from his eyes and followed behind the muscle behemoth.

Harry flew ahead and saw the familiar school. There were posters everywhere like before, but now there were pictures of Ron plastered on every wall. One image was easily 15ft tall and it was labeled, “Life Size Image!”

145.content:
WARNING: YOU ARE ABOUT TO ENTER “REALITY MANIPULATION” SIMILATION PROTYPE ONE. CONTINUE AT YOUR DISGRESSION.

--------------------------------

*Beep Beep Beep*

A hand slammed down on the alarm.

Kent was your typical high school student. Average in basically every possible way. In a never changing loop of his teen years. What does he think about his current life?

Kent trudged to the bathroom and did… the usual.

He got out and went to put on his … usual attire.

At breakfast, he ate the… usual cereal and milk combo.

On the way out, he grabbed got his… usual “Bye son. Have a nice day!” from his mom.

He stood bye the bus… as usual.

He got up and sat next to his best friend, Tyson… like usual.

- I think you get the point. Everything is… the usual -

Kent walked home that day pretty much tired… as usual.

His mom, Sarah yelled from upstairs “Welcome home son? Anything new happen today

Kent felt his mind deflate “No mom!”

Sarah “That’s nice honey. Go have-”

Kent “I know… a fruit or something in the kitchen…” He though, at least I know that we have ‘different types of fruit’. He walked in and saw a fruit basket full with oranges. He lost his appetite immediately, and walked up to his room.

He grabbed his laptop and started to work on his programming homework. His favorite class was Computer Sciences/Programming. They were working on individual projects, and he was having a hard time coming up with an idea. The lack of change has impacted his creativity greatly.

Kent “Maybe I can get an idea from the internet.” He went to his computer and typed in “Programming Projects-” He was doing this with Google instant on, so a few things had already popped up.

There were a bunch, but one of them really stood out to him for some reason. “ReWritten: Its Your Life!”

Kent was curious “What’s ReWritten?” He read the small description at the bottom. “Looking for feed on latest reality manipulation program project. First 20 testers get to keep program indefinitely.”

Kent decided that it wouldn’t hurt to try it out. He ran a scan on the website, and it was clear of viruses. He clicked on it and an installation window opened up. He clicked download, and then he installed it. Finally, he opened the program.

“Welcome to ReWritten. Please select segment of history to be ReWritten.” Suddenly, a timeline of Kent’s whole life appeared. Starting from when he was born to current time. The time line was still growing since time wasn’t stopping.

Kent “What they. How… where. What?” Kent was looking and reading. How on earth did this info get on the internet. How do they know this stuff. Kent started reading parts of his life that he had long forgotten about. Slowly, he began to creep up the timeline until recent times. Things started to get repetitive in high school. You thought you had read the same line twice, but it had actually popped up twice! “No ****** way! This has to be a scam… but…” He couldn’t believe that his whole history was being displayed by the program.

Then a voice played “Please select segment of history to be ReWritten.”

Kent’s hand was shaking. “I’ve got to be insane to trust this thing, but ok then.” Kent scrolled down to change something minor. “Lets see what would I change.” Then he saw it.

The day of the spelling bee. “I hated that day. I almost one. If only if I spelt Received E-I and not I-E. Maybe that wouldn’t be such a bad thing to change.”

Kent highlighted that part of the time line, and another pop-up came up. “Segment selected. How will it be changed.” Then a small text box appeared. Kent typed in “Kent spelled RECEIVED correctly.” Then he pressed ReWrite. A pop-up appeared “Are you sure you wish to change this?” and below was a check box to never show it again. He checked the box and pressed “Yes”. The program “Please wait we’ll segment is ReWritten.”

Kent waited a moment, until a loading bar finished loading. “Finished. You have won a spelling bee. Congratulations.” Kent thought about the spelling bee, and still remembered losing.

Kent “What a dud. I feel like an idiot now!” Kent was rather disappointed. “Might as well delete this junk program.” Kent reached for the mouse again, but saw something next to it. It was a small trophy “For Excellent Spelling: Kent Huffman”

Kent was shocked “No way…” He grabbed the small trophy to make sure it was real. “I won?” Then a new memory popped up in his mind “I did win!”, but he could still remember losing. He turned back to the computer screen, and he saw the program was waiting for another command.

Kent was shaking with shock, amazement, and excitement most of all!

What does he do now?

1452.content:
As exciting as winning your 5th grade spelling bee is, Kent had bigger plans.

Kent smiled “Now… lets get out of this loop.” As a sophomore in junior, he’s gotten used to the high school feel, but he never got that much out of it. Puberty hasn‘t been evil or kind. A zit appears every now and then. His body was about average. His IQ was also average. “Lets see what we can do about all of this.”

Currently Kent was…
Class: Sophomore
Age: 16
Height: 5ft 7in
Weight: 146lbs
Description: His hair is blond, and his skin is slightly on the pale side since he spends a lot of his time making programs. Physically, he can pass gym, but is nothing amazing. He was always one of the middle kids to get picked to a game or anything. In class, he was barely noticed since he was so normal. Even in programming. He is pretty good at it, but he isn’t a pro like some of the other kid. Also do to his average-ness in a certain external organ, he didn’t get much notice from the girls that were higher up in the social hierarchy, or the lower parts. Sadly, he’s simply to ‘average’.

He had to go back to the day he was born. He needed to go and change things at the heart of his life “Mark Huffman will live a fun and exciting life. He will be above average in every possible way, especial with his body. His skin will always be blemish free and he has the highest grades in school.” His hands were tingling with excitement and anticipation. He click submit. A loading bar appeared “This may take a while… Time Gauge: 8hrs.”

Kent “8hrs? That isn’t so bad.” He was looking up to the prospect of what he would wake up to tomorrow morning. He decided to sleep out the wait.

----The Next Morning----

*Beep Beep Beep*

A decently muscled and tanned arm came down on the alarm turning it off.

Kent sighed “Time for another boring and dull day…”

Kent got up and went to the bathroom like… usual. He stripped and went into the shower like usual. Then he started to rub his body with soap… like usual. He felt some bumps of muscles like…

Kent blasted the water on high washing all the soap off his tanned and pretty muscled body. He Jumped out of the bath tub and looked in the mirror. “No way! Its worked!”

Now at an above average 6ft 1in, he is one of the taller kids of his class, but there were kids who were taller. His muscles matched that of a decent swimmer, but nowhere near the giant bulk of a professional swimmer. Then he saw the biggest change. His previous 3in Kent Jr. has grown to a full blown 8in long, 2.5 in wide Kent Sr. with two tennis ball sized children.

Kent gasped as he saw muscles he never had before an the endowment he now owned. He started to flex and strike various poses trying to gauge his strength. Suddenly, a flood of memories entered his mind. He was the smartest in his class of sophomores, he was one of the most popular, his parents were loaded so they send him on vacations when ever he has time, he is sought after by 75% of the female student body, and he volunteers as a modeler for a company that publicizes the need for teen health and fitness. However, he didn’t even do a sport. It appears like his body was naturally muscled.

That wasn’t all, even his childhood was changed. Kent fell to the ground shaking from the backlash of taking in to much new information.

14523.content:
*Knock Knock*

A very composed voice “Excuse me sir, but please hurry. You will be late for your bus.”

Kent remembered have a butler named Jeffry (original right?), so he played along. “Thank you Jeffry. I will get right on it.”

Jeffry “Very good sir. I will prepare your breakfast.”

Kent smiled “Jeffry…”

Jeffry “Yes sir?”

Kent “Make it something different.”

Jeffry coughed “When do I not sir?”

Kent smiled when he heard that “Never mind Jeffry. Continue with what ever you need to do.”

Jeffry “Very well sir.”

Kent heard the servant’s footsteps leave fade away. Then suddenly it hit him.

He was in a giant marble clad bathroom. “When did this all get here?” Then he remembered that things began to morph after he fell to the ground.

Kent gave his body one last look over and went back to his room to pick out something new to wear. He went for a striped t-shirt with the picture of every muscle group on the body on it looking all innocent, and a pair of cargo shorts. (Apparently, its muscle awareness day at school).

Then a question hit Kent “Why am I still going to regular school? I thought I was loaded.” Then he got a new memory. His parents didn’t want his to become some snooty rich, so they sent him to a public school to learn to have fun the right way, and not to be all stuck up and bossy. “I guess I can deal with that. Besides, public school are a lot more fun, I guess…”

He left his room, and saw that nothing in it had changed from the old reality (because he had asked his parents for a normal room, and not some tricked out hotel floor). Well… except for his wardrobe. That closet grew exponentially. The rest of the house was totally tricked out. It was a large stone mansion with dozens of marble pillars and statues. The main entrance was enormous. The floors were covered in tiles and TV’s lined the walls. It had hundreds of rooms and a grand stair case leading downstairs. The dining room could hold hundreds.

When he got to the dining room, he saw that there was one single plate with a glass of milk. “Cereal and milk?”

Suddenly Jeffry appeared “Now sir! Cereal and milk indeed! I take that as an insult. Why don’t you go and take a look at what it is?”

Kent raised a questioning eyebrow. When he got to the bowl, he saw that it wasn’t cereal, but some type of pancake fondue. “What is this?”

Jeffry was starting to worry “Sir, are you alright? You have never questioned my cooking before, nor have you ever spent that much time in the lavatories. I do not wish to pry, but its is my job too.”

Kent felt more memories pop in his head. Ever since he was little, Jeffry was there watching over him. Jeffry made sure that he was always ready for what he needed to do, and he practically raised Kent. Taught him manners, etc. “Sorry Jeffry. I’m just having a slow start today.”

Jeffry nodded understandingly “Very well. I do hope it gets better. Now sir, I would eat before the bus arrives. This is a large house, so it has a long walkway toward the bus stop. I would get a move on.”

Kent smiled. “Thanks Jeffry.”

Jeffry bowed in reply “You are most welcome sir. If you need anything, I will be waiting outside the dining hall.”

Kent nodded and began to scarf down his breakfast as breakneck speed. Good thing Jeffry wasn’t there, or he’d have had a fit.

One that was gone what did Kent do?

145231.content:
Kent was loving the new reality more and more, and he though of what else he might change. What if he wasn’t at home? How would he change something them? Kent walked back up to his room. He still had fifteen minutes before the bus came. He had no idea what Jeffry meant by him being late. There was plenty of time.

Kent went over to his computer and saw that it was still the same. He needed some mobile device… Then he looked at where he usually put his phone, however, it wasn’t his old phone. It was the latest type of its kind. “Ohh… fancy!” Kent went and picked it up. He felt more memories come into his head on how to use the phone.

He went over to his computer and selected present time. Then he typed “The ReWritten program will now transfer over to my phone, and it will work perfectly fine. The program will be erased from my computer, so that the only copy is in my phone.” Then he thought of various emergencies “No one else but I can use my phone.” Just so that nothing unexpected happened without him knowing. The loading bar loaded much faster than before, and then the program vanished from his computer and into his phone.

Kent looked at his phone and saw a the ReWritten App.

*Knock Knock*

Jeffry “Sir? Have you left yet? The walk way is a 10 minute walk. Remember?”

Kent paused as he tried to imagine walking ten minutes from the main entrance to the side walk.

Jeffry slightly concerned “Sir?”

Kent snapped out of his day dream “Sorry Jeffry. The morning is still going slow. I’ll be leaving now.”

Jeffry sighed “Very good sir.”

Kent opened the door to see his butler standing off to the side and out of his path. “Have a nice day Jeffry.”

Jeffry “And you sir. And you…”

With that, Kent went off to the bus.

What does he do then?

1452311.content:
Kent got in the bus on time, though the walk was a lot longer than he had thought it would be.

The bus was the same as before, but he was ok with that. It helped show him that he really is lucky.

As he looked for a seat, he saw his best friend, Tyson, and waved. Tyson saw this and looked away avoiding eye contact.

Kent saw this and was surprised. What happened? What Tyson hurt? Then it hit him. The popularity difference between Kent and Tyson was astronomical. He had better fix that.

Kent walked on over and sat straight next to Tyson. Tyson looked in shock as one of the most popular kids in school sat next to him. His was nervous and jittery. What evil purpose did Kent have I for sitting next to a lower geek?

Kent pulled out his phone and opened up the app. He went over to Tyson’s timeline and began to fix a few things. “Tyson’s family lives right next to mine, and they are almost as rich us my family. The two are close friends which makes Tyson and I close friends. Tyson will grow larger than average, but slightly less than me since my genetics are superior (God! Isn‘t Kent getting a little self absorbed?) to his. However, he is better at football (Well… maybe not to selfish).

Then Kent remembered how long it takes for changes like this to occur. Then he put a command at the top “The phone can run the ReWritten app so well that all changes finish loading in as soon as Kent Huffman submit’s a change.” Then he pressed submit. The phone loaded the first command, and then suddenly, it was finished.

Kent smiled and then he felt the seat get just a smidge more cramped. He looked over and saw that his once small friend had grown to almost match him in size.

Tyson raised his hand to initiate their special handshake. Kent followed through. “Hey Kent. You look excited. What’s up?”

Kent laughed “I just woke up to a good morning. That’s all.”

Tyson “Well that’s good. You want to hang out after school? I heard they opened up a new bowling ally down the street from our school.”

Kent thought about “Sure why not?”

Tyson “Awesome.” Then someone caught his eye “Hey lover boy. Guess who’s behind you.”

Kent was shocked by the sudden change in topic. Lover boy? What could that possibly mean? Kent turned around and found himself face planted into a pair of GG cup boobs.

There were a dozen “ooohs” from the other teens.

A feminine voice “Aww… Kenty-poo. Having fun?”

Kent was paralyzed. His face began to fill with blood, and he almost had a nosebleed. Was this who he though it was. The crush of his life… Amy?

He looked up and out of the two mounds and it was true. No one else had a set like hers. “A-a--a- Amy! Hey! Um…. Ahh…. This isn’t… I meen…”

Amy put a finger on his mouth and giggled “Its alright. I’ll forgive this once. If you bye me lunch today.”

Kent was still unable to accept this reality. He had this girl! This girl! In this reality! He was loving it more and more! “Of course. Anything for you.”

Amy pouted “Anything?”

Kent felt a shiver run up his spine, and he was suddenly afraid. He quickly added “With in reason of course.”

Amy smiled “Of course! When haven’t I been reasonable.”

Kent smiled “I don’t really know.”

Amy smiled “So lunch right?”

Kent smiled “Right.”

Amy continued past him and sat by some of her girl friends. They were doing their little chats and gossips.

Kent turned around and came saw a Tyson ready to tackle him with excitement. “What?”

Tyson “It’s amazing someone like her existed with a rack like that.”

Kent smiled “I know, and I’m in a relationship with her!”

Tyson “Your one lucky guy.”

Kent smiled “And she’s wicked nice. Funny too!”

Tyson nodded “Yup.”

Kent continued to name Amy’s good qualities until he noticed a change in Tyson. Tyson seemed less happy now. As if he was jealous. Kent search his memories on the topic. Then it hit him. Tyson was single!

Kent pulled out his phone ready to correct the little mishap. “Tyson is in a deep relationship with Rina, Amy’s best friend. They spend as much time together and Amy and I.” Then he submit.

Suddenly, Tyson wasn’t so gloomy anymore. He seems kind of excited.

Kent “Now you look excited and a little anxious. What’s up?”

Tyson “Its my half year-adversary with Rina. I got her something special, and I hope she likes it.”

Kent smiled “Tyson! You player!”

Tyson chuckled nervously “Ok… ok. I get it. I know that you know a pretty sappy guy at relationships. Stop pushing it.”

Kent raised his hand is a sign of peace and resignation.

The doors open, and his goddess arrives to sit next to him at the table.

Amy “Hey Kent honey. Ready to get me lunch?”

They get in line, which was moving mind numbingly slow. While they waited, Kent got lost again and his cargo shorts began to bulge slightly. He felt his body temperature rise.

(Amy has been with Kent for so long that their relationship is similar to a friendship. They understand each other relatively well.).

Kent was slowly getting the words out. He tried to ignore the increasing sensitivity and horniness that he was trying hard to suppress “I’m… fine…”

145231121.content:
Kent strolled down the hall with his new/old girlfriend and dropped her off at class. Goodbye… see you soon… etc.

After all that, he went to gym class. “I wonder what we’re doing today?”

He walked into the locker room and saw that he was place in the gym class for the most popular student. At his high school, you got to pick which classes to go into, so there ended up to be a class full of the weak and meek kids, and a class full of the strongest and most proud kids.

When Kent entered, he was hit bye the sent of the precious’s class’s male sweat and musk.

He heard someone yell “They need better ventilation. This room reeks.”.

Some one else yelled “They would, but the concentrated sweat of a whole school of boys could potentially destroy all life as we know it.” This got that kid a few slaps on the back and a few chuckles.

Kent smiled. This was his type of group. He walked on over and tried to relate. They seems relatively open to him.

Suddenly, a 6ft5in, bulging behemoth opened the door so fast that it created a small vacuum in space to be filled with air. He walked/ shook the school as he walked over. Senior, Mark James Tootsie, was the schools ultimate jock. He was far to aggressive and far to dominate for anyone to saw anything about it. His shelf like pecs made it impossible for anyone to see his face when he was in front of them. If you stood next to his arm, you felt like they would crush you for being so near. All this muscles must make you think his testosterone factories must be pretty larger. Right? Wrong! With pea sizes testes and a 2in Mark Jr., he’s far to embarrassed to comment.

He stormed pass your group and gave you a hard cold glare. He hated you because of the abnormal bulge you normally display. He hated his name, and wanted a more appealing one like yours. However, he was glad that his body was better. He had to take medical steroids to keep up, and he does sneak another one in every now and then.

As he passed, the group let out a sigh. Kent, “What’s his problem?”

The group still felt the tension from moment ago.

Tyson “You don’t remember what “The Violator” did to the last kid that messed with him?”

Kent paused and thought about it. The image of two broken legs came to mind. “Why didn’t he get suspended again?”

Tyson “Because they couldn’t prove it! He used gloves and every thing to keep his DNA and finger prints off the body. He even poked a hole in his vocal cords so he couldn’t talk! He violated basic human murals. That‘s what he did!”

Kent’s face paled. He went to school with a psychopath! He had change something, or else he’ll get hurt. “Ok… thanks for reminding me.”. He turned away from the group and hid behind a stall, and pulled out his phone.

He knew he had above average strength that was relative to his decent muscle mass, but he was going to need more. “Kent Huffman will grow to be one of the strongest kids in school.” Then it hit him that even though he was big, he couldn’t keep and eye on Mark all the time, and Mark could hurt someone else. Kent went to the source of the kids problems and tried to fix them. The one that everyone knew about was his name. “Mark James Tootsies was named Mark Jetson instead.” Maybe this would make the mean… well… less mean. He pressed submit.

The loading bar appeared and then vanished, and he waited for his changes. Nothing changed. “What they?” He looked in the mirror to see if anything new happened, but he stilled looked the same. He looked for changes on the phone and it said the change has been made. “Maybe I need to wait?” He gave waiting a shot and put his phone away.

Kent changed into his set of gym attire and went out on the floor.

Coach Miller was running the show to do. As the request of the principal, he would have to run a fitness test. “Ok. Everyone! Line up! We’re completing a required fitness examination today.” the previous class groaned since they were the less developed class. This class seems more enthusiastic about seeing their rank in the school’s physical hierarchy.

Kent felt a bit anxious. What if he was to weak? He didn’t see any of the changes. He looked down at his arm and noticed something.

What was it?
